engChrName: These settings are for checking mob placement during day/evening/night. Remove these once they are no longer needed.
engSearchText:
These settings are for checking mob placement
during day/evening/night. Remove these once they
are no longer needed.
jpnChrName: 昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。 ※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select one character to patrol the city together. (Note: This can be changed at any time via the Travel menu, etc.)
engSearchText:
★DEBUG: Select one character to patrol the city together.
(Note: This can be changed at any time via the Travel menu, etc.)
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：市内を巡回するメンバーを一人選んで下さい。 （※移動メニュー等でいつでも変更できます）
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：市内を巡回するメンバーを一人選んで下さい。
（※移動メニュー等でいつでも変更できます）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Agnès, Feri, and Aaron have entered the party. Select two additional members.
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Agnès, Feri, and Aaron have entered the party. Select two additional members.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：アニエス、フェリ、アーロンがパーティに入りました。 追加のメンバーを２名選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：アニエス、フェリ、アーロンがパーティに入りました。
追加のメンバーを２名選んでください。

engChrName: ◆(Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).
engSearchText: ◆(Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).
jpnChrName: ◆（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）
jpnSearchText: ◆（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）

engChrName: ◆(Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).
engSearchText: ◆(Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).
jpnChrName: ◆（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）
jpnSearchText: ◆（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）
jpnSearchText: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）
jpnSearchText: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you in addition to Van/Agnès/Risette.
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you in addition to Van/Agnès/Risette.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：ヴァン・アニエス・リゼットに加えて 連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：ヴァン・アニエス・リゼットに加えて
連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select 1 accompanying character. (This can be changed later.)
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select 1 accompanying character. (This can be changed later.)
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：同行メンバーを一人選んでください。 （後で変更も可能です。）
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：同行メンバーを一人選んでください。
（後で変更も可能です。）

engChrName: We had this huge group of devils right on Second Street over there.
engSearchText:
We had this huge group of devils right on Second
Street over there.
jpnChrName: その先……黒芒街の“２番街”があるのだけど、 そっちに悪魔がなだれ込んできたらしくてね。
jpnSearchText:
その先……黒芒街の“２番街”があるのだけど、
そっちに悪魔がなだれ込んできたらしくてね。

engChrName: Thankfully, we have it under control now. We banded together with the locals to drive them out.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, we have it under control now.
We banded together with the locals to drive
them out.
jpnChrName: 丁度さっきみんなで協力して 蹴散らした所よ。
jpnSearchText:
丁度さっきみんなで協力して
蹴散らした所よ。

engChrName: It made me appreciate just how tough jaegers are. Those guys handled stuff that I sure as hell wouldn't trust a civilian with.
engSearchText:
It made me appreciate just how tough jaegers are.
Those guys handled stuff that I sure as hell wouldn't
trust a civilian with.
jpnChrName: ……それにしても、猟兵はやっぱり頑丈ね。 普段売らない品も使いこなせるなんて。
jpnSearchText:
……それにしても、猟兵はやっぱり頑丈ね。
普段売らない品も使いこなせるなんて。

engChrName: I'm gonna have to give 'em some downers later, though—they got a little too amped up for my liking once their stuff kicked in.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna have to give 'em some downers later,
though—they got a little too amped up for my liking
once their stuff kicked in.
jpnChrName: ちょっと興奮しすぎだから あとで別のハーブで落ち着かせるけど。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと興奮しすぎだから
あとで別のハーブで落ち着かせるけど。

engChrName: Those jaegers are some tough customers. You can always count on them when the going gets tough.
engSearchText:
Those jaegers are some tough customers. You can
always count on them when the going gets tough.
jpnChrName: 猟兵はやっぱり頑丈ね。 こういう時は頼りになるわ。
jpnSearchText:
猟兵はやっぱり頑丈ね。
こういう時は頼りになるわ。

engChrName: I think they could use some tranquilizing herbs, though... I had them on some potent stuff back there. You don't wanna overdose on that.
engSearchText:
I think they could use some tranquilizing
herbs, though... I had them on some potent stuff
back there. You don't wanna overdose on that.
jpnChrName: とはいえ使いすぎは禁物…… あとで別のハーブで落ち着かせないとね。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ使いすぎは禁物……
あとで別のハーブで落ち着かせないとね。

engChrName: Man, they're really getting pelted up on the surface, huh?
engSearchText:
Man, they're really getting pelted up on the
surface, huh?
jpnChrName: ……なんでも地上は大変らしいわね？
jpnSearchText: ……なんでも地上は大変らしいわね？

engChrName: We don't have a complete picture of what's going on, but we don't turn away anybody who comes down here. That's our code.
engSearchText:
We don't have a complete picture of what's going on,
but we don't turn away anybody who comes
down here. That's our code.
jpnChrName: 私たちも把握できてるわけじゃないけど、 来る者拒まずが黒芒街のルールよ。
jpnSearchText:
私たちも把握できてるわけじゃないけど、
来る者拒まずが黒芒街のルールよ。

engChrName: They need a place to stay, we'll take them. And if they need a little pick-me-up? Well, we've got just the thing for that, too!
engSearchText:
They need a place to stay, we'll take them. And if
they need a little pick-me-up? Well, we've got just
the thing for that, too!
jpnChrName: せいぜい受け入れてあげましょう。 不安ならイイ薬もお渡しできるしね。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい受け入れてあげましょう。
不安ならイイ薬もお渡しできるしね。

engChrName: Y'know, I wasn't born in Calvard, but I still fit in here. I respect the Republic's values like that.
engSearchText:
Y'know, I wasn't born in Calvard, but I still fit
in here. I respect the Republic's values like that.
jpnChrName: 私は共和国の出身ではないけれど、 この国の理念は嫌いではないわよ。
jpnSearchText:
私は共和国の出身ではないけれど、
この国の理念は嫌いではないわよ。

engChrName: Freedom and equality for all, regardless of color or creed...
engSearchText:
Freedom and equality for all, regardless of color
or creed...
jpnChrName: 国籍・人種に関わらず 自由と平等を謳う共和国憲章──
jpnSearchText:
国籍・人種に関わらず
自由と平等を謳う共和国憲章──

engChrName: Society doesn't always do a good job sticking to those tenets, but it's nice to have them outlined right in the constitution.
engSearchText:
Society doesn't always do a good job sticking to those
tenets, but it's nice to have them outlined right in
the constitution.
jpnChrName: 例えそれが形だけのものであってもね。
jpnSearchText: 例えそれが形だけのものであってもね。

engChrName: Even people like me can find the place for them— and for me, that's the Blacklight District. So yeah, I don't mind celebrating a bit!
engSearchText:
Even people like me can find the place for them—
and for me, that's the Blacklight District. So yeah, I
don't mind celebrating a bit!
jpnChrName: フフ、なんにせよ祝杯くらい上げましょうか。 私たちを受け入れてくれたこの国と黒芒街に。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、なんにせよ祝杯くらい上げましょうか。
私たちを受け入れてくれたこの国と黒芒街に。

engChrName: Yo there. Got a new flavor in stock, if you wanna check it out.
engSearchText:
Yo there. Got a new flavor in stock, if you wanna
check it out.
jpnChrName: ウフフ、いらっしゃい。 新作のフレーバーなんていかがかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ、いらっしゃい。
新作のフレーバーなんていかがかしら。

engChrName: Twice the cost, but twice the concentration for twice the high—and it's no more addictive than the weaker stuff. Wanna give it a shot?
engSearchText:
Twice the cost, but twice the concentration for twice
the high—and it's no more addictive than the
weaker stuff. Wanna give it a shot?
jpnChrName: 依存性はそのままに 値段とキメ具合を２倍にしてみたわ。
jpnSearchText:
依存性はそのままに
値段とキメ具合を２倍にしてみたわ。

engChrName: Can't say I do, sorry. I'll pass.
engSearchText: Can't say I do, sorry. I'll pass.
jpnChrName: いや、そういう品は遠慮しててな……
jpnSearchText: いや、そういう品は遠慮しててな……

engChrName: Ah, that's a shame. I worked hard on it for the festival, y'know—I made sure it's worth the price.
engSearchText:
Ah, that's a shame. I worked hard on it for the
festival, y'know—I made sure it's worth the price.
jpnChrName: そう、残念……記念祭に向けて 開発した渾身の品だったのだけど。
jpnSearchText:
そう、残念……記念祭に向けて
開発した渾身の品だったのだけど。

engChrName: But no worries—if you don't want it, you don't want it. Oh, and I've still got all my usual stock, in case you're craving something else.
engSearchText:
But no worries—if you don't want it, you don't
want it. Oh, and I've still got all my usual stock, in
case you're craving something else.
jpnChrName: まあいいわ、いつもの品も入荷してるし また御贔屓にね。
jpnSearchText:
まあいいわ、いつもの品も入荷してるし
また御贔屓にね。

engChrName: (It's kinda weird. It's still dark and gloomy down here, but it feels like everybody's really excited.)
engSearchText:
(It's kinda weird. It's still dark and gloomy down here,
but it feels like everybody's really excited.)
jpnChrName: （黒芒街……相変わらずですけど   どこかウキウキしてるような。）
jpnSearchText:
（黒芒街……相変わらずですけど
どこかウキウキしてるような。）

engChrName: (I guess even the Blacklight District gets swept up in the festival cheer.)
engSearchText:
(I guess even the Blacklight District gets swept up in
the festival cheer.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……こんな場所でも   お祭りが近いと賑わうみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……こんな場所でも
お祭りが近いと賑わうみたいですね。）

engChrName: I wish you'd try my new stuff. I poured a ton of work into it in time for the Revolution Festival. I just know it's worth your while.
engSearchText:
I wish you'd try my new stuff. I poured a ton of work
into it in time for the Revolution Festival. I just know
it's worth your while.
jpnChrName: 残念、記念祭に向けて開発した 渾身の品だったのだけど。
jpnSearchText:
残念、記念祭に向けて開発した
渾身の品だったのだけど。

engChrName: But hey, you do you. I've still got all my usual stock, so whatever you're in the market for, I've got'cha.
engSearchText:
But hey, you do you. I've still got all my usual stock,
so whatever you're in the market for, I've got'cha.
jpnChrName: まあいいわ、いつもの品も入荷してるし また御贔屓にね。
jpnSearchText:
まあいいわ、いつもの品も入荷してるし
また御贔屓にね。

engChrName: *sigh* Almata just had to go off the deep end, didn't they?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Almata just had to go off the deep end,
didn't they?
jpnChrName: ふう、アルマータの連中 ここまでの事をしでかすなんてね……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、アルマータの連中
ここまでの事をしでかすなんてね……

engChrName: I don't buy the whole 'show of force' bit, personally. There's gotta be more to it than that, just my gut feeling.
engSearchText:
I don't buy the whole 'show of force' bit, personally.
There's gotta be more to it than that, just my
gut feeling.
jpnChrName: 武力の示威行為（デモンストレーション）…… でも果たしてそれだけなのかしら……？
jpnSearchText:
武力の示威行為（デモンストレーション）……
でも果たしてそれだけなのかしら……？

engChrName: I'm feeling it, too—it's gone and knocked my supply routes out of commission. Business is gonna be real tough for a while...
engSearchText:
I'm feeling it, too—it's gone and knocked my supply
routes out of commission. Business is gonna be real
tough for a while...
jpnChrName: 何にせよしばらくは仕入れルートも 使えないし、こっちまで動きづらいわね……
jpnSearchText:
何にせよしばらくは仕入れルートも
使えないし、こっちまで動きづらいわね……

engChrName: I used to sell up on the surface until about two years ago. That was when those guys moved in and started dealing themselves—Almata, I mean.
engSearchText:
I used to sell up on the surface until about two
years ago. That was when those guys moved in and
started dealing themselves—Almata, I mean.
jpnChrName: 私は２年前までオモテで売っていたのだけど、 その頃から連中が薬物関係を仕切り始めたのよね。
jpnSearchText:
私は２年前までオモテで売っていたのだけど、
その頃から連中が薬物関係を仕切り始めたのよね。

engChrName: And man, they're ruthless. I couldn't tell you how many of my routes they've snatched up in those short years.
engSearchText:
And man, they're ruthless. I couldn't tell you how
many of my routes they've snatched up in those
short years.
jpnChrName: ……そう、アルマータの連中よ。 私の取引ルートもいくつも潰されて……
jpnSearchText:
……そう、アルマータの連中よ。
私の取引ルートもいくつも潰されて……

engChrName: I could swear they were after my head at one point. I went underground after that, and I don't regret that decision one bit.
engSearchText:
I could swear they were after my head at one point.
I went underground after that, and I don't regret that
decision one bit.
jpnChrName: 流石に身の危険を感じて地下に潜ったの。 今でも英断だったと思ってるわ。
jpnSearchText:
流石に身の危険を感じて地下に潜ったの。
今でも英断だったと思ってるわ。

engChrName: Blacklight's a good place to be. We have the boss watching out for us—A can't come slithering in like they usually do. It's safe here, y'know?
engSearchText:
Blacklight's a good place to be. We have the boss
watching out for us—A can't come slithering in like
they usually do. It's safe here, y'know?
jpnChrName: 黒芒街（ここ）には顔役もいるし、連中も 簡単には手が出せないから、まだ安心よ。
jpnSearchText:
黒芒街（ここ）には顔役もいるし、連中も
簡単には手が出せないから、まだ安心よ。

engChrName: My herbs get pretty good reviews—I promise you'll have a good time. Just take them in moderation, of course... Heh heh.
engSearchText:
My herbs get pretty good reviews—I promise you'll
have a good time. Just take them in moderation,
of course... Heh heh.
jpnChrName: ウチのハーブは愛用者も多いのよね、フフフ…… 用法用量を守れば楽しくハイになれるわよ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチのハーブは愛用者も多いのよね、フフフ……
用法用量を守れば楽しくハイになれるわよ。

engChrName: And be careful who you do business with. Plenty of bad actors here in Edith who'll sell you dirty stuff. It can get you in real trouble.
engSearchText:
And be careful who you do business with. Plenty of
bad actors here in Edith who'll sell you dirty stuff.
It can get you in real trouble.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、首都には粗悪品を扱っている 悪徳業者もいるから気を付けなさいな。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、首都には粗悪品を扱っている
悪徳業者もいるから気を付けなさいな。

engChrName: For a while, I remember A was trafficking these shady steroids.
engSearchText:
For a while, I remember A was trafficking these
shady steroids.
jpnChrName: 一時は《Ａ》の連中が 怪しい筋力増強剤を流していたっけ……
jpnSearchText:
一時は《Ａ》の連中が
怪しい筋力増強剤を流していたっけ……

engChrName: Guys say it's real good when you take it, but it wrecks you in the long run. I'd steer clear of that stuff if I were you.
engSearchText:
Guys say it's real good when you take it, but it wrecks
you in the long run. I'd steer clear of that stuff if I
were you.
jpnChrName: 構成員も使っているようだけど、 かなり負担が大きいからおススメしないわ。
jpnSearchText:
構成員も使っているようだけど、
かなり負担が大きいからおススメしないわ。

engChrName: Hey there! Can I interest you in any of my specialty herbs? Satisfaction guaranteed, heh heh.
engSearchText:
Hey there! Can I interest you in any of my
specialty herbs? Satisfaction guaranteed, heh heh.
jpnChrName: ウフフ、いらっしゃい。 イイ気持ちになれるハーブはいかがかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ、いらっしゃい。
イイ気持ちになれるハーブはいかがかしら？

engChrName: Before you ask, all my stuff is all safe and street legal. I'm just here to give people a good time.
engSearchText:
Before you ask, all my stuff is all safe and street legal.
I'm just here to give people a good time.
jpnChrName: ウチのは一応、法的にもセーフな品よ。 効果がバッチリ出るってだけでね。
jpnSearchText:
ウチのは一応、法的にもセーフな品よ。
効果がバッチリ出るってだけでね。

engChrName: I do have some of the grayer stuff, but I've had issues with people not using it right. Can't trust those boys with it, so I don't advertise it.
engSearchText:
I do have some of the grayer stuff, but I've had issues
with people not using it right. Can't trust those boys
with it, so I don't advertise it.
jpnChrName: グレーな品もないわけじゃないけど…… 前にとある連中に流したら“壊れた”事があってね。
jpnSearchText:
グレーな品もないわけじゃないけど……
前にとある連中に流したら“壊れた”事があってね。

engChrName: I told them to be careful with that stuff, but no dice. But, well, that's what I get for dealing with those types. Never again.
engSearchText:
I told them to be careful with that stuff, but no dice.
But, well, that's what I get for dealing with
those types. Never again.
jpnChrName: あの半グレ達、用法用量は守りなさいって言ったのに。 ……ま、自業自得だけど以来控えてるのよ。
jpnSearchText:
あの半グレ達、用法用量は守りなさいって言ったのに。
……ま、自業自得だけど以来控えてるのよ。

engChrName: (Way she talks, it sounds like her stuff's on the up-and-up. You just gotta use it wisely and you'll be fine.)
engSearchText:
(Way she talks, it sounds like her stuff's on
the up-and-up. You just gotta use it wisely and you'll
be fine.)
jpnChrName: （ここはまだ真っ当な品が中心だな。   わきまえて使う分には問題ないはずだぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ここはまだ真っ当な品が中心だな。
わきまえて使う分には問題ないはずだぜ。）

engChrName: (Interesting. Maybe I'll take a look at her inventory— partly because I'm curious and partly to make sure she's sticking to her word.)
engSearchText:
(Interesting. Maybe I'll take a look at her inventory—
partly because I'm curious and partly to make sure
she's sticking to her word.)
jpnChrName: （なるほどなぁ、調査も兼ねて   ちょいと覗いてみるかね。）
jpnSearchText:
（なるほどなぁ、調査も兼ねて
ちょいと覗いてみるかね。）

engChrName: You know, I had some funky hookahs come in through Tharbad.
engSearchText:
You know, I had some funky hookahs come in
through Tharbad.
jpnChrName: そういえばしばらく前に、サルバッド経由で “妙なシーシャ”が流れてきてね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばしばらく前に、サルバッド経由で
“妙なシーシャ”が流れてきてね。

engChrName: I had them for sale for a hot minute, but then I heard the police were going around clearing them off the streets.
engSearchText:
I had them for sale for a hot minute, but then I heard
the police were going around clearing them off
the streets.
jpnChrName: ウチでも一時期扱っていたけど、 警察が回収してるって聞いて分析したら……
jpnSearchText:
ウチでも一時期扱っていたけど、
警察が回収してるって聞いて分析したら……

engChrName: I open them up and, sure enough, they've got some real hardcore stuff in them. I pulled them after that— it's just not worth it.
engSearchText:
I open them up and, sure enough, they've got some
real hardcore stuff in them. I pulled them after that—
it's just not worth it.
jpnChrName: まあ色々とディープな成分だったから すぐに取り扱いをやめたわ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ色々とディープな成分だったから
すぐに取り扱いをやめたわ。

engChrName: I'm not in that kinda business. I sell good times, not lifetimes.
engSearchText:
I'm not in that kinda business. I sell good times,
not lifetimes.
jpnChrName: 流石にそういう品を売りさばくのは 抵抗があるのよね。
jpnSearchText:
流石にそういう品を売りさばくのは
抵抗があるのよね。

engChrName: (She must be talking about those orbal hookahs. Good to hear the police got rid of them here, too!)
engSearchText:
(She must be talking about those orbal hookahs.
Good to hear the police got rid of them here, too!)
jpnChrName: （例の導力シーシャが……でもちゃんと   回収されたみたいで良かったです！）
jpnSearchText:
（例の導力シーシャが……でもちゃんと
回収されたみたいで良かったです！）

engChrName: (Generally, the longer a shop's been around, the better the vendors know what to sell and not sell. This lady here's a bit of an outlier, but still.)
engSearchText:
(Generally, the longer a shop's been around, the
better the vendors know what to sell and not sell.
This lady here's a bit of an outlier, but still.)
jpnChrName: （黒芒街の連中も色々だが、   老舗ほど弁えた連中が多い。）
jpnSearchText:
（黒芒街の連中も色々だが、
老舗ほど弁えた連中が多い。）

engChrName: (It ain't THAT scary, shoppin' down here—just remember where those lines are and make sure you don't cross 'em. All right?)
engSearchText:
(It ain't THAT scary, shoppin' down here—just
remember where those lines are and make sure you
don't cross 'em. All right?)
jpnChrName: （ま、線引きのラインは見極めつつ   使えるものは使っていくでいいだろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、線引きのラインは見極めつつ
使えるものは使っていくでいいだろ。）

engChrName: (Right! That's good to know!)
engSearchText: (Right! That's good to know!)

engChrName: Blacklight's important to a lot of us. It lets us do our business in peace, free from prying eyes.
engSearchText:
Blacklight's important to a lot of us. It lets us do our
business in peace, free from prying eyes.
jpnChrName: ここはワシらが安心して 商売に励める大事な場所なんじゃよ。
jpnSearchText:
ここはワシらが安心して
商売に励める大事な場所なんじゃよ。

engChrName: So I don't care WHO Almata sends down here, I'm not giving them one rege of our turf! If anything of mine would help, you let me know.
engSearchText:
So I don't care WHO Almata sends down here, I'm
not giving them one rege of our turf! If anything of
mine would help, you let me know.
jpnChrName: アルマータだろうと明け渡すつもりはないぞい。 さあさあ、しっかり準備していくがいい。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータだろうと明け渡すつもりはないぞい。
さあさあ、しっかり準備していくがいい。

engChrName: We're counting on you young'uns! Don't let us down!
engSearchText: We're counting on you young'uns! Don't let us down!
jpnChrName: ほっほ、朗報も期待しておるぞい！
jpnSearchText: ほっほ、朗報も期待しておるぞい！

engChrName: I dunno what in the world those demon-looking things are, and I'm clueless as to why all those guys are frozen in place...
engSearchText:
I dunno what in the world those demon-looking
things are, and I'm clueless as to why all those guys
are frozen in place...
jpnChrName: あの悪魔もどきが何なのかは知らんが…… ついでに“停まった”連中も謎ばかりじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
あの悪魔もどきが何なのかは知らんが……
ついでに“停まった”連中も謎ばかりじゃが……

engChrName: ...but this is the Blacklight District! It'll take more than a couple of freakshows to rattle us.
engSearchText:
...but this is the Blacklight District! It'll take more
than a couple of freakshows to rattle us.
jpnChrName: ほっほ、ここは黒芒街。 そう簡単にくたばったりはせんぞい。
jpnSearchText:
ほっほ、ここは黒芒街。
そう簡単にくたばったりはせんぞい。

engChrName: I've got these protective amulets for sale, if you're interested. No idea if they work at all, but it can't hurt to give them a try.
engSearchText:
I've got these protective amulets for sale, if
you're interested. No idea if they work at all, but it
can't hurt to give them a try.
jpnChrName: 効くかは知らんが魔よけグッズも扱っておる。 見るだけでも見ていくがいいぞい。
jpnSearchText:
効くかは知らんが魔よけグッズも扱っておる。
見るだけでも見ていくがいいぞい。

engChrName: I've known old Filenkov for decades now. He and I must go back...oh, 30 years, probably.
engSearchText:
I've known old Filenkov for decades now. He and I
must go back...oh, 30 years, probably.
jpnChrName: フィレンコフとは長い付き合いでの、 かれこれ３０年以上になるか……
jpnSearchText:
フィレンコフとは長い付き合いでの、
かれこれ３０年以上になるか……

engChrName: Oddball, for sure, but customers like him are a rare breed.
engSearchText:
Oddball, for sure, but customers like him are a
rare breed.
jpnChrName: この通りの変わり者じゃが それだけに貴重な取引相手でもあるんじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
この通りの変わり者じゃが
それだけに貴重な取引相手でもあるんじゃ。

engChrName: Although I can't remember how long it's been since I last saw him in person. He hasn't really aged gracefully, has he?
engSearchText:
Although I can't remember how long it's been since I
last saw him in person. He hasn't really aged
gracefully, has he?
jpnChrName: ……しかし顔を見たのは何年ぶりじゃ？ 幾つになってもフラフラしすぎじゃのお～。
jpnSearchText:
……しかし顔を見たのは何年ぶりじゃ？
幾つになってもフラフラしすぎじゃのお～。

engChrName: I got to sell off that lovely vase today—business is just booming these days! I'm on cloud nine, hoho!
engSearchText:
I got to sell off that lovely vase today—business is just
booming these days! I'm on cloud nine, hoho!
jpnChrName: 今日はイイ壺が売れたんじゃよ。 ほっほ、景気も良うて万々歳じゃのう～♪
jpnSearchText:
今日はイイ壺が売れたんじゃよ。
ほっほ、景気も良うて万々歳じゃのう～♪

engChrName: Hmm...? Now, you don't look very sunny, sonny. What's got you down?
engSearchText:
Hmm...? Now, you don't look very sunny, sonny.
What's got you down?
jpnChrName: おや……何やらしけたツラをしとるの？
jpnSearchText: おや……何やらしけたツラをしとるの？

engChrName: We drove out those Almata goons for good, yeah? What better reason to go out and party?
engSearchText:
We drove out those Almata goons for good, yeah?
What better reason to go out and party?
jpnChrName: アルマータの連中も壊滅したんじゃ。 ぱーっと遊んでいったらどうじゃ？
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの連中も壊滅したんじゃ。
ぱーっと遊んでいったらどうじゃ？

engChrName: The Blacklight District is just packed with people these days... It's a madhouse, I swear.
engSearchText:
The Blacklight District is just packed with people
these days... It's a madhouse, I swear.
jpnChrName: 今黒芒街にも色んな連中が入り込んどってな。 正直カオスになってきたわい。
jpnSearchText:
今黒芒街にも色んな連中が入り込んどってな。
正直カオスになってきたわい。

engChrName: Some are selling, some are snooping, some are just doing whatever they darn well please. It's hard to know what's going on anymore.
engSearchText:
Some are selling, some are snooping, some are just
doing whatever they darn well please. It's hard to
know what's going on anymore.
jpnChrName: 偵察、売り込み、何を考えとるのか 分からん連中も多い。
jpnSearchText:
偵察、売り込み、何を考えとるのか
分からん連中も多い。

engChrName: It's gotten everybody a bit high strung lately. Be careful walking around—you don't wanna set anybody off.
engSearchText:
It's gotten everybody a bit high strung lately.
Be careful walking around—you don't wanna set
anybody off.
jpnChrName: お陰でピリついとる住人もおる、 ブラつくなら気をつけてのう。
jpnSearchText:
お陰でピリついとる住人もおる、
ブラつくなら気をつけてのう。

engChrName: Oof, ack... Why's my old wound giving me trouble again...?
engSearchText:
Oof, ack... Why's my old wound giving me trouble
again...?
jpnChrName: イタタ……なぜか近頃古傷がうずくのぉ……
jpnSearchText: イタタ……なぜか近頃古傷がうずくのぉ……

engChrName: Might just be karma. What goes around, comes around. This isn't the first time it's given me grief, and I doubt it'll be the last.
engSearchText:
Might just be karma. What goes around,
comes around. This isn't the first time it's given me
grief, and I doubt it'll be the last.
jpnChrName: これでも因果な商売じゃからの、 刺された事も１度や２度じゃないんじゃよ。
jpnSearchText:
これでも因果な商売じゃからの、
刺された事も１度や２度じゃないんじゃよ。

engChrName: Heiyue had their eyes on me in my youth... I had to bail from Langport, it got so bad. I miss that city...
engSearchText:
Heiyue had their eyes on me in my youth... I had to
bail from Langport, it got so bad. I miss that city...
jpnChrName: ワシも若かったからの～、黒月に目をつけられて 煌都にいられなくなったのもいい思い出じゃ……
jpnSearchText:
ワシも若かったからの～、黒月に目をつけられて
煌都にいられなくなったのもいい思い出じゃ……

engChrName: Ohoho. Perhaps I should head over to Isabelle's and have her take a look at my old wound. Maybe there's something she can do for me.
engSearchText:
Ohoho. Perhaps I should head over to Isabelle's and
have her take a look at my old wound. Maybe there's
something she can do for me.
jpnChrName: ほっほ、古傷の方は またイザベルに見てもらうとするかのう～。
jpnSearchText:
ほっほ、古傷の方は
またイザベルに見てもらうとするかのう～。

engChrName: Word on the street is, the big A's finally cooling off. It's been about two weeks since they were last around.
engSearchText:
Word on the street is, the big A's finally cooling off.
It's been about two weeks since they were last around.
jpnChrName: 近頃《Ａ》の連中が姿を見せんようになっての、 裏社会でもちょっとした噂じゃよ。
jpnSearchText:
近頃《Ａ》の連中が姿を見せんようになっての、
裏社会でもちょっとした噂じゃよ。

engChrName: Maybe they're finally pulling out of Edith for good... and good riddance, I say. I can finally get back to business with them gone.
engSearchText:
Maybe they're finally pulling out of Edith for good...
and good riddance, I say. I can finally get back to
business with them gone.
jpnChrName: もう二週間……首都から手を引いたのかもしれんな。 少しはやりやすくなるといいんじゃがの～。
jpnSearchText:
もう二週間……首都から手を引いたのかもしれんな。
少しはやりやすくなるといいんじゃがの～。

engChrName: I just remembered: there were these gangsters who came up to my shop a while ago looking for some strange antique...
engSearchText:
I just remembered: there were these gangsters who
came up to my shop a while ago looking for some
strange antique...
jpnChrName: そういえば、しばらく前に半グレどもが 妙な骨董品を探しに来たんじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、しばらく前に半グレどもが
妙な骨董品を探しに来たんじゃが……

engChrName: Hindsight says they might've been working for A. Makes you wonder who's been pulling the strings behind all this—even I can't say for certain.
engSearchText:
Hindsight says they might've been working for A.
Makes you wonder who's been pulling the strings
behind all this—even I can't say for certain.
jpnChrName: あれも《Ａ》絡みだったとか。 本当にどこで糸を引いておるか分からんな。
jpnSearchText:
あれも《Ａ》絡みだったとか。
本当にどこで糸を引いておるか分からんな。

engChrName: Did my eyes deceive me, or was that Beauty's Blade working with Heiyue and Ouroboros?
engSearchText:
Did my eyes deceive me, or was that Beauty's Blade
working with Heiyue and Ouroboros?
jpnChrName: いやはや、名高き“乙女”殿に 黒月、《蛇》関係者まで集うとはのう～。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、名高き“乙女”殿に
黒月、《蛇》関係者まで集うとはのう～。

engChrName: And those weren't the only intriguing faces present, either.
engSearchText:
And those weren't the only intriguing faces
present, either.
jpnChrName: それ以外にも興味深い連中が 来ておったようじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
それ以外にも興味深い連中が
来ておったようじゃが……

engChrName: Hohoho! I shudder to think what's about to happen if all of them are putting their heads together.
engSearchText:
Hohoho! I shudder to think what's about to happen if
all of them are putting their heads together.
jpnChrName: 一体これから何が起きようとしとるのかのぉ。 ほっほ、怖い怖い……
jpnSearchText:
一体これから何が起きようとしとるのかのぉ。
ほっほ、怖い怖い……

engChrName: Well, look who it is: Mister Arkride Solutions himself! And he's got the Immovable tagging right along with him, too...
engSearchText:
Well, look who it is: Mister Arkride
Solutions himself! And he's got the Immovable
tagging right along with him, too...
jpnChrName: おお裏解決屋の、元気にしとったかの。 それに《不動》とは……
jpnSearchText:
おお裏解決屋の、元気にしとったかの。
それに《不動》とは……

engChrName: Interesting. Veeery interesting, hohoho. Something must be going on for the two of you to be working together, but I'll mind my own business.
engSearchText:
Interesting. Veeery interesting, hohoho.
Something must be going on for the two of you to be
working together, but I'll mind my own business.
jpnChrName: 成程、何かありそうじゃの～。 ほっほっほ、深くは追及せんが。
jpnSearchText:
成程、何かありそうじゃの～。
ほっほっほ、深くは追及せんが。

engChrName: Hah! You sound pretty well informed, sir. Nothing gets past you, does it?
engSearchText:
Hah! You sound pretty well informed, sir.
Nothing gets past you, does it?
jpnChrName: 情報通な爺さんみたいだな。 こりゃあ油断できんぞ、ハッハッハ！
jpnSearchText:
情報通な爺さんみたいだな。
こりゃあ油断できんぞ、ハッハッハ！

engChrName: You know what they say: knowledge is power. He who knows more, controls most. That's the key to staying in the black down here.
engSearchText:
You know what they say: knowledge is power.
He who knows more, controls most. That's the key to
staying in the black down here.
jpnChrName: 情報に通じる者が制する。 まあ商売の秘訣みたいなもんじゃからの。
jpnSearchText:
情報に通じる者が制する。
まあ商売の秘訣みたいなもんじゃからの。

engChrName: That is to say, I trust you won't have any problems with my humble little store, Mr. Vathek?
engSearchText:
That is to say, I trust you won't have any problems
with my humble little store, Mr. Vathek?
jpnChrName: というわけで今後もどうか よろしゅう頼むぞい、不動の。
jpnSearchText:
というわけで今後もどうか
よろしゅう頼むぞい、不動の。

engChrName: Of course, sir—provided you don't cause any trouble for us at the guild.
engSearchText:
Of course, sir—provided you don't cause any trouble
for us at the guild.
jpnChrName: おうよ、爺さんも ギルド（ウチ）の手を煩わせないように頼むぜ？
jpnSearchText:
おうよ、爺さんも
ギルド（ウチ）の手を煩わせないように頼むぜ？

engChrName: (Sheesh, talk about an uneasy truce. I ain't stickin' MY nose in their mind games, no sir.)
engSearchText:
(Sheesh, talk about an uneasy truce. I ain't stickin'
MY nose in their mind games, no sir.)
jpnChrName: （狐とタヌキの化かし合いってか。   ……ヤダヤダ、関わりたくねえなぁ。）
jpnSearchText:
（狐とタヌキの化かし合いってか。
……ヤダヤダ、関わりたくねえなぁ。）

engChrName: I shudder to imagine what's necessitated that, but I know better than to stick my nose where it doesn't belong.
engSearchText:
I shudder to imagine what's necessitated that, but I
know better than to stick my nose where it
doesn't belong.
jpnChrName: 何やらありそうじゃが…… 首を突っ込むのもヤボというもんかの。
jpnSearchText:
何やらありそうじゃが……
首を突っ込むのもヤボというもんかの。

engChrName: Whatever's brought you two together, I appreciate your business all the same.
engSearchText:
Whatever's brought you two together, I appreciate
your business all the same.
jpnChrName: まあともかく今後も よろしゅう頼むぞい、２人とも。
jpnSearchText:
まあともかく今後も
よろしゅう頼むぞい、２人とも。

engChrName: Hohoho! Oh, Filenkov. Haven't you learned your lesson? Are you really about to spring for a forgery?
engSearchText:
Hohoho! Oh, Filenkov. Haven't you learned
your lesson? Are you really about to spring for
a forgery?
jpnChrName: おやフィレンコフ、お前さんも懲りんのう～。 ほっほ、また贋作を売りつけられに来たのかの？
jpnSearchText:
おやフィレンコフ、お前さんも懲りんのう～。
ほっほ、また贋作を売りつけられに来たのかの？

engChrName: Come now, don't put it like that. You know me: I don't care for authenticity or for condition.
engSearchText:
Come now, don't put it like that. You know me: I
don't care for authenticity or for condition.
jpnChrName: やだなぁ爺さん、あの品は贋作といっても 東方の古代皇国の影響を受けた一品で……
jpnSearchText:
やだなぁ爺さん、あの品は贋作といっても
東方の古代皇国の影響を受けた一品で……

engChrName: I care for the story behind this piece. It's still a work of art influenced by the antiques of the East.
engSearchText:
I care for the story behind this piece. It's still a work
of art influenced by the antiques of the East.
jpnChrName: 機械仕掛け（カラクリ）は動かなかったけど あれはあれで興味深いから買ったんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
機械仕掛け（カラクリ）は動かなかったけど
あれはあれで興味深いから買ったんだよ。

engChrName: It caught my eye, and so I shall buy it. Surely my old friend would understand how I operate by now?
engSearchText:
It caught my eye, and so I shall buy it. Surely my
old friend would understand how I operate by now?
jpnChrName: 僕は美術商じゃないからねぇ、贋作かなんて どうでも……知ってるでしょう、それくらい？
jpnSearchText:
僕は美術商じゃないからねぇ、贋作かなんて
どうでも……知ってるでしょう、それくらい？

engChrName: Hohoho... Oh, you're truly one of a kind, Filenkov. Who else would shine their eyes upon such... esoteric merchandise?
engSearchText:
Hohoho... Oh, you're truly one of a kind, Filenkov.
Who else would shine their eyes upon such...
esoteric merchandise?
jpnChrName: ほっほ、相変わらずのようじゃなぁ。 そんなお前さんなら安心して売りつけられるワイ。
jpnSearchText:
ほっほ、相変わらずのようじゃなぁ。
そんなお前さんなら安心して売りつけられるワイ。

engChrName: Now, these are some interesting finds! Coming back to Edith is always worth the trip!
engSearchText:
Now, these are some interesting finds! Coming back
to Edith is always worth the trip!
jpnChrName: おっ、何か面白い品が入ったのかい？ たまには首都にも戻ってみるもんだな～！
jpnSearchText:
おっ、何か面白い品が入ったのかい？
たまには首都にも戻ってみるもんだな～！

engChrName: (Of all the places that old repairman could have ties to, never in a million years would I have guessed the Blacklight District.)
engSearchText:
(Of all the places that old repairman could have ties
to, never in a million years would I have guessed the
Blacklight District.)
jpnChrName: （修理屋のオヤジさん、まさか   黒芒街まで馴染みだったとは……）
jpnSearchText:
（修理屋のオヤジさん、まさか
黒芒街まで馴染みだったとは……）

engChrName: (But hey, this guy's wares are right up his alley. Maybe there's somethin' in there for me, too. I'll hit him up and see.)
engSearchText:
(But hey, this guy's wares are right up his alley.
Maybe there's somethin' in there for me, too. I'll hit
him up and see.)
jpnChrName: （ま、そんだけ変わった品を集めてんだろうし   俺たちも利用させてもらうとするかね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、そんだけ変わった品を集めてんだろうし
俺たちも利用させてもらうとするかね。）

engChrName: I just got a hold of Gabriella. She and her little guy Yota are both doing just fine!
engSearchText:
I just got a hold of Gabriella. She and her little guy
Yota are both doing just fine!
jpnChrName: さっきガブリエラさんと連絡がついてね。 ヨータ君共々無事だって……！
jpnSearchText:
さっきガブリエラさんと連絡がついてね。
ヨータ君共々無事だって……！

engChrName: You don't know how relieving it is to hear that. I wouldn't have been able to sleep if anything happened to those two.
engSearchText:
You don't know how relieving it is to hear that.
I wouldn't have been able to sleep if anything
happened to those two.
jpnChrName: はぁ、よかった…… 何かあったら寝覚めが悪すぎだもの～。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、よかった……
何かあったら寝覚めが悪すぎだもの～。

engChrName: Now that I know they're all okay, I can get back to mixing drinks and lifting spirits! C'mon, drink up! You'll thank yourself later!
engSearchText:
Now that I know they're all okay, I can get back to
mixing drinks and lifting spirits! C'mon, drink up!
You'll thank yourself later!
jpnChrName: 安心したらヤル気出てきちゃった！ さあさあ飲んでいって！　最後の景気づけに！
jpnSearchText:
安心したらヤル気出てきちゃった！
さあさあ飲んでいって！　最後の景気づけに！

engChrName: I... G-Goddess above, I don't know what to do! I've never seen anything like this!
engSearchText:
I... G-Goddess above, I don't know what to do!
I've never seen anything like this!
jpnChrName: どどどどうしよう…… こんな事になっちゃうなんて……
jpnSearchText:
どどどどうしよう……
こんな事になっちゃうなんて……

engChrName: Where are Gabriella and Yota?! I know they went up to the surface not too long ago...
engSearchText:
Where are Gabriella and Yota?! I know they went up
to the surface not too long ago...
jpnChrName: 地上にいるガブリエラさんたちは 大丈夫なのかしら……！？
jpnSearchText:
地上にいるガブリエラさんたちは
大丈夫なのかしら……！？

engChrName: I want to look for them, but... Gah, I'm just tied up down here. What do I do...?!
engSearchText:
I want to look for them, but... Gah, I'm just tied up
down here. What do I do...?!
jpnChrName: ……でも探しに行くわけにも…… はぁ、どうしたらいいんだろ……
jpnSearchText:
……でも探しに行くわけにも……
はぁ、どうしたらいいんだろ……

engChrName: Why, hello, handsome! Welcome to Gabriella's watering hole!
engSearchText:
Why, hello, handsome! Welcome to Gabriella's
watering hole!
jpnChrName: あら、いらっしゃ～い！ ここはガブリエラさんの酒場よ！
jpnSearchText:
あら、いらっしゃ～い！
ここはガブリエラさんの酒場よ！

engChrName: Surprised? Gabriella's put me in charge of the place for the time being.
engSearchText:
Surprised? Gabriella's put me in charge of the place
for the time being.
jpnChrName: ガブリエラさん、どうしてもヨータ君に 記念祭を見せてあげたいんですって。
jpnSearchText:
ガブリエラさん、どうしてもヨータ君に
記念祭を見せてあげたいんですって。

engChrName: She wanted to take her little guy, Yota, to the festival, and needed someone to hold down the fort. How could I say no for her kid?
engSearchText:
She wanted to take her little guy, Yota, to the festival,
and needed someone to hold down the fort.
How could I say no for her kid?
jpnChrName: 臨時でお店を任されちゃったわ。 ふふっ、仕方ないわね、もう。
jpnSearchText:
臨時でお店を任されちゃったわ。
ふふっ、仕方ないわね、もう。

engChrName: She offered to pay for the trouble, so I figured, why not? It's nice doing something new for a change.
engSearchText:
She offered to pay for the trouble, so I figured,
why not? It's nice doing something new for a change.
jpnChrName: お給金も出してくれるらしいし、 たまにはこういうのもいいかもね。
jpnSearchText:
お給金も出してくれるらしいし、
たまにはこういうのもいいかもね。

engChrName: This is actually pretty fun! I've never worked in anything like a bar before. My sales figures are gonna blow her away when she gets back!
engSearchText:
This is actually pretty fun! I've never worked in
anything like a bar before. My sales figures are gonna
blow her away when she gets back!
jpnChrName: 店員なんて初めてだけど、案外楽しいし 精一杯やってみようかしら♪
jpnSearchText:
店員なんて初めてだけど、案外楽しいし
精一杯やってみようかしら♪

engChrName: I can't go back up to the surface anymore—I've got debt collectors on my tail. So I'm just stuck down here now.
engSearchText:
I can't go back up to the surface anymore—I've got
debt collectors on my tail. So I'm just stuck down
here now.
jpnChrName: 私、元々は借金取りに追われて 黒芒街に流れ着いたのよね～。
jpnSearchText:
私、元々は借金取りに追われて
黒芒街に流れ着いたのよね～。

engChrName: I'm just trying to make ends meet, landing whatever clients I can. It's not the WORST I could be doing, but...
engSearchText:
I'm just trying to make ends meet, landing whatever
clients I can. It's not the WORST I could be
doing, but...
jpnChrName: だから地上には戻れないし、 ここで客を取るしかないんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
だから地上には戻れないし、
ここで客を取るしかないんだけど……

engChrName: ...is this really how the rest of my life goes? I'm not exactly getting any younger here.
engSearchText:
...is this really how the rest of my life goes? I'm not
exactly getting any younger here.
jpnChrName: そろそろ若くないし、このままで いいのかなって時々思っちゃうわけ。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ若くないし、このままで
いいのかなって時々思っちゃうわけ。

engChrName: Not that there's any use worrying now. It's not like I can just snap my fingers and change the way I live this late in the game. *sigh*
engSearchText:
Not that there's any use worrying now. It's not like I
can just snap my fingers and change the way I live
this late in the game. *sigh*
jpnChrName: ふふっ、今更生き方なんて 変えられないんだけどね～……
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、今更生き方なんて
変えられないんだけどね～……

engChrName: We've had a lot of real nasty jaeger types around here lately. It makes it hard to focus on my job.
engSearchText:
We've had a lot of real nasty jaeger types around
here lately. It makes it hard to focus on my job.
jpnChrName: ガラの悪い猟兵どもが妙に増えてね、 仕事になんないのよ～……
jpnSearchText:
ガラの悪い猟兵どもが妙に増えてね、
仕事になんないのよ～……

engChrName: Times like these really bog down my work, given I have to go out and bring in clients myself.
engSearchText:
Times like these really bog down my work, given I
have to go out and bring in clients myself.
jpnChrName: 自分で客を取ってると こういう時やりづらいのよね。
jpnSearchText:
自分で客を取ってると
こういう時やりづらいのよね。

engChrName: I've thought about joining Eden, but I dunno if I could hack it when all their other girls are so much younger... *sigh*
engSearchText:
I've thought about joining Eden, but I dunno if I
could hack it when all their other girls are so
much younger... *sigh*
jpnChrName: 《エデン》に入るのも考えたけど、 あたしもうそんなに若くないし……
jpnSearchText:
《エデン》に入るのも考えたけど、
あたしもうそんなに若くないし……

engChrName: Little Yota's just too cute for his own good, I tell you. He makes all your worries melt away...
engSearchText:
Little Yota's just too cute for his own good, I tell you.
He makes all your worries melt away...
jpnChrName: はぁ、ヨータ君カワイイ…… ……癒されるわ～……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、ヨータ君カワイイ……
……癒されるわ～……

engChrName: I think maybe my luck's starting to look up. I'm not seeing those feisty, fight-picking gangsters around here anymore, for one.
engSearchText:
I think maybe my luck's starting to look up. I'm not
seeing those feisty, fight-picking gangsters around
here anymore, for one.
jpnChrName: フフ、今日はイイ感じに上客が取れたの。 羽振りのいいオトコって好きよ㈱
jpnSearchText:
フフ、今日はイイ感じに上客が取れたの。
羽振りのいいオトコって好きよ㈱

engChrName: And then just today, I bagged a real VIP client! I'm so proud of myself! I love getting a real big shot, heehee. ㈱
engSearchText:
And then just today, I bagged a real VIP client!
I'm so proud of myself! I love getting a real big
shot, heehee. ㈱
jpnChrName: 絡んでくる半グレ連中も見かけないし、 最近ツキが向いてるのかもね～。
jpnSearchText:
絡んでくる半グレ連中も見かけないし、
最近ツキが向いてるのかもね～。

engChrName: Maybe I'll take the rest of the day off and treat myself at Gabriella's. Celebrate the good times, you know? I deserve it!
engSearchText:
Maybe I'll take the rest of the day off and treat myself
at Gabriella's. Celebrate the good times, you know?
I deserve it!
jpnChrName: たまには休みでも取って、ガブリエラさんの 所でイイお酒でも頼んじゃおうかしら♪
jpnSearchText:
たまには休みでも取って、ガブリエラさんの
所でイイお酒でも頼んじゃおうかしら♪

engChrName: Before I came here, I used to think the Blacklight District was the absolute rock bottom in Edith. Just a terrible place.
engSearchText:
Before I came here, I used to think the Blacklight
District was the absolute rock bottom in Edith. Just a
terrible place.
jpnChrName: ここに来る前は、黒芒街なんて 下の下だと思ってたけど。
jpnSearchText:
ここに来る前は、黒芒街なんて
下の下だと思ってたけど。

engChrName: But living down here's changed my outlook. It's...abrasive. Weird, definitely. But you know, it's kinda comfy.
engSearchText:
But living down here's changed my outlook.
It's...abrasive. Weird, definitely. But you know, it's
kinda comfy.
jpnChrName: 流れてきてみると、案外居心地が 良かったりするのよねぇ、不思議と。
jpnSearchText:
流れてきてみると、案外居心地が
良かったりするのよねぇ、不思議と。

engChrName: I can take on clients at my own pace, I don't have to worry about the cops... Life here is good, in its own weird way.
engSearchText:
I can take on clients at my own pace, I don't have to
worry about the cops... Life here is good, in its own
weird way.
jpnChrName: 客も好きなペースで取れるし 警察の目を気にする必要もないし……
jpnSearchText:
客も好きなペースで取れるし
警察の目を気にする必要もないし……

engChrName: You just need street smarts down here—you gotta make sure you don't get tangled up with the wrong people. But hey, I can deal with that.
engSearchText:
You just need street smarts down here—you gotta
make sure you don't get tangled up with the
wrong people. But hey, I can deal with that.
jpnChrName: ヘンな奴に絡まれないようにだけは 気を付けないといけないけどね～。
jpnSearchText:
ヘンな奴に絡まれないようにだけは
気を付けないといけないけどね～。

engChrName: Oh, I remember all of you guys. Interesting... You make for one strange group when you all come here together.
engSearchText:
Oh, I remember all of you guys. Interesting...
You make for one strange group when you all come
here together.
jpnChrName: あらさっきの……ふーん、 合流したみたいだけど変わった一行ねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あらさっきの……ふーん、
合流したみたいだけど変わった一行ねぇ。

engChrName: But hey, what ISN'T weird when you live in the Blacklight District? Common sense is for the surface dwellers.
engSearchText:
But hey, what ISN'T weird when you live in the
Blacklight District? Common sense is for the
surface dwellers.
jpnChrName: 黒芒街（ココ）じゃ一般常識なんて通用しないし いざこざだって日常茶飯事なの。
jpnSearchText:
黒芒街（ココ）じゃ一般常識なんて通用しないし
いざこざだって日常茶飯事なの。

engChrName: Just be careful down here, folks. These parts can leap out and bite you if you don't keep an eye out.
engSearchText:
Just be careful down here, folks. These parts can leap
out and bite you if you don't keep an eye out.
jpnChrName: イロイロ危ない事だってあるんだから、 アナタたちも気を付けなさいな？
jpnSearchText:
イロイロ危ない事だってあるんだから、
アナタたちも気を付けなさいな？

engChrName: Hey there, boys! You from out of town? Why don't you stay a while and I'll show you a good time, hmm?
engSearchText:
Hey there, boys! You from out of town? Why don't
you stay a while and I'll show you a good time, hmm?
jpnChrName: あら、お兄さんたちは観光？ ねぇ私と遊んでかな～い？
jpnSearchText:
あら、お兄さんたちは観光？
ねぇ私と遊んでかな～い？

engChrName: Oooh, you're quite the stud. And your friend there, he's just ENORMOUS! In more ways than one, I hope. ㈱
engSearchText:
Oooh, you're quite the stud. And your friend there,
he's just ENORMOUS! In more ways than one,
I hope. ㈱
jpnChrName: お兄さんハンサムだし そっちの大きい人もすっごくツヨソウ♪
jpnSearchText:
お兄さんハンサムだし
そっちの大きい人もすっごくツヨソウ♪

engChrName: Hah! You make a tempting offer, miss—you're a real sight for sore eyes yourself!
engSearchText:
Hah! You make a tempting offer, miss—you're a real
sight for sore eyes yourself!
jpnChrName: はっはっは、美人の姉ちゃんには敵わんなぁ～！
jpnSearchText: はっはっは、美人の姉ちゃんには敵わんなぁ～！

engChrName: Not worth it, dude. It's a wild ride, and you don't wanna be on it.
engSearchText:
Not worth it, dude. It's a wild ride, and you don't
wanna be on it.
jpnChrName: ってアンタも乗ってんじゃねーよ。
jpnSearchText: ってアンタも乗ってんじゃねーよ。

engChrName: The only way we can navigate something calamitous like this is by joining together and combining our strength!
engSearchText:
The only way we can navigate something calamitous
like this is by joining together and combining
our strength!
jpnChrName: このような異常事態でこそ、 力を合わせて乗り越えないとですね！
jpnSearchText:
このような異常事態でこそ、
力を合わせて乗り越えないとですね！

engChrName: Any help you need, we'll hook you up—anything to ensure you win! Best of luck out there, Spriggidy-do!
engSearchText:
Any help you need, we'll hook you up—anything to
ensure you win! Best of luck out there, Spriggidy-do!
jpnChrName: 私たちもできる限り協力させて頂きます！ 皆さんも、どうかご武運を！！
jpnSearchText:
私たちもできる限り協力させて頂きます！
皆さんも、どうかご武運を！！

engChrName: Don't be shy! Step right up! I've got all the weapons, all the ammo, all the funsies you could possibly need!
engSearchText:
Don't be shy! Step right up! I've got all the weapons,
all the ammo, all the funsies you could possibly need!
jpnChrName: どうぞどうぞ、好きなだけ見て行って下さい！ 武器弾薬はしこたま在庫がありますからね！
jpnSearchText:
どうぞどうぞ、好きなだけ見て行って下さい！
武器弾薬はしこたま在庫がありますからね！

engChrName: Whew! I'm glad I ordered a little extra stock for the festival. Who'd have thought it'd come in handy like this?
engSearchText:
Whew! I'm glad I ordered a little extra stock for
the festival. Who'd have thought it'd come in handy
like this?
jpnChrName: 実は記念祭に向けて沢山仕入れていたんです。 いや～、発注かけてて良かったですよ～！
jpnSearchText:
実は記念祭に向けて沢山仕入れていたんです。
いや～、発注かけてて良かったですよ～！

engChrName: Happy Revolution Festival! See these new grenades I've got on display? What do you think? Pretty nifty, huh?
engSearchText:
Happy Revolution Festival! See these new grenades
I've got on display? What do you think? Pretty
nifty, huh?
jpnChrName: うふふ、記念祭おめでとうございます！ どうですか、新型の手榴弾などは！
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、記念祭おめでとうございます！
どうですか、新型の手榴弾などは！

engChrName: Y-Yeah. Nifty... (Were they really talking about the same weapons dealer?)
engSearchText:
Y-Yeah. Nifty...
(Were they really talking about the same
weapons dealer?)
jpnChrName: お、おう………… （こいつが噂に聞く、闇の武器商人か……）
jpnSearchText:
お、おう…………
（こいつが噂に聞く、闇の武器商人か……）

engChrName: Oh, more of a knife guy, maybe? I hear you, I hear you! Right, get a load of this ripper here—it's my personal favorite!
engSearchText:
Oh, more of a knife guy, maybe? I hear you, I
hear you! Right, get a load of this ripper here—it's my
personal favorite!
jpnChrName: もしかしてナイフがお好みですかっ？ こちらのリッパーナイフ、私も愛用してまして……！
jpnSearchText:
もしかしてナイフがお好みですかっ？
こちらのリッパーナイフ、私も愛用してまして……！

engChrName: (His merch is definitely the real deal, but man, why's he gotta be so upbeat about it?!)
engSearchText:
(His merch is definitely the real deal, but man, why's
he gotta be so upbeat about it?!)
jpnChrName: （ブ、ブツは確からしいが……   なんか落ち着かねえんだが……！？）
jpnSearchText:
（ブ、ブツは確からしいが……
なんか落ち着かねえんだが……！？）

engChrName: Goodness gracious, I've got customer-os aplenty today! I'm on top of the underworld!
engSearchText:
Goodness gracious, I've got customer-os
aplenty today! I'm on top of the underworld!
jpnChrName: うふふ、今日はお客さんが沢山来てくれて♪ 嬉しい限りですねぇ～！
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、今日はお客さんが沢山来てくれて♪
嬉しい限りですねぇ～！

engChrName: You two take a look around! Anything catches your peepers, I'll fill you in on the details.
engSearchText:
You two take a look around! Anything catches your
peepers, I'll fill you in on the details.
jpnChrName: 私もバンバン案内しちゃいますから！ お二人も見て行ってくださいね～！！
jpnSearchText:
私もバンバン案内しちゃいますから！
お二人も見て行ってくださいね～！！

engChrName: Mercy, am I relieved this Almata mess is yesterday's news.
engSearchText:
Mercy, am I relieved this Almata mess is
yesterday's news.
jpnChrName: アルマータの件が片付いて 本当に良かったですね～！！
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの件が片付いて
本当に良かったですね～！！

engChrName: I read all about it—they said you took down that rotten old Dantès!
engSearchText:
I read all about it—they said you took down that
rotten old Dantès!
jpnChrName: 皆さんの噂も聞きましたよ、なんでも ボスのジェラールを討ち取ったとかっ♪
jpnSearchText:
皆さんの噂も聞きましたよ、なんでも
ボスのジェラールを討ち取ったとかっ♪

engChrName: And thanks to you, Blacklight's nice and peaceful again. Now I can get back to selling my shooty-stabbies for the festival and...other things!
engSearchText:
And thanks to you, Blacklight's nice and
peaceful again. Now I can get back to selling my
shooty-stabbies for the festival and...other things!
jpnChrName: ふふ、お蔭で平和が戻りました。 記念祭に向けて武器（うりもの）を仕入れないとですネッ！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、お蔭で平和が戻りました。
記念祭に向けて武器（うりもの）を仕入れないとですネッ！

engChrName: Other things? If you're trying to joke, it's not very funny.
engSearchText:
Other things? If you're trying to joke, it's not
very funny.
jpnChrName: ハッ……そいつは洒落か？
jpnSearchText: ハッ……そいつは洒落か？

engChrName: Oh, dear. I'm sorry, I didn't mean to offend. I may be jocular, but I'm no joker!
engSearchText:
Oh, dear. I'm sorry, I didn't mean to offend. I may be
jocular, but I'm no joker!
jpnChrName: いえ、だって記念祭といえば──
jpnSearchText: いえ、だって記念祭といえば──

engChrName: You see, jaeger types tend to wash up here around festival time when they don't have any other work. That's good news for me!
engSearchText:
You see, jaeger types tend to wash up here around
festival time when they don't have any other work.
That's good news for me!
jpnChrName: 共和国中からヒマな猟兵たちが遊びにきて、 商談も盛り上がりますでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
共和国中からヒマな猟兵たちが遊びにきて、
商談も盛り上がりますでしょ？

engChrName: Huh. I never thought about that before. I...guess that makes sense.
engSearchText:
Huh. I never thought about that before. I...guess that
makes sense.
jpnChrName: そういう事、なんですね……
jpnSearchText: そういう事、なんですね……

engChrName: Wow, that sounds amazing! I kinda wanna see it for myself now!
engSearchText:
Wow, that sounds amazing! I kinda wanna see it for
myself now!
jpnChrName: わたしもちょっと興味がありますっ！
jpnSearchText: わたしもちょっと興味がありますっ！

engChrName: You might wanna think twice before you go rollin' around with 'em. This place gets real rowdy once the festival rolls around.
engSearchText:
You might wanna think twice before you go rollin'
around with 'em. This place gets real rowdy once the
festival rolls around.
jpnChrName: ここいらも騒がしくなるから 気を付けとけよ？
jpnSearchText:
ここいらも騒がしくなるから
気を付けとけよ？

engChrName: I can just tell this year's festival is going to be a real boon. I'll have to stock up in advance so that I have everything for everyone!
engSearchText:
I can just tell this year's festival is going to be a
real boon. I'll have to stock up in advance so that I
have everything for everyone!
jpnChrName: 今年の記念祭、盛り上がりそうですし 沢山仕入れないとですねぇ♪
jpnSearchText:
今年の記念祭、盛り上がりそうですし
沢山仕入れないとですねぇ♪

engChrName: Land mines, RPGs, chainsaws, submachines...ooh, and jamming devices, too. Those have been real hot commodities lately.
engSearchText:
Land mines, RPGs, chainsaws, submachines...ooh,
and jamming devices, too. Those have been real hot
commodities lately.
jpnChrName: チェーンソーに対戦車砲（Ｒ  Ｐ  Ｇ）…… 最近は“シャード妨害（ジャミング）”なんかも需要がありそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
チェーンソーに対戦車砲（Ｒ Ｐ Ｇ）……
最近は“シャード妨害（ジャミング）”なんかも需要がありそうですし。

engChrName: It's hard getting my orders through to the manufacturers, but I simply must strike while the iron's hot!
engSearchText:
It's hard getting my orders through to the
manufacturers, but I simply must strike while the
iron's hot!
jpnChrName: 対応メーカーが限られるのが難点ですが、 商人として機は逃せませんからねぇ～！
jpnSearchText:
対応メーカーが限られるのが難点ですが、
商人として機は逃せませんからねぇ～！

engChrName: Geez Louise, it's scary to see the kind of havoc a single group of undesirables can raise.
engSearchText:
Geez Louise, it's scary to see the kind of havoc a
single group of undesirables can raise.
jpnChrName: いや～、怖いですねぇ。 一マフィアがここまでの事をやるだなんて。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、怖いですねぇ。
一マフィアがここまでの事をやるだなんて。

engChrName: If the Blacklight District is this shaken up about it, I can only imagine how messy it's gotten on the surface.
engSearchText:
If the Blacklight District is this shaken up about it, I
can only imagine how messy it's gotten on
the surface.
jpnChrName: 黒芒街も見ての通りですが 地上はさぞ混乱している事でしょう……
jpnSearchText:
黒芒街も見ての通りですが
地上はさぞ混乱している事でしょう……

engChrName: I'm scared to think where all this might be headed. Hopefully it doesn't snowball into something even worse, but who knows? *sigh*
engSearchText:
I'm scared to think where all this might be headed.
Hopefully it doesn't snowball into something even
worse, but who knows? *sigh*
jpnChrName: この事態、一体どこへ向かうのか…… はぁ、あまり大事にならなきゃいいんですが。
jpnSearchText:
この事態、一体どこへ向かうのか……
はぁ、あまり大事にならなきゃいいんですが。

engChrName: Perhaps it's time I dug out some of my rarer merchandise. Normally these don't sell so easy, but you never know.
engSearchText:
Perhaps it's time I dug out some of my
rarer merchandise. Normally these don't sell so easy,
but you never know.
jpnChrName: とりあえず、普段は売れないレア商品を 引っ張り出しておきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず、普段は売れないレア商品を
引っ張り出しておきましょうか。

engChrName: Let's see. I've got my mines, my RPGs... What else can I put out for sale? Choices, choices...
engSearchText:
Let's see. I've got my mines, my RPGs... What else
can I put out for sale? Choices, choices...
jpnChrName: 地雷に対戦車砲…… あとは何がいいですかねぇ～……
jpnSearchText:
地雷に対戦車砲……
あとは何がいいですかねぇ～……

engChrName: Times like these, it's hard to predict what people want. Maybe I should put out some of my less popular items and see if I get any bites.
engSearchText:
Times like these, it's hard to predict what
people want. Maybe I should put out some of my less
popular items and see if I get any bites.
jpnChrName: こんな状況ですし、何が売れるか分かりません。 普段は売れない品も出しておきましょうかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
こんな状況ですし、何が売れるか分かりません。
普段は売れない品も出しておきましょうかねぇ。

engChrName: I had some business to negotiate with an old friend today—and mercy, she really likes to play hardball with me.
engSearchText:
I had some business to negotiate with an old friend
today—and mercy, she really likes to play hardball
with me.
jpnChrName: 今日は昔馴染と商談をしてきたんですが…… ふう、相変わらず手厳しい方で。
jpnSearchText:
今日は昔馴染と商談をしてきたんですが……
ふう、相変わらず手厳しい方で。

engChrName: I thought raising her daughter and moving to Crossbell might've softened her up a little, but nope!
engSearchText:
I thought raising her daughter and moving to
Crossbell might've softened her up a little, but nope!
jpnChrName: 娘さんが産まれて、クロスベルに移ってからは 少しは柔らかくなったかと思いきや……
jpnSearchText:
娘さんが産まれて、クロスベルに移ってからは
少しは柔らかくなったかと思いきや……

engChrName: That daughter of hers? Wouldn't you know it, she's in the arms dealing business, too! And darn tootin', she's good at it.
engSearchText:
That daughter of hers? Wouldn't you know it, she's in
the arms dealing business, too! And darn tootin', she's
good at it.
jpnChrName: 今度はその娘さんまで武器商人を始めて、 それがまたやり手でどうにもこうにも……
jpnSearchText:
今度はその娘さんまで武器商人を始めて、
それがまたやり手でどうにもこうにも……

engChrName: Word is, she even has her own airship now! She really does take after her mother. I might have a real firecracker on my hands when she grows up...
engSearchText:
Word is, she even has her own airship now! She really
does take after her mother. I might have a real
firecracker on my hands when she grows up...
jpnChrName: 最近では飛行船まで手に入れたらしく。 いや～、末恐ろしいとはこの事ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
最近では飛行船まで手に入れたらしく。
いや～、末恐ろしいとはこの事ですよ。

engChrName: I got that deal done, in the end...but I'm telling you, they make for one scary duo.
engSearchText:
I got that deal done, in the end...but I'm telling you,
they make for one scary duo.
jpnChrName: 商談はどうにか纏まりましたけど、 いやはや恐ろしい母娘ですよ……
jpnSearchText:
商談はどうにか纏まりましたけど、
いやはや恐ろしい母娘ですよ……

engChrName: Whatever happened to throwing your old friend a bone? Chivalry's dead, I tell you! *sigh* Ah, well.
engSearchText:
Whatever happened to throwing your old friend
a bone? Chivalry's dead, I tell you! *sigh* Ah, well.
jpnChrName: いくら昔馴染とはいえ、もう少し 手加減してほしいものですねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
いくら昔馴染とはいえ、もう少し
手加減してほしいものですねぇ～。

engChrName: Today I mosey on up to Altair for a little business negotiating.
engSearchText:
Today I mosey on up to Altair for a little
business negotiating.
jpnChrName: 今日はアルタイル市の方まで 商談に行く予定なんです。
jpnSearchText:
今日はアルタイル市の方まで
商談に行く予定なんです。

engChrName: I've gotta set the stage juuust right—that means triple-checking my schedule, arranging gifts and favors, the whole nine arge.
engSearchText:
I've gotta set the stage juuust right—that means
triple-checking my schedule, arranging gifts and
favors, the whole nine arge.
jpnChrName: ふふ、先方に失礼があってはいけませんからね。 時間の再確認に、手土産も用意して……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、先方に失礼があってはいけませんからね。
時間の再確認に、手土産も用意して……

engChrName: Maybe I should include little notes, too. New Year's IS almost here! I'm sure they'd appreciate the goodwill.
engSearchText:
Maybe I should include little notes, too. New Year's
IS almost here! I'm sure they'd appreciate
the goodwill.
jpnChrName: そうそう、簡単なお手紙も添えましょうか。 年の瀬も近づいて来ましたし……♪
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、簡単なお手紙も添えましょうか。
年の瀬も近づいて来ましたし……♪

engChrName: (He SOUNDS perfectly polite and thoughtful...but I don't want to even think about what he'd put on those notes.)
engSearchText:
(He SOUNDS perfectly polite and thoughtful...but I
don't want to even think about what he'd put on
those notes.)
jpnChrName: （て、丁寧な人なんだね、中身は……）
jpnSearchText: （て、丁寧な人なんだね、中身は……）

engChrName: (Yeeeah, I feel sorry for the poor schmucks he's workin' with.)
engSearchText:
(Yeeeah, I feel sorry for the poor schmucks he's
workin' with.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、中身だけはな……）
jpnSearchText: （ああ、中身だけはな……）

engChrName: Oh, I remember seeing you all pass through here earlier. I'm glad to see you managed to reunite with Mr. Van!
engSearchText:
Oh, I remember seeing you all pass through
here earlier. I'm glad to see you managed to reunite
with Mr. Van!
jpnChrName: おや、先ほども通りがかった皆さん…… 無事ヴァンさんと合流できたんですねぇ♪
jpnSearchText:
おや、先ほども通りがかった皆さん……
無事ヴァンさんと合流できたんですねぇ♪

engChrName: Just be careful where you walk! The more trouble you can avoid, the better. Blacklight's full of danger— STRANGER danger, especially!
engSearchText:
Just be careful where you walk! The more trouble you
can avoid, the better. Blacklight's full of danger—
STRANGER danger, especially!
jpnChrName: でも気を付けてくださいよ？ 今更ですけど黒芒街（ここ）は危険で一杯なんですから。
jpnSearchText:
でも気を付けてくださいよ？
今更ですけど黒芒街（ここ）は危険で一杯なんですから。

engChrName: Don't make eye contact with anybody who looks the least bit suspicious, all righty? It's for your safety.
engSearchText:
Don't make eye contact with anybody who looks the
least bit suspicious, all righty? It's for your safety.
jpnChrName: トラブルは極力避けて。見るからに怪しい人と 目なんて合わせてはいけませんよ？
jpnSearchText:
トラブルは極力避けて。見るからに怪しい人と
目なんて合わせてはいけませんよ？

engChrName: O-Okay. Thank you for the advice, sir.
engSearchText: O-Okay. Thank you for the advice, sir.
jpnChrName: は、はい……ご忠告はありがたいのですけど……
jpnSearchText: は、はい……ご忠告はありがたいのですけど……

engChrName: Not to change the subject, but may I ask why you wear that mask? Its design is quite...curious.
engSearchText:
Not to change the subject, but may I ask why you
wear that mask? Its design is quite...curious.
jpnChrName: ちなみに……つかぬ事をお伺いしますが、 そのマスクは一体……？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに……つかぬ事をお伺いしますが、
そのマスクは一体……？

engChrName: Oh, you mean this thing? Gee willickers, I feel so darn silly talking about it...
engSearchText:
Oh, you mean this thing? Gee willickers, I feel so
darn silly talking about it...
jpnChrName: ああ、これですか？ ……いやあ、お恥ずかしいですねぇ～……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、これですか？
……いやあ、お恥ずかしいですねぇ～……

engChrName: Call it a little indulgence of mine. In another life, I was a little...naughty, you see. ㈱
engSearchText:
Call it a little indulgence of mine. In another life, I
was a little...naughty, you see. ㈱
jpnChrName: その……最低限の嗜みといいますか。 これでも一応、元脱獄囚ですので♪
jpnSearchText:
その……最低限の嗜みといいますか。
これでも一応、元脱獄囚ですので♪

engChrName: Oh. That's, uh...neat. (I guess it's just kinda his own weird little quirk?)
engSearchText:
Oh. That's, uh...neat.
(I guess it's just kinda his own weird little quirk?)
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですね…… （これも個性、なんでしょうか……？）
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうなんですね……
（これも個性、なんでしょうか……？）

engChrName: (Quirk, my ass. Man's creepy as all get out.)
engSearchText: (Quirk, my ass. Man's creepy as all get out.)
jpnChrName: （いや不気味すぎんだろうがよ……）
jpnSearchText: （いや不気味すぎんだろうがよ……）

engChrName: (I know he's weird, but that's just the way Blacklight is. Just roll with it, 'kay?)
engSearchText:
(I know he's weird, but that's just the way
Blacklight is. Just roll with it, 'kay?)
jpnChrName: （ま、その辺りは放っといてやれ。）
jpnSearchText: （ま、その辺りは放っといてやれ。）

engChrName: Watch your step when you're walking around here! The Blacklight District is full of danger— STRANGER danger, especially!
engSearchText:
Watch your step when you're walking around here!
The Blacklight District is full of danger—
STRANGER danger, especially!
jpnChrName: 黒芒街（ここ）は危険で一杯なので、 皆さんどうか気を付けてくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
黒芒街（ここ）は危険で一杯なので、
皆さんどうか気を付けてくださいね！

engChrName: Come back soon, all righty? Always happy to serve you!
engSearchText:
Come back soon, all righty? Always happy to
serve you!
jpnChrName: またのお越しをお待ちしておりますっ♪
jpnSearchText: またのお越しをお待ちしておりますっ♪

engChrName: Howdy there, Spriggidy-do! And is THAT the Immovable Mr. Zin I see? Well, butter my butt and call me a biscuit! How've you been, big guy?
engSearchText:
Howdy there, Spriggidy-do! And is THAT the
Immovable Mr. Zin I see? Well, butter my butt and
call me a biscuit! How've you been, big guy?
jpnChrName: やあ、ヴァンさんじゃないですか。 それに《不動》さんまで……お久しぶりですねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
やあ、ヴァンさんじゃないですか。
それに《不動》さんまで……お久しぶりですねぇ！

engChrName: Wait, you guys know each other? You really are a celebrity down here, ain'tcha?
engSearchText:
Wait, you guys know each other? You really are a
celebrity down here, ain'tcha?
jpnChrName: なんだ、コイツとも顔見知りかよ。 相変わらず顔が広い奴だな。
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、コイツとも顔見知りかよ。
相変わらず顔が広い奴だな。

engChrName: I wouldn't say that. Morgan just happens to be one of the more reputable merchants here—and I do sometimes employ his services.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't say that. Morgan just happens to be one of
the more reputable merchants here—and I do
sometimes employ his services.
jpnChrName: まあカルバードで裏の武器商人といやあ まずはこの男だろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
まあカルバードで裏の武器商人といやあ
まずはこの男だろうしな。

engChrName: He kinda tiptoes the legal line, but he's been an invaluable informant for us at the guild, so we just sort of look the other way.
engSearchText:
He kinda tiptoes the legal line, but he's been an
invaluable informant for us at the guild, so we just
sort of look the other way.
jpnChrName: ギルドの立場からは微妙な所もあるが…… 情報源として何度か世話になった事もあるな。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドの立場からは微妙な所もあるが……
情報源として何度か世話になった事もあるな。

engChrName: Oh, mercy, that's... That's so nice of you, Mr. Zin. Too nice, in fact—I haven't done that much, really.
engSearchText:
Oh, mercy, that's... That's so nice of you, Mr. Zin.
Too nice, in fact—I haven't done that much, really.
jpnChrName: そんなっ、恐縮です…… 私なんて大したことは……
jpnSearchText:
そんなっ、恐縮です……
私なんて大したことは……

engChrName: I still feel terrible that I couldn't help you before... I'm so sorrily sorry! I'm pathetic, I tell you. Just a failure in the eyes of Aidios...
engSearchText:
I still feel terrible that I couldn't help you before...
I'm so sorrily sorry! I'm pathetic, I tell you. Just a
failure in the eyes of Aidios...
jpnChrName: あの件だって結局何もできず…… スミマセン、スミマセン！　無力な人間で……！
jpnSearchText:
あの件だって結局何もできず……
スミマセン、スミマセン！　無力な人間で……！

engChrName: (Y'know, it's weird as hell seein' a guy in a mask beatin' up on himself like that. It's givin' me whiplash.)
engSearchText:
(Y'know, it's weird as hell seein' a guy in a mask
beatin' up on himself like that. It's givin'
me whiplash.)
jpnChrName: （このナリで低姿勢なのが   逆に不気味なんだがな……）
jpnSearchText:
（このナリで低姿勢なのが
逆に不気味なんだがな……）

engChrName: (Hahaha! Yeah, I get that. He's an eccentric fellow, but I take it to mean he's a good guy at heart.)
engSearchText:
(Hahaha! Yeah, I get that. He's an eccentric fellow,
but I take it to mean he's a good guy at heart.)
jpnChrName: （はっはっは、まあ色々あるが   性根はいい奴という事だろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（はっはっは、まあ色々あるが
性根はいい奴という事だろう。）

engChrName: Well, shut my mouth! I'm surprised to see you two boys mingling together.
engSearchText:
Well, shut my mouth! I'm surprised to see you two
boys mingling together.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それにしてもお二人が 一緒にいらっしゃるだなんて。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それにしてもお二人が
一緒にいらっしゃるだなんて。

engChrName: I have a whole slew of outposts scattered around Calvard—I just happen to be staying around the Blacklight District for the time being.
engSearchText:
I have a whole slew of outposts scattered around
Calvard—I just happen to be staying around the
Blacklight District for the time being.
jpnChrName: 私、共和国内にもいくつか拠点がありますけど 最近は黒芒街中心にお仕事させてもらってます。
jpnSearchText:
私、共和国内にもいくつか拠点がありますけど
最近は黒芒街中心にお仕事させてもらってます。

engChrName: By all means, feel free to look around and browse my merchandise! I'm more than happy to show you all of the wonderful blessings I have! ㈱
engSearchText:
By all means, feel free to look around and browse
my merchandise! I'm more than happy to show you
all of the wonderful blessings I have! ㈱
jpnChrName: 今日はぜひお買い物していってくださいね！ いい商品をお出ししますから♪
jpnSearchText:
今日はぜひお買い物していってくださいね！
いい商品をお出ししますから♪

engChrName: Of course! If we can be of any use, we'll be happy to help.
engSearchText:
Of course! If we can be of any use, we'll be happy
to help.
jpnChrName: ええ、自分たちで良ければ協力しますよ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、自分たちで良ければ協力しますよ。

engChrName: I'm sure I can borrow a part or two from our cutting-edge RPGs—we'll have that covered for you lickety-split!
engSearchText:
I'm sure I can borrow a part or two from our
cutting-edge RPGs—we'll have that covered for
you lickety-split!
jpnChrName: 最新式のＲＰＧ砲を分解すれば この部品はまかなえそうです♪
jpnSearchText:
最新式のＲＰＧ砲を分解すれば
この部品はまかなえそうです♪

engChrName: Don't forget about me, either. I have some black market wares that are sure to catch your eye.
engSearchText:
Don't forget about me, either. I have some black
market wares that are sure to catch your eye.
jpnChrName: ほっほ、ワシも闇市で仕入れた 面白い品を持っておるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ほっほ、ワシも闇市で仕入れた
面白い品を持っておるぞ。

engChrName: They should help you procure those materials you're after. Just be warned: they don't come cheap!
engSearchText:
They should help you procure those materials
you're after. Just be warned: they don't come cheap!
jpnChrName: お前さんらが捜しておる素材に使えそうじゃ。 もっとも値は張るがのう～！
jpnSearchText:
お前さんらが捜しておる素材に使えそうじゃ。
もっとも値は張るがのう～！

engChrName: Heh. Still hustlin', huh? Glad to see you workin' together, at least.
engSearchText:
Heh. Still hustlin', huh? Glad to see you workin'
together, at least.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……だが爺さんたちも一応 協力してくれてるみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……だが爺さんたちも一応
協力してくれてるみてえだな。

engChrName: But of course! Why wouldn't we? All we want is a nice, peaceful marketplace for our business—and we'll do all we can to get it back.
engSearchText:
But of course! Why wouldn't we? All we want is a
nice, peaceful marketplace for our business—and we'll
do all we can to get it back.
jpnChrName: うむうむ、これも安心して商売が できる地を取り戻すためじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
うむうむ、これも安心して商売が
できる地を取り戻すためじゃ。

engChrName: I hear you're taking part in that big infiltration mission.
engSearchText:
I hear you're taking part in that big
infiltration mission.
jpnChrName: 皆さんこそ突入作戦に参加するとか…… どうにも心配ですが……
jpnSearchText:
皆さんこそ突入作戦に参加するとか……
どうにも心配ですが……

engChrName: Now, being honest, I'm worried sick, but nevertheless, we'll do everything we can to help you out! Goddess bless you!
engSearchText:
Now, being honest, I'm worried sick, but
nevertheless, we'll do everything we can to help
you out! Goddess bless you!
jpnChrName: 私たちも全力で応援しますからっ！ どうか皆さんに女神の加護を──！
jpnSearchText:
私たちも全力で応援しますからっ！
どうか皆さんに女神の加護を──！

engChrName: Thank you, Morgan. We'll put this all to rest, we promise!
engSearchText:
Thank you, Morgan. We'll put this all to rest,
we promise!
jpnChrName: は、はい……ありがとうございます。 必ず成し遂げてみせますね！
jpnSearchText:
は、はい……ありがとうございます。
必ず成し遂げてみせますね！

engChrName: Oh, thank Aidios! You're all okay!
engSearchText: Oh, thank Aidios! You're all okay!
jpnChrName: 皆さん！　ご無事でよかった～！
jpnSearchText: 皆さん！　ご無事でよかった～！

engChrName: Hey there. You two look like you're in pretty good spirits.
engSearchText:
Hey there. You two look like you're in pretty
good spirits.
jpnChrName: モーガンのオヤジに爺さん…… そっちもピンピンしてるみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
モーガンのオヤジに爺さん……
そっちもピンピンしてるみてえだな。

engChrName: Well, it helps that the Blacklight District seems to be weathering the storm better than the surface.
engSearchText:
Well, it helps that the Blacklight District seems to be
weathering the storm better than the surface.
jpnChrName: ほっほ、よう分からんが黒芒街は 地上よりはマシなようじゃからの。
jpnSearchText:
ほっほ、よう分からんが黒芒街は
地上よりはマシなようじゃからの。

engChrName: Whether it's the physical distance or the...cultural distance, I couldn't tell you—but I'll take it, nonetheless.
engSearchText:
Whether it's the physical distance or the...cultural
distance, I couldn't tell you—but I'll take
it, nonetheless.
jpnChrName: 地下にあるせいか、それとも単純に 距離なのかは知らんが……
jpnSearchText:
地下にあるせいか、それとも単純に
距離なのかは知らんが……

engChrName: Or is it perhaps my special evil-warding amulets? Yes, I can feel their power! Why not buy one for yourselves, hmm?
engSearchText:
Or is it perhaps my special evil-warding amulets?
Yes, I can feel their power! Why not buy one for
yourselves, hmm?
jpnChrName: ハッ、もしやワシの仕入れた魔よけの壺が！？ ──という訳で買っていくかの？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、もしやワシの仕入れた魔よけの壺が！？
──という訳で買っていくかの？

engChrName: Oh, that reminds me! I have this chainsaw with quite the 'history' to it—they say it can rip and tear evil spirits in two! Let me go find it...
engSearchText:
Oh, that reminds me! I have this chainsaw with quite
the 'history' to it—they say it can rip and tear evil
spirits in two! Let me go find it...
jpnChrName: あ、でしたら私も、悪霊が切れるという 曰くつきのチェーンソーを出しますねっ♪
jpnSearchText:
あ、でしたら私も、悪霊が切れるという
曰くつきのチェーンソーを出しますねっ♪

engChrName: Nothing rains on these guys' parade, does it?
engSearchText: Nothing rains on these guys' parade, does it?
jpnChrName: 逞しすぎんだろ、商売人どもが……
jpnSearchText: 逞しすぎんだろ、商売人どもが……

engChrName: A steady hand is exactly what you want in your supplier—takes out all the guesswork. Let's stock up here while we still can.
engSearchText:
A steady hand is exactly what you want in your
supplier—takes out all the guesswork. Let's stock up
here while we still can.
jpnChrName: フフ、何にせよ補給にはもってこいであろう。 万全に整えさせてもらうとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、何にせよ補給にはもってこいであろう。
万全に整えさせてもらうとしよう。

engChrName: I'm not really doing anything for the festival. I mean, I'm not Calvardian—and even if I were, this isn't exactly the most festive block in town.
engSearchText:
I'm not really doing anything for the festival. I mean,
I'm not Calvardian—and even if I were, this isn't
exactly the most festive block in town.
jpnChrName: こんな場所だし、共和国人でもないからね。 革命記念日たって何をするつもりもなかったが……
jpnSearchText:
こんな場所だし、共和国人でもないからね。
革命記念日たって何をするつもりもなかったが……

engChrName: But everybody else is going on about it, of course. I figure I oughta let Yota walk around if he wants to.
engSearchText:
But everybody else is going on about it, of course.
I figure I oughta let Yota walk around if he wants to.
jpnChrName: 世間じゃ祭りをやるじゃないか。 ……たまにはヨータにも見せてやりたくてね。
jpnSearchText:
世間じゃ祭りをやるじゃないか。
……たまにはヨータにも見せてやりたくてね。

engChrName: I do want to show him what the surface is like... The real world, so to speak. He's still got a shot at staying on the straight and narrow.
engSearchText:
I do want to show him what the surface is like...
The real world, so to speak. He's still got a shot at
staying on the straight and narrow.
jpnChrName: あの子には表の世界の事も知って、 まっとうに育ってほしいのさ……
jpnSearchText:
あの子には表の世界の事も知って、
まっとうに育ってほしいのさ……

engChrName: Only problem is the bar... It's not gonna run itself while I'm gone.
engSearchText:
Only problem is the bar... It's not gonna run itself
while I'm gone.
jpnChrName: ふう、店もあるから ちょいと悩むんだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、店もあるから
ちょいと悩むんだけどね。

engChrName: We've got jaegers everywhere trying to make moves with all the turmoil going on.
engSearchText:
We've got jaegers everywhere trying to make moves
with all the turmoil going on.
jpnChrName: どうもこの混乱に乗じて あちこちの猟兵団が動いてるようだが……
jpnSearchText:
どうもこの混乱に乗じて
あちこちの猟兵団が動いてるようだが……

engChrName: However it all shakes out, I can't see it leading to anything good. *sigh*
engSearchText:
However it all shakes out, I can't see it leading to
anything good. *sigh*
jpnChrName: ……やれやれ、こいつはどう転んでも いい予感はしないねェ……
jpnSearchText:
……やれやれ、こいつはどう転んでも
いい予感はしないねェ……

engChrName: Tell me: was that reporter who I think it was? The one who broke the news about Creil Village...?
engSearchText:
Tell me: was that reporter who I think it was?
The one who broke the news about Creil Village...?
jpnChrName: それに噂で聞いたが、クレイユ村の スクープを撮ったルポライターってのは……
jpnSearchText:
それに噂で聞いたが、クレイユ村の
スクープを撮ったルポライターってのは……

engChrName: *sniffle*
engSearchText: *sniffle*

engChrName: I...think you know the answer as well as we do.
engSearchText: I...think you know the answer as well as we do.
jpnChrName: ……ま、想像に任せるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、想像に任せるぜ。

engChrName: ...Man, shit. He was a good guy.
engSearchText: ...Man, shit. He was a good guy.
jpnChrName: そうかい……イイ男だったのにねぇ……
jpnSearchText: そうかい……イイ男だったのにねぇ……

engChrName: I feel like it's our responsibility to go out and avenge him... That way he can rest in peace up there.
engSearchText:
I feel like it's our responsibility to go out and
avenge him... That way he can rest in peace up there.
jpnChrName: ……せめて仇さえ取れりゃ、安心して 女神の元に行ってくれそうなもんだが……
jpnSearchText:
……せめて仇さえ取れりゃ、安心して
女神の元に行ってくれそうなもんだが……

engChrName: I'd do it myself, but...yeah. All I can do is pour one out for him.
engSearchText:
I'd do it myself, but...yeah. All I can do is pour one
out for him.
jpnChrName: アタシも残念でならないよ。
jpnSearchText: アタシも残念でならないよ。

engChrName: Not to mention, we've got jaeger corps making moves all over the place. Shit could get ugly any second.
engSearchText:
Not to mention, we've got jaeger corps making moves
all over the place. Shit could get ugly any second.
jpnChrName: それにあちこちの猟兵団も動いてるようでね、 今にもドンパチが始まりそうな状況さ。
jpnSearchText:
それにあちこちの猟兵団も動いてるようでね、
今にもドンパチが始まりそうな状況さ。

engChrName: *sigh* I probably need to put more stock in maintaining my weapons—not just for my safety, but Yota's, too.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I probably need to put more stock in
maintaining my weapons—not just for my safety, but
Yota's, too.
jpnChrName: ふう……ヨータのためにも、久々に 得物の手入れくらいはしておこうかね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……ヨータのためにも、久々に
得物の手入れくらいはしておこうかね。

engChrName: ...I'm not his birth mother, I should clarify. I found him on a battlefield I was working in.
engSearchText:
...I'm not his birth mother, I should clarify. I found
him on a battlefield I was working in.
jpnChrName: ……ヨータはね、アタシが とある戦場で拾った子なんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
……ヨータはね、アタシが
とある戦場で拾った子なんだよ。

engChrName: He's not tough by any stretch, though. He's so frail, I feel like if I let go of him, he'll just blow into dust.
engSearchText:
He's not tough by any stretch, though. He's so frail, I
feel like if I let go of him, he'll just blow into dust.
jpnChrName: 弱くて脆くて、アタシが手を離したら それだけで掻き消えてしまいそうな子供……
jpnSearchText:
弱くて脆くて、アタシが手を離したら
それだけで掻き消えてしまいそうな子供……

engChrName: But you know something? I don't feel like I'm the one protecting him... The opposite, actually: he's the one who saved me.
engSearchText:
But you know something? I don't feel like I'm the one
protecting him... The opposite, actually: he's the one
who saved me.
jpnChrName: けれどだからこそ、ただ心を凍てつかせていた アタシに愛を教えてくれた──
jpnSearchText:
けれどだからこそ、ただ心を凍てつかせていた
アタシに愛を教えてくれた──

engChrName: I was a cold and heartless woman before I found him... He taught me what it meant to love someone.
engSearchText:
I was a cold and heartless woman before I
found him... He taught me what it meant to
love someone.
jpnChrName: ……アタシがこの子を救ったんじゃない。 救われたのはアタシの方さ。
jpnSearchText:
……アタシがこの子を救ったんじゃない。
救われたのはアタシの方さ。

engChrName: There's nothing I want more than for him to grow up happy, healthy, and strong... I want to give him the life he deserves.
engSearchText:
There's nothing I want more than for him to grow up
happy, healthy, and strong... I want to give him the
life he deserves.
jpnChrName: 今はこんな地の底にいるが…… この子には健やかに育って欲しいもんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
今はこんな地の底にいるが……
この子には健やかに育って欲しいもんだよ。

engChrName: I hope and pray my little Yota grows up to be big and strong, and that he gets to feel the sun on his face. Easier said than done, but...still.
engSearchText:
I hope and pray my little Yota grows up to be big and
strong, and that he gets to feel the sun on his face.
Easier said than done, but...still.
jpnChrName: いつかこの子には日の当たる所で 伸び伸び育って欲しいけどねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
いつかこの子には日の当たる所で
伸び伸び育って欲しいけどねぇ……

engChrName: I was a Northern Jaeger in another life. That's the only reason I have any connections at all.
engSearchText:
I was a Northern Jaeger in another life. That's the
only reason I have any connections at all.
jpnChrName: アタシは《北の猟兵》の出身でね。 ちょっとしたツテがあるってだけさ。
jpnSearchText:
アタシは《北の猟兵》の出身でね。
ちょっとしたツテがあるってだけさ。

engChrName: But I'm done with that business now. I only hear the occasional whisper from my friends in those circles.
engSearchText:
But I'm done with that business now. I only hear the
occasional whisper from my friends in those circles.
jpnChrName: もう猟兵稼業からは足を洗ってるし 噂話くらいのモンだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
もう猟兵稼業からは足を洗ってるし
噂話くらいのモンだけどね。

engChrName: That's still valuable intel regardless—and it's good that you're sharing it. I try to do the same with my info so that we all benefit.
engSearchText:
That's still valuable intel regardless—and it's good
that you're sharing it. I try to do the same with my
info so that we all benefit.
jpnChrName: だからこその情報もある。 まあ、持ちつ持たれつだろう。
jpnSearchText:
だからこその情報もある。
まあ、持ちつ持たれつだろう。

engChrName: Which I appreciate. You don't try to leech off of me like some other men do.
engSearchText:
Which I appreciate. You don't try to leech off of me
like some other men do.
jpnChrName: そう言ってくれると嬉しいけどね。
jpnSearchText: そう言ってくれると嬉しいけどね。

engChrName: Any rate, there's no going back to where I came from. This is my home—I gotta just find a way to hack it down here.
engSearchText:
Any rate, there's no going back to where I came from.
This is my home—I gotta just find a way to hack it
down here.
jpnChrName: もう故郷にも帰れない身だ、 ここでしがなくやらせてもらうさ。
jpnSearchText:
もう故郷にも帰れない身だ、
ここでしがなくやらせてもらうさ。

engChrName: (I heard her mention the Northern Jaegers—that must mean she's North Ambrian. That place is still real poor for...obvious reasons.)
engSearchText:
(I heard her mention the Northern Jaegers—that
must mean she's North Ambrian. That place is still
real poor for...obvious reasons.)
jpnChrName: （《北の猟兵》──   あの極貧のノーザンブリア出身か。）
jpnSearchText:
（《北の猟兵》──
あの極貧のノーザンブリア出身か。）

engChrName: (They finally broke off from Erebonia last year, but they ain't exactly had it easy since then.)
engSearchText:
(They finally broke off from Erebonia last year, but
they ain't exactly had it easy since then.)
jpnChrName: （去年ようやく帝国から独立したが   ……あっちも色々あるみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（去年ようやく帝国から独立したが
……あっちも色々あるみてえだな。）

engChrName: My hands are too dirty after all these years. A gal like me doesn't belong on the surface.
engSearchText:
My hands are too dirty after all these years. A gal like
me doesn't belong on the surface.
jpnChrName: アタシも山ほど汚い事をやったからね。 イマサラ戻る資格なんざないのさ。
jpnSearchText:
アタシも山ほど汚い事をやったからね。
イマサラ戻る資格なんざないのさ。

engChrName: And I couldn't go back to the Northern Jaegers, even if I wanted to—they all broke up. Just gotta lie low and make it work down here.
engSearchText:
And I couldn't go back to the Northern Jaegers, even
if I wanted to—they all broke up. Just gotta lie low
and make it work down here.
jpnChrName: 《北の猟兵》も解散しちまったし…… ま、こっちでボチボチやらせてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
《北の猟兵》も解散しちまったし……
ま、こっちでボチボチやらせてもらうよ。

engChrName: I can't just think for myself anymore, anyway... Gotta take care of Yota, too.
engSearchText:
I can't just think for myself anymore, anyway...
Gotta take care of Yota, too.
jpnChrName: 今はヨータの事も考えなきゃならないしね。
jpnSearchText: 今はヨータの事も考えなきゃならないしね。

engChrName: (*sigh* Yota, how are you always SO cute? You're always such a sweet, considerate little angel. ㈱)
engSearchText:
(*sigh* Yota, how are you always SO cute?
You're always such a sweet, considerate little angel. ㈱)
jpnChrName: （はあぁ、ヨータったら可愛いねぇ……㈱   気も利くし、流石はアタシの天使──）
jpnSearchText:
（はあぁ、ヨータったら可愛いねぇ……㈱
気も利くし、流石はアタシの天使──）

engChrName: ...The hell're you looking at? Can't you give a gal some privacy?! You're killin' the goddamn vibe!
engSearchText:
...The hell're you looking at? Can't you give a gal
some privacy?! You're killin' the goddamn vibe!
jpnChrName: って何だい、アンタ達は！！ 気配を消して近づいてるんじゃないよ！！
jpnSearchText:
って何だい、アンタ達は！！
気配を消して近づいてるんじゃないよ！！

engChrName: Sorry, sorry! We'll be out of your way. (She was in a completely different world there.)
engSearchText:
Sorry, sorry! We'll be out of your way.
(She was in a completely different world there.)
jpnChrName: あはは、すみません。 （物凄く上の空でしたけど……）
jpnSearchText:
あはは、すみません。
（物凄く上の空でしたけど……）

engChrName: (Yeah, talk about zoning out. She sure as hell doesn't look all bark, though.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, talk about zoning out. She sure as hell doesn't
look all bark, though.)
jpnChrName: （つーか完全に腑抜けた顔してやがったな。   ハッ、それなりに腕は立ちそうだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（つーか完全に腑抜けた顔してやがったな。
ハッ、それなりに腕は立ちそうだが……）

engChrName: (I kinda feel like she used to be a jaeger. Maybe she's retired.)
engSearchText:
(I kinda feel like she used to be a jaeger. Maybe
she's retired.)
jpnChrName: （はい、あの子には甘々みたいです。）
jpnSearchText: （はい、あの子には甘々みたいです。）

engChrName: (Either way, she really loves her son. Heehee.)
engSearchText: (Either way, she really loves her son. Heehee.)
jpnChrName: （猟兵出身みたいですけど……この様子だと   もう引退されてるのかもですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（猟兵出身みたいですけど……この様子だと
もう引退されてるのかもですね。）

engChrName: Just so we're absolutely clear: if you do anything to my Yota—and I do mean ANYTHING—you're going to pay the price for it. Big time.
engSearchText:
Just so we're absolutely clear: if you do anything to my
Yota—and I do mean ANYTHING—you're going
to pay the price for it. Big time.
jpnChrName: ゴホン、言っておくがヨータに 何かしたらタダじゃ済まさないからね。
jpnSearchText:
ゴホン、言っておくがヨータに
