何かしたらタダじゃ済まさないからね。

engChrName: If you're gonna drink at my bar, I expect you to know your place. Got it?!
engSearchText:
If you're gonna drink at my bar, I expect you to know
your place. Got it?!
jpnChrName: ウチで飲むなら弁えておきな──いいね！！
jpnSearchText: ウチで飲むなら弁えておきな──いいね！！

engChrName: ...You serious? Zin Vathek?! What the hell are YOU doing here?
engSearchText:
...You serious? Zin Vathek?! What the hell are YOU
doing here?
jpnChrName: はん？　《不動》がこんな所で 一体何をしてるんだい？
jpnSearchText:
はん？　《不動》がこんな所で
一体何をしてるんだい？

engChrName: Look, if you're just a customer, that's fine. But you're on our turf, and we're not the straight laces you deal with on the surface.
engSearchText:
Look, if you're just a customer, that's fine. But you're
on our turf, and we're not the straight laces you deal
with on the surface.
jpnChrName: 何者だろうが客は客、ただここは “オモテの世界（アンタのフィールド）”じゃないんだ。
jpnSearchText:
何者だろうが客は客、ただここは
“オモテの世界（アンタのフィールド）”じゃないんだ。

engChrName: You just stay the hell out of our business and we'll steer clear of yours. You got that?
engSearchText:
You just stay the hell out of our business and we'll
steer clear of yours. You got that?
jpnChrName: アタシらに口出しする権利なんざない── そいつは分かってんだろうね？
jpnSearchText:
アタシらに口出しする権利なんざない──
そいつは分かってんだろうね？

engChrName: Don't worry, I know my place here. I'm not looking to ruffle any feathers.
engSearchText:
Don't worry, I know my place here. I'm not looking
to ruffle any feathers.
jpnChrName: はは、無論弁えてるさ。 商売の邪魔をするつもりもない。
jpnSearchText:
はは、無論弁えてるさ。
商売の邪魔をするつもりもない。

engChrName: Sometimes all I want is to shoot the shit over drinks. Nothing wrong with that, is there?
engSearchText:
Sometimes all I want is to shoot the shit over drinks.
Nothing wrong with that, is there?
jpnChrName: ただ時々うまい酒を飲みに来て 話を聞くくらいは構わんだろう？
jpnSearchText:
ただ時々うまい酒を飲みに来て
話を聞くくらいは構わんだろう？

engChrName: No, provided you don't try to pull anything funny. And drop the goody-two-shoes bullshit while you're here, okay? Makes me wanna puke.
engSearchText:
No, provided you don't try to pull anything funny.
And drop the goody-two-shoes bullshit while you're
here, okay? Makes me wanna puke.
jpnChrName: フン……スジを通すってんならいいけどね。 ウザイから正義のミカタぶるのだけは止めときな。
jpnSearchText:
フン……スジを通すってんならいいけどね。
ウザイから正義のミカタぶるのだけは止めときな。

engChrName: I hear you, I'll be careful. Thanks for the warning. (She must be some kind of ex-jaeger to be talking like that.)
engSearchText:
I hear you, I'll be careful. Thanks for the warning.
(She must be some kind of ex-jaeger to be talking
like that.)
jpnChrName: ああ、忠告として受け取っておくぜ。 （どうやら猟兵上がりのようだが……）
jpnSearchText:
ああ、忠告として受け取っておくぜ。
（どうやら猟兵上がりのようだが……）

engChrName: (Best you don't go down that rabbit hole. People don't like you pryin' into their histories here.)
engSearchText:
(Best you don't go down that rabbit hole.
People don't like you pryin' into their histories here.)
jpnChrName: （やめときな、変に事情を勘繰るのも   ここじゃヤボってもんだぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（やめときな、変に事情を勘繰るのも
ここじゃヤボってもんだぜ。）

engChrName: (And anyway, pretty sure this ain't the bar we want.)
engSearchText: (And anyway, pretty sure this ain't the bar we want.)
jpnChrName: （しかしこの様子……   目当ての酒場は別みてえだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（しかしこの様子……
目当ての酒場は別みてえだな。）

engChrName: Bracers make me sick just looking at them— always have. I sure as hell don't miss that part of the surface.
engSearchText:
Bracers make me sick just looking at them—
always have. I sure as hell don't miss that part of
the surface.
jpnChrName: フン……アタシは昔から 遊撃士だけはいけ好かないんだ。
jpnSearchText:
フン……アタシは昔から
遊撃士だけはいけ好かないんだ。

engChrName: Bunch'a hypocrites who don't know jack shit about how the world works. They're not mafia bad, but that's not exactly a high bar.
engSearchText:
Bunch'a hypocrites who don't know jack shit about
how the world works. They're not mafia bad, but
that's not exactly a high bar.
jpnChrName: 偽善者ぶりやがって、何も分かっちゃいない。 ──まあ“最悪”の連中よりはマシだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
偽善者ぶりやがって、何も分かっちゃいない。
──まあ“最悪”の連中よりはマシだけどね。

engChrName: Just stay in your damn lane. This is OUR world. You wannabe cops and your shiny badges don't mean shit down here, so get lost.
engSearchText:
Just stay in your damn lane. This is OUR world. You
wannabe cops and your shiny badges don't mean shit
down here, so get lost.
jpnChrName: なんにせよ大人しくしてな。 ここはアタシらの世界だ。
jpnSearchText:
なんにせよ大人しくしてな。
ここはアタシらの世界だ。

engChrName: And ANYBODY who tries laying a finger on my Yota, bracer or not, they'll have hell to pay. REAL hell. Remember that if you want to live.
engSearchText:
And ANYBODY who tries laying a finger on my
Yota, bracer or not, they'll have hell to pay.
REAL hell. Remember that if you want to live.
jpnChrName: ……あとヨータに手出ししたら タダじゃ置かないからね、よーく覚えておきな。
jpnSearchText:
……あとヨータに手出ししたら
タダじゃ置かないからね、よーく覚えておきな。

engChrName: Damn. Not a peep from your channels, huh? That's pretty surprising.
engSearchText:
Damn. Not a peep from your channels, huh?
That's pretty surprising.
jpnChrName: ……そうか、そっちのルートでも 詳しいことが分からないとはな。
jpnSearchText:
……そうか、そっちのルートでも
詳しいことが分からないとはな。

engChrName: Sorry about that... All I can tell you is that it's not coming from Messeldam.
engSearchText:
Sorry about that... All I can tell you is that it's not
coming from Messeldam.
jpnChrName: 悪いねぇ、ただメッセルダム方面の ルートじゃないのは確かだろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
悪いねぇ、ただメッセルダム方面の
ルートじゃないのは確かだろうさ。

engChrName: I don't know what specifically you're trying to dig up, but if you're gonna try and find some other informants yourself, you'd better be careful—
engSearchText:
I don't know what specifically you're trying to dig up,
but if you're gonna try and find some other
informants yourself, you'd better be careful—
jpnChrName: ま、何を探ってるのか知らないが 他を当たるなら慎重に──
jpnSearchText:
ま、何を探ってるのか知らないが
他を当たるなら慎重に──

engChrName: Oh. Hey there, spriggan.
engSearchText: Oh. Hey there, spriggan.
jpnChrName: ああ、裏解決屋かい。
jpnSearchText: ああ、裏解決屋かい。

engChrName: Hey, Van. Didn't know you guys were down here.
engSearchText: Hey, Van. Didn't know you guys were down here.
jpnChrName: なんだヴァン、 お前たちも黒芒街（こちら）に来ていたのか。
jpnSearchText:
なんだヴァン、
お前たちも黒芒街（こちら）に来ていたのか。

engChrName: Doing a little onboarding for your latest hire, looks like?
engSearchText:
Doing a little onboarding for your latest hire,
looks like?
jpnChrName: フフ、期待の新人の 試用研修の仕上げといった所か？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、期待の新人の
試用研修の仕上げといった所か？

engChrName: Kinda, though he's just a temp.
engSearchText: Kinda, though he's just a temp.
jpnChrName: ま、そんな所だ。 あくまで臨時ではあるけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そんな所だ。
あくまで臨時ではあるけどな。

engChrName: Pleased to meet you, Mr. Brad—my name is Quatre Salision. I've heard plenty about you from my colleagues.
engSearchText:
Pleased to meet you, Mr. Brad—my name is
Quatre Salision. I've heard plenty about you from
my colleagues.
jpnChrName: カトル・サリシオンです。 ディンゴさんの噂はかねがね。
jpnSearchText:
カトル・サリシオンです。
ディンゴさんの噂はかねがね。

engChrName: From what I gather, you've lent your talents to both the Institute of Science and the Verne Company on several occasions.
engSearchText:
From what I gather, you've lent your talents to both
the Institute of Science and the Verne Company on
several occasions.
jpnChrName: 理科大学とヴェルヌ社方面でも以前、 何度かお世話になっているそうですね？
jpnSearchText:
理科大学とヴェルヌ社方面でも以前、
何度かお世話になっているそうですね？

engChrName: Yeah, I exchange intel for their inside scoops every now and then. I scratch their back, they scratch mine.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I exchange intel for their inside scoops every
now and then. I scratch their back, they scratch mine.
jpnChrName: ああ、情報屋として力を貸した一方、 スクープをすっぱ抜いたこともあるがな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、情報屋として力を貸した一方、
スクープをすっぱ抜いたこともあるがな。

engChrName: So wait... You're the kid that Hamilton...
engSearchText: So wait... You're the kid that Hamilton...
jpnChrName: ……そうか、君があの ハミルトン博士が預かったという……
jpnSearchText:
……そうか、君があの
ハミルトン博士が預かったという……

engChrName: Hmm? Is...something the matter?
engSearchText: Hmm? Is...something the matter?

engChrName: What's up? Got word from the grapevine about him?
engSearchText: What's up? Got word from the grapevine about him?
jpnChrName: なんだ、前に何か 聞いたことでもあんのか？
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、前に何か
聞いたことでもあんのか？

engChrName: No, not exactly. He just reminded me of an old scoop I'd forgotten about.
engSearchText:
No, not exactly. He just reminded me of an old scoop
I'd forgotten about.
jpnChrName: いや──ちょっとした 昔話を思い出しただけさ。
jpnSearchText:
いや──ちょっとした
昔話を思い出しただけさ。

engChrName: At any rate, I heard you pulled your own weight out there in Basel. That's real impressive for a kid your age.
engSearchText:
At any rate, I heard you pulled your own weight out
there in Basel. That's real impressive for a kid
your age.
jpnChrName: 先日のバーゼルの件については ヴァンたち共々、尽力してくれたそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
先日のバーゼルの件については
ヴァンたち共々、尽力してくれたそうだな？

engChrName: If you can already hang with Van and his ragtag bunch, you'll do just fine at the solutions office.
engSearchText:
If you can already hang with Van and his ragtag
bunch, you'll do just fine at the solutions office.
jpnChrName: まだ若いのに頼もしい限りだ。 どうか解決事務所の力になってやってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
まだ若いのに頼もしい限りだ。
どうか解決事務所の力になってやってくれ。

engChrName: Th-Thank you! I, er... Of course. I'll pour my all into my work here.
engSearchText:
Th-Thank you! I, er... Of course. I'll pour my all into
my work here.
jpnChrName: ！　えっと、 やるからには微力を尽くします。
jpnSearchText:
！　えっと、
やるからには微力を尽くします。

engChrName: (I'd heard he was handsome, but seeing him in person is...really something else.)
engSearchText:
(I'd heard he was handsome, but seeing him in person
is...really something else.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、噂は聞いてたけど   めちゃくちゃイケメンだねぇ……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、噂は聞いてたけど
めちゃくちゃイケメンだねぇ……）

engChrName: (Yeah, he looks really cool and rugged. Heehee.)
engSearchText: (Yeah, he looks really cool and rugged. Heehee.)
jpnChrName: （えへへ、はいっ。   カッコイイですよね。）
jpnSearchText:
（えへへ、はいっ。
カッコイイですよね。）

engChrName: (Meh. As a real ladykiller, I'd give him maybe a seven out of ten. Better than the boss, though, I'll give him that much.)
engSearchText:
(Meh. As a real ladykiller, I'd give him maybe a seven
out of ten. Better than the boss, though, I'll give him
that much.)
jpnChrName: （ハン……俺様には及ばねえが   どこぞの所長よりは確実に上だな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハン……俺様には及ばねえが
どこぞの所長よりは確実に上だな。）

engChrName: (I can see why Mr. Arkride and Ms. Aymé place their trust in him.)
engSearchText:
(I can see why Mr. Arkride and Ms. Aymé place
their trust in him.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ、ヴァン様やマリエル様が   全幅の信頼を寄せられるのも納得かと。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ、ヴァン様やマリエル様が
全幅の信頼を寄せられるのも納得かと。）

engChrName: (Ahaha... I think you're perfectly handsome, too, Van!)
engSearchText:
(Ahaha... I think you're
perfectly handsome, too, Van!)
jpnChrName: （あはは……あ、勿論ヴァンさんも   負けてないと思いますけどっ！）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……あ、勿論ヴァンさんも
負けてないと思いますけどっ！）

engChrName: (It's all right, Agnès. You don't have to try and pity this poor, ugly old geezer. He's just too far gone...)
engSearchText:
(It's all right, Agnès. You don't have to try and pity
this poor, ugly old geezer. He's just too far gone...)
jpnChrName: （フン、取って付けたような   フォローはいらねぇんだっつの。）
jpnSearchText:
（フン、取って付けたような
フォローはいらねぇんだっつの。）

engChrName: How 'bout you, though? Out investigatin' something? I know you ran out on your date with your little gal pal.
engSearchText:
How 'bout you, though? Out investigatin' something?
I know you ran out on your date with your little
gal pal.
jpnChrName: それはともかく何か調べ物か？ 嬢ちゃんとのデートを中断したようだが。
jpnSearchText:
それはともかく何か調べ物か？
嬢ちゃんとのデートを中断したようだが。

engChrName: Oh, you ran into Marielle, did you? Yeah, I had to scram—although I did recommend she hit the bathhouse, so her time out wasn't a total wash.
engSearchText:
Oh, you ran into Marielle, did you? Yeah, I had to
scram—although I did recommend she hit the
bathhouse, so her time out wasn't a total wash.
jpnChrName: ああ、マリエルに会ったのか。 折角だから公衆浴場を勧めたが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、マリエルに会ったのか。
折角だから公衆浴場を勧めたが……

engChrName: How 'bout you, though? Out investigatin' something? Not used to seein' you 'round here at this time of day.
engSearchText:
How 'bout you, though? Out investigatin' something?
Not used to seein' you 'round here at this time of day.
jpnChrName: それはともかく何か調べ物か？ 昼ここに来てるのも珍しい気がするが。
jpnSearchText:
それはともかく何か調べ物か？
昼ここに来てるのも珍しい気がするが。

engChrName: Yeah. I have to keep my schedule open—I've got something lined up tonight. So I'm just schmoozing here for now.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I have to keep my schedule open—I've got
something lined up tonight. So I'm just schmoozing
here for now.
jpnChrName: ああ、夜にちょっと 時間を空けておく必要があってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、夜にちょっと
時間を空けておく必要があってな。

engChrName: ...What's up? Sounded like you had more to say.
engSearchText: ...What's up? Sounded like you had more to say.
jpnChrName: ……？　どうした？
jpnSearchText: ……？　どうした？

engChrName: Is...everything okay?
engSearchText: Is...everything okay?
jpnChrName: えっと、ディンゴさん？
jpnSearchText: えっと、ディンゴさん？

engChrName: Sorry. Just lost in thought. I'm following a lead at the moment—nothing solid yet, but yeah.
engSearchText:
Sorry. Just lost in thought. I'm following a lead at the
moment—nothing solid yet, but yeah.
jpnChrName: いや──まだ確かなことが 何も掴めていないネタがあってな。
jpnSearchText:
いや──まだ確かなことが
何も掴めていないネタがあってな。

engChrName: I might actually have to hit you up later, if that's okay. You might know a thing or two about it.
engSearchText:
I might actually have to hit you up later, if that's okay.
You might know a thing or two about it.
jpnChrName: いずれ相談させてもらうかもしれん。 そうなったら改めて力を貸してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
いずれ相談させてもらうかもしれん。
そうなったら改めて力を貸してくれ。

engChrName: Fine with me. You know my door's always open for you.
engSearchText:
Fine with me. You know my door's always open
for you.
jpnChrName: ハン、言わずもがなだろ。
jpnSearchText: ハン、言わずもがなだろ。

engChrName: Havin' a guy like you in my line of work is a real cheat code. I'll always lend you a hand.
engSearchText:
Havin' a guy like you in my line of work is a real
cheat code. I'll always lend you a hand.
jpnChrName: 俺が解決屋を始めて以来の腐れ縁、 どんだけ貸し借りしてると思ってやがる。
jpnSearchText:
俺が解決屋を始めて以来の腐れ縁、
どんだけ貸し借りしてると思ってやがる。

engChrName: Agreed. Please, don't hesitate to come talk to us, especially now that we have extra hands to help.
engSearchText:
Agreed. Please, don't hesitate to come talk to us,
especially now that we have extra hands to help.
jpnChrName: ふふ、遠慮なく仰ってくださいね。 事務所の人手も増えていますし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、遠慮なく仰ってくださいね。
事務所の人手も増えていますし。

engChrName: Thanks. I'll let you guys know if I end up needing outside help on it.
engSearchText:
Thanks. I'll let you guys know if I end up needing
outside help on it.

jpnSearchText:
ああ……
なら遠慮なくアテにしておくぞ。

engSearchText:
Hey, what's a...uh, a rebelooshun festibull?
Mommy and the others keep talking about it.
jpnChrName: ねーねー……カクメキネサイ？　ってなに～？ さいきんママたちが話してるんだけど～……
jpnSearchText:
ねーねー……カクメキネサイ？　ってなに～？
さいきんママたちが話してるんだけど～……

engChrName: Is it like a...a celery? Cell abrasion? One of those. I went to one with Mommy at the colosseum. Is this one like that?
engSearchText:
Is it like a...a celery? Cell abrasion? One of those.
I went to one with Mommy at the colosseum. Is this
one like that?

jpnSearchText:
オマツリ？　って前にママとみた
トーギジョーともちがうのかなぁ……

engSearchText:
Mommy asked if I wanna go, but I dunno if I wanna,
'cause like...

jpnSearchText:
ママに行きたいかきかれたんだけど……
ボク……よくわかんないや……

engChrName: ...I dunno what a rebelooshun festibull is.
engSearchText: ...I dunno what a rebelooshun festibull is.
jpnChrName: ボク……よくわかんないし……
jpnSearchText: ボク……よくわかんないし……

engChrName: But I bet it's great! I get to be with Mommy, and being with Mommy makes me super duper ultra extra happy! Heehee!
engSearchText:
But I bet it's great! I get to be with Mommy, and
being with Mommy makes me super duper ultra
extra happy! Heehee!
jpnChrName: ママといっしょなら ずっとずっとしあわせだよーっ！
jpnSearchText:
ママといっしょなら
ずっとずっとしあわせだよーっ！

engChrName: A lot of old guys like to come here for some reason.
engSearchText: A lot of old guys like to come here for some reason.
jpnChrName: なんだかしらないオジサンが たくさんきてくれるんだケド……
jpnSearchText:
なんだかしらないオジサンが
たくさんきてくれるんだケド……

engChrName: I dunno who they are. Maybe they just like Mommy's drinks?
engSearchText:
I dunno who they are. Maybe they just like
Mommy's drinks?
jpnChrName: えへへっ、みんなママのおさけが のみたくてきちゃったのかな～っ？
jpnSearchText:
えへへっ、みんなママのおさけが
のみたくてきちゃったのかな～っ？

engChrName: I like them, though! Nobody who likes Mommy's drinks can be a bad person! Heehee, I'm gonna go give them all biiig hugs!
engSearchText:
I like them, though! Nobody who likes Mommy's
drinks can be a bad person! Heehee, I'm gonna go
give them all biiig hugs!
jpnChrName: じゃあボク、みんなのこと大好きかも！ えへへ、ギューってしてあげるっ！！
jpnSearchText:
じゃあボク、みんなのこと大好きかも！
えへへ、ギューってしてあげるっ！！

engChrName: Mommyyy... Lemme help... I'll wash the... the dishes... *yaaawn*
engSearchText:
Mommyyy... Lemme help... I'll wash the...
the dishes... *yaaawn*
jpnChrName: ……ママ……　ボク、おさらあらいするね……
jpnSearchText: ……ママ……　ボク、おさらあらいするね……

engChrName: Thank you, Yota, but that's okay. It's time for you to go to bed now.
engSearchText:
Thank you, Yota, but that's okay. It's time for you to
go to bed now.
jpnChrName: ……いいから休みな、ヨータ。 あんたそろそろおねむじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
……いいから休みな、ヨータ。
あんたそろそろおねむじゃないか。

engChrName: Mommy can take care of everything by herself. Go brush your teeth and get tucked in, okay?
engSearchText:
Mommy can take care of everything by herself.
Go brush your teeth and get tucked in, okay?
jpnChrName: 後はアタシ一人で十分さ。 ホラ、はやく歯を磨いてきな！
jpnSearchText:
後はアタシ一人で十分さ。
ホラ、はやく歯を磨いてきな！

engChrName: Mommyyy... Can you pick me up...?
engSearchText: Mommyyy... Can you pick me up...?
jpnChrName: ママぁ……だっこぉ……
jpnSearchText: ママぁ……だっこぉ……

engChrName: *sigh* Now how am I supposed to say no to that?
engSearchText: *sigh* Now how am I supposed to say no to that?
jpnChrName: し、しょうがないねぇ、あんたは……
jpnSearchText: し、しょうがないねぇ、あんたは……

engChrName: Okay, but only after you've brushed your teeth. Come on, let's go. I'll wait for you while you get ready for bed.
engSearchText:
Okay, but only after you've brushed your teeth.
Come on, let's go. I'll wait for you while you get ready
for bed.
jpnChrName: まずは歯磨きしてきな。 まっててあげるからね！
jpnSearchText:
まずは歯磨きしてきな。
まっててあげるからね！

engChrName: Huh? Who are you, lady? I've never seen you before!
engSearchText: Huh? Who are you, lady? I've never seen you before!
jpnChrName: はれ～っ？　おねーさんダレ～っ？
jpnSearchText: はれ～っ？　おねーさんダレ～っ？

engChrName: Lady? A-Are you talking about me? E-Er, no, I'm a guy!
engSearchText:
Lady? A-Are you talking about me? E-Er, no, I'm
a guy!
jpnChrName: ちょっ……ぼ、僕のこと？ お、お姉さんじゃないから！！
jpnSearchText:
ちょっ……ぼ、僕のこと？
お、お姉さんじゃないから！！

engChrName: Really? You're so prettyyy! I thought you were a lady.
engSearchText: Really? You're so prettyyy! I thought you were a lady.
jpnChrName: そうなの～っ？　キレーだから おねーさんかとおもっちゃった～！
jpnSearchText:
そうなの～っ？　キレーだから
おねーさんかとおもっちゃった～！

engChrName: That's okay! Hey, will you hug me and pick me up? Pleeease?
engSearchText:
That's okay! Hey, will you hug me and pick me up?
Pleeease?
jpnChrName: ねーねー、それじゃあ だっこしてギューってしてくれる～っ？
jpnSearchText:
ねーねー、それじゃあ
だっこしてギューってしてくれる～っ？

engChrName: Er, sorry, I'll have to pass!
engSearchText: Er, sorry, I'll have to pass!
jpnChrName: し、しないからっ！
jpnSearchText: し、しないからっ！

engChrName: (This place just gets weirder and weirder... You'd think this kid would've learned to be more careful around strangers.)
engSearchText:
(This place just gets weirder and weirder...
You'd think this kid would've learned to be more
careful around strangers.)
jpnChrName: （この子、人懐っこすぎじゃないの？   まったく変な場所だなぁ……）
jpnSearchText:
（この子、人懐っこすぎじゃないの？
まったく変な場所だなぁ……）

engChrName: (Heehee, he's really taken a liking to you, hasn't he? That's so sweet.)
engSearchText:
(Heehee, he's really taken a liking to you, hasn't he?
That's so sweet.)
jpnChrName: （あははは……カトル君にも   懐いてしまったみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（あははは……カトル君にも
懐いてしまったみたいですね。）

engChrName: Mr. Dingo knows so many cool stories!
engSearchText: Mr. Dingo knows so many cool stories!
jpnChrName: あのねー、ディンゴのおにーさんは たっくさんオモシロイ話してくれるんだよ～っ！
jpnSearchText:
あのねー、ディンゴのおにーさんは
たっくさんオモシロイ話してくれるんだよ～っ！

engChrName: I wanna be just like him when I grow up! I'm gonna travel all over the world and meet a ton of people!
engSearchText:
I wanna be just like him when I grow up! I'm gonna
travel all over the world and meet a ton of people!
jpnChrName: ボク、いつかおにーさんみたいに いろんなトコにいってみたいな～！
jpnSearchText:
ボク、いつかおにーさんみたいに
いろんなトコにいってみたいな～！

engChrName: And I'm gonna give everybody big old hugs! ㈱
engSearchText: And I'm gonna give everybody big old hugs! ㈱
jpnChrName: でね～、いろんなひとにあって、 ギューってしてあげるの～っ♪
jpnSearchText:
でね～、いろんなひとにあって、
ギューってしてあげるの～っ♪

engChrName: Hey, you're the curry-her lady!
engSearchText: Hey, you're the curry-her lady!
jpnChrName: あっ、はこびやのおねーちゃんだ～っ！
jpnSearchText: あっ、はこびやのおねーちゃんだ～っ！

engChrName: Yaaay! Are you gonna tell me more stories about the outside? Pleeease?
engSearchText:
Yaaay! Are you gonna tell me more stories about
the outside? Pleeease?
jpnChrName: ね～ね～、また外のおはなしきかせて～っ！
jpnSearchText: ね～ね～、また外のおはなしきかせて～っ！

engChrName: Of course! What are you curious about today, kiddo?
engSearchText: Of course! What are you curious about today, kiddo?
jpnChrName: ふふっ、勿論いいわよ。 ヨータは何が聞きたいのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、勿論いいわよ。
ヨータは何が聞きたいのかしら？

engChrName: Hmm... Oh, oh! I wanna know about where Mommy came from! And can you gimme a hug, too?
engSearchText:
Hmm... Oh, oh! I wanna know about where Mommy
came from! And can you gimme a hug, too?
jpnChrName: えっとね、ママの国のおはなし～！！ ……あとね～、ギューってして～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
えっとね、ママの国のおはなし～！！
……あとね～、ギューってして～っ！！

engChrName: *sigh* Just an irresistible little munchkin, aren't you? Oh, all right. C'mere, I'm all yours.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Just an irresistible little munchkin, aren't you?
Oh, all right. C'mere, I'm all yours.
jpnChrName: いつもながらの破壊力……コホン じゃなくて、仕方ないわね、もう……
jpnSearchText:
いつもながらの破壊力……コホン
じゃなくて、仕方ないわね、もう……

engChrName: (Hah. Even Hermès is no match for the power of cuteness.)
engSearchText:
(Hah. Even Hermès is no match for the power
of cuteness.)
jpnChrName: （はは……エルメスも形無しみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText: （はは……エルメスも形無しみてえだな。）

engChrName: Heehee! I LOVE the curry-her lady!
engSearchText: Heehee! I LOVE the curry-her lady!
jpnChrName: はこびやのおねーちゃんね、 ときどきあいにきてくれるんだよ～っ！
jpnSearchText:
はこびやのおねーちゃんね、
ときどきあいにきてくれるんだよ～っ！

engChrName: Sometimes she comes to visit me! I wish she would come every day!
engSearchText:
Sometimes she comes to visit me! I wish she would
come every day!
jpnChrName: えへへ、ボクおねーちゃんのこと だいだいだ～い好き～～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、ボクおねーちゃんのこと
だいだいだ～い好き～～っ！！

engChrName: Whoa, hey there, little guy. Didn't see you there.
engSearchText: Whoa, hey there, little guy. Didn't see you there.
jpnChrName: おっと、子供もいるのか……
jpnSearchText: おっと、子供もいるのか……

engChrName: WHOA! You're so BIG, mister!
engSearchText: WHOA! You're so BIG, mister!
jpnChrName: わああっ！　おにーさんたちおっきいね～っ！
jpnSearchText: わああっ！　おにーさんたちおっきいね～っ！

engChrName: You should have some of Mommy's drinks! They're delicious!
engSearchText:
You should have some of Mommy's drinks!
They're delicious!
jpnChrName: あのねあのね～？ ママのつくったおさけ、おいしいよぉ？
jpnSearchText:
あのねあのね～？
ママのつくったおさけ、おいしいよぉ？

engChrName: I'm not allowed to have any 'cause I'm too little. But you guys will love them! I know it!
engSearchText:
I'm not allowed to have any 'cause I'm too little.
But you guys will love them! I know it!
jpnChrName: ボクはのんじゃメッなんだけど、 オジサンたちはまっかっかになっちゃうの～！
jpnSearchText:
ボクはのんじゃメッなんだけど、
オジサンたちはまっかっかになっちゃうの～！

engChrName: Sounds like a ringing endorsement to me. I'll never say no to a good glass of brew.
engSearchText:
Sounds like a ringing endorsement to me. I'll never
say no to a good glass of brew.
jpnChrName: おお、そいつは楽しみだなぁ！ オジサンも酒には目がなくてな！
jpnSearchText:
おお、そいつは楽しみだなぁ！
オジサンも酒には目がなくてな！

engChrName: Really?! You're gonna have one of Mommy's 'spear-its'? You promise?!
engSearchText:
Really?! You're gonna have one of
Mommy's 'spear-its'? You promise?!
jpnChrName: ほんと～っ！　ママのつくった “すぴりたす”、のんでくれる～っ！？
jpnSearchText:
ほんと～っ！　ママのつくった
“すぴりたす”、のんでくれる～っ！？

engChrName: You bet. I'm a little too busy to sit down for a drink today, but I'll come back another day for it. Deal?
engSearchText:
You bet. I'm a little too busy to sit down for a drink
today, but I'll come back another day for it. Deal?
jpnChrName: ああ、今はちょいと用事があるが 日を改めてなら……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、今はちょいと用事があるが
日を改めてなら……

engChrName: Yaaay! I'm gonna tell Mommy right now!
engSearchText: Yaaay! I'm gonna tell Mommy right now!
jpnChrName: わぁぁっ！　またきてくれるの！？ ボクうれし～っ！！　ママにもはなしてくるー！！
jpnSearchText:
わぁぁっ！　またきてくれるの！？
ボクうれし～っ！！　ママにもはなしてくるー！！

engChrName: (Whoops, might've run my mouth a bit too much there. That kid got me hook, line, and sinker.)
engSearchText:
(Whoops, might've run my mouth a bit too
much there. That kid got me hook, line, and sinker.)
jpnChrName: （うーむ、つい口約束をしちまったか。   ハハ、毒気のない子相手だとついな。）
jpnSearchText:
（うーむ、つい口約束をしちまったか。
ハハ、毒気のない子相手だとついな。）

engChrName: (I'll say. No wonder this joint does pretty well for itself.)
engSearchText:
(I'll say. No wonder this joint does pretty well
for itself.)
jpnChrName: （この酒場が繁盛してる理由……   分かった気がすんだろ？）
jpnSearchText:
（この酒場が繁盛してる理由……
分かった気がすんだろ？）

engChrName: You're so BIG, mister! You're like a bear!
engSearchText: You're so BIG, mister! You're like a bear!
jpnChrName: オジサン、おっきくてクマみた～い！！
jpnSearchText: オジサン、おっきくてクマみた～い！！

engChrName: Heehee! Hey, mister, won't you come back to play another day? I'll be waiting!
engSearchText:
Heehee! Hey, mister, won't you come back to play
another day? I'll be waiting!
jpnChrName: えへへっ、またこんどあそびにきてね？ ボクまってるから～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
えへへっ、またこんどあそびにきてね？
ボクまってるから～っ！！

engChrName: Well, how can I say no to a face like that? You've got a deal, kiddo: I'll come back soon, okay?
engSearchText:
Well, how can I say no to a face like that? You've got
a deal, kiddo: I'll come back soon, okay?
jpnChrName: ハハ、敵わんなぁ。 ……おう、また顔を出すぜ坊主。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、敵わんなぁ。
……おう、また顔を出すぜ坊主。

engChrName: Need a bite to eat? I just had a ton of people telling me they were hungry, so I decided to open back up for now.
engSearchText:
Need a bite to eat? I just had a ton of people telling
me they were hungry, so I decided to open back
up for now.
jpnChrName: なんか食ってくか？　腹減ったって 連中も多いし、ウチも通常営業に戻したぜ。
jpnSearchText:
なんか食ってくか？　腹減ったって
連中も多いし、ウチも通常営業に戻したぜ。

engChrName: Guess we folks adjust to things pretty quickly, for better and for worse.
engSearchText:
Guess we folks adjust to things pretty quickly, for
better and for worse.
jpnChrName: まあそろそろこの状況にも 慣れてきたって所なんだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
まあそろそろこの状況にも
慣れてきたって所なんだろうな。

engChrName: I ain't made of booze and grub, though. I only got so much to go around.
engSearchText:
I ain't made of booze and grub, though. I only got so
much to go around.
jpnChrName: だが酒も食料もそう在庫があるわけじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText: だが酒も食料もそう在庫があるわけじゃねえ。

engChrName: You guys better come back in one piece, y'hear me? My business is countin' on you!
engSearchText:
You guys better come back in one piece, y'hear me?
My business is countin' on you!
jpnChrName: オレの店のためにも とっとと戻ってほしい所だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
オレの店のためにも
とっとと戻ってほしい所だぜ。

engChrName: Hey, good, you're alive. That makes two of us. We're doing just peachy down here, for the most part.
engSearchText:
Hey, good, you're alive. That makes two of us.
We're doing just peachy down here, for the most part.
jpnChrName: よお、元気そうじゃねえか。 オレらもピンピンしてんぜ。
jpnSearchText:
よお、元気そうじゃねえか。
オレらもピンピンしてんぜ。

engChrName: No idea what these devils are. If they're customers, I'll serve 'em like anyone else. Shitheels? I'll beat their asses like anyone else.
engSearchText:
No idea what these devils are. If they're customers, I'll
serve 'em like anyone else. Shitheels? I'll beat their
asses like anyone else.
jpnChrName: “悪魔”だか知らんが知ったこっちゃねえな。 客ならもてなし、糞ならブチのめすだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
“悪魔”だか知らんが知ったこっちゃねえな。
客ならもてなし、糞ならブチのめすだけだ。

engChrName: I dunno what's up with those guys frozen in place there...but they better not try'n dine and dash me, or else.
engSearchText:
I dunno what's up with those guys frozen in place
there...but they better not try'n dine and dash me,
or else.
jpnChrName: あの“停まった”連中も……訳は分からんが 食い逃げだけはさせねえぜ、絶対にな。
jpnSearchText:
あの“停まった”連中も……訳は分からんが
食い逃げだけはさせねえぜ、絶対にな。

engChrName: (Wow, he's really giving them the glare! I feel sorry for them.)
engSearchText:
(Wow, he's really giving them the glare! I feel sorry
for them.)
jpnChrName: （め、めちゃくちゃ睨んでますね……）
jpnSearchText: （め、めちゃくちゃ睨んでますね……）

engChrName: (Well, least he's got the place on lock. You can always count on him for that.)
engSearchText:
(Well, least he's got the place on lock. You can always
count on him for that.)
jpnChrName: （ったく頼もしい限りだぜ、   ここの連中はよ。
jpnSearchText:
（ったく頼もしい限りだぜ、
ここの連中はよ。

engChrName: Damn, I've got Salvatore Gotti himself in the house.
engSearchText: Damn, I've got Salvatore Gotti himself in the house.
jpnChrName: へっ、まさかあのゴッチ監督がねぇ。
jpnSearchText: へっ、まさかあのゴッチ監督がねぇ。

engChrName: I ain't the type of guy to get very hands-on with my customers. But someone like him, I gotta make sure we treat him right.
engSearchText:
I ain't the type of guy to get very hands-on with
my customers. But someone like him, I gotta make
sure we treat him right.
jpnChrName: 俺ァ客には干渉しねえタチだが 流石にサービスしとかねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
俺ァ客には干渉しねえタチだが
流石にサービスしとかねえとな。

engChrName: Why's that, you ask...? You really don't know? You dense or somethin'?
engSearchText:
Why's that, you ask...? You really don't know?
You dense or somethin'?
jpnChrName: なんでかって？ 言わせんじゃねえぜ馬鹿野郎。
jpnSearchText:
なんでかって？
言わせんじゃねえぜ馬鹿野郎。

engChrName: 'Cause Gotti's films are the shit down here, just like everywhere else! We ain't some other dimension.
engSearchText:
'Cause Gotti's films are the shit down here, just like
everywhere else! We ain't some other dimension.
jpnChrName: この黒芒街でもゴッチ作品は 人気に決まってんだろうが！
jpnSearchText:
この黒芒街でもゴッチ作品は
人気に決まってんだろうが！

engChrName: I recognize some of the guys he's got with him, too. Whatever they're doin', they look like they're in good spirits.
engSearchText:
I recognize some of the guys he's got with him, too.
Whatever they're doin', they look like they're in
good spirits.
jpnChrName: 一緒に居る連中、見た顔もいるが それなりに盛り上がってるみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
一緒に居る連中、見た顔もいるが
それなりに盛り上がってるみてえだな。

engChrName: Heh. Think I'mma go out on a limb and offer 'em somethin' special for liftin' our spirits here in this dump.
engSearchText:
Heh. Think I'mma go out on a limb and offer 'em
somethin' special for liftin' our spirits here in
this dump.
jpnChrName: へっ、俺もちょいと サービスさせてもらうかね。
jpnSearchText:
へっ、俺もちょいと
サービスさせてもらうかね。

engChrName: Every festival, the colosseum down here holds a tournament called the Apex Showdown.
engSearchText:
Every festival, the colosseum down here holds a
tournament called the Apex Showdown.
jpnChrName: 地下闘技場のトーナメント、年に一度の “頂上戦”は革命記念日って決まっててな。
jpnSearchText:
地下闘技場のトーナメント、年に一度の
“頂上戦”は革命記念日って決まっててな。

engChrName: It's a hell of a hoot. They kick it off with this monster bloodbath, all kinds of different creatures goin' at each other.
engSearchText:
It's a hell of a hoot. They kick it off with this monster
bloodbath, all kinds of different creatures goin' at
each other.
jpnChrName: 前座で魔獣同士の 殺し合いショーなんかもやるんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
前座で魔獣同士の
殺し合いショーなんかもやるんだぜ。

engChrName: Pretty thrillin' stuff, and it makes for as good an excuse to gamble as any. You should check it out if you're into that kinda thing.
engSearchText:
Pretty thrillin' stuff, and it makes for as good an
excuse to gamble as any. You should check it out if
you're into that kinda thing.
jpnChrName: 賭けの方も含めてそれなりに盛り上がる。 気が向いたらテメエらも見に来いよ。
jpnSearchText:
賭けの方も含めてそれなりに盛り上がる。
気が向いたらテメエらも見に来いよ。

engChrName: This place is a real magnet for the thugs and lowlifes of Calvard. Talkin' jaeger dropouts, con artists, two-bit gangsters, the works.
engSearchText:
This place is a real magnet for the thugs and lowlifes
of Calvard. Talkin' jaeger dropouts, con artists,
two-bit gangsters, the works.
jpnChrName: チッ、どこぞの猟兵崩れに 詐欺師だの半グレだのがゾロゾロと……
jpnSearchText:
チッ、どこぞの猟兵崩れに
詐欺師だの半グレだのがゾロゾロと……

engChrName: Those guys are always makin' a ruckus. I tell 'em to can it, but the dumb shits never listen.
engSearchText:
Those guys are always makin' a ruckus. I tell 'em to
can it, but the dumb shits never listen.
jpnChrName: どいつもこいつも騒いでんじゃねーぞ。 迷惑つってんだろーが、糞どもがよォ……
jpnSearchText:
どいつもこいつも騒いでんじゃねーぞ。
迷惑つってんだろーが、糞どもがよォ……

engChrName: You folks be real careful wanderin' around these parts. Damn near anything can pop off if your luck's bad enough.
engSearchText:
You folks be real careful wanderin' around these parts.
Damn near anything can pop off if your luck's
bad enough.
jpnChrName: テメエらも精々気をつけろ。 何があるか分かったモンじゃねーぞ。
jpnSearchText:
テメエらも精々気をつけろ。
何があるか分かったモンじゃねーぞ。

engChrName: Ain't nobody knows exactly how long Blacklight's been around.
engSearchText:
Ain't nobody knows exactly how long Blacklight's
been around.
jpnChrName: この黒芒街は、いつから存在するのかも はっきりしねえらしいが……
jpnSearchText:
この黒芒街は、いつから存在するのかも
はっきりしねえらしいが……

engChrName: You believe the people on the streets, they'll tell you it goes back some 500 years.
engSearchText:
You believe the people on the streets, they'll tell you it
goes back some 500 years.
jpnChrName: なんでも百年くらい前には 既にあったんじゃねえかって話だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
なんでも百年くらい前には
既にあったんじゃねえかって話だぜ。

engChrName: More likely, it just popped up when people were driftin' around the city after the revolution. Shit was real chaotic back then.
engSearchText:
More likely, it just popped up when people were
driftin' around the city after the revolution. Shit was
real chaotic back then.
jpnChrName: ま、革命後のゴタゴタの中で 流れ着いた連中が作ったってトコだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、革命後のゴタゴタの中で
流れ着いた連中が作ったってトコだろうな。

engChrName: Only one who knows for sure's probably the boss, and the boss ain't someone to show up down here often, so who can say for certain?
engSearchText:
Only one who knows for sure's probably the boss, and
the boss ain't someone to show up down here often,
so who can say for certain?
jpnChrName: その辺りを知ってそうなのは顔役くらいだが…… あの人は滅多に顔を出さねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
その辺りを知ってそうなのは顔役くらいだが……
あの人は滅多に顔を出さねえからな。

engChrName: The boss is the one who keeps things clean down here. Ain't a soul alive down here who don't benefit somehow.
engSearchText:
The boss is the one who keeps things clean
down here. Ain't a soul alive down here who don't
benefit somehow.
jpnChrName: 顔役には黒芒街の誰もが世話ンなってる。 ここの唯一の纏め役みてえなもんだな。
jpnSearchText:
顔役には黒芒街の誰もが世話ンなってる。
ここの唯一の纏め役みてえなもんだな。

engChrName: I don't see the boss all that often myself, but you can always count on him to come through when you need him.
engSearchText:
I don't see the boss all that often myself, but you can
always count on him to come through when you
need him.
jpnChrName: 滅多に会えねえお人だが、 いざって時は頼るといいだろうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
滅多に会えねえお人だが、
いざって時は頼るといいだろうぜ。

engChrName: Well, I'll be damned, spriggan. Word on the street's that you folks tussled with Almata's crew out in Basel.
engSearchText:
Well, I'll be damned, spriggan. Word on the street's
that you folks tussled with Almata's crew out in Basel.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋……バーゼルじゃ アルマータとやり合ったんだってな？
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋……バーゼルじゃ
アルマータとやり合ったんだってな？

engChrName: Heh, don't you play coy with me. You got the underworld talkin'. Heard even Marduk had to get their hands dirty.
engSearchText:
Heh, don't you play coy with me. You got the
underworld talkin'. Heard even Marduk had to get
their hands dirty.
jpnChrName: 裏でもちょいと話題になってたぜ。 なんでもＭＫまで出張ってきたらしいが……
jpnSearchText:
裏でもちょいと話題になってたぜ。
なんでもＭＫまで出張ってきたらしいが……

engChrName: Hope you realize what kind of hornets' nest you've gone and shook. You ain't careful, you'll have a one-way ticket to an early grave.
engSearchText:
Hope you realize what kind of hornets' nest you've
gone and shook. You ain't careful, you'll have a
one-way ticket to an early grave.
jpnChrName: フン、よくもンな所に首が突っ込めたもんだ。 あんま無茶ばっかしてっと早死すんぞ？
jpnSearchText:
フン、よくもンな所に首が突っ込めたもんだ。
あんま無茶ばっかしてっと早死すんぞ？

engChrName: Well, look what the cat dragged in. Thought'cha could start shit outside my restaurant, huh?
engSearchText:
Well, look what the cat dragged in.
Thought'cha could start shit outside my
restaurant, huh?
jpnChrName: ……テメエらか。 店の前で散々やらかしてくれやがって……
jpnSearchText:
……テメエらか。
店の前で散々やらかしてくれやがって……

engChrName: I'll let you guys off once—got to make some money takin' bets on that. But you damage this place and I'll collect on your head, got it?
engSearchText:
I'll let you guys off once—got to make some money
takin' bets on that. But you damage this place and I'll
collect on your head, got it?
jpnChrName: まあ賭けの方で儲けさせてもらったからいいがな。 店に被害を出したら命はねえと思いやがれ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ賭けの方で儲けさせてもらったからいいがな。
店に被害を出したら命はねえと思いやがれ。

engChrName: Don't you guys cause no trouble, all right? This here's a legit business I'm runnin' with the boss' permission. You can't gimme shit!
engSearchText:
Don't you guys cause no trouble, all right? This here's
a legit business I'm runnin' with the boss' permission.
You can't gimme shit!
jpnChrName: ウチは顔役にもスジ通してんだ、 真っ当な商売を邪魔すんじゃねーぞコラ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチは顔役にもスジ通してんだ、
真っ当な商売を邪魔すんじゃねーぞコラ。

engChrName: ('Legitimate' is...stretching it a bit, with all those safety hazards he's got in plain sight.)
engSearchText:
('Legitimate' is...stretching it a bit, with all those
safety hazards he's got in plain sight.)
jpnChrName: （ま、真っ当、ですか……   手元に物騒な物まで置かれてますけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、真っ当、ですか……
手元に物騒な物まで置かれてますけど……）

engChrName: (Whatever's going on, he sounds serious! Better not get in his way or else.)
engSearchText:
(Whatever's going on, he sounds serious! Better not
get in his way or else.)
jpnChrName: （あはは、殺気も本物みたいです。   営業妨害はダメですよねっ！）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは、殺気も本物みたいです。
営業妨害はダメですよねっ！）

engChrName: (It ain't MY fault all that crap went down... Eh, whatever. Let's take a look around and then get the hell outta here.)
engSearchText:
(It ain't MY fault all that crap went down...
Eh, whatever. Let's take a look around and then get
the hell outta here.)
jpnChrName: （そもそも俺のせいじゃねえんだが……   まあいい、適当にブラついて帰んぞ。）
jpnSearchText:
（そもそも俺のせいじゃねえんだが……
まあいい、適当にブラついて帰んぞ。）

engChrName: (Relax, chief! Why do we need to rush? The gambling den's open. We oughta grab a seat and throw down. We can leave once we make some dough.)
engSearchText:
(Relax, chief! Why do we need to rush? The gambling
den's open. We oughta grab a seat and throw down.
We can leave once we make some dough.)
jpnChrName: （おうよ、ここじゃ賭場も開いてるようだしな。   軽く荒らして帰ろうぜ♪）
jpnSearchText:
（おうよ、ここじゃ賭場も開いてるようだしな。
軽く荒らして帰ろうぜ♪）

engChrName: (...All right, but just a little. And I mean ONLY a little.)
engSearchText:
(...All right, but just a little. And I mean ONLY
a little.)
jpnChrName: （……程々にしろ、程々に。）
jpnSearchText: （……程々にしろ、程々に。）

engChrName: We run a gamblin' den here, but that don't mean it's a free-for-all. Any bastards that step outta line get kicked out. Literally.
engSearchText:
We run a gamblin' den here, but that don't mean it's
a free-for-all. Any bastards that step outta line get
kicked out. Literally.
jpnChrName: ウチじゃ賭場も開いてるが…… 騒いだり暴れたりする糞は叩き出すからな。
jpnSearchText:
ウチじゃ賭場も開いてるが……
騒いだり暴れたりする糞は叩き出すからな。

engChrName: You wanna up the ante and put more money on the table, be my guest. But when you play in my house, you play by my rules.
engSearchText:
You wanna up the ante and put more money on the
table, be my guest. But when you play in my house,
you play by my rules.
jpnChrName: レートはいくら上げようが勝手だが ここじゃオレがルールだ。
jpnSearchText:
レートはいくら上げようが勝手だが
ここじゃオレがルールだ。

engChrName: The sooner you get that through your thick skulls, the better we'll get along. Got it?
engSearchText:
The sooner you get that through your thick skulls, the
better we'll get along. Got it?
jpnChrName: そこンとこ脳髄に叩き込んで遊べ、いいな。
jpnSearchText: そこンとこ脳髄に叩き込んで遊べ、いいな。

engChrName: Hey there! Come on and have some fun!
engSearchText: Hey there! Come on and have some fun!
jpnChrName: ハァイ！　楽しんでいってね～っ！
jpnSearchText: ハァイ！　楽しんでいってね～っ！

engChrName: Just don't get TOO naughty, all right? ㈱
engSearchText: Just don't get TOO naughty, all right? ㈱
jpnChrName: た・だ・し──　おいたはダメよっ☆
jpnSearchText: た・だ・し──　おいたはダメよっ☆

engChrName: I hear you youngins are startin' some big operation.
engSearchText: I hear you youngins are startin' some big operation.
jpnChrName: なんでも面白い作戦を始めるんですってね。
jpnSearchText: なんでも面白い作戦を始めるんですってね。

engChrName: Now there's a show I don't want to miss! I'll have to go watch and get some hecklin' in, heehee.
engSearchText:
Now there's a show I don't want to miss! I'll have to
go watch and get some hecklin' in, heehee.
jpnChrName: うふふ、これは見逃せないわねぇ。 私も冷やかしに行きましょうか♪
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、これは見逃せないわねぇ。
私も冷やかしに行きましょうか♪

engChrName: Exciting as this all is, I have to admit, it's gonna get in the way of my work if it goes on much longer.
engSearchText:
Exciting as this all is, I have to admit, it's gonna get
in the way of my work if it goes on much longer.
jpnChrName: それにしても……愉快な状況ではあるけれど、 あまり続くと私の仕事にも障りが出そうだし。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……愉快な状況ではあるけれど、
あまり続くと私の仕事にも障りが出そうだし。

engChrName: Don't let me down now, kids! You kick the bucket and you won't hear the end of it from me, understand? Wahaha!
engSearchText:
Don't let me down now, kids! You kick the bucket
and you won't hear the end of it from
me, understand? Wahaha!
jpnChrName: ヒヒャヒャ！　しっかりやるんですよ？ シクッたら承知しませんからねェ！
jpnSearchText:
ヒヒャヒャ！　しっかりやるんですよ？
シクッたら承知しませんからねェ！

engChrName: (Tch... I can shake off your run-of-the-mill monster like it's nobody's business, but this one's awful stubborn here.)
engSearchText:
(Tch... I can shake off your run-of-the-mill monster
like it's nobody's business, but this one's awful
stubborn here.)
jpnChrName: （チッ……化物を振り切るくらいは   朝飯前だけど、こいつは予想外だね……）
jpnSearchText:
（チッ……化物を振り切るくらいは
朝飯前だけど、こいつは予想外だね……）

engChrName: (And all these people fleein' behind me don't give me any room to work with. Gah, this is just ridiculous!)
engSearchText:
(And all these people fleein' behind me don't give me
any room to work with. Gah, this is just ridiculous!)
jpnChrName: （おまけにアタシの後を追って避難した連中も   いるようだし、やりづらいったらありゃしないよ！）
jpnSearchText:
（おまけにアタシの後を追って避難した連中も
いるようだし、やりづらいったらありゃしないよ！）

engChrName: Gah, criminy. That racist coot's goin' on one of his rants again. Does he EVER shut up?
engSearchText:
Gah, criminy. That racist coot's goin' on one of his
rants again. Does he EVER shut up?
jpnChrName: おやおや、流れてきた人種主義者が 何やら喚（わめ）いているようねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
おやおや、流れてきた人種主義者が
何やら喚（わめ）いているようねぇ……

engChrName: I just might have a word with that man later. Everybody can appreciate a useful idiot, if you catch my drift.
engSearchText:
I just might have a word with that man later.
Everybody can appreciate a useful idiot, if you catch
my drift.
jpnChrName: うふふ、後で声をかけてみましょうか。 ああいう手合いは手駒に持っておくと便利──
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、後で声をかけてみましょうか。
ああいう手合いは手駒に持っておくと便利──

engChrName: I can tell just by lookin' at him: poke him in the right place and he falls like a house of cards. Bet I can sucker him just like that.
engSearchText:
I can tell just by lookin' at him: poke him in the right
place and he falls like a house of cards. Bet I can
sucker him just like that.
jpnChrName: もとい潰しが効くのよねぇ♪ つけ入る隙も多そうだし丁度いいわ。
jpnSearchText:
もとい潰しが効くのよねぇ♪
つけ入る隙も多そうだし丁度いいわ。

engChrName: The government's been awful slow responding to the mafia's massacre. And the guild's got their hands tied, too...
engSearchText:
The government's been awful slow responding to the
mafia's massacre. And the guild's got their hands
tied, too...
jpnChrName: マフィアによる大量虐殺……政府も後手に回って ギルドも手が出せないそうねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
マフィアによる大量虐殺……政府も後手に回って
ギルドも手が出せないそうねぇ……

engChrName: Heehee! Oh, man, I haven't felt so thrilled in ages!
engSearchText: Heehee! Oh, man, I haven't felt so thrilled in ages!
jpnChrName: ヒヒャヒャ！　久々に興奮するわねぇこれは！！
jpnSearchText: ヒヒャヒャ！　久々に興奮するわねぇこれは！！

engChrName: Who makes the next move, I wonder? Maybe there'll be some blood to pay?
engSearchText:
Who makes the next move, I wonder? Maybe there'll
be some blood to pay?
jpnChrName: これからも何をやらかしてくれるのか…… はたまた連中の命取りになるのか──
jpnSearchText:
これからも何をやらかしてくれるのか……
はたまた連中の命取りになるのか──

engChrName: Whatever happens, it's settin' up for one hell of a show! I'm on pins and needles!
engSearchText:
Whatever happens, it's settin' up for one hell of
a show! I'm on pins and needles!
jpnChrName: まさに最高の“見世物（ショー）”じゃないの！ 楽しみで仕方ないわ♪
jpnSearchText:
まさに最高の“見世物（ショー）”じゃないの！
楽しみで仕方ないわ♪

engChrName: Has it really been a whole year since Crossbell broke off from Erebonia? How time flies when you get to my age...
engSearchText:
Has it really been a whole year since Crossbell broke
off from Erebonia? How time flies when you get to
my age...
jpnChrName: 西のクロスベル自治州が独立して もう１年、早いものねぇ～……
jpnSearchText:
西のクロスベル自治州が独立して
もう１年、早いものねぇ～……

engChrName: I had a number of brushes with the ol' CPD back when I lived there.
engSearchText:
I had a number of brushes with the ol' CPD back
when I lived there.
jpnChrName: あそこの警察には何度か 痛い目に合わされた事があってねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あそこの警察には何度か
痛い目に合わされた事があってねぇ。

engChrName: They'll throw you in jail for just about anything over there—I didn't even do anything wrong this one time, and they still cuffed me.
engSearchText:
They'll throw you in jail for just about anything over
there—I didn't even do anything wrong this one
time, and they still cuffed me.
jpnChrName: この前も久々にちょっかいを出したら 早速ブタ箱送りにされてしまったの、やれやれ……
jpnSearchText:
この前も久々にちょっかいを出したら
早速ブタ箱送りにされてしまったの、やれやれ……

engChrName: But if they think they got the last laugh, oh, they've got another thing comin'. One of these days, they'll pay the piper. ㈱
engSearchText:
But if they think they got the last laugh, oh, they've
got another thing comin'. One of these days, they'll
pay the piper. ㈱
jpnChrName: でもねぇ、うふふ……私は負けませんよ？ 借りはいずれキッチリ返しますからねぇ……♪
jpnSearchText:
でもねぇ、うふふ……私は負けませんよ？
借りはいずれキッチリ返しますからねぇ……♪

engChrName: Crossbell's startin' to get a little big for its britches now that it's independent. They've got consulates and everything now.
engSearchText:
Crossbell's startin' to get a little big for its britches
now that it's independent. They've got consulates and
everything now.
jpnChrName: 今やクロスベルにも領事館ができて、 いい気になってるようじゃないの。
jpnSearchText:
今やクロスベルにも領事館ができて、
いい気になってるようじゃないの。

engChrName: But if the cops and the SSS think they've had the last laugh, oh, they've got another thing comin'. Sooner or later, they'll pay the piper. ㈱
engSearchText:
But if the cops and the SSS think they've had the last
laugh, oh, they've got another thing comin'.
Sooner or later, they'll pay the piper. ㈱
jpnChrName: 警察、そして“特務支援課”…… うふふ、いずれキッチリお返ししますからねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
警察、そして“特務支援課”……
うふふ、いずれキッチリお返ししますからねぇ！

engChrName: In a previous life of mine, I used to sell all kinds of stuff.
engSearchText:
In a previous life of mine, I used to sell all kinds
of stuff.
jpnChrName: 私も一昔前まではいろいろと 商売をしていたのよ、ふふ……
jpnSearchText:
私も一昔前まではいろいろと
商売をしていたのよ、ふふ……

engChrName: Money was good, job was easy, and nothin' felt better than swindlin' whatever poor bastard walked into my shop.
engSearchText:
Money was good, job was easy, and nothin' felt better
than swindlin' whatever poor bastard walked into
my shop.
jpnChrName: 儲けも上々だったし、マヌケな連中を 出し抜く快感ときたら最高で──
jpnSearchText:
儲けも上々だったし、マヌケな連中を
出し抜く快感ときたら最高で──

engChrName: I've been on somethin' of a hiatus from all that, but I'd just LOVE to get back into the swing of things given the chance.
engSearchText:
I've been on somethin' of a hiatus from all that, but
I'd just LOVE to get back into the swing of things
given the chance.
jpnChrName: うふふ、今は少し箸休めしているけれど また機会があればやりたいものねぇ♪
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、今は少し箸休めしているけれど
また機会があればやりたいものねぇ♪

engChrName: Now that was some good entertainment today! Sure made this old hag happy.
engSearchText:
Now that was some good entertainment today!
Sure made this old hag happy.
jpnChrName: ふふ、満足満足。 今日は面白い余興が見れたわねぇ♪
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、満足満足。
今日は面白い余興が見れたわねぇ♪

engChrName: They've got some pretty colorful youngins lined up. I can't wait to see just what sort of havoc they end up wreakin'. ㈱
engSearchText:
They've got some pretty colorful youngins lined up.
I can't wait to see just what sort of havoc they end
up wreakin'. ㈱
jpnChrName: 興味深い子たちもいるようだし…… どう引っ掻き回してくれるか楽しみだわ♪
jpnSearchText:
興味深い子たちもいるようだし……
どう引っ掻き回してくれるか楽しみだわ♪

engChrName: (Heh. Not your average grandma, this one.)
engSearchText: (Heh. Not your average grandma, this one.)
jpnChrName: （ハン……なんだこのババアは……？）
jpnSearchText: （ハン……なんだこのババアは……？）

engChrName: (She gives off a really sinister aura... I'm not sure why.)
engSearchText:
(She gives off a really sinister aura... I'm not
sure why.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、どことなく   邪悪なオーラを感じますけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、どことなく
邪悪なオーラを感じますけど……）

engChrName: Blacklight ain't without it's downsides—but when you're old and you've got more time than you know what to do with, it's the only place to be.
engSearchText:
Blacklight ain't without it's downsides—but when
you're old and you've got more time than you know
what to do with, it's the only place to be.
jpnChrName: この黒芒街、気に入らない事もありはするけど 老後の退屈しのぎにはピッタリなのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
この黒芒街、気に入らない事もありはするけど
老後の退屈しのぎにはピッタリなのよねぇ。

engChrName: Just don't call it my retirement, because I've still got plenty of fuel left in this tank! Hahaha!
engSearchText:
Just don't call it my retirement, because I've still got
plenty of fuel left in this tank! Hahaha!
jpnChrName: もっとも……うふふ、別に引退を 決めたわけでもないのだけど♪
jpnSearchText:
もっとも……うふふ、別に引退を
決めたわけでもないのだけど♪

engChrName: Now that I'm finally back in contact with people, I've got a good grasp of what's going on.
engSearchText:
Now that I'm finally back in contact with people, I've
got a good grasp of what's going on.
jpnChrName: 連絡もつくようになったし ようやく情勢がつかめてきたわね。
jpnSearchText:
連絡もつくようになったし
ようやく情勢がつかめてきたわね。

engChrName: In hindsight, I really wrote off Almata. It's clear as day now that they're not your average thugs.
engSearchText:
In hindsight, I really wrote off Almata. It's clear as
day now that they're not your average thugs.
jpnChrName: それにしても……こんな事をしでかすなんて アルマータの連中は一体何者なのかしら……？
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……こんな事をしでかすなんて
アルマータの連中は一体何者なのかしら……？

engChrName: Your ordinary mafia wouldn't be out causing all of...this. These people just... I don't even know how to describe them.
engSearchText:
Your ordinary mafia wouldn't be out causing all
of...this. These people just... I don't even know how
to describe them.
jpnChrName: 今までただのマフィアだと思ってきたけれど、 それこそが大きな間違い──
jpnSearchText:
今までただのマフィアだと思ってきたけれど、
それこそが大きな間違い──

engChrName: That's just what I keep going back to at this point.
engSearchText: That's just what I keep going back to at this point.
jpnChrName: そんな気すらしてくるわね……
jpnSearchText: そんな気すらしてくるわね……

engChrName: I'm guessing you're all taking part in that big operation? Well, go get 'em, tiger. I'm rooting for you.
engSearchText:
I'm guessing you're all taking part in that
big operation? Well, go get 'em, tiger. I'm rooting
for you.
jpnChrName: 例の作戦に参加するんでしょう？ フフ、せめて応援させて頂戴な。
jpnSearchText:
例の作戦に参加するんでしょう？
フフ、せめて応援させて頂戴な。

engChrName: When this is all over, we'll make sure to treat you right down here.
engSearchText:
When this is all over, we'll make sure to treat you
right down here.
jpnChrName: 無事に成功したら ウチでたっぷりサービスしてあげるわ。
jpnSearchText:
無事に成功したら
ウチでたっぷりサービスしてあげるわ。

engChrName: So make sure you come back alive, got it? There's nothing sexy about a dead hero!
engSearchText:
So make sure you come back alive, got it?
There's nothing sexy about a dead hero!
jpnChrName: だから──必ず無事に帰ってくるのよ？
jpnSearchText: だから──必ず無事に帰ってくるのよ？

engChrName: My staff's real skittish with everything going on, so I hired some extra hands to bolster our security.
engSearchText:
My staff's real skittish with everything going on, so I
hired some extra hands to bolster our security.
jpnChrName: ウチのキャストたちも不安がってるし、 この連中を雇って警備させている所よ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチのキャストたちも不安がってるし、
この連中を雇って警備させている所よ。

engChrName: That ought to help keep things under control around here. If only we could help those girls frozen in place, though...
engSearchText:
That ought to help keep things under control
around here. If only we could help those girls frozen
in place, though...
jpnChrName: これで滅多な事はないでしょうけど 中には“停まって”しまった子もいてね……
jpnSearchText:
これで滅多な事はないでしょうけど
中には“停まって”しまった子もいてね……

engChrName: *sigh* I just can't believe those guys would go this far. You guys be careful out there, all right? Seriously.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I just can't believe those guys would go this far.
You guys be careful out there, all right? Seriously.
jpnChrName: ……これが連中の仕業だなんて、ふう…… あなた達も重々気を付けて動きなさいな。
jpnSearchText:
……これが連中の仕業だなんて、ふう……
あなた達も重々気を付けて動きなさいな。

engChrName: Well, don't you two look awfully friendly together on this festival day?
engSearchText:
Well, don't you two look awfully friendly together on
this festival day?
jpnChrName: あら、記念祭に二人きりだなんて お安くないわね？
jpnSearchText:
あら、記念祭に二人きりだなんて
お安くないわね？

engChrName: Well, that's all right. We accept all kinds here—we're a judgment-free zone.
engSearchText:
Well, that's all right. We accept all kinds here—we're
a judgment-free zone.
jpnChrName: いいわよ、ウチはどんなプレイでも 受け入れられるし。
jpnSearchText:
いいわよ、ウチはどんなプレイでも
受け入れられるし。

engChrName: Wh-WHAT?! Wait, no! You've got it all wrong! Van and I, we're not—
engSearchText:
Wh-WHAT?! Wait, no! You've got it all wrong!
Van and I, we're not—
jpnChrName: え──ええええええっ！？ わ、私とヴァンさんはそういうのじゃ……！！
jpnSearchText:
え──ええええええっ！？
わ、私とヴァンさんはそういうのじゃ……！！

engChrName: 'Kinds'? 'All kinds' of what? I don't get it.
engSearchText: 'Kinds'? 'All kinds' of what? I don't get it.
jpnChrName: えっと？？　“ぷれい”ですか……？
jpnSearchText: えっと？？　“ぷれい”ですか……？

engChrName: Huh? Look, I know I'm a hot commodity, but I don't lend myself to just ANYONE—least of all this old fart here.
engSearchText:
Huh? Look, I know I'm a hot commodity, but I don't
lend myself to just ANYONE—least of all this old
fart here.
jpnChrName: ハアァ？　オッサンとか勘弁しろや、 いくら俺が美形だからってよ……
jpnSearchText:
ハアァ？　オッサンとか勘弁しろや、
いくら俺が美形だからってよ……

engChrName: Heehee... Well, no. Mr. Arkride and I maintain a professional relationship. It isn't what you seem to think it is.
engSearchText:
Heehee... Well, no. Mr. Arkride and I maintain a
professional relationship. It isn't what you seem to
think it is.
jpnChrName: ふふ……残念ながらヴァン様とは そういった関係では。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……残念ながらヴァン様とは
そういった関係では。

engChrName: E-Excuse me?! What are you even saying?! I've never heard anything more outrageous in my life!
engSearchText:
E-Excuse me?! What are you even saying?! I've never
heard anything more outrageous in my life!
jpnChrName: ちょっ、なっ…… 何を言い出すのさ、貴女は！！
jpnSearchText:
ちょっ、なっ……
何を言い出すのさ、貴女は！！

engChrName: I... Beg pardon?! Wh-Why do you think he and I would ever... Gah, no! Absolutely not!
engSearchText:
I... Beg pardon?! Wh-Why do you think he and I
would ever... Gah, no! Absolutely not!
jpnChrName: なあっ……！？　なななんでこんな奴と…… 絶対に願い下げだっての！！
jpnSearchText:
なあっ……！？　なななんでこんな奴と……
絶対に願い下げだっての！！

engChrName: Oh? What sort of activities did you have in mind? Training, perhaps?
engSearchText:
Oh? What sort of activities did you have in mind?
Training, perhaps?
jpnChrName: ふむ……？　我が弟子に 稽古をつけるという意味かな？
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……？　我が弟子に
稽古をつけるという意味かな？

engChrName: ...Oh. Well, uh, point taken. I might've read the room a bit wrong. You can't fault me in this line of work, though.
engSearchText:
...Oh. Well, uh, point taken. I might've read the
room a bit wrong. You can't fault me in this line of
work, though.
jpnChrName: 流石に想定外だったけど、 それはそれでアリかもしれないわね。
jpnSearchText:
流石に想定外だったけど、
それはそれでアリかもしれないわね。

engChrName: Ugh, lay off me already. You always have such a one-track mind.
engSearchText:
Ugh, lay off me already. You always have such a
one-track mind.
jpnChrName: からかうなっつの…… ったくアンタも相変わらずだな。
jpnSearchText:
からかうなっつの……
ったくアンタも相変わらずだな。

engChrName: Heehee! Well, if you know, why'd you seek me out? Fool you twice, shame on you, right?
engSearchText:
Heehee! Well, if you know, why'd you seek me out?
Fool you twice, shame on you, right?
jpnChrName: クスクス………
jpnSearchText: クスクス………

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I wanted to mention... Thanks for getting revenge for Dingo.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I wanted to mention... Thanks for getting
revenge for Dingo.
jpnChrName: 言いそびれていたけど、ディンゴの仇を 取ってくれてありがとうね。
jpnSearchText:
言いそびれていたけど、ディンゴの仇を
取ってくれてありがとうね。

engChrName: He and I went way back. What happened to him just didn't sit right with me at all.
engSearchText:
He and I went way back. What happened to him just
didn't sit right with me at all.
jpnChrName: 彼とは長かったから…… どうしても割り切れない所があってね。
jpnSearchText:
彼とは長かったから……
どうしても割り切れない所があってね。

engChrName: I'm glad he got what he wanted in the end. Now we can all rest easy going into the festival...and wherever he is, I'm sure he can, too.
engSearchText:
I'm glad he got what he wanted in the end. Now we
can all rest easy going into the festival...and wherever
he is, I'm sure he can, too.
jpnChrName: 彼の想いが果たされて良かった。 無事に革命記念日を迎えられて何よりだわ。
jpnSearchText:
彼の想いが果たされて良かった。
無事に革命記念日を迎えられて何よりだわ。

engChrName: You can say that again.
engSearchText: You can say that again.
jpnChrName: ああ、まったくだぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、まったくだぜ。

engChrName: (Man, even dead, that guy's got women pinin' for him. Guess that's just how big an effect he had on everybody.)
engSearchText:
(Man, even dead, that guy's got women pinin'
for him. Guess that's just how big an effect he had
on everybody.)
jpnChrName: （それもアイツの意地が繋いだ結果か……   ハッ、くたばってもイケメンな野郎め。）
jpnSearchText:
（それもアイツの意地が繋いだ結果か……
ハッ、くたばってもイケメンな野郎め。）

engChrName: Dingo was always going after Almata. I imagine deep down, he was always prepared to pay the price...
engSearchText:
Dingo was always going after Almata. I imagine deep
down, he was always prepared to pay the price...
jpnChrName: ディンゴはずっとアルマータを追っていた。 ……どこかで覚悟もしていたんでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴはずっとアルマータを追っていた。
……どこかで覚悟もしていたんでしょうね。

engChrName: He was really willing to put it all on the line to bring them to justice. He never said a word about any of it to me, though.
engSearchText:
He was really willing to put it all on the line to bring
them to justice. He never said a word about any of it
to me, though.
jpnChrName: 私にも一言も言ってくれなかったけど…… それでも命を懸けてやり遂げるつもりだった。
jpnSearchText:
私にも一言も言ってくれなかったけど……
それでも命を懸けてやり遂げるつもりだった。

engChrName: Either way, I'm glad you guys were able to fulfill his last wishes. As a friend of his, thank you all from the bottom of my heart.
engSearchText:
Either way, I'm glad you guys were able to fulfill his
last wishes. As a friend of his, thank you all from the
bottom of my heart.
jpnChrName: 彼の想い、果たされて本当に良かった。 ありがとうね、あなた達。
jpnSearchText:
彼の想い、果たされて本当に良かった。
ありがとうね、あなた達。

engChrName: Hey. Just wanted to let you know that we found the notebook we were lookin' for. Thanks for your help back there.
engSearchText:
Hey. Just wanted to let you know that we found the
notebook we were lookin' for. Thanks for your help
back there.
jpnChrName: よう、アンタのおかげで あの後例の手帳を回収できたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
よう、アンタのおかげで
あの後例の手帳を回収できたぜ。

engChrName: Oh, wow. You found it, huh? Good... I'm sure he's glad to see it's in safe hands, too.
engSearchText:
Oh, wow. You found it, huh? Good... I'm sure he's
glad to see it's in safe hands, too.
jpnChrName: そう……それは良かったわ。 これで少しは彼もうかばれるわね。
jpnSearchText:
そう……それは良かったわ。
これで少しは彼もうかばれるわね。

engChrName: I wasn't able to get together with him all that much after our careers took off. I loved shooting the breeze over drinks with him...
engSearchText:
I wasn't able to get together with him all that much
after our careers took off. I loved shooting the breeze
over drinks with him...
jpnChrName: お互いに仕事が軌道に乗ってからは 気軽に飲み交わす機会も減ってしまっていたけど。
jpnSearchText:
お互いに仕事が軌道に乗ってからは
気軽に飲み交わす機会も減ってしまっていたけど。

engChrName: Had I known this would happen, I would've made more time for him... It is what it is, though. Nothing I can do about it now.
engSearchText:
Had I known this would happen, I would've made
more time for him... It is what it is, though.
Nothing I can do about it now.
jpnChrName: こんな事になるならあの時もっと……なんて。 後悔しても仕方がないのにね。
jpnSearchText:
こんな事になるならあの時もっと……なんて。
後悔しても仕方がないのにね。

engChrName: All I can do is cherish those little connections he left behind.
engSearchText:
All I can do is cherish those little connections he
left behind.
jpnChrName: せめて彼が残してくれた縁は 大事にしていきたいものだわ。
jpnSearchText:
せめて彼が残してくれた縁は
大事にしていきたいものだわ。

engChrName: I'm only the woman I am today because Dingo stuck his neck out for me.
engSearchText:
I'm only the woman I am today because Dingo stuck
his neck out for me.
jpnChrName: 昔ディンゴに助けてもらったおかげで 今の私があるようなものよ。
jpnSearchText:
昔ディンゴに助けてもらったおかげで
今の私があるようなものよ。

engChrName: Edith's gonna feel a little lonelier without him around, that's for sure...
engSearchText:
Edith's gonna feel a little lonelier without him
around, that's for sure...
jpnChrName: 彼がいなくなってしまった首都は寂しいけど……
jpnSearchText: 彼がいなくなってしまった首都は寂しいけど……

engChrName: But there's a lot he gave us both while he was still alive. It's up to us to make sure they all last.
engSearchText:
But there's a lot he gave us both while he was
still alive. It's up to us to make sure they all last.
jpnChrName: 私も貴方も、彼から貰ったものを せめて大切にしていかないとね。
jpnSearchText:
私も貴方も、彼から貰ったものを
せめて大切にしていかないとね。

engChrName: He probably entrusted the notebook to someone he was close with...
engSearchText:
He probably entrusted the notebook to someone he
was close with...
jpnChrName: ディンゴが手帳を託した相手は、 彼の個人的なツテだと思うわ。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴが手帳を託した相手は、
彼の個人的なツテだと思うわ。

engChrName: Going off your description, a taxi driver would probably fit the bill. I can see him being friends with one.
engSearchText:
Going off your description, a taxi driver would
probably fit the bill. I can see him being friends
with one.
jpnChrName: 貴方達の話だと、導力タクシーの運転手に それらしい人がいるんだったかしら？
jpnSearchText:
貴方達の話だと、導力タクシーの運転手に
それらしい人がいるんだったかしら？

engChrName: Good luck. I hope you find the notebook, for his sake.
engSearchText:
Good luck. I hope you find the notebook, for
his sake.
jpnChrName: どうか彼の為にも見つけてあげて頂戴ね。
jpnSearchText: どうか彼の為にも見つけてあげて頂戴ね。

engChrName: I'm sure that if he wanted anyone to have it, it would be you guys.
engSearchText:
I'm sure that if he wanted anyone to have it, it would
be you guys.
jpnChrName: きっと貴方達に託したいと思っていたはずだから……
jpnSearchText: きっと貴方達に託したいと思っていたはずだから……

engChrName: You won't hear me complaining about Almata getting the boot...but we've got tons and tons of festival goers trundling around in their place now.
engSearchText:
You won't hear me complaining about Almata
getting the boot...but we've got tons and tons of
festival goers trundling around in their place now.
jpnChrName: アルマータが壊滅したのはいいけれど、 記念祭を前に色んな連中が来ているようね。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータが壊滅したのはいいけれど、
記念祭を前に色んな連中が来ているようね。

engChrName: It really isn't the best for business when rowdy types come along... Hopefully they mind their business.
engSearchText:
It really isn't the best for business when rowdy types
come along... Hopefully they mind their business.
jpnChrName: これ以上の面倒事は 商売的にも勘弁だけれど……
jpnSearchText:
これ以上の面倒事は
商売的にも勘弁だけれど……

engChrName: But there are so many deterrents in play now, maybe I won't have anything to worry about. Who can say?
engSearchText:
But there are so many deterrents in play now, maybe I
won't have anything to worry about. Who can say?
jpnChrName: フフ、色んな抑止力も働いているし まあ大丈夫かもしれないわね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、色んな抑止力も働いているし
まあ大丈夫かもしれないわね。

engChrName: I never thought Almata would go that far...but they did. They sure as hell did...
engSearchText:
I never thought Almata would go that far...but
they did. They sure as hell did...
jpnChrName: ……アルマータの連中、 まさかここまでやるだなんてね………
jpnSearchText:
……アルマータの連中、
まさかここまでやるだなんてね………

engChrName: I had a couple friends out there, and now... *sigh* All you can do is just try and roll with the punches, I guess.
engSearchText:
I had a couple friends out there, and now... *sigh* All
you can do is just try and roll with the punches,
I guess.
jpnChrName: 私も連中とは少し因縁があってね。 フウ……流石に少し堪えるわ。
jpnSearchText:
私も連中とは少し因縁があってね。
フウ……流石に少し堪えるわ。

engChrName: What psychotic stunt do they pull next, though? Nothing's off the table anymore...
engSearchText:
What psychotic stunt do they pull next, though?
Nothing's off the table anymore...
jpnChrName: 連中がこれから何をしでかすのか もう見通せない事も含めて、ね………
jpnSearchText:
連中がこれから何をしでかすのか
もう見通せない事も含めて、ね………

engChrName: Well, this is unusual. What's the occasion? You pop down here for pleasure over business for a change?
engSearchText:
Well, this is unusual. What's the occasion? You pop
down here for pleasure over business for a change?
jpnChrName: あら珍しい、もしかして今日はご利用かしら？
jpnSearchText: あら珍しい、もしかして今日はご利用かしら？

engChrName: Nah, I'm good. Just figure it's a good idea to keep tabs on this place every now and then. Never know when you might find somethin' useful.
engSearchText:
Nah, I'm good. Just figure it's a good idea to keep
tabs on this place every now and then. Never know
when you might find somethin' useful.
jpnChrName: そういうわけじゃねえんだが…… たまには一人で回っとくべきかと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
そういうわけじゃねえんだが……
たまには一人で回っとくべきかと思ってな。

engChrName: Been noticin' some faces I didn't see during the day. Looks like you guys're havin' some interesting visitors 'round here, too.
engSearchText:
Been noticin' some faces I didn't see during the day.
Looks like you guys're havin' some interesting visitors
'round here, too.
jpnChrName: 日中は見なかった連中や、珍しい顔も 出入りしてるみてえだしな。
jpnSearchText:
日中は見なかった連中や、珍しい顔も
出入りしてるみてえだしな。

engChrName: Oh, you mean 'her' and those so-called superheroes? You bet they're interesting. I've heard my fair share about them from the grapevine.
engSearchText:
Oh, you mean 'her' and those so-called superheroes?
You bet they're interesting. I've heard my fair share
about them from the grapevine.
jpnChrName: 正義のミカタさんたちに“彼女”とかかしら？ ウフフ、私も又聞きくらいだけれど。
jpnSearchText:
正義のミカタさんたちに“彼女”とかかしら？
ウフフ、私も又聞きくらいだけれど。

engChrName: I don't mind them—we could use a little excitement. It distracts from how lonely things can get down here.
engSearchText:
I don't mind them—we could use a little excitement.
It distracts from how lonely things can get down here.
jpnChrName: なんにせよ賑わうのはいい事よ。 ここの住民は皆どこか“寂しがりや”だもの。
jpnSearchText:
なんにせよ賑わうのはいい事よ。
ここの住民は皆どこか“寂しがりや”だもの。

engChrName: Y'know, 'lonely' hits different comin' from you, heh.
engSearchText: Y'know, 'lonely' hits different comin' from you, heh.
jpnChrName: ハッ……アンタが言うと説得力が違うねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……アンタが言うと説得力が違うねぇ。

engChrName: (I get her, though. You kinda gotta be a lone wolf to hack it down here.)
engSearchText:
(I get her, though. You kinda gotta be a lone wolf to
hack it down here.)
jpnChrName: （……寂しがりや、か……   まあはぐれ者なんざそんな物だが……）
jpnSearchText:
（……寂しがりや、か……
まあはぐれ者なんざそんな物だが……）

engChrName: When the sun goes down, all the boys come out to play... That's when 'business' really picks up.
engSearchText:
When the sun goes down, all the boys come out
to play... That's when 'business' really picks up.
jpnChrName: 夜はこれからが本番…… この街はもっと賑わうわよ㈱
jpnSearchText:
夜はこれからが本番……
この街はもっと賑わうわよ㈱

engChrName: What do you say, handsome? Any chance I can convince you to drop by this evening?
engSearchText:
What do you say, handsome? Any chance I can
convince you to drop by this evening?
jpnChrName: フフ、貴方も今夜は楽しんでいったら？
jpnSearchText: フフ、貴方も今夜は楽しんでいったら？

engChrName: To think it's been eight years since I pretty much washed up here... Time really flies, doesn't it?
engSearchText:
To think it's been eight years since I pretty much
washed up here... Time really flies, doesn't it?
jpnChrName: 黒芒街に流れてきてかれこれ８年…… 思い返せばあっという間ね。
jpnSearchText:
黒芒街に流れてきてかれこれ８年……
思い返せばあっという間ね。

engChrName: I broke my back getting this far, but now I've got all this to show for it—I can count on my harem to get the job done.
engSearchText:
I broke my back getting this far, but now I've got all
this to show for it—I can count on my harem to get
the job done.
jpnChrName: 苦労ばかりした気がするけれど 今では頼ってくれるキャストの子も増えて……
jpnSearchText:
苦労ばかりした気がするけれど
今では頼ってくれるキャストの子も増えて……

engChrName: They're what keep me around, heehee. I can't bring myself to retire from this business when I've still got all of them.
engSearchText:
They're what keep me around, heehee. I can't bring
myself to retire from this business when I've still got
all of them.
jpnChrName: ウフフ、あの子たちの為にも まだまだ引退はできないわね。
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ、あの子たちの為にも
まだまだ引退はできないわね。

engChrName: And how could I ever forget Tracey? That man lives for his job. I can trust him with just about anything.
engSearchText:
And how could I ever forget Tracey? That man lives
for his job. I can trust him with just about anything.
jpnChrName: トレイシーもあれが生きがいのような 男だから、信用して大丈夫よ。
jpnSearchText:
トレイシーもあれが生きがいのような
男だから、信用して大丈夫よ。

engChrName: He's reeled in some fine customers in his time—and that motivates me to keep this place spick and span so they all walk away satisfied.
engSearchText:
He's reeled in some fine customers in his time—and
that motivates me to keep this place spick and span so
they all walk away satisfied.
jpnChrName: いい客も掴んできてくれるし、 私も期待に応えないとね。
jpnSearchText:
いい客も掴んできてくれるし、
私も期待に応えないとね。

engChrName: Well, if it isn't Edith's one and only spriggan! What brings you here, darling? Got time to stay and play?
engSearchText:
Well, if it isn't Edith's one and only spriggan!
What brings you here, darling? Got time to stay
and play?
jpnChrName: あら、裏解決屋のお兄さんじゃない。 ……どう、少し遊んでいく？
jpnSearchText:
あら、裏解決屋のお兄さんじゃない。
……どう、少し遊んでいく？

engChrName: Your lady friends are more than welcome to join you, if they're up for it. We've got girls that know how to keep a woman company, too.
engSearchText:
Your lady friends are more than welcome to join you,
if they're up for it. We've got girls that know how to
keep a woman company, too.
jpnChrName: ウチは女の子の同伴もＯＫよ。 そっちが得意なコもいるから、大丈夫。
jpnSearchText:
ウチは女の子の同伴もＯＫよ。
そっちが得意なコもいるから、大丈夫。

engChrName: You'll be drowning in pleasures you can't find anywhere up on the surface, I can promise you that. Stay a while, won't you, big guy?
engSearchText:
You'll be drowning in pleasures you can't find
anywhere up on the surface, I can promise you that.
Stay a while, won't you, big guy?
jpnChrName: オモテじゃ味わえない快楽に溺れさせてあげる。 ──ほら、いらっしゃいな？
jpnSearchText:
オモテじゃ味わえない快楽に溺れさせてあげる。
──ほら、いらっしゃいな？

engChrName: Umm, I don't get it. What kind of place is this?
engSearchText: Umm, I don't get it. What kind of place is this?
jpnChrName: え、えっと、それって一体……
jpnSearchText: え、えっと、それって一体……

engChrName: It feels...alluring. I feel drawn to it, but I really don't know why. I've never felt like this before...
engSearchText:
It feels...alluring. I feel drawn to it, but I really don't
know why. I've never felt like this before...
jpnChrName: な、なんでしょう…… ついフラフラとついて行きたくなるような……
jpnSearchText:
な、なんでしょう……
ついフラフラとついて行きたくなるような……

engChrName: Hard no. Letting you two waltz in there's just askin' for trouble.
engSearchText:
Hard no. Letting you two waltz in there's just askin'
for trouble.
jpnChrName: お前らが拐（かどわ）かされてどうすんだっつの……
jpnSearchText: お前らが拐（かどわ）かされてどうすんだっつの……

engChrName: ...And YOU, don't even think about sneakin' inside while I'm not lookin', punk!
engSearchText:
...And YOU, don't even think about sneakin' inside
while I'm not lookin', punk!
jpnChrName: ──あとそこ、早速 入店しようとしてんじゃねえ！
jpnSearchText:
──あとそこ、早速
入店しようとしてんじゃねえ！

engChrName: I'm an adult. What do you care how I spend my free time? Sometimes a guy needs to just let it hang, you know?
engSearchText:
I'm an adult. What do you care how I spend my
free time? Sometimes a guy needs to just let it hang,
you know?
jpnChrName: アン？　いいだろ別に。 たまにはこの手の娼館で腕試しっつーのも……
jpnSearchText:
アン？　いいだろ別に。
たまにはこの手の娼館で腕試しっつーのも……

engChrName: I care because you'll get hooked on that shit in two seconds. Can't trust your horny ass to stay outta trouble.
engSearchText:
I care because you'll get hooked on that shit in
two seconds. Can't trust your horny ass to stay
outta trouble.
jpnChrName: お前はハマリそうだから 気にかけてやってんだっつの！
jpnSearchText:
お前はハマリそうだから
気にかけてやってんだっつの！

engChrName: Heehee... I think most of the girls still have some growing up to do. Those services aside, I've still got some things for sale here.
engSearchText:
Heehee... I think most of the girls still have some
growing up to do. Those services aside, I've still got
some things for sale here.
jpnChrName: ウフフ、初心（ウブ）なコたちを連れてるのね。 ……ならいくつかイイモノを売ってあげる。
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ、初心（ウブ）なコたちを連れてるのね。
……ならいくつかイイモノを売ってあげる。

engChrName: If you change your mind and decide to spend some quality time with our girls, just let me know. I'll wait right here for you, handsome.
engSearchText:
If you change your mind and decide to spend some
quality time with our girls, just let me know. I'll wait
right here for you, handsome.
jpnChrName: その上でウチの子と遊びたくなったら 改めて声をかけなさいな。
jpnSearchText:
その上でウチの子と遊びたくなったら
改めて声をかけなさいな。

engChrName: (It appears she and Mr. Arkride are acquainted with one another. Whoever she is, she certainly has quite the way with words.)
engSearchText:
(It appears she and Mr. Arkride are acquainted with
one another. Whoever she is, she certainly has quite
the way with words.)
jpnChrName: （ヴァン様のお知り合いのようですが……   成程、中々のやり手のようです。）
jpnSearchText:
（ヴァン様のお知り合いのようですが……
成程、中々のやり手のようです。）

engChrName: Now, we have something of a reputation for sucking our customers dry, literally and figuratively...but we still have our standards.
engSearchText:
Now, we have something of a reputation for sucking
our customers dry, literally and figuratively...but we
still have our standards.
jpnChrName: ウチは“骨までしゃぶりつくされる”なんて 言われてるけど、一線は弁えてるのよ？
jpnSearchText:
ウチは“骨までしゃぶりつくされる”なんて
言われてるけど、一線は弁えてるのよ？

engChrName: For one thing, we only put the squeeze on our richest customers. We don't overwork our employees either.
engSearchText:
For one thing, we only put the squeeze on our
richest customers. We don't overwork our
employees either.
jpnChrName: 金持ちからしか搾り取らないし、 キャストの健康だって気を使ってる。
jpnSearchText:
金持ちからしか搾り取らないし、
キャストの健康だって気を使ってる。

engChrName: Getting addicted only leads to trouble in the long term. Indulge responsibly, okay?
engSearchText:
Getting addicted only leads to trouble in the
long term. Indulge responsibly, okay?
jpnChrName: まあ、ハマったら大変な事になるから 遊ぶのは余裕ができてからにしなさいな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ハマったら大変な事になるから
遊ぶのは余裕ができてからにしなさいな。

engChrName: (Huh. I dunno how to describe it, but this lady is... really alluring for some reason.)
engSearchText:
(Huh. I dunno how to describe it, but this lady is...
really alluring for some reason.)
jpnChrName: （うーん……やっぱりなんだか   不思議な魅力がある女性（ヒト）です……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん……やっぱりなんだか
不思議な魅力がある女性（ヒト）です……）

jpnSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText: Oh, hell yeah! That sounds tight. Count me—

jpnSearchText:

弁（わきま） え ま し ょ う ね ？

jpnSearchText:
（アニエスも有無を

engSearchText:

jpnChrName: よう分からんけどエライこっちゃで！ 地上から逃げてきた人もおるらしいし……
jpnSearchText:
よう分からんけどエライこっちゃで！

engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:
きっとみんな不安がっとる！
ここはワイらでもてなしたらななァ！！

engSearchText:

keeping on.

jpnSearchText: そ、そうね！　こうしてても仕方ないし……

engSearchText:
And nothing's more comforting than the warm, soft

jpnSearchText: まだ抱いてもらった方が安心かも～……

engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText:

engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

exhibitions, those are just EXHILARATING!
Highly recommend them!
jpnChrName: おっきい魔獣をみんなでブチ殺すショーとか ホントスカッとするのォ～！　オススメだよっ☆
jpnSearchText:
おっきい魔獣をみんなでブチ殺すショーとか
ホントスカッとするのォ～！　オススメだよっ☆

engChrName: Buuut they're not doing anything like that today. Plenty to do here, though! Lemme fetch you a drink, it'll cheer you right up!
engSearchText:
Buuut they're not doing anything like that today.
Plenty to do here, though! Lemme fetch you a drink,
it'll cheer you right up!
jpnChrName: でもォ、今日はお休みしてるみた～い。 ……憂さ晴らしにウチで飲んでいってねっ！
jpnSearchText:
でもォ、今日はお休みしてるみた～い。
……憂さ晴らしにウチで飲んでいってねっ！

engChrName: I've been running into trouble lately... I keep getting all these rough customers.
engSearchText:
I've been running into trouble lately... I keep getting
all these rough customers.
jpnChrName: 最近ランボーなお客が多くて キャンディ困っちゃう～……
jpnSearchText:
最近ランボーなお客が多くて
キャンディ困っちゃう～……

engChrName: I don't know what, but I guess something big happened, because all these weirdos have been flooding in down here.
engSearchText:
I don't know what, but I guess something big
happened, because all these weirdos have been
flooding in down here.
jpnChrName: よくわかんないけど大ジケン？　があって ヘンな人も入り込んでるみた～い。
jpnSearchText:
よくわかんないけど大ジケン？　があって
ヘンな人も入り込んでるみた～い。

engChrName: They're great for business, but they're a teensy bit scary to deal with, you know?
engSearchText:
They're great for business, but they're a teensy bit
scary to deal with, you know?
jpnChrName: 売り上げはいいんだけど ちょっとコワイかもぉ～？
jpnSearchText:
売り上げはいいんだけど
ちょっとコワイかもぉ～？

engChrName: Now, I'm...not the sharpest tool in the shed. I don't really know much about what goes on outside my ditzy little bubble.
engSearchText:
Now, I'm...not the sharpest tool in the shed. I don't
really know much about what goes on outside my
ditzy little bubble.
jpnChrName: キャンディね、おバカだし よくわかってないけどォ～……
jpnSearchText:
キャンディね、おバカだし
よくわかってないけどォ～……

engChrName: But I'm not worried. This area always has a way of bouncing back from trouble. That's what I love about it!
engSearchText:
But I'm not worried. This area always has a way of
bouncing back from trouble. That's what I love
about it!
jpnChrName: それでも黒芒街（ココ）だと案外 どうにかなっちゃうから、やっぱり好きカモ～！
jpnSearchText:
それでも黒芒街（ココ）だと案外
どうにかなっちゃうから、やっぱり好きカモ～！

engChrName: And don't you worry, baby, heehee. No matter how low you go, you'll always have a place here with me and everyone else! ㈱
engSearchText:
And don't you worry, baby, heehee. No matter how
low you go, you'll always have a place here with me
and everyone else! ㈱
jpnChrName: うふっ、おにーさんも、どんなに落ちぶれたって キャンディたちが受け入れてあげるからねっ！
jpnSearchText:
うふっ、おにーさんも、どんなに落ちぶれたって
キャンディたちが受け入れてあげるからねっ！

engChrName: Heh, thanks. I'll keep that in mind. (I know what that's like... I'd rather swim than sink, that's for damn sure.)
engSearchText:
Heh, thanks. I'll keep that in mind.
(I know what that's like... I'd rather swim than sink,
that's for damn sure.)
jpnChrName: ハハ、そりゃどーも。 （どんなに落ちぶれても、か……）
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、そりゃどーも。
（どんなに落ちぶれても、か……）

engChrName: You know what's great about the Blacklight District?
engSearchText: You know what's great about the Blacklight District?
jpnChrName: 知ってた？　黒芒街（ココ）には 昼も夜もないのっ！
jpnSearchText:
知ってた？　黒芒街（ココ）には
昼も夜もないのっ！

engChrName: The sun never rises on this place! It's always nighttime down here—and that means PARTY time! So sit that butt down and drink until you drop! ㈱
engSearchText:
The sun never rises on this place! It's always
nighttime down here—and that means PARTY time!
So sit that butt down and drink until you drop! ㈱
jpnChrName: いつでもオールナイトだから ジャンジャン飲んで潰れてオッケー☆
jpnSearchText:
いつでもオールナイトだから
ジャンジャン飲んで潰れてオッケー☆

engChrName: And you're not the only one who's invited—all of you should stay here and have some fun! Take it from me: you'll be glad you did!
engSearchText:
And you're not the only one who's invited—all of you
should stay here and have some fun! Take it from me:
you'll be glad you did!
jpnChrName: うふン、みんなも一緒に愉しもぉ？
jpnSearchText: うふン、みんなも一緒に愉しもぉ？

engChrName: The colosseum is really buzzing today... Must be something big going on up there.
engSearchText:
The colosseum is really buzzing today... Must be
something big going on up there.
jpnChrName: この上に“地下闘技場”があるんだけど、 今日も盛り上がってるみたい♪
jpnSearchText:
この上に“地下闘技場”があるんだけど、
今日も盛り上がってるみたい♪

engChrName: I'd say that's as good a reason to let loose and party hard, though, don't you? I've got just the right drinks to make that happen!
engSearchText:
I'd say that's as good a reason to let loose and party
hard, though, don't you? I've got just the right drinks
to make that happen!
jpnChrName: うふっ、みんなもハジけちゃお？ オイシーお酒も用意してるからっ♪
jpnSearchText:
うふっ、みんなもハジけちゃお？
オイシーお酒も用意してるからっ♪

engChrName: In fact, here's a secret: it REALLY turns me on when somebody buys one of my pricier bottles. Do that and maybe I'll throw in an extra treat. Mmm! ㈱
engSearchText:
In fact, here's a secret: it REALLY turns me on when
somebody buys one of my pricier bottles. Do that and
maybe I'll throw in an extra treat. Mmm! ㈱
jpnChrName: お高いボトル開けてくれたら キャンディ興奮して脱いじゃうかもぉ～！
jpnSearchText:
お高いボトル開けてくれたら
キャンディ興奮して脱いじゃうかもぉ～！

engChrName: They...er, sure don't have places like this on the surface.
engSearchText:
They...er, sure don't have places like this on
the surface.
jpnChrName: い、色んなお店があるんですね……
jpnSearchText: い、色んなお店があるんですね……

engChrName: You had my attention when you mentioned the colosseum...but maybe that can wait.
engSearchText:
You had my attention when you mentioned the
colosseum...but maybe that can wait.
jpnChrName: クク、闘技場っつーのも気になるが……
jpnSearchText: クク、闘技場っつーのも気になるが……

engChrName: That's what no laws and no regulations does to a place. Just don't let 'em sucker you in, or you'll regret it.
engSearchText:
That's what no laws and no regulations does to
a place. Just don't let 'em sucker you in, or you'll
regret it.
jpnChrName: ここには法律なんざねえからな。 ま、流されない程度にしとけ。
jpnSearchText:
ここには法律なんざねえからな。
ま、流されない程度にしとけ。

engChrName: Rahaha! The plan's simple: just kill the bastards! If they get you, just take 'em down with you! Got it?!
engSearchText:
Rahaha! The plan's simple: just kill the
bastards! If they get you, just take 'em down
with you! Got it?!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: ヒャハ！！　殺られたら殺り返す！！ シンプル・イズ・ベストッ！！
jpnSearchText:
ヒャハ！！　殺られたら殺り返す！！
シンプル・イズ・ベストッ！！

engChrName: Now let's roll, boys! We've got some cleaning up to do!
engSearchText:
Now let's roll, boys! We've got some cleaning
up to do!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: 行くぞテメーらァ！！ 次は南方面のお掃除だぜ、ヒャハハァ！！
jpnSearchText:
行くぞテメーらァ！！
次は南方面のお掃除だぜ、ヒャハハァ！！

engChrName: Bit soon to be leaving, isn't it? These things aren't actually dead yet.
engSearchText:
Bit soon to be leaving, isn't it? These things aren't
actually dead yet.
jpnChrName: いや、こいつらまだ死んでねーけどな。
jpnSearchText: いや、こいつらまだ死んでねーけどな。

engChrName: So what if they aren't? We're here for the boxer—he's useful for our plans. Now let's follow along and get to hunting.
engSearchText:
So what if they aren't? We're here for the boxer—he's
useful for our plans. Now let's follow along and get
to hunting.
jpnChrName: だがまあこのボクサーは使えるな。 よし、南方面の掃討に移るか。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあこのボクサーは使えるな。
よし、南方面の掃討に移るか。

engChrName: WOOO, BABY! Now THIS is what I'm talking about!
engSearchText:
