WOOO, BABY! Now THIS is what I'm
talking about!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: ヒャッハ──ッッ！！ これだぜこれェ！！
jpnSearchText:
ヒャッハ──ッッ！！
これだぜこれェ！！

engChrName: Kill those monsters! Kill those hideous freaks until they're all dead! KILL THEM! KILL THEM! KILL THEM ALL!
engSearchText:
Kill those monsters! Kill those hideous freaks
until they're all dead! KILL THEM!
KILL THEM! KILL THEM ALL!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: ブッ殺すブッ殺すブッ殺すブッ殺── あの醜い化け物ドモヲ皆殺シダァ──！！
jpnSearchText:
ブッ殺すブッ殺すブッ殺すブッ殺──
あの醜い化け物ドモヲ皆殺シダァ──！！

engChrName: Goddess almighty, would that boxer shut up? He's getting a bit too excited about bashing devil heads for my liking.
engSearchText:
Goddess almighty, would that boxer shut up?
He's getting a bit too excited about bashing devil
heads for my liking.
jpnChrName: 落ち着けやボクサー、“悪魔”を 殴り殺したくらいで興奮しすぎだろ。
jpnSearchText:
落ち着けやボクサー、“悪魔”を
殴り殺したくらいで興奮しすぎだろ。

engChrName: Tell me about it. The drugs must've fried whatever brain cells he had left... Oh, well. Doesn't hurt having extra brute force to throw around.
engSearchText:
Tell me about it. The drugs must've fried whatever
brain cells he had left... Oh, well. Doesn't hurt having
extra brute force to throw around.
jpnChrName: つーかチッ、こいつキメてやがる…… まあ戦力になるならいいけどよォ。
jpnSearchText:
つーかチッ、こいつキメてやがる……
まあ戦力になるならいいけどよォ。

engChrName: Whoa, whoa, whoa! What the hell are those things, huh?!
engSearchText:
Whoa, whoa, whoa! What the hell are those
things, huh?!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: オイオイオイ…… 何なんだよあいつらはよォ！！
jpnSearchText:
オイオイオイ……
何なんだよあいつらはよォ！！

engChrName: The annual Apex Showdown was supposed to be afternoon, but this shit is way too crazy for that!
engSearchText:
The annual Apex Showdown was supposed to be
afternoon, but this shit is way too crazy for that!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: 今日は午後から“頂上戦”の予定だったんだが…… タダモンじゃあねえ！　クレイジーすぎるぜ！！
jpnSearchText:
今日は午後から“頂上戦”の予定だったんだが……
タダモンじゃあねえ！　クレイジーすぎるぜ！！

engChrName: ...Bah, whatever! If you're here for a blood bath, then let's turn this place into a slaughterhouse! RAAAH!
engSearchText:
...Bah, whatever! If you're here for a blood bath, then
let's turn this place into a slaughterhouse! RAAAH!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: 見せてくれよ、テメーらの最高の 殺し合いをよォォォ！！！
jpnSearchText:
見せてくれよ、テメーらの最高の
殺し合いをよォォォ！！！

engChrName: Hoo yeah! The Apex Showdown's only three days away—that's where they crown this year's champion!
engSearchText:
Hoo yeah! The Apex Showdown's only three days
away—that's where they crown this year's champion!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: ぷは～っ！！　今年のチャンピオンを決める “頂上戦”開始まであと３日……
jpnSearchText:
ぷは～っ！！　今年のチャンピオンを決める
“頂上戦”開始まであと３日……

engChrName: I'm getting pumped up, man. Shit like that's what I call living!
engSearchText:
I'm getting pumped up, man. Shit like that's what I
call living!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: ……高ぶるぜ……… 生きてるって感じがするよなァオイ！
jpnSearchText:
……高ぶるぜ………
生きてるって感じがするよなァオイ！

engChrName: This is all I live for now! Real, raw ass fights with all the pain and thrills you could ever ask for! BRING IT ON!
engSearchText:
This is all I live for now! Real, raw ass fights with all
the pain and thrills you could ever ask for! BRING
IT ON!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: このヒリつくスリルを味わうためだけに 俺ァ生きてんだ、ハッハッハーッ！！
jpnSearchText:
このヒリつくスリルを味わうためだけに
俺ァ生きてんだ、ハッハッハーッ！！

engChrName: Well, what've we got here? You jumping into the fray? Hell yeah, you're my kind of man!
engSearchText:
Well, what've we got here? You jumping into
the fray? Hell yeah, you're my kind of man!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: お？　飛び込みか？ イイねイイねェ、イキがあってよォ！！
jpnSearchText:
お？　飛び込みか？
イイねイイねェ、イキがあってよォ！！

engChrName: They're doing exhibition matches for the tournament right now. Get on this shit and show everyone what you're made of!
engSearchText:
They're doing exhibition matches for the tournament
right now. Get on this shit and show everyone what
you're made of!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: 今やってるトーナメントのエキシビション マッチにでも挑戦してみろよ、ハッハー！！
jpnSearchText:
今やってるトーナメントのエキシビション
マッチにでも挑戦してみろよ、ハッハー！！

engChrName: (Craaap... I didn't sign up for this. All I wanted to do today was a little recon.)
engSearchText:
(Craaap... I didn't sign up for this. All I wanted to do
today was a little recon.)
jpnChrName: （チッ……変なのに絡まれちまったぞ。   今日の所は偵察のつもりだったが──）
jpnSearchText:
（チッ……変なのに絡まれちまったぞ。
今日の所は偵察のつもりだったが──）

engChrName: (They're bound to make some moves soon. I should just lay low and blend in for now.)
engSearchText:
(They're bound to make some moves soon. I should
just lay low and blend in for now.)
jpnChrName: （フン、そろそろ動きもあるはずだ。   目立つ真似は控えておくか……）
jpnSearchText:
（フン、そろそろ動きもあるはずだ。
目立つ真似は控えておくか……）

engChrName: (Can't say I recognize those jaegers. Guess this is the place all the cops go to for sniffin' out intel.)
engSearchText:
(Can't say I recognize those jaegers. Guess this is the
place all the cops go to for sniffin' out intel.)
jpnChrName: （見かけねえ猟兵どもだな……   どこの団も情報収集を掛けてるって所か──）
jpnSearchText:
（見かけねえ猟兵どもだな……
どこの団も情報収集を掛けてるって所か──）

engChrName: All right! Five-hundred more reps today, let's do this! Grrrah!
engSearchText:
All right! Five-hundred more reps today, let's do this!
Grrrah!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: シャア！　今日はあと５００打っておくか！！
jpnSearchText: シャア！　今日はあと５００打っておくか！！

engChrName: I used to be a famous boxer back on the surface— buuut then the drugs came a-callin'.
engSearchText:
I used to be a famous boxer back on the surface—
buuut then the drugs came a-callin'.
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: ……俺はオモテじゃ有名なボクサーだったんだが ヤクが止められなくてなァ！
jpnSearchText:
……俺はオモテじゃ有名なボクサーだったんだが
ヤクが止められなくてなァ！

engChrName: I fell about as low as a guy could fall... But you know something? Life here ain't so bad.
engSearchText:
I fell about as low as a guy could fall... But you
know something? Life here ain't so bad.
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: 堕ちる所まで堕ちて── ……だがここでの生活も悪くねーぜ。
jpnSearchText:
堕ちる所まで堕ちて──
……だがここでの生活も悪くねーぜ。

engChrName: This place is rotten to shit, but you can do whatever you want down here! I love it! Hell, you can leave guys half-dead, nobody cares!
engSearchText:
This place is rotten to shit, but you can do whatever
you want down here! I love it! Hell, you can leave
guys half-dead, nobody cares!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: 腐った町だが、拳だけは思う存分振えるしな。 相手を半殺しにしてもイイ！　最高だぜェ！！
jpnSearchText:
腐った町だが、拳だけは思う存分振えるしな。
相手を半殺しにしてもイイ！　最高だぜェ！！

engChrName: That's the spirit, Joe! Can't wait to see you kick ass in your next match!
engSearchText:
That's the spirit, Joe! Can't wait to see you kick ass in
your next match!
jpnChrName: 気合は入ったかよ、ブローニング・ジョー！！ 次の試合も楽しみにしてるぜェ！！
jpnSearchText:
気合は入ったかよ、ブローニング・ジョー！！
次の試合も楽しみにしてるぜェ！！

engChrName: Kill that stupid bastard, you hear me? I've got all my money riding on you!
engSearchText:
Kill that stupid bastard, you hear me? I've got all my
money riding on you!
jpnChrName: クソどもなんざブッ殺せ！！ テメエに有り金全部賭けてんだからよォ！！
jpnSearchText:
クソどもなんざブッ殺せ！！
テメエに有り金全部賭けてんだからよォ！！

engChrName: Don't have to tell me twice! Once I'm done with him, we're havin' ourselves a good old-fashioned bloodbath!
engSearchText:
Don't have to tell me twice! Once I'm done
with him, we're havin' ourselves a good
old-fashioned bloodbath!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: ハッハッハー！！　言われるまでもねえ！！ 次の相手も血祭りにしてやるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ハッハッハー！！　言われるまでもねえ！！
次の相手も血祭りにしてやるぜ！

engChrName: I'll knock the sumbitch out in one blow, and I won't stop until this whole town's red! GAHAHAHA!
engSearchText:
I'll knock the sumbitch out in one blow, and
I won't stop until this whole town's red!
GAHAHAHA!
engHtmlText: ブローニング・ジョー
jpnChrName: おっとその前に一発決めんとな、 ハッハッハーッ！！
jpnSearchText:
おっとその前に一発決めんとな、
ハッハッハーッ！！

engChrName: Well, that got weird...but I'll never turn down a challenge from him.
engSearchText:
Well, that got weird...but I'll never turn down a
challenge from him.
jpnChrName: 妙な事にはなっちまったが、 コイツの挑戦ならいつでも受けて立つさ。
jpnSearchText:
妙な事にはなっちまったが、
コイツの挑戦ならいつでも受けて立つさ。

engChrName: Especially not after our showdown back in Liberl. That match had some implications... Big implications.
engSearchText:
Especially not after our showdown back in Liberl.
That match had some implications...
Big implications.
jpnChrName: ヴァルターとの決着もリベールの 一件以来、尾を引いちまってるからなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァルターとの決着もリベールの
一件以来、尾を引いちまってるからなぁ……

engChrName: For now, I think I'll just hang back and see what the Butterfly and Silverblade have to offer.
engSearchText:
For now, I think I'll just hang back and see what the
Butterfly and Silverblade have to offer.
jpnChrName: 《黄金蝶》や《白銀の剣聖》殿の実力も 今日はじっくり見せてもらうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
《黄金蝶》や《白銀の剣聖》殿の実力も
今日はじっくり見せてもらうとするか。

engChrName: Sorry, I've got a ton of work on my plate right now. Can't talk much.
engSearchText:
Sorry, I've got a ton of work on my plate right now.
Can't talk much.
jpnChrName: すまない、色々仕事が入ってしまってね。
jpnSearchText: すまない、色々仕事が入ってしまってね。

engChrName: Hmm... Actually, maybe I should get to work on his surgery while I wait for Leon to get back. He's sure taking his sweet time...
engSearchText:
Hmm... Actually, maybe I should get to work on his
surgery while I wait for Leon to get back. He's sure
taking his sweet time...
jpnChrName: リオン君も中々戻ってこないし…… ふむ、待っている間に彼の手術でもしているか。
jpnSearchText:
リオン君も中々戻ってこないし……
ふむ、待っている間に彼の手術でもしているか。

engChrName: Anyway, I hear you guys are getting involved in some big operation. Whatever you do, just make sure you don't come back in body bags, got it?
engSearchText:
Anyway, I hear you guys are getting involved in some
big operation. Whatever you do, just make sure you
don't come back in body bags, got it?
jpnChrName: そちらは大きな作戦に参加するそうだが── 死んでも死体だけは帰ってきてくれよ！？
jpnSearchText:
そちらは大きな作戦に参加するそうだが──
死んでも死体だけは帰ってきてくれよ！？

engChrName: Of course. Dying would be rather bad.
engSearchText: Of course. Dying would be rather bad.
jpnChrName: いや、死ぬつもりはないんだけど。
jpnSearchText: いや、死ぬつもりはないんだけど。

engChrName: Right back at you, doc. You seem to be goin' a million selge a minute there. Don't burn yourself out, yeah?
engSearchText:
Right back at you, doc. You seem to be goin' a
million selge a minute there. Don't burn yourself
out, yeah?
jpnChrName: 相変わらずぶっ飛んでるみてーだが、 そっちも無理のねえ程度にな。
jpnSearchText:
相変わらずぶっ飛んでるみてーだが、
そっちも無理のねえ程度にな。

engChrName: Now there's a tantalizing case study! I haven't felt this intrigued since they kicked me out of the medical community in Remiferia.
engSearchText:
Now there's a tantalizing case study! I haven't felt this
intrigued since they kicked me out of the medical
community in Remiferia.
jpnChrName: いやはや、なんと刺激的な 研究テーマなんだ！
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、なんと刺激的な
研究テーマなんだ！

engChrName: Things are about to get a lot more stimulating around here—and it's all thanks to him.
engSearchText:
Things are about to get a lot more stimulating around
here—and it's all thanks to him.
jpnChrName: レミフェリアの医学界を追われて以来だ── 彼のお陰で刺激的な日になりそうだよっ！
jpnSearchText:
レミフェリアの医学界を追われて以来だ──
彼のお陰で刺激的な日になりそうだよっ！

engChrName: I actually get along pretty well with her, enigmatic though she is.
engSearchText:
I actually get along pretty well with her, enigmatic
though she is.
jpnChrName: フフ、彼女も謎が多いが 不思議と気が合ってね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、彼女も謎が多いが
不思議と気が合ってね。

engChrName: It's just a shame she can't have the hard stuff when we get together. I get why, but still.
engSearchText:
It's just a shame she can't have the hard stuff when we
get together. I get why, but still.
jpnChrName: いつもノンアルなのが少々残念だが──
jpnSearchText: いつもノンアルなのが少々残念だが──

engChrName: Hmm... How feasible would it be to have a pill that accelerates the breakup of alcohol in the body? Overclocking the liver, perhaps?
engSearchText:
Hmm... How feasible would it be to have a pill that
accelerates the breakup of alcohol in the body?
Overclocking the liver, perhaps?
jpnChrName: ふむ、今度アルコール分解を促進する 薬品でも作ってみようか。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、今度アルコール分解を促進する
薬品でも作ってみようか。

engChrName: Word through the grapevine is, the church has some similar drug. If I could just find a way to reverse engineer it, I'd be in business!
engSearchText:
Word through the grapevine is, the church has some
similar drug. If I could just find a way to reverse
engineer it, I'd be in business!
jpnChrName: 教会に伝わる秘薬にもそういった効果が あるらしいが、安定した製法を確立すれば……
jpnSearchText:
教会に伝わる秘薬にもそういった効果が
あるらしいが、安定した製法を確立すれば……

engChrName: I heard what you guys have been up to lately. Sounds like you make quite a splash over at the old capital.
engSearchText:
I heard what you guys have been up to lately.
Sounds like you make quite a splash over at the
old capital.
jpnChrName: おや君たち、噂は聞いているよ。 古都では大活躍だったそうじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
おや君たち、噂は聞いているよ。
古都では大活躍だったそうじゃないか。

engChrName: I also heard some stuff about Almata's leadership— sounds like they had quite the intriguing lineup, to say the least.
engSearchText:
I also heard some stuff about Almata's leadership—
sounds like they had quite the intriguing lineup, to
say the least.
jpnChrName: アルマータ幹部の情報も耳にしたが── 中々興味深い連中だったようだね。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータ幹部の情報も耳にしたが──
中々興味深い連中だったようだね。

engChrName: Did they really have a 130 year-old ageless wonder on their team? What a medical marvel... I'd have loved to get a good look at him.
engSearchText:
Did they really have a 130 year-old ageless wonder on
their team? What a medical marvel... I'd have loved to
get a good look at him.
jpnChrName: １３０年以上生きている男もいたとか…… ふむ、この目で見てみたかったものだが。
jpnSearchText:
１３０年以上生きている男もいたとか……
ふむ、この目で見てみたかったものだが。

engChrName: At that age, I bet his body was indestructible—and therefore the perfect guinea pig. I bet I could've opened him up any which way I wanted...
engSearchText:
At that age, I bet his body was indestructible—and
therefore the perfect guinea pig. I bet I could've
opened him up any which way I wanted...
jpnChrName: いくら切り刻んでも耐えてくれそうだし 理想的な実験体なんだが……
jpnSearchText:
いくら切り刻んでも耐えてくれそうだし
理想的な実験体なんだが……

engChrName: You sound like you miss him. Word of advice: don't—he ain't worth it. (What a freak. Sayin' all that with a straight face...)
engSearchText:
You sound like you miss him. Word of advice:
don't—he ain't worth it.
(What a freak. Sayin' all that with a straight face...)
jpnChrName: って残念そうな顔してるんじゃねえよ…… （本気で言ってやがんな、これは。）
jpnSearchText:
って残念そうな顔してるんじゃねえよ……
（本気で言ってやがんな、これは。）

engChrName: I made plenty today at work, so tonight, I figured I'd treat myself to a well-earned break.
engSearchText:
I made plenty today at work, so tonight, I figured I'd
treat myself to a well-earned break.
jpnChrName: フフ、日中もガッツリ稼がせてもらったし 今夜は羽を伸ばさせてもらうとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、日中もガッツリ稼がせてもらったし
今夜は羽を伸ばさせてもらうとしようか。

engChrName: I've known Renne here since her Kitty days—we got to know each other online.
engSearchText:
I've known Renne here since her Kitty days—we got
to know each other online.
jpnChrName: レン君とは“仔猫”時代から ネットでのやり取りはしてきたが……
jpnSearchText:
レン君とは“仔猫”時代から
ネットでのやり取りはしてきたが……

engChrName: I never thought I'd get to meet her in person all these years later—so young, and yet she's grown so much!
engSearchText:
I never thought I'd get to meet her in person all these
years later—so young, and yet she's grown so much!
jpnChrName: まさか今年、こんな成長した姿で 本人と会えるとは思ってもみなかった。
jpnSearchText:
まさか今年、こんな成長した姿で
本人と会えるとは思ってもみなかった。

engChrName: It didn't take her long to start marching to the Blacklight beat. But I suppose with a résumé like hers, she can adapt to just about anything.
engSearchText:
It didn't take her long to start marching to the
Blacklight beat. But I suppose with a résumé like
hers, she can adapt to just about anything.
jpnChrName: 黒芒街にも速攻馴染んでいたし、 フフ、流石の経歴（キャリア）と言った所かな？
jpnSearchText:
黒芒街にも速攻馴染んでいたし、
フフ、流石の経歴（キャリア）と言った所かな？

engChrName: (Shoulda figured she'd know about her society ties. Man, what DOESN'T this woman know?)
engSearchText:
(Shoulda figured she'd know about her society ties.
Man, what DOESN'T this woman know?)
jpnChrName: （当然、結社方面の話も知ってるわけか。   なかなか底知れねえ姐さんだぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（当然、結社方面の話も知ってるわけか。
なかなか底知れねえ姐さんだぜ。）

engChrName: Those Almata bastards! They hit our hideout and nailed our top brass!
engSearchText:
Those Almata bastards! They hit our hideout and
nailed our top brass!
jpnChrName: アルマータども……隠れアジトまで カチコミに来やがって！！
jpnSearchText:
アルマータども……隠れアジトまで
カチコミに来やがって！！

engChrName: Doc, you've gotta come see them! They're on the outskirts of town. Real deep shit here!
engSearchText:
Doc, you've gotta come see them! They're on the
outskirts of town. Real deep shit here!
jpnChrName: ウチの幹部もやられた！！ おい医者ッ、すぐに郊外まで来い！！
jpnSearchText:
ウチの幹部もやられた！！
おい医者ッ、すぐに郊外まで来い！！

engChrName: Outskirts? So he's not inside Edith proper? I can do house calls, but they don't come cheap.
engSearchText:
Outskirts? So he's not inside Edith proper? I can do
house calls, but they don't come cheap.
jpnChrName: おや？　つまり患者は別の町という事かな？ 出張は高くつくんだが──
jpnSearchText:
おや？　つまり患者は別の町という事かな？
出張は高くつくんだが──

engChrName: I want a million up-front...per person. And then, let's say, three million for each treatment. Does that sound good to you boys?
engSearchText:
I want a million up-front...per person. And then, let's
say, three million for each treatment. Does that sound
good to you boys?
jpnChrName: 前金で１００万、成功報酬３００万。 ……一人頭だが、やるかね？
jpnSearchText:
前金で１００万、成功報酬３００万。
……一人頭だが、やるかね？

engChrName: Wha— You want four million a person?!
engSearchText: Wha— You want four million a person?!
jpnChrName: なあっ……ひ、一人頭だと！？
jpnSearchText: なあっ……ひ、一人頭だと！？

engChrName: You trying to bankrupt us, you money-grubbing bitch?!
engSearchText:
You trying to bankrupt us, you
money-grubbing bitch?!
jpnChrName: ぼ、ぼったくりすぎだろ、このアマがァ！！
jpnSearchText: ぼ、ぼったくりすぎだろ、このアマがァ！！

engChrName: If you don't wanna pay, fine. There are plenty of other doctors out there you can turn to instead. Take it or leave it, boys.
engSearchText:
If you don't wanna pay, fine. There are plenty of
other doctors out there you can turn to instead.
Take it or leave it, boys.
jpnChrName: フフ、嫌ならいいさ。 世の中には真っ当な医者もいるわけだしね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、嫌ならいいさ。
世の中には真っ当な医者もいるわけだしね。

engChrName: (This is an awfully tense place to be... You can cut the tension with a knife.)
engSearchText:
(This is an awfully tense place to be... You can cut the
tension with a knife.)
jpnChrName: （な、なんだか修羅場っぽいけど……）
jpnSearchText: （な、なんだか修羅場っぽいけど……）

engChrName: (Yeah, those mafia goons're always trouble. Just look the other way and move along.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, those mafia goons're always trouble. Just look
the other way and move along.)
jpnChrName: （こいつらはアルマータ以外のマフィアか……？   あんま関わりたくねえなぁ。）
jpnSearchText:
（こいつらはアルマータ以外のマフィアか……？
あんま関わりたくねえなぁ。）

engChrName: I get those sorts of clients all the time lately...though still not as much as before.
engSearchText:
I get those sorts of clients all the time lately...though
still not as much as before.
jpnChrName: 最近この手の話が多くてね。 まァ、マシになった方ではあるが。
jpnSearchText:
最近この手の話が多くてね。
まァ、マシになった方ではあるが。

engChrName: Ever since Almata rose up the food chain, I've had their victims lining up for blocks outside my door.
engSearchText:
Ever since Almata rose up the food chain, I've had
their victims lining up for blocks outside my door.
jpnChrName: アルマータが台頭し始めた頃は 日常茶飯事でね、稼がせてもらったものさ。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータが台頭し始めた頃は
日常茶飯事でね、稼がせてもらったものさ。

engChrName: Can't help but wonder how much my services are REALLY needed, though. Really, I'm just some black market quack who's fallen from grace. Heh.
engSearchText:
Can't help but wonder how much my services are
REALLY needed, though. Really, I'm just some
black market quack who's fallen from grace. Heh.
jpnChrName: しかしそうまでして私が必要かねェ？ 所詮は堕ちた闇医者風情だというのに。
jpnSearchText:
しかしそうまでして私が必要かねェ？
所詮は堕ちた闇医者風情だというのに。

engChrName: Ah, the spriggan and his lovely assistant again. I see you've added some new faces to your ranks since we last met.
engSearchText:
Ah, the spriggan and his lovely assistant again. I see
you've added some new faces to your ranks since we
last met.
jpnChrName: おや？　裏解決屋に学生君じゃないか。 それ以外のメンツもいるようだが……
jpnSearchText:
おや？　裏解決屋に学生君じゃないか。
それ以外のメンツもいるようだが……

engChrName: What brings you here? Somebody hurt I need to take a look at?
engSearchText:
What brings you here? Somebody hurt I need to take
a look at?
jpnChrName: どうしたんだい？　こんな所まで。 怪我人でも出たのかな？
jpnSearchText:
どうしたんだい？　こんな所まで。
怪我人でも出たのかな？

engChrName: Well, you know me. Show me the mira and I'll take a gander. Sick, dead, whatever you need, I can handle it.
engSearchText:
Well, you know me. Show me the mira and I'll take
a gander. Sick, dead, whatever you need, I can
handle it.
jpnChrName: フフ……ミラさえ積めば診てあげるよ。 病人でも死体でも何でもね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……ミラさえ積めば診てあげるよ。
病人でも死体でも何でもね。

engChrName: Isabelle! I didn't know you worked down here.
engSearchText: Isabelle! I didn't know you worked down here.
jpnChrName: イザベルさん…… 黒芒街にいらしたんですね。
jpnSearchText:
イザベルさん……
黒芒街にいらしたんですね。

engChrName: What, she a friend of yours or something?
engSearchText: What, she a friend of yours or something?
jpnChrName: ハン？　なんだ顔見知りかよ？
jpnSearchText: ハン？　なんだ顔見知りかよ？

engChrName: Well, not exactly. She was a client we did some work for after I first joined.
engSearchText:
Well, not exactly. She was a client we did some work
for after I first joined.
jpnChrName: ええ、仕事を始めた頃にちょっと……
jpnSearchText: ええ、仕事を始めた頃にちょっと……

engChrName: Yep. As you can probably tell, she's a pretty renowned doc in the underbelly.
engSearchText:
Yep. As you can probably tell, she's a pretty renowned
doc in the underbelly.
jpnChrName: ま、想像の通りだ。 イザベルは裏じゃ名の通った医者だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、想像の通りだ。
イザベルは裏じゃ名の通った医者だぜ。

engChrName: Not my FIRST choice for treatment—she'll patch you up, but gouge your wallet, too. But hey, she's always around whenever you need it.
engSearchText:
Not my FIRST choice for treatment—she'll patch
you up, but gouge your wallet, too. But hey, she's
always around whenever you need it.
jpnChrName: ミラもぼられるし、世話になるつもりもねえが 他に手立てがねえ時は思い出すといいかもな。
jpnSearchText:
ミラもぼられるし、世話になるつもりもねえが
他に手立てがねえ時は思い出すといいかもな。

engChrName: Ouch, haha! That's a little mean, don't you think? I'm not some scam artist... I just know what I'm worth.
engSearchText:
Ouch, haha! That's a little mean, don't you think?
I'm not some scam artist... I just know what
I'm worth.
jpnChrName: フフ、酷いなァ。 私は全てに対してフェアというだけなんだが。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、酷いなァ。
私は全てに対してフェアというだけなんだが。

engChrName: Money talks, after all—and I listen. Green is a language we all understand.
engSearchText:
Money talks, after all—and I listen. Green is a
language we all understand.
jpnChrName: 地獄の沙汰もミラ次第── 極めて公平な世の理だと思わないかい？
jpnSearchText:
地獄の沙汰もミラ次第──
極めて公平な世の理だと思わないかい？

engChrName: Money...talks? I didn't know they printed talking money...but I'll take your word for it! You sound like a really skilled doctor!
engSearchText:
Money...talks? I didn't know they printed talking
money...but I'll take your word for it! You sound like
a really skilled doctor!
jpnChrName: ？　よく分かりませんけど…… 腕は確かな人みたいですね！
jpnSearchText:
？　よく分かりませんけど……
腕は確かな人みたいですね！

engChrName: You know the colosseum behind here? They ship me a lot of their fighters whenever they get roughed up.
engSearchText:
You know the colosseum behind here? They ship me
a lot of their fighters whenever they get roughed up.
jpnChrName: ここは裏が闘技場だろう？ 重傷者が運ばれてくることも多くてね。
jpnSearchText:
ここは裏が闘技場だろう？
重傷者が運ばれてくることも多くてね。

engChrName: They're not easy jobs, but I'll always take a look, provided they've got the coin.
engSearchText:
They're not easy jobs, but I'll always take a look,
provided they've got the coin.
jpnChrName: フフ、ミラ次第だが ちょくちょく診てやっているのさ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ミラ次第だが
ちょくちょく診てやっているのさ。

engChrName: They're far from my favorite patients, though—too rowdy for me. They just never sit still.
engSearchText:
They're far from my favorite patients, though—too
rowdy for me. They just never sit still.
jpnChrName: 騒がしい連中ばかりだから 私は嫌いなんだがねェ～。
jpnSearchText:
騒がしい連中ばかりだから
私は嫌いなんだがねェ～。

engChrName: Now, the silver spoons who come wailing and begging with stacks of mira? I love those. They're so desperate, it's adorable.
engSearchText:
Now, the silver spoons who come wailing and
begging with stacks of mira? I love those. They're so
desperate, it's adorable.
jpnChrName: 大金を積んで懇願してくる 金持ちの方が、可愛げがあって好きだね㈱
jpnSearchText:
大金を積んで懇願してくる
金持ちの方が、可愛げがあって好きだね㈱

engChrName: Hmm... I hadn't considered that as a way to restore cranial nerve functions... Interesting. Very interesting.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I hadn't considered that as a way to restore
cranial nerve functions... Interesting. Very interesting.
jpnChrName: ……ふむ、そんなやり方で 失われた脳神経の機能回復を図れるとはねェ。
jpnSearchText:
……ふむ、そんなやり方で
失われた脳神経の機能回復を図れるとはねェ。

engChrName: Thank you, Renne. That helped clear up the part of your thesis I had trouble parsing. That insight will come in mighty handy.
engSearchText:
Thank you, Renne. That helped clear up the part of
your thesis I had trouble parsing. That insight will
come in mighty handy.
jpnChrName: いや～、助かったよレン君㈱ これで論文の不明瞭な箇所も明快になった。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、助かったよレン君㈱
これで論文の不明瞭な箇所も明快になった。

engChrName: Don't mention it—just know that it's all still theory. It's up to you and your field to determine how practical it actually is.
engSearchText:
Don't mention it—just know that it's all still theory.
It's up to you and your field to determine how
practical it actually is.
jpnChrName: うふふ、あくまで理論上の可能性だし 実践できるかどうかは医療現場（あなたたち）次第でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、あくまで理論上の可能性だし
実践できるかどうかは医療現場（あなたたち）次第でしょう。

engChrName: I'm definitely excited to see how my ideas pan out in the real world, at any rate. I'll be keeping a very close eye on those tests. ㈱
engSearchText:
I'm definitely excited to see how my ideas pan out in
the real world, at any rate. I'll be keeping a very close
eye on those tests. ㈱
jpnChrName: 理論の実地検証という観点から こちらの方も大いに期待させてもらうわね㈱
jpnSearchText:
理論の実地検証という観点から
こちらの方も大いに期待させてもらうわね㈱

engChrName: By all means! I'm excited to put your theory to work.
engSearchText: By all means! I'm excited to put your theory to work.
jpnChrName: フフ、そちらは任せたまえ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、そちらは任せたまえ。

engChrName: ...Do I even wanna ask what harebrained schemes you're up to? And what's a kid like you doin' down here at this hour, huh?
engSearchText:
...Do I even wanna ask what harebrained schemes
you're up to? And what's a kid like you doin' down
here at this hour, huh?
jpnChrName: ……なに突っ込みどころ満載の話をしてんだよ。 それに未成年が夜来て良い場所でもねぇぞ？
jpnSearchText:
……なに突っ込みどころ満載の話をしてんだよ。
それに未成年が夜来て良い場所でもねぇぞ？

engChrName: Ah, if it isn't Edith's one and only spriggan.
engSearchText: Ah, if it isn't Edith's one and only spriggan.
jpnChrName: おや、裏解決屋。
jpnSearchText: おや、裏解決屋。

engChrName: Good evening, Van. Why so concerned? I have proper permission to leave the campus at night. Everything is above-board, I assure you.
engSearchText:
Good evening, Van. Why so concerned? I have
proper permission to leave the campus at night.
Everything is above-board, I assure you.
jpnChrName: うふふ、こんばんはヴァンさん。 夜間の外出届は一応出してあるわよ？
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、こんばんはヴァンさん。
夜間の外出届は一応出してあるわよ？

engChrName: That's not what I meant and you know it.
engSearchText: That's not what I meant and you know it.
jpnChrName: ったく、そういう問題じゃねえだろが。
jpnSearchText: ったく、そういう問題じゃねえだろが。

engChrName: So you're still publishin' papers, huh? Man, you're a real workaholic. You were doin' that five years ago when we first met.
engSearchText:
So you're still publishin' papers, huh? Man, you're a
real workaholic. You were doin' that five years ago
when we first met.
jpnChrName: しかしあれから５年になるが、 今もあちこちに論文を書いてるらしいな？
jpnSearchText:
しかしあれから５年になるが、
今もあちこちに論文を書いてるらしいな？

engChrName: So you're the infamous Mille Chaton, are you? The mysterious researcher who puts out papers at the speed of light.
engSearchText:
So you're the infamous Mille Chaton, are you?
The mysterious researcher who puts out papers at the
speed of light.
jpnChrName: ふふ、医学のみならず、導力工学に経済学、 近代文学や音楽理論に至るまで……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、医学のみならず、導力工学に経済学、
近代文学や音楽理論に至るまで……

engChrName: Medicine, economics, engineering...even literature and music theory. A polymath through and through.
engSearchText:
Medicine, economics, engineering...even literature
and music theory. A polymath through and through.
jpnChrName: 《千の仔猫（ミル＝シャトン）》なる名義で 論文を送りつけていた謎の人物だったか。
jpnSearchText:
《千の仔猫（ミル＝シャトン）》なる名義で
論文を送りつけていた謎の人物だったか。

engChrName: Your work has been very well regarded at various conferences. I hear you even managed to attain your doctorate while remaining anonymous.
engSearchText:
Your work has been very well regarded at
various conferences. I hear you even managed to
attain your doctorate while remaining anonymous.
jpnChrName: そのどれもが各学会で高く評価されて 匿名ながら博士号も授与されたという。
jpnSearchText:
そのどれもが各学会で高く評価されて
匿名ながら博士号も授与されたという。

engChrName: Wow, you do know your stuff. Normally I would deflect such scrutiny into my identity, but it seems as though the jig is up.
engSearchText:
Wow, you do know your stuff. Normally I would
deflect such scrutiny into my identity, but it seems as
though the jig is up.
jpnChrName: あら、何のことかしら？ って誤魔化す必要も貴方たちには無いか。
jpnSearchText:
あら、何のことかしら？
って誤魔化す必要も貴方たちには無いか。

engChrName: My output isn't what it once was. I used to be a little haphazard in my youth, dabbling in anything and everything that came to mind.
engSearchText:
My output isn't what it once was. I used to be a little
haphazard in my youth, dabbling in anything and
everything that came to mind.
jpnChrName: まあ“昔”はちょっと荒れていて 手当たりしだい色々手を出してたけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ“昔”はちょっと荒れていて
手当たりしだい色々手を出してたけど……

engChrName: But now I'm so busy with the Student Council and my other commitments, I don't have the energy to publish as often as I used to.
engSearchText:
But now I'm so busy with the Student Council and
my other commitments, I don't have the energy to
publish as often as I used to.
jpnChrName: 今は生徒会に他の手伝いも忙しくって それどころじゃ無くなっちゃったわね。
jpnSearchText:
今は生徒会に他の手伝いも忙しくって
それどころじゃ無くなっちゃったわね。

engChrName: These days, I put out a paper...oh, every six months or so.
engSearchText:
These days, I put out a paper...oh, every six months
or so.
jpnChrName: せいぜい半年に一本出せるかくらいかしら？
jpnSearchText: せいぜい半年に一本出せるかくらいかしら？

engChrName: Because, y'know, publishing ONLY two papers a year at 16 is so bog-standard.
engSearchText:
Because, y'know, publishing ONLY two papers a year
at 16 is so bog-standard.
jpnChrName: いや、その時点で 十分以上に常識外れだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
いや、その時点で
十分以上に常識外れだろうが……

engChrName: I think that's a healthy pace to maintain. Your youth doesn't last forever—it wouldn't do to drown your teenage years in work.
engSearchText:
I think that's a healthy pace to maintain. Your youth
doesn't last forever—it wouldn't do to drown your
teenage years in work.
jpnChrName: まあ、そのくらいにしておくといい。 青春を謳歌することも若人には大切だ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そのくらいにしておくといい。
青春を謳歌することも若人には大切だ。

engChrName: My, look at this body! They don't get any fresher than this! What wonderful samples do you hold inside, sir?
engSearchText:
My, look at this body! They don't get any fresher
than this! What wonderful samples do you hold
inside, sir?
jpnChrName: ……殺されたてホヤホヤ！！ なんて希少なサンプルなんだっ！
jpnSearchText:
……殺されたてホヤホヤ！！
なんて希少なサンプルなんだっ！

engChrName: I... I'm still alive...you know!
engSearchText: I... I'm still alive...you know!
jpnChrName: か……勝手に……殺す、な……！
jpnSearchText: か……勝手に……殺す、な……！

engChrName: Those monsters... Why...did this...have...to happen? I've...still got to... URGH!
engSearchText:
Those monsters... Why...did this...have...to happen?
I've...still got to... URGH!
jpnChrName: クソどもめ……俺はまだ……使命が…… ……なのに何故……あああの、悪魔め……ッ！！
jpnSearchText:
クソどもめ……俺はまだ……使命が……
……なのに何故……あああの、悪魔め……ッ！！

engChrName: Hmm... You've had quite the ordeal out there, haven't you?
engSearchText:
Hmm... You've had quite the ordeal out there,
haven't you?
jpnChrName: ふむ～う？　よほど 恐ろしい目に遭ったのだろうね。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ～う？　よほど
恐ろしい目に遭ったのだろうね。

engChrName: I guess this calls for a dissec... Well, no, I suppose I should try surgery first. Yes, we'll go with that!
engSearchText:
I guess this calls for a dissec... Well, no, I suppose I
should try surgery first. Yes, we'll go with that!
jpnChrName: よしっ、解剖──じゃなかった。 手術してみようじゃないかっ！
jpnSearchText:
よしっ、解剖──じゃなかった。
手術してみようじゃないかっ！

engChrName: I'll even treat you for free in exchange for some of your brain tissue! What do you say?
engSearchText:
I'll even treat you for free in exchange for some of
your brain tissue! What do you say?
jpnChrName: お代は負けに負けて、 君の脳ミソで請け負おう！
jpnSearchText:
お代は負けに負けて、
君の脳ミソで請け負おう！

engChrName: Wha—?! H-HELL no, you freaking quack! Just patch me up like a normal doctor, already!
engSearchText:
Wha—?! H-HELL no, you freaking quack!
Just patch me up like a normal doctor, already!
jpnChrName: こ、このヤブ医者がァァ！！ ……普通にたすけろォォ……！！
jpnSearchText:
こ、このヤブ医者がァァ！！
……普通にたすけろォォ……！！

engChrName: Graaah! Damn those...those THINGS!
engSearchText: Graaah! Damn those...those THINGS!
jpnChrName: ぐああっ……あの化け物どもめ……ッ！！
jpnSearchText: ぐああっ……あの化け物どもめ……ッ！！

engChrName: Oh, now this looks bad. That does seem like the work of a devil.
engSearchText:
Oh, now this looks bad. That does seem like the work
of a devil.
jpnChrName: おやおや、これはヒドイ…… まさに悪魔の所業だな。
jpnSearchText:
おやおや、これはヒドイ……
まさに悪魔の所業だな。

engChrName: Tell you what: I'll give you a discount for my medical services. I'm extremely interested in you as a test su—I mean, as a physician!
engSearchText:
Tell you what: I'll give you a discount for my
medical services. I'm extremely interested in you as a
test su—I mean, as a physician!
jpnChrName: どうかな、格安にするから治療を受けないか？ 実験台──もとい医師として非常に興味深い。
jpnSearchText:
どうかな、格安にするから治療を受けないか？
実験台──もとい医師として非常に興味深い。

engChrName: Are you nuts?! Just treat me like normal! That's all I want!
engSearchText:
Are you nuts?! Just treat me like normal! That's all
I want!
jpnChrName: こ、この外道が！！ 普通に治療しやがれっ！！
jpnSearchText:
こ、この外道が！！
普通に治療しやがれっ！！

engChrName: Aww, you're no fun. Well, my standard rate, then: one million mira. Do we have a deal?
engSearchText:
Aww, you're no fun. Well, my standard rate, then:
one million mira. Do we have a deal?
jpnChrName: ええ～……テンション下がるなぁ…… あと治療費は１００万ミラだ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ～……テンション下がるなぁ……
あと治療費は１００万ミラだ。

engChrName: Aidios! The hell kinda doctor ARE you?! I don't need my wallet bleeding out, too!
engSearchText:
Aidios! The hell kinda doctor ARE you?! I don't need
my wallet bleeding out, too!
jpnChrName: 高ぇよ、このクソ闇医者があッ！！
jpnSearchText: 高ぇよ、このクソ闇医者があッ！！

engChrName: Looks like they've been running a bunch of seek-and-destroy operations down by here.
engSearchText:
Looks like they've been running a bunch of
seek-and-destroy operations down by here.
jpnChrName: 黒芒街の近くで、何度か“掃討作戦”を やっているみたいなんです。
jpnSearchText:
黒芒街の近くで、何度か“掃討作戦”を
やっているみたいなんです。

engChrName: It's comforting to know that the monsters are being taken care of...
engSearchText:
It's comforting to know that the monsters are being
taken care of...
jpnChrName: お陰で化け物も入ってこないし 少しは安心できますけど……
jpnSearchText:
お陰で化け物も入ってこないし
少しは安心できますけど……

engChrName: ...but more importantly, those jaegers? Woof! Now those are some handsome devils. Yes, VERY handsome... ㈱
engSearchText:
...but more importantly, those jaegers? Woof!
Now those are some handsome devils. Yes,
VERY handsome... ㈱
jpnChrName: あ、あと戦いに向かう猟兵の人って ちょっとイイっていうか……㈱
jpnSearchText:
あ、あと戦いに向かう猟兵の人って
ちょっとイイっていうか……㈱

engChrName: When they come limping back from the battlefield, stabbed up to within a rege of their life... *huff* Heeheehee... Oooh, that gets me going.
engSearchText:
When they come limping back from the battlefield,
stabbed up to within a rege of their life...
*huff* Heeheehee... Oooh, that gets me going.
jpnChrName: その上、全身刺されて瀕死で帰ってきた姿なんて ハァハァ……さ、最高です……ッ！
jpnSearchText:
その上、全身刺されて瀕死で帰ってきた姿なんて
ハァハァ……さ、最高です……ッ！

engChrName: Good lord, I can't tell if you're just a sadist or you've lost your damn mind. Talking to you gives me whiplash.
engSearchText:
Good lord, I can't tell if you're just a sadist or you've
lost your damn mind. Talking to you gives
me whiplash.
jpnChrName: 純情なのか変態なのか、 はっきりしてもらえますかね？
jpnSearchText:
純情なのか変態なのか、
はっきりしてもらえますかね？

engChrName: (I think you know as well as I do that she's beyond help.)
engSearchText:
(I think you know as well as I do that she's
beyond help.)
jpnChrName: （ヴァンさん……まあ気持ちは   分からなくはないですけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（ヴァンさん……まあ気持ちは
分からなくはないですけど……）

engChrName: Eeek! Van! There you are! Van, do you have any idea what's going on?!
engSearchText:
Eeek! Van! There you are! Van, do you have any idea
what's going on?!
jpnChrName: ひぃぃ！！　ヴァンさんたち！！ 一体何がどうなってるんですかもう！？
jpnSearchText:
ひぃぃ！！　ヴァンさんたち！！
一体何がどうなってるんですかもう！？

engChrName: There are all these people standing completely frozen! It's so...creepy! And those who AREN'T frozen, they're all torn up out here.
engSearchText:
There are all these people standing completely frozen!
It's so...creepy! And those who AREN'T frozen,
they're all torn up out here.
jpnChrName: 不気味に固まった人が立ってるし、 大怪我をして運ばれてくる人も──
jpnSearchText:
不気味に固まった人が立ってるし、
大怪我をして運ばれてくる人も──

engChrName: I'm so scared! So very, very scared! I don't know what to do! Help me, Van!
engSearchText:
I'm so scared! So very, very scared! I don't know what
to do! Help me, Van!
jpnChrName: ううっ、怖い怖い怖いです～～っ！！
jpnSearchText: ううっ、怖い怖い怖いです～～っ！！

engChrName: Settle down. We've exorcised the devils around here—you're safe now.
engSearchText:
Settle down. We've exorcised the devils around
here—you're safe now.
jpnChrName: 落ち着くがいい、ここにいれば安全だ。 近隣の悪魔どもは祓っておいたのでな。
jpnSearchText:
落ち着くがいい、ここにいれば安全だ。
近隣の悪魔どもは祓っておいたのでな。

engChrName: Y-You have? Oh, Bergard... Thank you, sir! Umm... Err...
engSearchText:
Y-You have? Oh, Bergard... Thank you, sir! Umm...
Err...
jpnChrName: ゼ、ゼーマン様…… ありがとうございます、その……
jpnSearchText:
ゼ、ゼーマン様……
ありがとうございます、その……

engChrName: (Ohhh, there's just nothing better than a big, strong man standing beside me. Van, Bergard... Anyone, really... *sigh* So dreamy!)
engSearchText:
(Ohhh, there's just nothing better than a big, strong
man standing beside me. Van, Bergard...
Anyone, really... *sigh* So dreamy!)
jpnChrName: （やっぱり強い人はカッコイイなぁ……   ヴァンさんたちも、他の皆さんも……）
jpnSearchText:
（やっぱり強い人はカッコイイなぁ……
ヴァンさんたちも、他の皆さんも……）

engChrName: ...Anything else we can help with, or are you good?
engSearchText: ...Anything else we can help with, or are you good?
jpnChrName: ……どうかしたか？
jpnSearchText: ……どうかしたか？

engChrName: Oh, I'm fine! If you need to take a break, I've got my books for you! My collection isn't anything to write home about, but it passes the time!
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm fine! If you need to take a break, I've got my
books for you! My collection isn't anything to write
home about, but it passes the time!
jpnChrName: い、いえ、えっと……大した品はありませんけど どうかゆっくりして行ってくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
い、いえ、えっと……大した品はありませんけど
どうかゆっくりして行ってくださいね！

engChrName: (Just make sure to stand right next to me when you do, please. ㈱)
engSearchText:
(Just make sure to stand right next to me when you
do, please. ㈱)
jpnChrName: （そして傍に居てくれたら……チラッ㈱）
jpnSearchText: （そして傍に居てくれたら……チラッ㈱）

engChrName: (I respect the hustle, but damn, subtlety's not in her vocabulary, is it? I've had glasses of water less transparent than this chick.)
engSearchText:
(I respect the hustle, but damn, subtlety's not in her
vocabulary, is it? I've had glasses of water less
transparent than this chick.)
jpnChrName: （分かりやすすぎんだろ……   ハッ、殊勝なんだか図太いんだか。）
jpnSearchText:
（分かりやすすぎんだろ……
ハッ、殊勝なんだか図太いんだか。）

engChrName: (Heehee. Some are difficult to read, and some are...not.)
engSearchText:
(Heehee. Some are difficult to read, and some
are...not.)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ、女性らしい方だと   思いますけれど。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふっ、女性らしい方だと
思いますけれど。）

engChrName: I used to be able to read books to escape reality. But this time, it wasn't helping, and I...I lost it. I really lost it.
engSearchText:
I used to be able to read books to escape reality.
But this time, it wasn't helping, and I...I lost it.
I really lost it.
jpnChrName: 今までは本を読めば現実逃避できたんですけど ……そうもいかなくて、取り乱しちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
今までは本を読めば現実逃避できたんですけど
……そうもいかなくて、取り乱しちゃって……

engChrName: I'm sorry for scaring all of you. Don't worry! I think... I think I'm okay now.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry for scaring all of you. Don't worry! I think...
I think I'm okay now.
jpnChrName: すみません、でも落ち着けた気がします。
jpnSearchText: すみません、でも落ち着けた気がします。

engChrName: My collection isn't the most interesting thing in the world, but if you need a break, feel free to give them a read!
engSearchText:
My collection isn't the most interesting thing in the
world, but if you need a break, feel free to give them
a read!
jpnChrName: あのぅ、大した品はありませんけど どうかゆっくりして行ってくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
あのぅ、大した品はありませんけど
どうかゆっくりして行ってくださいね！

engChrName: *huff* *huff* D-Did you see them? Did you see all those people gathered at the colosseum?!
engSearchText:
*huff* *huff* D-Did you see them? Did you see all
those people gathered at the colosseum?!
jpnChrName: ハァハァ……み、見ましたか！？ 闘技場に集まっている人たちを！！
jpnSearchText:
ハァハァ……み、見ましたか！？
闘技場に集まっている人たちを！！

engChrName: They all look so big and strong, like they could tank anything. Like getting...getting stabbed!
engSearchText:
They all look so big and strong, like they could
tank anything. Like getting...getting stabbed!
jpnChrName: 皆さんとっても頑丈で、しぶとそうで、 刺しても死ななさそうな人ばかりで……
jpnSearchText:
皆さんとっても頑丈で、しぶとそうで、
刺しても死ななさそうな人ばかりで……

engChrName: Oh, this is too much! I'm getting so flustered just thinking about it! Oof...
engSearchText:
Oh, this is too much! I'm getting so flustered just
thinking about it! Oof...
jpnChrName: ダ、ダメっ…… 私には刺激が強すぎますってば～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
ダ、ダメっ……
私には刺激が強すぎますってば～っ！！

engChrName: Man, only you could say that kinda shit with a straight face.
engSearchText:
Man, only you could say that kinda shit with a
straight face.
jpnChrName: ……お前さんの“萌え”ポイントが 理解できないんだが？
jpnSearchText:
……お前さんの“萌え”ポイントが
理解できないんだが？

engChrName: EEEP!
engSearchText: EEEP!

engChrName: O-Oh, my goodness! I didn't see you see there! M-May I ask your name, sir?
engSearchText:
O-Oh, my goodness! I didn't see you see there!
M-May I ask your name, sir?
jpnChrName: あっ、あのっ…… お名前、聞いてもいいですかっ！？
jpnSearchText:
あっ、あのっ……
お名前、聞いてもいいですかっ！？

engChrName: Huh? Me? Well, I go by Bergard Zeman these days.
engSearchText: Huh? Me? Well, I go by Bergard Zeman these days.
jpnChrName: ふむ……？　私の事だろうか？ 今はベルガルド・ゼーマンと名乗っているが。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……？　私の事だろうか？
今はベルガルド・ゼーマンと名乗っているが。

engChrName: Oooh, Bergard, is it? You're so burly and handsome! Can I... Can I call you 'sir'? I'm sorry, MAY I call you 'sir'? Teehee!
engSearchText:
Oooh, Bergard, is it? You're so burly and handsome!
Can I... Can I call you 'sir'? I'm sorry, MAY I call
you 'sir'? Teehee!
jpnChrName: ゼーマン様……きゅん㈱ 逞しくてすす、素敵ですっ！
jpnSearchText:
ゼーマン様……きゅん㈱
逞しくてすす、素敵ですっ！

engChrName: Oh, no. Don't tell me...
engSearchText: Oh, no. Don't tell me...
jpnChrName: こ、これはもしかして……
jpnSearchText: こ、これはもしかして……

engChrName: Has she ALREADY fallen for him?
engSearchText: Has she ALREADY fallen for him?
jpnChrName: 一目惚れ、でしょうか！？
jpnSearchText: 一目惚れ、でしょうか！？

engChrName: *sigh* Think we already know the answer, but...well? You fall for him?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Think we already know the answer, but...well?
You fall for him?
jpnChrName: あー、念のため聞いておくが ……その心は？
jpnSearchText:
あー、念のため聞いておくが
……その心は？

engChrName: I mean, how could I NOT? He's just so big and strong... I bet I could poke him full of holes and he'd never leave me!
engSearchText:
I mean, how could I NOT? He's just so big
and strong... I bet I could poke him full of holes and
he'd never leave me!
jpnChrName: だ、だって……見るからに頑丈で 沢山刺しても死ななさそうなんですもん～㈱
jpnSearchText:
だ、だって……見るからに頑丈で
沢山刺しても死ななさそうなんですもん～㈱

engChrName: ...Oops! Did I say that out loud? Oh, no! You weren't supposed to hear that! Now my secret is out! I'm so embarrassed. So embarrassed...
engSearchText:
...Oops! Did I say that out loud? Oh, no! You weren't
supposed to hear that! Now my secret is out! I'm
so embarrassed. So embarrassed...
jpnChrName: きゃっ、言っちゃったぁ～！！
jpnSearchText: きゃっ、言っちゃったぁ～！！

engChrName: The hell you are. You don't have an innocent bone in your body.
engSearchText:
The hell you are. You don't have an innocent bone in
your body.
jpnChrName: 何テレてやがんだ…… 純情のカケラもねーぞ。
jpnSearchText:
何テレてやがんだ……
純情のカケラもねーぞ。

engChrName: I'm flattered, miss. Thank you. Unfortunately, I have decided to remain single for the rest of my life.
engSearchText:
I'm flattered, miss. Thank you. Unfortunately, I have
decided to remain single for the rest of my life.
jpnChrName: ふむ、残念だが余生は 独りで送ると決めていてな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、残念だが余生は
独りで送ると決めていてな。

engChrName: Aww! But, sirrr! We would go together so well! Won't you please reconsider? Please?
engSearchText:
Aww! But, sirrr! We would go together so well!
Won't you please reconsider? Please?
jpnChrName: ああん、そんなぁ～……！
jpnSearchText: ああん、そんなぁ～……！

engChrName: (Phew. So much for that romance.)
engSearchText: (Phew. So much for that romance.)
jpnChrName: （短い恋、でしたね……）
jpnSearchText: （短い恋、でしたね……）

engChrName: Bergard Zeman... If only we had met sooner. We could've done amazing things together, sir. Really amazing things...
engSearchText:
Bergard Zeman... If only we had met sooner.
We could've done amazing things together, sir.
Really amazing things...
jpnChrName: ゼーマン様……残念です…… もっと早くにお会いしていれば、きっと……
jpnSearchText:
ゼーマン様……残念です……
もっと早くにお会いしていれば、きっと……

engChrName: (I'm...not sure you ever DID have a chance.)
engSearchText: (I'm...not sure you ever DID have a chance.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、可能性、あったんでしょうか……？）
jpnSearchText: （うーん、可能性、あったんでしょうか……？）

engChrName: (Yeah, no. I give her about half an hour before she finds some other guy to drool over.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, no. I give her about half an hour before she
finds some other guy to drool over.)
jpnChrName: （つーかコイツは惚れたいだけだろ……）
jpnSearchText: （つーかコイツは惚れたいだけだろ……）

engChrName: (Truly, the Goddess has blessed our world with many kinds of people. Many, many kinds.)
engSearchText:
(Truly, the Goddess has blessed our world with many
kinds of people. Many, many kinds.)
jpnChrName: （ふむ……世俗には   様々な人間がいるものだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふむ……世俗には
様々な人間がいるものだな。）

engChrName: The Blacklight District is back to normal after what happened, but... *sigh* It's so boring now. There's been nothing to excite me.
engSearchText:
The Blacklight District is back to normal after what
happened, but... *sigh* It's so boring now.
There's been nothing to excite me.
jpnChrName: あれから黒芒街も落ち着きましたけど…… はぁ、近頃どうも刺激がなくって……
jpnSearchText:
あれから黒芒街も落ち着きましたけど……
はぁ、近頃どうも刺激がなくって……

engChrName: It gets lonely living underground for so long... Haven't I put up with this enough? Don't you think I deserve to enjoy my life again? Don't you?!
engSearchText:
It gets lonely living underground for so long...
Haven't I put up with this enough? Don't you think I
deserve to enjoy my life again? Don't you?!
jpnChrName: やっぱり地下暮らしが長いとツライです。 私も潤いが欲しいですよ～っ！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり地下暮らしが長いとツライです。
私も潤いが欲しいですよ～っ！

engChrName: Hey, don't look at us—WE ain't on the run. You reap what you sow, lady.
engSearchText:
Hey, don't look at us—WE ain't on the run.
You reap what you sow, lady.
jpnChrName: んな事を俺たちに言われても困るんだがな。
jpnSearchText: んな事を俺たちに言われても困るんだがな。

engChrName: (Might not hurt to introduce her to our latest addition at the office. Give her someone new to talk to for once. Have to be careful, though...)
engSearchText:
(Might not hurt to introduce her to our latest
addition at the office. Give her someone new to talk
to for once. Have to be careful, though...)
jpnChrName: （まあ新しい面子で回るのも   アリかもしれねえが……）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ新しい面子で回るのも
アリかもしれねえが……）

engChrName: From the sounds of it, they've got cops everywhere patrolling the streets above.
engSearchText:
From the sounds of it, they've got cops everywhere
patrolling the streets above.
jpnChrName: なんでも地上は警察が たくさん見回りをしているとか……
jpnSearchText:
なんでも地上は警察が
たくさん見回りをしているとか……

engChrName: I doubt they'll come down here, but it's hard not to be nervous knowing they're close by...
engSearchText:
I doubt they'll come down here, but it's hard not to be
nervous knowing they're close by...
jpnChrName: ううっ、ここまでは来ないと思いますけど なんだか落ち着かないです……
jpnSearchText:
ううっ、ここまでは来ないと思いますけど
なんだか落ち着かないです……

engChrName: *sigh* How much longer must I wait until I can finally, finally leave here and feel the sun on my skin again? I miss the outside world...
engSearchText:
*sigh* How much longer must I wait until I can
finally, finally leave here and feel the sun on my
skin again? I miss the outside world...
jpnChrName: はあ、いつになったら 日の当たる所で暮らせるんだろ～……
jpnSearchText:
はあ、いつになったら
日の当たる所で暮らせるんだろ～……

engChrName: I've loved books for as long as I remember. Nowadays, they're the only things that can mend my broken heart.
engSearchText:
I've loved books for as long as I remember.
Nowadays, they're the only things that can mend my
broken heart.
jpnChrName: 元々本は好きだったんですけど…… 今となっては唯一の癒しです～♪
jpnSearchText:
元々本は好きだったんですけど……
今となっては唯一の癒しです～♪

engChrName: Ooh, like this book here! It talks about all the gruesome ways they used to execute people in the Middle Ages!
engSearchText:
Ooh, like this book here! It talks about all the
gruesome ways they used to execute people in the
Middle Ages!
jpnChrName: ほら、これなんて中世の 惨（むご）たらしい処刑法が沢山載ってて……
jpnSearchText:
ほら、これなんて中世の
惨（むご）たらしい処刑法が沢山載ってて……

engChrName: Every page is just dripping with so much love! Oh, it's irresistible! Just... O-Oh, no! Did I say that out loud? Teehee! ㈱
engSearchText:
Every page is just dripping with so much love! Oh,
it's irresistible! Just... O-Oh, no! Did I say that
out loud? Teehee! ㈱
jpnChrName: あ、愛を感じますよねっ！ ……きゃっ、言っちゃった～㈱
jpnSearchText:
あ、愛を感じますよねっ！
……きゃっ、言っちゃった～㈱

engChrName: (...Why'd I say hello to this chick? Ain't got a damn clue what she's on about.)
engSearchText:
(...Why'd I say hello to this chick? Ain't got a damn
clue what she's on about.)
jpnChrName: （相変わらず理解できんが……   口に出すだけ無駄かもな。）
jpnSearchText:
（相変わらず理解できんが……
口に出すだけ無駄かもな。）

engChrName: Books are the perfect friend for the lonely underground lady. You should buy some, too, Van! You'll love them just as much as I love you! ㈱
engSearchText:
Books are the perfect friend for the lonely
underground lady. You should buy some, too, Van!
You'll love them just as much as I love you! ㈱
jpnChrName: 本は寂しい地下暮らしのお供なんです。 ヴァンさんも、この本とか如何ですかっ！？
jpnSearchText:
本は寂しい地下暮らしのお供なんです。
ヴァンさんも、この本とか如何ですかっ！？

engChrName: If my math's right, then the warrant they have out for me should expire after three years.
engSearchText:
If my math's right, then the warrant they have out for
me should expire after three years.
jpnChrName: 私の指名手配、３年くらいで 取り消されると思うんですよね！
jpnSearchText:
私の指名手配、３年くらいで
取り消されると思うんですよね！

engChrName: It's been two years since the stabbing, so just a little more time and then...then I can leave! Leave and live a life full of love again!
engSearchText:
It's been two years since the stabbing, so just a little
more time and then...then I can leave! Leave and live
a life full of love again!
jpnChrName: この前刺しちゃったのは２年前だし、 あとちょっと……！
jpnSearchText:
この前刺しちゃったのは２年前だし、
あとちょっと……！

engChrName: I'd really love to go to a café up on the surface and enjoy a nice drink.
engSearchText:
I'd really love to go to a café up on the surface and
enjoy a nice drink.
jpnChrName: ……たまには地上のカフェに行って お茶したいな～なんて思うけど……
jpnSearchText:
……たまには地上のカフェに行って
お茶したいな～なんて思うけど……

engChrName: Soon! Soon I finally can! I just have to be patient and hang in there a little longer...
engSearchText:
Soon! Soon I finally can! I just have to be patient and
hang in there a little longer...
jpnChrName: ダメダメ、今は我慢！ もう少しだけ頑張らないと！！
jpnSearchText:
ダメダメ、今は我慢！
もう少しだけ頑張らないと！！

engChrName: There are so many scary people down here. And none of the shops here are all that trendy. It stinks... REALLY stinks.
engSearchText:
There are so many scary people down here. And none
of the shops here are all that trendy. It stinks...
REALLY stinks.
jpnChrName: ここは怖い人も多いし オシャレな店も全然ないし……
jpnSearchText:
ここは怖い人も多いし
オシャレな店も全然ないし……

engChrName: But I have to be patient! I can do this! I'm so close, I can TASTE the freedom! The freedom to love whoever I want, however I want!
engSearchText:
But I have to be patient! I can do this! I'm so close, I
can TASTE the freedom! The freedom to love
whoever I want, however I want!
jpnChrName: ……でもあとちょっとの辛抱ですよね！ うん、頑張らないと！
jpnSearchText:
……でもあとちょっとの辛抱ですよね！
うん、頑張らないと！

engChrName: O-Oh, my goodness! Is that... Is that you, Van? It is, isn't it?! Oh, my beloved fourth boyfriend has finally returned to me!
engSearchText:
O-Oh, my goodness! Is that... Is that you, Van? It is,
isn't it?! Oh, my beloved fourth boyfriend has finally
returned to me!
jpnChrName: あっ！　あのぅ…… 私の４人目の彼氏のヴァンさんですよね！？
jpnSearchText:
あっ！　あのぅ……
私の４人目の彼氏のヴァンさんですよね！？

engChrName: ...What.
engSearchText: ...What.

engChrName: Damn, chief. Save some girls for the rest of us. What chick in this town DON'T you have crawling all over you?
engSearchText:
Damn, chief. Save some girls for the rest of us.
What chick in this town DON'T you have crawling
all over you?
jpnChrName: オイオイオイ…… 所長殿も隅に置けねえなァ？
jpnSearchText:
オイオイオイ……
所長殿も隅に置けねえなァ？

engChrName: Oh, for—I'm OLD, not INSANE! You really think I'd get with a girl like her?! Piss off!
engSearchText:
Oh, for—I'm OLD, not INSANE! You really think
I'd get with a girl like her?! Piss off!
jpnChrName: チ ガ イ マ ス。 ──誰が彼氏だ、誰が！！
jpnSearchText:
チ ガ イ マ ス。
──誰が彼氏だ、誰が！！

engChrName: B-But...no! You saved me! You held my hand and rescued me from those awful, no-good cops on my tail...
engSearchText:
B-But...no! You saved me! You held my hand and
rescued me from those awful, no-good cops on
my tail...
jpnChrName: だってあの時助けてくれたじゃないですか～！ 迫りくる警察、私の手を強く握って……
jpnSearchText:
だってあの時助けてくれたじゃないですか～！
迫りくる警察、私の手を強く握って……

engChrName: You were my knight in shining armor, saving me from those false charges. Just remembering it gives me butterflies. *sigh* ㈱
engSearchText:
You were my knight in shining armor, saving me
from those false charges. Just remembering it gives
me butterflies. *sigh* ㈱
jpnChrName: 無実の罪から救い出してくれた力強い背中…… はぁ、今でもドキドキしますっ㈱
jpnSearchText:
無実の罪から救い出してくれた力強い背中……
はぁ、今でもドキドキしますっ㈱

engChrName: ...Yeah, uh, if those charges were false, then I'm Sheena Dirke. Bullshit, lady.
engSearchText:
...Yeah, uh, if those charges were false, then I'm
Sheena Dirke. Bullshit, lady.
jpnChrName: お前は無実じゃなかっただろ……
jpnSearchText: お前は無実じゃなかっただろ……

engChrName: You really oughta kick that habit of yours, stabbin' every guy you fall for like they're some kinda cork board.
engSearchText:
You really oughta kick that habit of yours, stabbin'
every guy you fall for like they're some kinda
cork board.
jpnChrName: 惚れっぽい上に“惚れた相手を刺したくなる” その性格、いい加減どうにかしろっつの。
jpnSearchText:
惚れっぽい上に“惚れた相手を刺したくなる”
その性格、いい加減どうにかしろっつの。

engChrName: Wait, what did you say she does?
engSearchText: Wait, what did you say she does?
jpnChrName: えっと、惚れた相手を……？
jpnSearchText: えっと、惚れた相手を……？

engChrName: Pardon me if this sounds like an obvious question, but...may I ask why you go to such lengths?
engSearchText:
Pardon me if this sounds like an obvious question,
but...may I ask why you go to such lengths?
jpnChrName: それはまた……理由をお伺いしても よろしいでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
それはまた……理由をお伺いしても
よろしいでしょうか？

engChrName: Teehee! Oh, that's just so embarrassing! Are you really going to make me answer?
engSearchText:
Teehee! Oh, that's just so embarrassing! Are you
really going to make me answer?
jpnChrName: え？　だって好きになったら 相手の全部、手に入れたいじゃないですか～。
jpnSearchText:
え？　だって好きになったら
相手の全部、手に入れたいじゃないですか～。

engChrName: I mean, what WON'T a girl do for love? She'll do whatever it takes to make a man hers—each and every last rege of him! It's only natural! ㈱
engSearchText:
I mean, what WON'T a girl do for love? She'll do
whatever it takes to make a man hers—each and every
last rege of him! It's only natural! ㈱
jpnChrName: やだも～、言わせないでくださいよぉっ㈱
jpnSearchText: やだも～、言わせないでくださいよぉっ㈱

engChrName: (This chick takes 'possessive' to a whole new level.)
engSearchText: (This chick takes 'possessive' to a whole new level.)
jpnChrName: （いや、意味ちがわねーか？）
jpnSearchText: （いや、意味ちがわねーか？）

engChrName: (She's certainly a...unique person, even under her circumstances.)
engSearchText:
(She's certainly a...unique person, even under
her circumstances.)
jpnChrName: （こ、個性的な方、みたいですね……   ……事情は分かりましたけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（こ、個性的な方、みたいですね……
……事情は分かりましたけど……）

engChrName: (Hold on. Doesn't that mean...?)
engSearchText: (Hold on. Doesn't that mean...?)
jpnChrName: （あれ、でもって事は……？）
jpnSearchText: （あれ、でもって事は……？）

engChrName: (Van could be next! His life's in danger!)
engSearchText: (Van could be next! His life's in danger!)
jpnChrName: （次はヴァンさんの命が危ないです！！）
jpnSearchText: （次はヴァンさんの命が危ないです！！）

engChrName: (The hell it is! I just told you, she and I are NOT a thing. Period.)
engSearchText:
(The hell it is! I just told you, she and I are NOT
a thing. Period.)
jpnChrName: （だから彼氏じゃねえんだっつの……）
jpnSearchText: （だから彼氏じゃねえんだっつの……）

engChrName: It's only normal for a girl in love to be a little possessive! Her man should be ALL hers! ㈱
engSearchText:
It's only normal for a girl in love to be a
little possessive! Her man should be ALL hers! ㈱
jpnChrName: 私、好きになった人は 全部手に入れたいんです！　だから……
jpnSearchText:
私、好きになった人は
全部手に入れたいんです！　だから……

engChrName: That's why I stab every boyfriend of mine, like a little pin cushion! And then, when I'm done, I tell them I'm breaking up with them...
engSearchText:
That's why I stab every boyfriend of mine, like a little
pin cushion! And then, when I'm done, I tell them
I'm breaking up with them...
jpnChrName: 今までの彼氏はみんな刺しちゃって、 そしたら別れたいって言い出して……
jpnSearchText:
今までの彼氏はみんな刺しちゃって、
そしたら別れたいって言い出して……

engChrName: *sigh* Why does it have to be like this? Why do the police always get involved when it's just a tiny little argument? It makes no sense...
engSearchText:
*sigh* Why does it have to be like this? Why do the
police always get involved when it's just a tiny
little argument? It makes no sense...
jpnChrName: はぁ、どうしてこうなっちゃうんだろ。 いつも警察沙汰になっちゃいますし～……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、どうしてこうなっちゃうんだろ。
いつも警察沙汰になっちゃいますし～……

engChrName: Oh, well. For now, I'm laying low until things cool down. I have you to thank for making it all possible, my love...
engSearchText:
Oh, well. For now, I'm laying low until things
cool down. I have you to thank for making it all
possible, my love...
jpnChrName: とにかく、ヴァンさんの計らいで ほとぼりが冷めるまで、身を隠してるんです。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、ヴァンさんの計らいで
ほとぼりが冷めるまで、身を隠してるんです。

engChrName: Anyway, I like to collect books in my free time! Feel free to look around and see if any of them interest you.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I like to collect books in my free time!
Feel free to look around and see if any of them
interest you.
jpnChrName: 趣味で本も置いてるので もし良かったら見てくださいね～！
jpnSearchText:
趣味で本も置いてるので
もし良かったら見てくださいね～！

engChrName: (For a collection of books, these make for a...rather stark selection, I must say.)
engSearchText:
(For a collection of books, these make for a...rather
stark selection, I must say.)
jpnChrName: （本ですか……   ですがこのラインナップは……）
jpnSearchText:
（本ですか……
ですがこのラインナップは……）

engChrName: (Yeah, she has a lot of romance novels and...erm. Prison diaries. She certainly has very specific tastes.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, she has a lot of romance novels and...erm.
Prison diaries. She certainly has very specific tastes.)
jpnChrName: （恋愛物に獄中記……   か、偏りが激しいような……）
jpnSearchText:
（恋愛物に獄中記……
か、偏りが激しいような……）

engChrName: (Smile and wave, gang, smile and wave. You try to actually hold a conversation with her and she'll break your mind in half.)
engSearchText:
(Smile and wave, gang, smile and wave. You try to
actually hold a conversation with her and she'll break
your mind in half.)
jpnChrName: （適当に流しとけ。   まともに相手してたら身が持たねえぞ。）
jpnSearchText:
（適当に流しとけ。
まともに相手してたら身が持たねえぞ。）

engChrName: I got in touch with the kids over in Old Town. That's one less thing to worry about, at least.
engSearchText:
I got in touch with the kids over in Old Town.
That's one less thing to worry about, at least.
jpnChrName: 旧市街にいる子供たちとも連絡がついてね。 うんうん、良かった良かった。
jpnSearchText:
旧市街にいる子供たちとも連絡がついてね。
うんうん、良かった良かった。

engChrName: Now I need to do what I can to help down here. That way, when I get back home, I can tell them I did my part!
engSearchText:
Now I need to do what I can to help down here.
That way, when I get back home, I can tell them I
did my part!
jpnChrName: あの子達に胸を張れるように 僕も頑張らないとなぁ、ははは。
jpnSearchText:
あの子達に胸を張れるように
僕も頑張らないとなぁ、ははは。

engChrName: It seems there's some big operation that's about to kick off soon. Can I help with supplies at all?
engSearchText:
It seems there's some big operation that's about to
kick off soon. Can I help with supplies at all?
jpnChrName: なんでも大きな作戦を始めるらしいし、 物資面で協力させてもらおうかな？
jpnSearchText:
なんでも大きな作戦を始めるらしいし、
物資面で協力させてもらおうかな？

engChrName: *sigh* Well, quite the fine mess we've found ourselves in, isn't it?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Well, quite the fine mess we've found ourselves
in, isn't it?
jpnChrName: やあ、なんだか大変な事に なってしまったみたいだねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
やあ、なんだか大変な事に
なってしまったみたいだねぇ。

engChrName: I'm concerned about the kids over in Old Town, but they should be okay. They're a tough bunch, I think they can handle themselves.
engSearchText:
I'm concerned about the kids over in Old Town, but
they should be okay. They're a tough bunch, I think
they can handle themselves.
jpnChrName: 旧市街にいる子供たちも心配だけど、 まああの子達なら大丈夫なはずさ。
jpnSearchText:
旧市街にいる子供たちも心配だけど、
まああの子達なら大丈夫なはずさ。

engChrName: Are the lot of you headed out? If you need any work done before you go, I'm more than happy to help.
engSearchText:
Are the lot of you headed out? If you need any work
done before you go, I'm more than happy to help.
jpnChrName: それで、君たちはどこかへ行くのかな？ 良ければ工房仕事を引き受けようか？
jpnSearchText:
それで、君たちはどこかへ行くのかな？
良ければ工房仕事を引き受けようか？

engChrName: I do know how to tune a Xipha. I'm sure you folks can always use someone like that, no?
engSearchText:
I do know how to tune a Xipha. I'm sure you folks
can always use someone like that, no?
jpnChrName: 一応ザイファ調整の心得もあってね。 多少の力にはなれるはずさ。
jpnSearchText:
一応ザイファ調整の心得もあってね。
多少の力にはなれるはずさ。

engChrName: It won't do to panic. We must keep calm and get a read on the situation—knee-jerk reactions will only come back to bite us.
engSearchText:
It won't do to panic. We must keep calm and get a
read on the situation—knee-jerk reactions will only
come back to bite us.
jpnChrName: まあこんな時は慌てても仕方ない。 状況を見極めるのが先決だろうね。
jpnSearchText:
まあこんな時は慌てても仕方ない。
状況を見極めるのが先決だろうね。

engChrName: Either way, I'm glad I was able to stock up on all these Xipha parts before all hell broke loose.
engSearchText:
Either way, I'm glad I was able to stock up on all
these Xipha parts before all hell broke loose.
jpnChrName: それにしても、ザイファ関連の資材を 沢山仕入れておいて良かったよ。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、ザイファ関連の資材を
沢山仕入れておいて良かったよ。

engChrName: Hopefully, they can be of use to the people down here.
engSearchText: Hopefully, they can be of use to the people down here.
jpnChrName: 多少は黒芒街の人たちの 力にもなれるかもしれないねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
多少は黒芒街の人たちの
力にもなれるかもしれないねぇ。

engChrName: That Yimai, haha. He never changes, does he?
engSearchText: That Yimai, haha. He never changes, does he?
jpnChrName: はは、イーマイさんも変わらないなぁ～。
jpnSearchText: はは、イーマイさんも変わらないなぁ～。

engChrName: Now that I'm finally back in Edith, I'm going to give his lineup a good, long look. I can always count on him to stock the strangest things!
engSearchText:
Now that I'm finally back in Edith, I'm going to give
his lineup a good, long look. I can always count on
him to stock the strangest things!
jpnChrName: 折角首都に戻ってきたんだし、今日は 心行くまで珍品を見せてもらおうかな！
jpnSearchText:
折角首都に戻ってきたんだし、今日は
心行くまで珍品を見せてもらおうかな！

engChrName: Hey, you! What are you standing around for? You got anything better to do, huh? Move along.
engSearchText:
Hey, you! What are you standing around for? You got
anything better to do, huh? Move along.
jpnChrName: オイ何うろついてやがんだ？ お前ここで何してやがる。
jpnSearchText:
オイ何うろついてやがんだ？
お前ここで何してやがる。

engChrName: You just loitering or are you some kinda spy? Who do you work for, huh? Hey! Answer me, punk!
engSearchText:
You just loitering or are you some kinda spy? Who do
you work for, huh? Hey! Answer me, punk!
jpnChrName: マフィアどものスパイじゃねえだろうな。 どうやってここに来た？
jpnSearchText:
マフィアどものスパイじゃねえだろうな。
どうやってここに来た？

engChrName: Eeek! N-No sir, I'm not a spy! I-I-I'm just lost and I don't know where to go or what to do! P-Please, can you help me?!
engSearchText:
Eeek! N-No sir, I'm not a spy! I-I-I'm just lost and I
don't know where to go or what to do! P-Please, can
you help me?!
jpnChrName: ひえぇぇ……っ！！　そそその道に迷ってッ！ 僕もさっぱり分からないっていうか～～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
ひえぇぇ……っ！！　そそその道に迷ってッ！
僕もさっぱり分からないっていうか～～っ！！

engChrName: ...Oh. Just a normal-ass civvie. Heh, no wonder you're shaking in your boots. Haven't been down here before, huh?
engSearchText:
...Oh. Just a normal-ass civvie. Heh, no wonder you're
shaking in your boots. Haven't been down here
before, huh?
jpnChrName: なんだ民間人か。 確かに情けない顔立ちだ。
jpnSearchText:
なんだ民間人か。
確かに情けない顔立ちだ。

engChrName: Take my advice: find a bar and lie low. We're about to round up these monsters and put 'em down— gonna get real nasty, real fast. Got it?
engSearchText:
Take my advice: find a bar and lie low. We're about
to round up these monsters and put 'em down—
gonna get real nasty, real fast. Got it?
jpnChrName: オイ、これから化け物の掃討に出る予定でな。 この辺りは騒がしくなるから酒場で休んでな。
jpnSearchText:
オイ、これから化け物の掃討に出る予定でな。
この辺りは騒がしくなるから酒場で休んでな。

engChrName: Y-Yes sir! Thanks for letting me know! (...Huh! That guy was surprisingly nice!)
engSearchText:
Y-Yes sir! Thanks for letting me know!
(...Huh! That guy was surprisingly nice!)
jpnChrName: は、はいぃっ……！！ （ってあれなんだかメッチャ親切～！？）
jpnSearchText:
は、はいぃっ……！！
（ってあれなんだかメッチャ親切～！？）

engChrName: We're about to start clearing out the monsters here— civvies like you'd best get outta the way. Bar's over that way, yeah?
engSearchText:
We're about to start clearing out the monsters here—
civvies like you'd best get outta the way. Bar's over
that way, yeah?
jpnChrName: 近場に湧いた化け物どもを討伐するのさ。 民間人は酒場で休んでな。
jpnSearchText:
近場に湧いた化け物どもを討伐するのさ。
民間人は酒場で休んでな。

engChrName: Might find some thugs in there, but most of 'em are frozen over or whatever shit that is. Just stay calm and don't make a fuss.
engSearchText:
Might find some thugs in there, but most of 'em are
frozen over or whatever shit that is. Just stay calm and
don't make a fuss.
jpnChrName: ここを下ったらすぐに酒場だ、大抵のゴロツキは “停まって”るが、大人しくしてろよ？
jpnSearchText:
ここを下ったらすぐに酒場だ、大抵のゴロツキは
“停まって”るが、大人しくしてろよ？

engChrName: (That's all I have to do? Wow, I guess these guys aren't as bad as they seem! Okay... I can do this! No problem!)
engSearchText:
(That's all I have to do? Wow, I guess these guys
aren't as bad as they seem! Okay... I can do this!
No problem!)
jpnChrName: （道順も分かりやすっ……！   なんて親切な人たちなんだ──っ！！）
jpnSearchText:
（道順も分かりやすっ……！
なんて親切な人たちなんだ──っ！！）

engChrName: Eeek! How did I get here?! I was just running away from those monsters and now I'm... Where AM I?!
engSearchText:
Eeek! How did I get here?! I was just running away
from those monsters and now I'm... Where AM I?!
jpnChrName: ひえぇぇ……っ！！　駅前にバケモノが現れて── 逃げ回ってたらこんな所に来ちゃったよ！！
jpnSearchText:
ひえぇぇ……っ！！　駅前にバケモノが現れて──
逃げ回ってたらこんな所に来ちゃったよ！！

engChrName: I'm just completely lost. I have no idea how to get out, either. Why is this happening to me...?
engSearchText:
I'm just completely lost. I have no idea how to get
out, either. Why is this happening to me...?
jpnChrName: 途中で道に迷ったんだよな…… 一体どうやってきたんだっけか……
jpnSearchText:
途中で道に迷ったんだよな……
一体どうやってきたんだっけか……

engChrName: I have no idea what's going on up above, either. Not that it matters when I doubt I'm ever going to make it out anyway, ahaha! Ahahaha!
engSearchText:
I have no idea what's going on up above, either.
Not that it matters when I doubt I'm ever going to
make it out anyway, ahaha! Ahahaha!
jpnChrName: 何が起きてるのかさっぱりだけど── うん、戻れる気がしないなっ、アハハ！
jpnSearchText:
何が起きてるのかさっぱりだけど──
うん、戻れる気がしないなっ、アハハ！

engChrName: Huh. Well, hello there. You know, I always had a feeling you frequented this place—guess I was right after all.
engSearchText:
Huh. Well, hello there. You know, I always had a
feeling you frequented this place—guess I was right
after all.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋……やはりここにも出入りしていたのか。 フン、そんな所だろうと思ったが……
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋……やはりここにも出入りしていたのか。
フン、そんな所だろうと思ったが……

engChrName: Anyway, let's just stay in our own lanes here, all right? I'll look the other way if you do.
engSearchText:
Anyway, let's just stay in our own lanes here, all right?
I'll look the other way if you do.
jpnChrName: ともかくここで俺たちが何をしても関係ないはずだ。 口出ししないでもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
ともかくここで俺たちが何をしても関係ないはずだ。
口出ししないでもらおうか？

engChrName: (Not even tryin' to play it cool this time. Well, fine by me—I ain't got nothin' to do with you, anyway.)
engSearchText:
(Not even tryin' to play it cool this time. Well, fine by
me—I ain't got nothin' to do with you, anyway.)
jpnChrName: （１リジュたりともカッコがついてねえが……   今は突っ込まないでおいてやるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（１リジュたりともカッコがついてねえが……
今は突っ込まないでおいてやるか。）

engChrName: It's been a hot minute since I last checked this place. They've got a really nice lineup today.
engSearchText:
It's been a hot minute since I last checked this place.
They've got a really nice lineup today.
jpnChrName: へえ、久々に来たが 面白いラインナップが揃ってるじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、久々に来たが
面白いラインナップが揃ってるじゃないか。

engChrName: Like this greatsword here. What do you think of it, Lahad?
engSearchText:
Like this greatsword here. What do you think of
it, Lahad?
jpnChrName: この大剣なんていかがです、ラハドさん？
jpnSearchText: この大剣なんていかがです、ラハドさん？

engChrName: It's pretty nice, yeah. Got this back alley blacksmith vibe to it... I like it.
engSearchText:
It's pretty nice, yeah. Got this back alley blacksmith
vibe to it... I like it.
jpnChrName: おお、結構好きだぜこういうの。 どこぞの裏工房の品みたいだが──
jpnSearchText:
おお、結構好きだぜこういうの。
どこぞの裏工房の品みたいだが──

engChrName: You two are way too comfortable here... I dunno how you do it. I can't stand these kinds of places.
engSearchText:
You two are way too comfortable here... I dunno how
you do it. I can't stand these kinds of places.
jpnChrName: 二人とも馴染みすぎですよ…… 俺はこういう場所は好みませんね。
jpnSearchText:
二人とも馴染みすぎですよ……
俺はこういう場所は好みませんね。

engChrName: Oh, don't be such a spoilsport, Alvis. A bracer is responsible for ALL citizens, no? Including the ones in the gutters.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't be such a spoilsport, Alvis. A bracer is
responsible for ALL citizens, no? Including the ones
in the gutters.
jpnChrName: はは、そう眉間にシワを作るなよ。 裏のトレンドを見ておくのも仕事の一環だろ？
jpnSearchText:
はは、そう眉間にシワを作るなよ。
裏のトレンドを見ておくのも仕事の一環だろ？

engChrName: Y'know, that's why Regina worries about you so much—you're always so high-strung on the job.
engSearchText:
Y'know, that's why Regina worries about you so
much—you're always so high-strung on the job.
jpnChrName: そんな調子だからレジーナちゃんに 余計な心配をだな……
jpnSearchText:
そんな調子だからレジーナちゃんに
余計な心配をだな……

engChrName: I mean...what? What does Regina have to do with that?
engSearchText:
I mean...what? What does Regina have to do
with that?
jpnChrName: おいユアン、なんでそこで レジーナが出てくるんだよ……？
jpnSearchText:
おいユアン、なんでそこで
レジーナが出てくるんだよ……？

engChrName: (Oh, for the love of Aidios, TAKE THE HINT! You big dense blockhead!)
engSearchText:
(Oh, for the love of Aidios, TAKE THE HINT!
You big dense blockhead!)
jpnChrName: （なにっ！？　こいつまさか   まだ気づいてないのか──！？）
jpnSearchText:
（なにっ！？　こいつまさか
まだ気づいてないのか──！？）

engChrName: *sigh* Okay, how about this: you two hold a competition between yourselves. The winner gets to take Regina on a dinner date.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Okay, how about this: you two hold a
competition between yourselves. The winner gets to
take Regina on a dinner date.
jpnChrName: あー、そんじゃあお前らで手合わせして 勝った方がレジーナを食事に誘うってのはどうだ。
jpnSearchText:
あー、そんじゃあお前らで手合わせして
勝った方がレジーナを食事に誘うってのはどうだ。

engChrName: Sounds good to me! I mean, I still don't get why you're bringing her up in this, but I'm not gonna lose either way! My pride's on the line!
engSearchText:
Sounds good to me! I mean, I still don't get why
you're bringing her up in this, but I'm not gonna lose
either way! My pride's on the line!
jpnChrName: いいでしょう──！！ 何故レジーナなのかは知りませんが必ず勝ちます！
jpnSearchText:
いいでしょう──！！
何故レジーナなのかは知りませんが必ず勝ちます！

engChrName: You were alarmingly quick to agree there... Wait, why would I have dinner with her? I have a girlfriend. This is just...
engSearchText:
You were alarmingly quick to agree there... Wait, why
would I have dinner with her? I have a girlfriend.
This is just...
jpnChrName: 即答かよ…… というか自分、彼女いるんですが……
jpnSearchText:
即答かよ……
というか自分、彼女いるんですが……

engChrName: ...Oh, whatever. Fine! You're on, and I'm not gonna lose! I swear on my honor as a B-rank bracer!
engSearchText:
...Oh, whatever. Fine! You're on, and I'm not
gonna lose! I swear on my honor as a B-rank bracer!
jpnChrName: とはいえＢ級として負けられません、 全力で行かせてもらいます！！
jpnSearchText:
とはいえＢ級として負けられません、
全力で行かせてもらいます！！

engChrName: ...Yes, the situation is a lot more insidious than we anticipated. Lots of unknowns roaming around down here.
engSearchText:
...Yes, the situation is a lot more insidious than
we anticipated. Lots of unknowns roaming around
down here.
jpnChrName: ──ええ、黒芒街（こちら）は想定以上に厄介な情勢です。 得体の知れない連中もかなり多くて……
jpnSearchText:
──ええ、黒芒街（こちら）は想定以上に厄介な情勢です。
得体の知れない連中もかなり多くて……

engChrName: There are no signs of A, either, which is rather unsettling... Right... Uh-huh.
engSearchText:
There are no signs of A, either, which is
rather unsettling... Right... Uh-huh.
jpnChrName: ただそれだけに《Ａ》の気配がないのが 逆に不気味で……ええ、ええ……
jpnSearchText:
ただそれだけに《Ａ》の気配がないのが
逆に不気味で……ええ、ええ……

engChrName: Understood. All right, I'll keep checking as I pull out. *sigh* Hopefully I still dig something up, but I'll just have to wait and see.
engSearchText:
Understood. All right, I'll keep checking as I pull out.
*sigh* Hopefully I still dig something up, but I'll just
have to wait and see.
jpnChrName: 分かりました、確認しつつ引き上げます。 ……なんとか尻尾が掴めるといいんですが……
jpnSearchText:
分かりました、確認しつつ引き上げます。
……なんとか尻尾が掴めるといいんですが……

engChrName: (The guild is really pulling out all the stops.)
engSearchText: (The guild is really pulling out all the stops.)
jpnChrName: （ギルドも必死に動向を追ってるようね……）
jpnSearchText: （ギルドも必死に動向を追ってるようね……）

engChrName: (But we shouldn't linger here. Let's get out of here before somebody recognizes me!)
engSearchText:
(But we shouldn't linger here. Let's get out of here
before somebody recognizes me!)
jpnChrName: （それはともかく、正体がバレるとマズイし   そろそろ行きましょ！）
jpnSearchText:
（それはともかく、正体がバレるとマズイし
そろそろ行きましょ！）

engChrName: (One of Calvard's best actresses, and you can't convince people you're someone else?)
engSearchText:
(One of Calvard's best actresses, and you can't
convince people you're someone else?)
jpnChrName: （ったく情けねえトップ女優だな……）
jpnSearchText: （ったく情けねえトップ女優だな……）

engChrName: (...You know, he does have a point.)
engSearchText: (...You know, he does have a point.)
jpnChrName: （あはははは……）
jpnSearchText: （あはははは……）

engChrName: Those two never change, do they? They've been like that ever since they were rookies.
engSearchText:
Those two never change, do they? They've been like
that ever since they were rookies.
jpnChrName: クック、こいつらも変わらねえなァ。 新人の頃に纏めて面倒見てた時のまんまだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クック、こいつらも変わらねえなァ。
新人の頃に纏めて面倒見てた時のまんまだぜ。

engChrName: The more things change, the more they stay the same. They're capable bracers now, but their old habits are hard to kick.
engSearchText:
The more things change, the more they stay
the same. They're capable bracers now, but their old
habits are hard to kick.
jpnChrName: ま、二人とも今や腕利きだ。 指導役としちゃ本望だが──
jpnSearchText:
ま、二人とも今や腕利きだ。
指導役としちゃ本望だが──

engChrName: Maybe that falls on me as their mentor... I've got room to improve myself, I reckon. I do need to do a better job of reining in Ewan.
engSearchText:
Maybe that falls on me as their mentor... I've got
room to improve myself, I reckon. I do need to do a
better job of reining in Ewan.
jpnChrName: コッチの方はまだまだっつーか…… ユアンもユアンでじれったい奴だからなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
コッチの方はまだまだっつーか……
ユアンもユアンでじれったい奴だからなぁ……

engChrName: Man, how does Alvis function with a head that dense? Hopefully once I get the guy to come to his senses, he and Regina...
engSearchText:
Man, how does Alvis function with a head
that dense? Hopefully once I get the guy to come to
his senses, he and Regina...
jpnChrName: アルヴィスときたら……まあいい、 ここで気づかせてやればレジーナちゃんも──
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィスときたら……まあいい、
ここで気づかせてやればレジーナちゃんも──

engChrName: ...Or, wait. He only gets to invite her to dinner if I lose. And if I lose, then I look bad, and if I look bad...
engSearchText:
...Or, wait. He only gets to invite her to dinner if
I lose. And if I lose, then I look bad, and if I
look bad...
jpnChrName: って待てよ、そのためにはオレが負けないと…… し、しかしそれではＢ級として……
jpnSearchText:
って待てよ、そのためにはオレが負けないと……
し、しかしそれではＢ級として……

engChrName: ...Okay, this is kind of a problem. What do I do? Should I just win and let him figure it out on his own? Hmm...
engSearchText:
...Okay, this is kind of a problem. What do I do?
Should I just win and let him figure it out on
his own? Hmm...
jpnChrName: ……彼女の手前、勝つのも…… むむ、どうすればいいんだ……？
jpnSearchText:
……彼女の手前、勝つのも……
むむ、どうすればいいんだ……？

engChrName: (Man, must suck bein' that dude's wingman. He's really fussin' over it.)
engSearchText:
(Man, must suck bein' that dude's wingman.
He's really fussin' over it.)
jpnChrName: （こいつも真面目か？   腕は立ちそうなのにやれやれだな……）
jpnSearchText:
（こいつも真面目か？
腕は立ちそうなのにやれやれだな……）

engChrName: I didn't expect I'd end up working with the Chief Giscard himself when I first came here for materials.
engSearchText:
I didn't expect I'd end up working with the Chief
Giscard himself when I first came here for materials.
jpnChrName: ……資材調達のつもりで来てみりゃ、あの名高い ジスカール技術長と一緒に仕事できるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
……資材調達のつもりで来てみりゃ、あの名高い
ジスカール技術長と一緒に仕事できるとはな。

engChrName: He and I have different specialties, but there's still plenty I can learn from him. It should be a good learning opportunity for Kaina, too.
engSearchText:
He and I have different specialties, but there's still
plenty I can learn from him. It should be a good
learning opportunity for Kaina, too.
jpnChrName: ま、専門は違うが職人としちゃ学ぶところはあるし、 カイナにも良い経験になるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ま、専門は違うが職人としちゃ学ぶところはあるし、
カイナにも良い経験になるだろう。

engChrName: But all that learning won't matter if we don't make it through today. We've gotta give this our all! You can count on me for support!
engSearchText:
But all that learning won't matter if we don't make it
through today. We've gotta give this our all! You can
count on me for support!
jpnChrName: ……その経験が活きる未来を守る為にも、 今は作戦のために全力でバックアップするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……その経験が活きる未来を守る為にも、
今は作戦のために全力でバックアップするぜ。

engChrName: This is all just...insane. Absolutely insane. If it turns out Almata is behind this, too, I swear to Aidios...
engSearchText:
This is all just...insane. Absolutely insane. If it turns
out Almata is behind this, too, I swear to Aidios...
jpnChrName: とんでもないことになってしまったけど…… これもアルマータの仕業だってんなら……
jpnSearchText:
とんでもないことになってしまったけど……
これもアルマータの仕業だってんなら……

engChrName: No, I can't dwell on this. I've gotta help Sylvie and the Chief however I can—they need us now!
engSearchText:
No, I can't dwell on this. I've gotta help Sylvie and
the Chief however I can—they need us now!
jpnChrName: あたしは、あいつらと戦う人達をシルヴィさんや ジスカール技術長と一緒に支えるまでだよ。
jpnSearchText:
あたしは、あいつらと戦う人達をシルヴィさんや
ジスカール技術長と一緒に支えるまでだよ。

engChrName: The guild's looking after Lashkar right now, which I really appreciate. That lets me focus on the fighting here!
engSearchText:
The guild's looking after Lashkar right now, which I
really appreciate. That lets me focus on the
fighting here!
jpnChrName: ラシュカルはギルドで預かってもらえたから 安心だし、あたしなりの戦いに専念できる！
jpnSearchText:
ラシュカルはギルドで預かってもらえたから
安心だし、あたしなりの戦いに専念できる！

engChrName: We'll use the power of technology to take down Almata. That's my way of getting revenge on them as a tradesman!
engSearchText:
We'll use the power of technology to take
down Almata. That's my way of getting revenge on
them as a tradesman!
jpnChrName: 技術の力でアルマータを倒す力になる。 これが、あたしの職人としての復讐だから……！
jpnSearchText:
技術の力でアルマータを倒す力になる。
これが、あたしの職人としての復讐だから……！

engChrName: I've really got a long way to go before I can reach Sylvie's level.
engSearchText:
I've really got a long way to go before I can reach
Sylvie's level.
jpnChrName: あたしはシルヴィさんなんかに比べれば まだまだ未熟ではあるけど……
jpnSearchText:
あたしはシルヴィさんなんかに比べれば
まだまだ未熟ではあるけど……

engChrName: But I'll still fight to the very end! Supporting all of you guys is my own little way of getting revenge on the bastards!
engSearchText:
But I'll still fight to the very end! Supporting all of
you guys is my own little way of getting revenge on
the bastards!
jpnChrName: それでも最後まで職人として戦いたい、 皆を支えて復讐を成し遂げたいんだ！
jpnSearchText:
それでも最後まで職人として戦いたい、
皆を支えて復讐を成し遂げたいんだ！

engChrName: So don't be afraid to ask me for any help you need! As Sylvie's assistant, I'm ready to do whatever it takes!
engSearchText:
So don't be afraid to ask me for any help you need!
As Sylvie's assistant, I'm ready to do whatever
it takes!
jpnChrName: だから……遠慮なく頼ってよ！　あたしも、 シルヴィさんの助手として死ぬ気でやるから！
jpnSearchText:
だから……遠慮なく頼ってよ！　あたしも、
シルヴィさんの助手として死ぬ気でやるから！

engChrName: Goodness me. I had no idea such a place existed so close to my apartment!
engSearchText:
Goodness me. I had no idea such a place existed so
close to my apartment!
jpnChrName: あらあら……まさかこんなところが マンションのご近所にあったなんて……
jpnSearchText:
あらあら……まさかこんなところが
マンションのご近所にあったなんて……

engChrName: I stumbled into here by accident—I was trying to follow a woman much faster than I.
engSearchText:
I stumbled into here by accident—I was trying to
follow a woman much faster than I.
jpnChrName: やたらと足の速いご婦人についてきて みたら、迷い込んでしまってねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
やたらと足の速いご婦人についてきて
みたら、迷い込んでしまってねぇ……

engChrName: I suppose it's relatively safe. There seem to be no monsters down here, at least... Still, just what have I gotten myself into?
engSearchText:
I suppose it's relatively safe. There seem to be no
monsters down here, at least... Still, just what have I
gotten myself into?
jpnChrName: まあ、ここは化け物もいないようだし、多少は 安全そうだけど……そもそもどういう場所なの？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ここは化け物もいないようだし、多少は
安全そうだけど……そもそもどういう場所なの？

engChrName: I really wanted to talk to that woman, but she seems to have disappeared. Where in the world could she have gone...?
engSearchText:
I really wanted to talk to that woman, but she seems
to have disappeared. Where in the world could she
have gone...?
