jpnChrName: あのご婦人も、お話してみたかったけど どこかに行ってしまったようだし……
jpnSearchText:
あのご婦人も、お話してみたかったけど
どこかに行ってしまったようだし……

engChrName: *huff* *huff* I am, of course, relieved that the mistress is unharmed. But why, oh, why did we have to end up in a place like this?
engSearchText:
*huff* *huff* I am, of course, relieved that the
mistress is unharmed. But why, oh, why did we have
to end up in a place like this?
jpnChrName: はぁ、はぁ……奥様に怪我が無かったのは 幸いですが、どうしてこんな事に……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、はぁ……奥様に怪我が無かったのは
幸いですが、どうしてこんな事に……

engChrName: It's so...disorderly. I shudder to think what the Master will have to say if my mistress succumbs to its degenerate proclivities.
engSearchText:
It's so...disorderly. I shudder to think what the Master
will have to say if my mistress succumbs to its
degenerate proclivities.
jpnChrName: それに、こんな乱れた場所など……もし奥様が 影響を受けたら旦那様に何と言われるか……
jpnSearchText:
それに、こんな乱れた場所など……もし奥様が
影響を受けたら旦那様に何と言われるか……

engChrName: *huff* *huff* Well...guess I haven't kicked the bucket just yet.
engSearchText:
*huff* *huff* Well...guess I haven't kicked the bucket
just yet.
jpnChrName: はぁ、はぁ……僕、生きてる……よな？
jpnSearchText: はぁ、はぁ……僕、生きてる……よな？

engChrName: Where the heck am I, though? Looks pretty crowded, but I don't recognize this area at all.
engSearchText:
Where the heck am I, though? Looks pretty crowded,
but I don't recognize this area at all.
jpnChrName: 化け物に追われて逃げてみれば、まさか こんな場所に迷い込むだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
化け物に追われて逃げてみれば、まさか
こんな場所に迷い込むだなんて……

engChrName: I was running from a bunch of monsters, turned down an alleyway, and here I was. I never imagined I'd find something like this!
engSearchText:
I was running from a bunch of monsters, turned
down an alleyway, and here I was. I never imagined
I'd find something like this!
jpnChrName: それなりに人がいるけど…… ここは一体どこなんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
それなりに人がいるけど……
ここは一体どこなんだ！？

engChrName: I'm just... I'm flabbergasted that I never heard about this place in all my years as a reporter.
engSearchText:
I'm just... I'm flabbergasted that I never heard about
this place in all my years as a reporter.
jpnChrName: 首都にこんな場所があるなんて 記者の僕ですら知らなかったよ……
jpnSearchText:
首都にこんな場所があるなんて
記者の僕ですら知らなかったよ……

engChrName: I hope Marielle and San are doing okay, too... They tend to have better luck with these things than I do, but I just can't help but worry.
engSearchText:
I hope Marielle and San are doing okay, too...
They tend to have better luck with these things than I
do, but I just can't help but worry.
jpnChrName: そういえば……マリエルは……サンは無事かな。 二人共僕と違って運は良い方だけど……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……マリエルは……サンは無事かな。
二人共僕と違って運は良い方だけど……

engChrName: Urgh! If I hadn't torn my stupid calf, I'd be running straight back to the Times office right now... *sigh*
engSearchText:
Urgh! If I hadn't torn my stupid calf, I'd be running
straight back to the Times office right now... *sigh*
jpnChrName: くっ、ふくらはぎが肉離れになっていなければ 一刻も早く通信社に戻りたいのに……
jpnSearchText:
くっ、ふくらはぎが肉離れになっていなければ
一刻も早く通信社に戻りたいのに……

engChrName: Of all the times to go and get myself hurt, why'd it have to be now? I swear, I really am cursed...
engSearchText:
Of all the times to go and get myself hurt, why'd it
have to be now? I swear, I really am cursed...
jpnChrName: こんな時に肉離れだなんて…… 僕は本当についていないな……
jpnSearchText:
こんな時に肉離れだなんて……
僕は本当についていないな……

engChrName: I heard the surface is all out of sorts. The Tyrell District is calming down, but it's panic everywhere else.
engSearchText:
I heard the surface is all out of sorts. The Tyrell
District is calming down, but it's panic
everywhere else.
jpnChrName: 地上でも色々動いてるんだってな……とりあえず、 タイレルも落ち着いたって話だが……
jpnSearchText:
地上でも色々動いてるんだってな……とりあえず、
タイレルも落ち着いたって話だが……

engChrName: I hope my dad and the girls are doing okay... I heard the movie theater's taking in a bunch of evacuees, so that's good.
engSearchText:
I hope my dad and the girls are doing okay... I heard
the movie theater's taking in a bunch of evacuees, so
that's good.
jpnChrName: 二人や親父の無事、信じて大丈夫だよな？ 映画館とかも随分人を受け入れてるらしいが……
jpnSearchText:
二人や親父の無事、信じて大丈夫だよな？
映画館とかも随分人を受け入れてるらしいが……

engChrName: What the hell is happening here?! First all those people get frozen, and now those freaking monsters are crawling everywhere!
engSearchText:
What the hell is happening here?! First all those
people get frozen, and now those freaking monsters
are crawling everywhere!
jpnChrName: おいおい……マジでどうなってるんだよ！？ 街の人らが止まったと思ったら化け物が出て……
jpnSearchText:
おいおい……マジでどうなってるんだよ！？
街の人らが止まったと思ったら化け物が出て……

engChrName: And now I'm in this weird-ass place, whatever it is... I'd be in trouble if I didn't find it, but still, why'd this all have to happen?!
engSearchText:
And now I'm in this weird-ass place, whatever it is...
I'd be in trouble if I didn't find it, but still, why'd this
all have to happen?!
jpnChrName: しかも、何だよこの場所は…… まあ、助かったから別に良いけど……
jpnSearchText:
しかも、何だよこの場所は……
まあ、助かったから別に良いけど……

engChrName: I wonder how the girls and my dad are doing... San and Marilyn had just split up when everything went down.
engSearchText:
I wonder how the girls and my dad are doing...
San and Marilyn had just split up when everything
went down.
jpnChrName: ……サンたちや親父は大丈夫かな…… サンたちとはさっき別れたばかりだが……
jpnSearchText:
……サンたちや親父は大丈夫かな……
サンたちとはさっき別れたばかりだが……

engChrName: Man, and my dad and I were starting to talk again, too. I thought this year was actually going to end on a nice note... So much for that.
engSearchText:
Man, and my dad and I were starting to talk
again, too. I thought this year was actually going to
end on a nice note... So much for that.
jpnChrName: ちくしょう、せっかく親父と話せて 少しは爽やかに１年終えられそうだったのに……
jpnSearchText:
ちくしょう、せっかく親父と話せて
少しは爽やかに１年終えられそうだったのに……

engChrName: Why did this have to happen? They don't deserve this... *sigh*
engSearchText:
Why did this have to happen? They don't
deserve this... *sigh*
jpnChrName: 何だってこんな事に……他の皆も 残念なんだろうなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
何だってこんな事に……他の皆も
残念なんだろうなぁ……

engChrName: Come on! Get 'em! No, not like that, you dumbass! Hook 'em! Right! RIGHT!
engSearchText:
Come on! Get 'em! No, not like that, you dumbass!
Hook 'em! Right! RIGHT!
jpnChrName: おらァ！　そこだァー！ ちげえだろ、右下から攻めやがれッ！
jpnSearchText:
おらァ！　そこだァー！
ちげえだろ、右下から攻めやがれッ！

engChrName: I thought I recognized that head of hair. Good fight, huh? You're pretty riled up there.
engSearchText:
I thought I recognized that head of hair. Good
fight, huh? You're pretty riled up there.
jpnChrName: 見覚えのある赤毛がいると思ったら…… 随分お楽しみじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
見覚えのある赤毛がいると思ったら……
随分お楽しみじゃねえか？

engChrName: Good fight is right. Got a grudge match going on. The one I was yelling at, he just barely lost to this other guy last time.
engSearchText:
Good fight is right. Got a grudge match going on.
The one I was yelling at, he just barely lost to this
other guy last time.
jpnChrName: 今日の試合は、僅差で負けた相手との リベンジマッチなんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
今日の試合は、僅差で負けた相手との
リベンジマッチなんだよ。

engChrName: He lost me my money, but I'll get it back this time! I got a hunch! C'mon, how about you throw some mira in, too? It's real hype shit!
engSearchText:
He lost me my money, but I'll get it back this time!
I got a hunch! C'mon, how about you throw some
mira in, too? It's real hype shit!
jpnChrName: あの時はスッちまったが、今日は間違いねえ！ なんならお前も賭けて行けっての！
jpnSearchText:
あの時はスッちまったが、今日は間違いねえ！
なんならお前も賭けて行けっての！

engChrName: *sigh* Didn't take long for 'em to reel you in, huh? Punks gonna punk, I guess.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Didn't take long for 'em to reel you in, huh?
Punks gonna punk, I guess.
jpnChrName: すっかり黒芒街に馴染みやがって…… ま、いずれこうなるとは思っちゃいたがな。
jpnSearchText:
すっかり黒芒街に馴染みやがって……
ま、いずれこうなるとは思っちゃいたがな。

engChrName: I've got buddies who are just as into all this as me. We like to bet on who wins.
engSearchText:
I've got buddies who are just as into all this as me.
We like to bet on who wins.
jpnChrName: 闘技場好きの仲間もいてな、 一緒に次の試合の予想とかもしてんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
闘技場好きの仲間もいてな、
一緒に次の試合の予想とかもしてんだよ。

engChrName: You should get in on the fun, chief. Once you start, you won't be able to stop.
engSearchText:
You should get in on the fun, chief. Once you start,
you won't be able to stop.
jpnChrName: なんならお前も混ざってみるか？ 意外とハマるもんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
なんならお前も混ざってみるか？
意外とハマるもんだぜ。

engChrName: I, too, am curious to see how this match ends.
engSearchText: I, too, am curious to see how this match ends.
jpnChrName: 私も勝負の行く末に 興味がないという訳でもないが。
jpnSearchText:
私も勝負の行く末に
興味がないという訳でもないが。

engChrName: If things do get out of hand, I'll step in and calm them down.
engSearchText:
If things do get out of hand, I'll step in and calm
them down.
jpnChrName: 度が過ぎるようであれば 私がなんとか諫めるとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
度が過ぎるようであれば
私がなんとか諫めるとしよう。

engChrName: Go ahead and do your rounds—I'll handle the rest.
engSearchText: Go ahead and do your rounds—I'll handle the rest.
jpnChrName: おぬしらは安心して街を回って来るといい。
jpnSearchText: おぬしらは安心して街を回って来るといい。

engChrName: So, Agnès tells me that you're going on something of a company retreat next week.
engSearchText:
So, Agnès tells me that you're going on something of
a company retreat next week.
jpnChrName: そういえばアニエスから聞いたけど 次の週末に社員旅行に行くんですって？
jpnSearchText:
そういえばアニエスから聞いたけど
次の週末に社員旅行に行くんですって？

engChrName: I must say, it sounds like fun! Perhaps I'll stow away inside someone's truck and come along for the ride.
engSearchText:
I must say, it sounds like fun! Perhaps I'll stow away
inside someone's truck and come along for the ride.
jpnChrName: いいわねぇ～、私もトランクに忍び込んで こっそり付いてっちゃおうかしら。
jpnSearchText:
いいわねぇ～、私もトランクに忍び込んで
こっそり付いてっちゃおうかしら。

engChrName: You might still be pretty short, but not as much as when we first met. Don't think you'll fit into anybody's suitcases anymore.
engSearchText:
You might still be pretty short, but not as much as
when we first met. Don't think you'll fit into
anybody's suitcases anymore.
jpnChrName: ５年前の仔猫の頃じゃあるまいし、 さすがに無理があんだろ……
jpnSearchText:
５年前の仔猫の頃じゃあるまいし、
さすがに無理があんだろ……

engChrName: But honestly, you don't have to go to all that trouble. You're welcome to tag along if you like. We owe you big time for all your help at Basel.
engSearchText:
But honestly, you don't have to go to all that trouble.
You're welcome to tag along if you like. We owe you
big time for all your help at Basel.
jpnChrName: しかしバーゼルじゃ相当世話になったし お前さんも招待の資格は十分以上にあるな。
jpnSearchText:
しかしバーゼルじゃ相当世話になったし
お前さんも招待の資格は十分以上にあるな。

engChrName: We got room for one more. You're in if you want it.
engSearchText: We got room for one more. You're in if you want it.
jpnChrName: 座席は勿論、部屋にも余裕がありそうだし、 その気なら来るかよ？
jpnSearchText:
座席は勿論、部屋にも余裕がありそうだし、
その気なら来るかよ？

engChrName: That's sweet of you to offer. Alas, I have plenty of obligations keeping me busy next week, so I'll have to pass.
engSearchText:
That's sweet of you to offer. Alas, I have plenty of
obligations keeping me busy next week, so I'll have
to pass.
jpnChrName: うふふ、お誘いは嬉しいけど遠慮しておくわ。 来週は片付けないといけないことが色々あって。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、お誘いは嬉しいけど遠慮しておくわ。
来週は片付けないといけないことが色々あって。

engChrName: That said, I hope you and your lovely assistants all get some very well-earned rest—Agnès especially.
engSearchText:
That said, I hope you and your lovely assistants all get
some very well-earned rest—Agnès especially.
jpnChrName: せいぜい助手さんたちと一緒に のんびり骨休めをしてきてちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい助手さんたちと一緒に
のんびり骨休めをしてきてちょうだい。

engChrName: She's been a real busy bee, between your work and the Student Council. Make sure you treat her well, all right?
engSearchText:
She's been a real busy bee, between your work and the
Student Council. Make sure you treat her well,
all right?
jpnChrName: 特にアニエス、生徒会の仕事も頑張ってるから ちゃんと労（いたわ）ってあげてね？
jpnSearchText:
特にアニエス、生徒会の仕事も頑張ってるから
ちゃんと労（いたわ）ってあげてね？

engChrName: Of course. I get I ain't the best influence, but I ain't a slave driver.
engSearchText:
Of course. I get I ain't the best influence, but I ain't a
slave driver.
jpnChrName: へいへい、分かってるっつの。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、分かってるっつの。

engChrName: (Renne could stand to take her own advice, too. That girl never stops. But, well, she has her friends and family to help with that, I guess.)
engSearchText:
(Renne could stand to take her own advice, too.
That girl never stops. But, well, she has her friends
and family to help with that, I guess.)
jpnChrName: （そういうコイツこそ骨休めが必要そうだが……   ま、それこそ家族やダチの役目ってところか。）
jpnSearchText:
（そういうコイツこそ骨休めが必要そうだが……
ま、それこそ家族やダチの役目ってところか。）

engChrName: Thinking about it, we HAVE known each other for quite some time, haven't we?
engSearchText:
Thinking about it, we HAVE known each other for
quite some time, haven't we?
jpnChrName: うふふ、思えば貴方との付き合いも それなりに長いのかしらね。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、思えば貴方との付き合いも
それなりに長いのかしらね。

engChrName: I met our intrepid reporter friend around the same time, too...
engSearchText:
I met our intrepid reporter friend around the same
time, too...
jpnChrName: ルポライターのお兄さんとも 同じ時期からの付き合いだし──
jpnSearchText:
ルポライターのお兄さんとも
同じ時期からの付き合いだし──

engChrName: ...I'm sorry. Should I not be dredging all of that back up?
engSearchText:
...I'm sorry. Should I not be dredging all of that
back up?
jpnChrName: って、この話はヤブヘビかしらね？
jpnSearchText: って、この話はヤブヘビかしらね？

engChrName: Heh. Yeah, I'd appreciate it, if I'm bein' real with you.
engSearchText:
Heh. Yeah, I'd appreciate it, if I'm bein' real
with you.
jpnChrName: はは、そうかもな。
jpnSearchText: はは、そうかもな。

engChrName: (Those were rough times for her, to put it lightly. She was walkin' through Gehenna...)
engSearchText:
(Those were rough times for her, to put it lightly.
She was walkin' through Gehenna...)
jpnChrName: （仔猫が元になった頃…… 確かに荒れてたよなぁ。）
jpnSearchText:
（仔猫が元になった頃……
確かに荒れてたよなぁ。）

engChrName: Not to change the subject, but it sounds like Buzzraider beat you guys to the punch the other day.
engSearchText:
Not to change the subject, but it sounds like
Buzzraider beat you guys to the punch the other day.
jpnChrName: おっと、そういや全然話は違うが、 《バズレイダー》に先を越されたそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
おっと、そういや全然話は違うが、
《バズレイダー》に先を越されたそうだな？

engChrName: Oh, the thing with Judith Lanster? Yeeeah... That they did. Our editor gave me an earful about it.
engSearchText:
Oh, the thing with Judith Lanster? Yeeeah...
That they did. Our editor gave me an earful about it.
jpnChrName: ああ、ランスター嬢の件か。 ウチ（メルド）の編集長からも嫌味を言われたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ランスター嬢の件か。
ウチ（メルド）の編集長からも嫌味を言われたよ。

engChrName: But, well, they beat us fair and square—nothing I can do about that. Now we just wait and see if their report actually holds water.
engSearchText:
But, well, they beat us fair and square—nothing I can
do about that. Now we just wait and see if their
report actually holds water.
jpnChrName: 今回はあちらさんの粘り勝ちだろう。 どこまで引っ張れるネタかは知らないが。
jpnSearchText:
今回はあちらさんの粘り勝ちだろう。
どこまで引っ張れるネタかは知らないが。

engChrName: You said it. She's a ditz with capital DDs, but I just don't see her pullin' some midnight tryst for a dope like him.
engSearchText:
You said it. She's a ditz with capital DDs, but I just
don't see her pullin' some midnight tryst for a dope
like him.
jpnChrName: だよなぁ、あのお間抜け女優が 深夜に密会ってのもピンと来ないしよ。
jpnSearchText:
だよなぁ、あのお間抜け女優が
深夜に密会ってのもピンと来ないしよ。

engChrName: I can see HIM doing it, though, the horndog.
engSearchText: I can see HIM doing it, though, the horndog.
jpnChrName: 《紅い流星（マクシム・ルーガン）》の方はまあ、 調子に乗りそうなタイプだから納得だが。
jpnSearchText:
《紅い流星（マクシム・ルーガン）》の方はまあ、
調子に乗りそうなタイプだから納得だが。

engChrName: Hah. You got that right. I imagine the truth is somewhere in the middle—and we'll happen upon it soon enough.
engSearchText:
Hah. You got that right. I imagine the truth is
somewhere in the middle—and we'll happen upon it
soon enough.
jpnChrName: フフ、同感だ。 そのうち真相も明かされるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、同感だ。
そのうち真相も明かされるだろう。

engChrName: If there's anything this job's taught me, it's that the truth tends to show itself right when you least expect it.
engSearchText:
If there's anything this job's taught me, it's that the
truth tends to show itself right when you least
expect it.
jpnChrName: ふむ……ひょっとしたら 意外な所で分かるかもしれないぞ？
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……ひょっとしたら
意外な所で分かるかもしれないぞ？

engChrName: You might be on to somethin' there. That just your intuition talkin', or you keepin' secrets again?
engSearchText:
You might be on to somethin' there. That just your
intuition talkin', or you keepin' secrets again?
jpnChrName: なんだよ、思わせぶりだな。 まあ今に始まったことじゃねえが。
jpnSearchText:
なんだよ、思わせぶりだな。
まあ今に始まったことじゃねえが。

engChrName: Like with that Kitty case back in the spring. You knew what was up and you still kept your mouth shut. I haven't forgotten that, y'know.
engSearchText:
Like with that Kitty case back in the spring.
You knew what was up and you still kept your
mouth shut. I haven't forgotten that, y'know.
jpnChrName: 大体お前、春の仔猫絡みのヤマだって 分かってて俺に伏せてやがっただろ？
jpnSearchText:
大体お前、春の仔猫絡みのヤマだって
分かってて俺に伏せてやがっただろ？

engChrName: Oh, let go of that already. I just didn't want to interject myself into that whole debacle. Nothing more to it.
engSearchText:
Oh, let go of that already. I just didn't want to
interject myself into that whole debacle.
Nothing more to it.
jpnChrName: フッ、そう拗ねるな──変に俺が 出しゃばるのもどうかと思っただけさ。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、そう拗ねるな──変に俺が
出しゃばるのもどうかと思っただけさ。

engChrName: (Huh. Is it just me, or does Van seem to...loosen up around him? They talk to each other like they're brothers.)
engSearchText:
(Huh. Is it just me, or does Van seem to...loosen up
around him? They talk to each other like
they're brothers.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、何故かあのヴァンさんから   “年下み”を感じるんだけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、何故かあのヴァンさんから
“年下み”を感じるんだけど……）

engChrName: (Heehee. It's not just you. You can tell they're good friends.)
engSearchText:
(Heehee. It's not just you. You can tell they're
good friends.)
jpnChrName: （えへへ……   やっぱり仲良しですよねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（えへへ……
やっぱり仲良しですよねぇ。）

engChrName: (Indeed. I don't believe I've ever seen Mr. Arkride act in such a manner. Rather a change of pace.)
engSearchText:
(Indeed. I don't believe I've ever seen Mr. Arkride act
in such a manner. Rather a change of pace.)
jpnChrName: （ええ、こういうヴァン様を   見るのも何だか新鮮ですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ、こういうヴァン様を
見るのも何だか新鮮ですね。）

engChrName: (I believe Mr. Kincaid is older than him, too... He might be the youngest in his old friend group.)
engSearchText:
(I believe Mr. Kincaid is older than him, too...
He might be the youngest in his old friend group.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ、キンケイドさんも   一つ年上みたいですけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ、キンケイドさんも
一つ年上みたいですけど……）

engChrName: (But I guess he's close enough to Dingo that they talk more like brothers.)
engSearchText:
(But I guess he's close enough to Dingo that they talk
more like brothers.)
jpnChrName: （ディンゴさんはもう少し上みたいですから   お兄さんみたいな感じなのかもしれません。）
jpnSearchText:
（ディンゴさんはもう少し上みたいですから
お兄さんみたいな感じなのかもしれません。）

engChrName: (Heh, what a hypocrite. Treats us lackeys like we're all little kids, only to turn around and baby himself with this guy.)
engSearchText:
(Heh, what a hypocrite. Treats us lackeys like we're
all little kids, only to turn around and baby himself
with this guy.)
jpnChrName: （ケッ……人をガキ扱いして   自分の方が甘ったれじゃねえか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ケッ……人をガキ扱いして
自分の方が甘ったれじゃねえか。）

engChrName: Anyway, I've gotta jet. I have some investigative work to wrap up this evening.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I've gotta jet. I have some investigative work
to wrap up this evening.
jpnChrName: さて……俺も夕方までには 取材を切り上げておかないとな。
jpnSearchText:
さて……俺も夕方までには
取材を切り上げておかないとな。

engChrName: Y'know, you guys have really been making waves with all the work you're doing—just don't burn yourselves out, okay?
engSearchText:
Y'know, you guys have really been making waves with
all the work you're doing—just don't burn yourselves
out, okay?
jpnChrName: お前たちも各地で立て続けの活躍ぶりだ。 あまり無理はしないようにな。
jpnSearchText:
お前たちも各地で立て続けの活躍ぶりだ。
あまり無理はしないようにな。

engChrName: Same to you, pal. Work ain't everything, yeah?
engSearchText: Same to you, pal. Work ain't everything, yeah?
jpnChrName: ああ、そっちこそ程々にしとけよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そっちこそ程々にしとけよ。

engChrName: I still don't get how you ended up here, of all places.
engSearchText: I still don't get how you ended up here, of all places.
jpnChrName: それにしても、 あんたもどうしてこんな所に──
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、
あんたもどうしてこんな所に──

engChrName: I did hear you were back home tying up some loose ends, but that's about it.
engSearchText:
I did hear you were back home tying up some loose
ends, but that's about it.
jpnChrName: そう言えば後始末がてら こっちに里帰りしてるとは聞いたけど。
jpnSearchText:
そう言えば後始末がてら
こっちに里帰りしてるとは聞いたけど。

engChrName: Mhm. My travels actually took me to President Rocksmith, as fate would have it.
engSearchText:
Mhm. My travels actually took me to President
Rocksmith, as fate would have it.
jpnChrName: ええ、その流れで 殿下にもご挨拶する事になって。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、その流れで
殿下にもご挨拶する事になって。

engChrName: After what happened the other day, I wanted to assess the situation for myself.
engSearchText:
After what happened the other day, I wanted to
assess the situation for myself.
jpnChrName: 先日の一件の“揺れ戻し”── この目で確認しておきたかったから。
jpnSearchText:
先日の一件の“揺れ戻し”──
この目で確認しておきたかったから。

engChrName: I still don't get what you're doing down here, of all places.
engSearchText:
I still don't get what you're doing down here, of
all places.
jpnChrName: にしても、どうしてこんな所に──
jpnSearchText: にしても、どうしてこんな所に──

engChrName: I knew you were sortin' some stuff out back home, but that's about it.
engSearchText:
I knew you were sortin' some stuff out back home,
but that's about it.
jpnChrName: そう言えば後始末がてら こっちに里帰りしてるとは聞いたが。
jpnSearchText:
そう言えば後始末がてら
こっちに里帰りしてるとは聞いたが。

engChrName: Mhm. My travels actually took me to President Rocksmith, as fate would have it.
engSearchText:
Mhm. My travels actually took me to President
Rocksmith, as fate would have it.
jpnChrName: ええ、その流れで 殿下にもご挨拶する事になって。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、その流れで
殿下にもご挨拶する事になって。

engChrName: After what happened the other day, I wanted to assess the situation for myself.
engSearchText:
After what happened the other day, I wanted to
assess the situation for myself.
jpnChrName: 先日の一件の“揺れ戻し”── この目で確認しておきたかったので。
jpnSearchText:
先日の一件の“揺れ戻し”──
この目で確認しておきたかったので。

engChrName: Fair enough.
engSearchText: Fair enough.
jpnChrName: そうでしたか……
jpnSearchText: そうでしたか……

engChrName: Thanks again for everything you did in Oración, by the way. We really, really appreciate it!
engSearchText:
Thanks again for everything you did in Oración, by
the way. We really, really appreciate it!
jpnChrName: ふふ、改めてになりますが その節はどうも。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、改めてになりますが
その節はどうも。

engChrName: Agreed. Cao pulled his own weight, but you were the real ace in the hole.
engSearchText:
Agreed. Cao pulled his own weight, but you were the
real ace in the hole.
jpnChrName: ま、ツァオはともかく アンタの協力は大きかったからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ツァオはともかく
アンタの協力は大きかったからな。

engChrName: Yeah, I'm so glad we had you around when we did! You did great!
engSearchText:
Yeah, I'm so glad we had you around when we did!
You did great!
jpnChrName: はいっ、心強かったです！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、心強かったです！

engChrName: What she said. I know you did a lot behind the scenes after we all duked it out back there.
engSearchText:
What she said. I know you did a lot behind the scenes
after we all duked it out back there.
jpnChrName: ま、アンタとはやり合ったが水面下で 色々動いてくれたみたいだからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、アンタとはやり合ったが水面下で
色々動いてくれたみたいだからな。

engChrName: That was amazing how you and Heiyue were able to keep Almata in check like that. That couldn't have been easy!
engSearchText:
That was amazing how you and Heiyue were able to
keep Almata in check like that. That couldn't have
been easy!
jpnChrName: 黒月と合わせてのアルマータ傘下への 牽制など──お疲れさまでした！
jpnSearchText:
黒月と合わせてのアルマータ傘下への
牽制など──お疲れさまでした！

engChrName: Oh, no need to thank me. I just did what I could to help.
engSearchText:
Oh, no need to thank me. I just did what I could
to help.
jpnChrName: いえ、私はあくまで お手伝いをしただけですから。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、私はあくまで
お手伝いをしただけですから。

engChrName: I may have moved to Crossbell, but Calvard is still my homeland. I won't allow them to defile it.
engSearchText:
I may have moved to Crossbell, but Calvard is still
my homeland. I won't allow them to defile it.
jpnChrName: ──それに、クロスベルに移住したといえ、 この国が故郷であるのは変わらないから。
jpnSearchText:
──それに、クロスベルに移住したといえ、
この国が故郷であるのは変わらないから。

engChrName: So I'm happy I was able to help however I could.
engSearchText: So I'm happy I was able to help however I could.
jpnChrName: 少しでも力になれたのなら良かった。
jpnSearchText: 少しでも力になれたのなら良かった。

engChrName: Got it. That makes more sense now.
engSearchText: Got it. That makes more sense now.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そっか。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そっか。

engChrName: I may have moved to Crossbell, but Calvard is still my homeland.
engSearchText:
I may have moved to Crossbell, but Calvard is still
my homeland.
jpnChrName: ──それに、クロスベルに移住したといえ、 この国が故郷であるのは変わりませんから。
jpnSearchText:
──それに、クロスベルに移住したといえ、
この国が故郷であるのは変わりませんから。

engChrName: I won't just sit by and let them ruin my home. I was happy to help however I could.
engSearchText:
I won't just sit by and let them ruin my home. I was
happy to help however I could.
jpnChrName: 少しでも力になれたのなら良かったです。
jpnSearchText: 少しでも力になれたのなら良かったです。

engChrName: Got'cha. Now it all adds up.
engSearchText: Got'cha. Now it all adds up.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、そうか。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、そうか。

engChrName: I understand that you are on leave from your troupe. Do you intend to return soon?
engSearchText:
I understand that you are on leave from your troupe.
Do you intend to return soon?
jpnChrName: 劇団から休暇を貰ったそうだが そろそろ“帰る”つもりなのかな？
jpnSearchText:
劇団から休暇を貰ったそうだが
そろそろ“帰る”つもりなのかな？

engChrName: I understand that you're currently on leave from Arc en Ciel. Do you plan to return to the troupe soon?
engSearchText:
I understand that you're currently on leave from Arc
en Ciel. Do you plan to return to the troupe soon?
jpnChrName: 劇団から休暇を貰われたそうですが そろそろ“帰られる”おつもりですか？
jpnSearchText:
劇団から休暇を貰われたそうですが
そろそろ“帰られる”おつもりですか？

engChrName: I know you're taking a break from Arc en Ciel at the moment. Do you plan on getting back together with them soon?
engSearchText:
I know you're taking a break from Arc en Ciel at
the moment. Do you plan on getting back together
with them soon?
jpnChrName: 劇団から休暇を貰ったそうですけど そろそろ“帰る”つもりなんですか？
jpnSearchText:
劇団から休暇を貰ったそうですけど
そろそろ“帰る”つもりなんですか？

engChrName: I do, yes. I'm booked for a handful of events coming up.
engSearchText:
I do, yes. I'm booked for a handful of events
coming up.
jpnChrName: ええ、“表”の芸能イベントに 幾つか出る必要はあるんですが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、“表”の芸能イベントに
幾つか出る必要はあるんですが……

engChrName: Once the Revolution Festival is over, I'll be making my way back to Crossbell.
engSearchText:
Once the Revolution Festival is over, I'll be making
my way back to Crossbell.
jpnChrName: ３日後の革命記念式典が終わったら 午後にはクロスベルに帰ろうと思います。
jpnSearchText:
３日後の革命記念式典が終わったら
午後にはクロスベルに帰ろうと思います。

engChrName: I also want to attend the memorial service for the victims at Creil... I want to see for myself how the country responds.
engSearchText:
I also want to attend the memorial service for the
victims at Creil... I want to see for myself how the
country responds.
jpnChrName: クレイユの追悼式もありますし…… 今後のこの国の未来を見届ける意味でも。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユの追悼式もありますし……
今後のこの国の未来を見届ける意味でも。

engChrName: That's fair. Thank you for sharing all that with us.
engSearchText: That's fair. Thank you for sharing all that with us.
jpnChrName: そうですか…… そう言って頂けると嬉しいです。
jpnSearchText:
そうですか……
そう言って頂けると嬉しいです。

engChrName: Sounds like you're gonna have your hands full once you're back in Crossbell.
engSearchText:
Sounds like you're gonna have your hands full once
you're back in Crossbell.
jpnChrName: ま、どうせクロスベルに戻ったら 忙しい日々が始まるんだろう？
jpnSearchText:
ま、どうせクロスベルに戻ったら
忙しい日々が始まるんだろう？

engChrName: Hope you're able to take it easy in the meantime, be a little lazy like our local celebrity.
engSearchText:
Hope you're able to take it easy in the meantime, be a
little lazy like our local celebrity.
jpnChrName: 精々のんびり過ごすといい。 どこぞのトップ女優みたいにな。
jpnSearchText:
精々のんびり過ごすといい。
どこぞのトップ女優みたいにな。

engChrName: Wha...? Excuse you! Have I been ACTING lazy to you, huh?!
engSearchText:
Wha...? Excuse you! Have I been ACTING lazy to
you, huh?!
jpnChrName: ってあたしは別に のんびりしてるわけじゃないわよ！
jpnSearchText:
ってあたしは別に
のんびりしてるわけじゃないわよ！

engChrName: Yes, she's quite the workaholic. I admire that.
engSearchText: Yes, she's quite the workaholic. I admire that.
jpnChrName: ふふ、確かに。 彼女も普段から忙しそうだしね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、確かに。
彼女も普段から忙しそうだしね。

engChrName: Indeed. Her work ethic is admirable—albeit perhaps a little self-destructive.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Her work ethic is admirable—albeit perhaps
a little self-destructive.
jpnChrName: ふふ、確かにあの方も 普段からお忙しそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、確かにあの方も
普段からお忙しそうですし。

engChrName: That's the plan: just taking it nice and slow while I can.
engSearchText:
That's the plan: just taking it nice and slow while
I can.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、はい。 そうさせてもらいますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、はい。
そうさせてもらいますね。

engChrName: I'll be heading back to Crossbell once the Revolution Festival is over. I have work waiting for me there.
engSearchText:
I'll be heading back to Crossbell once the Revolution
Festival is over. I have work waiting for me there.
jpnChrName: クロスベルの方で仕事もありまして…… 革命記念式典が終わったら戻る予定です。
jpnSearchText:
クロスベルの方で仕事もありまして……
革命記念式典が終わったら戻る予定です。

engChrName: But until then, I'm relaxing here in Calvard. If anything comes up, don't hesitate to get in touch.
engSearchText:
But until then, I'm relaxing here in Calvard.
If anything comes up, don't hesitate to get in touch.
jpnChrName: それまではこちらにいるつもりですから 何かあれば声をかけてくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
それまではこちらにいるつもりですから
何かあれば声をかけてくださいね。

engChrName: Given my position, opportunities to visit the Blacklight District are few and far between. I'm glad I was able to make time for it today.
engSearchText:
Given my position, opportunities to visit the
Blacklight District are few and far between. I'm glad I
was able to make time for it today.
jpnChrName: 立場上、黒芒街に足を運ぶ機会は少なかったんだが 期せずして様子を見に来れて良かったと思っているよ。
jpnSearchText:
立場上、黒芒街に足を運ぶ機会は少なかったんだが
期せずして様子を見に来れて良かったと思っているよ。

engChrName: I make a point of interacting with everyone in Calvard—ordinary civilians and stranger types included.
engSearchText:
I make a point of interacting with everyone in
Calvard—ordinary civilians and stranger
types included.
jpnChrName: それに、こうした一般の方や 興味深い方との交流も得難いものだ。
jpnSearchText:
それに、こうした一般の方や
興味深い方との交流も得難いものだ。

engChrName: I have to leave the heavy lifting to you and the other hardworking heroes out there. Rest assured, though, I'll be helping the efforts myself.
engSearchText:
I have to leave the heavy lifting to you and the other
hardworking heroes out there. Rest assured, though,
I'll be helping the efforts myself.
jpnChrName: 状況の打開は君たちやＣＩＤ、各勢力に任せる事になるが。 私は私なりに立ち回らせてもらうとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
状況の打開は君たちやＣＩＤ、各勢力に任せる事になるが。
私は私なりに立ち回らせてもらうとしよう。

engChrName: This is quite the calamity to befall us, isn't it? You must be a regular citizen from the look of things.
engSearchText:
This is quite the calamity to befall us, isn't it?
You must be a regular citizen from the look of things.
jpnChrName: いや～、お互い災難でしたなぁ。 見たところ一般の方のようですが。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、お互い災難でしたなぁ。
見たところ一般の方のようですが。

engChrName: Do you have any family? I imagine they must be worried about you, what with all of this happening in the middle of the festival.
engSearchText:
Do you have any family? I imagine they must be
worried about you, what with all of this happening in
the middle of the festival.
jpnChrName: 記念祭の最中──ご家族など さぞご心配されておるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭の最中──ご家族など
さぞご心配されておるでしょう。

engChrName: Y-Yes, I suppose they are. I worry for my grandchildren out there as well...
engSearchText:
Y-Yes, I suppose they are. I worry for my
grandchildren out there as well...
jpnChrName: そ、そうですねぇ。 私も孫たちが心配で心配で……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうですねぇ。
私も孫たちが心配で心配で……

engChrName: (Curses... Of all the places to run into that wretched Samuel Rocksmith!)
engSearchText:
(Curses... Of all the places to run into that wretched
Samuel Rocksmith!)
jpnChrName: （チッ……あのロックスミスが   どうしてこんな場所に……！）
jpnSearchText:
（チッ……あのロックスミスが
どうしてこんな場所に……！）

engChrName: (And the CID and Flying Swallow are here, too? Could this get any worse?!)
engSearchText:
(And the CID and Flying Swallow are here, too?
Could this get any worse?!)
jpnChrName: （しかもＣＩＤの連中に   飛燕紅児まで来てるとは……）
jpnSearchText:
（しかもＣＩＤの連中に
飛燕紅児まで来てるとは……）

engChrName: (Can't an old woman get a little rest around here? I just got away from those monsters! I don't need these people harassing me, too!)
engSearchText:
(Can't an old woman get a little rest around here?
I just got away from those monsters! I don't need
these people harassing me, too!)
jpnChrName: （せっかく化物どもをまいて避難したのに   落ち着かないったらッ……！）
jpnSearchText:
（せっかく化物どもをまいて避難したのに
落ち着かないったらッ……！）

engChrName: Also, did I see you come in from the subway station with other civilians in tow?
engSearchText:
Also, did I see you come in from the subway station
with other civilians in tow?
jpnChrName: おお──そういえば駅前から何人もの 市民を連れてこちらに逃れたとか？
jpnSearchText:
おお──そういえば駅前から何人もの
市民を連れてこちらに逃れたとか？

engChrName: That's quite the impressive feat at your age, madam. Not everyone remains such a hardy walker in their golden years.
engSearchText:
That's quite the impressive feat at your age, madam.
Not everyone remains such a hardy walker in their
golden years.
jpnChrName: 素晴らしい健脚をお持ちのようだが いやはや、そのお歳で素晴らしいことだ。
jpnSearchText:
素晴らしい健脚をお持ちのようだが
いやはや、そのお歳で素晴らしいことだ。

engChrName: Ah, haha, y-you flatter me. I was a triathlete in my youth, you see.
engSearchText:
Ah, haha, y-you flatter me. I was a triathlete in my
youth, you see.
jpnChrName: オ、オホホ……若いころ趣味で、 トライアスロンなどを少々嗜んでてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
オ、オホホ……若いころ趣味で、
トライアスロンなどを少々嗜んでてねぇ。

engChrName: (Hmph! If this guy goes prying into my past, he and I are going to have a problem!)
engSearchText:
(Hmph! If this guy goes prying into my past, he and I
are going to have a problem!)
jpnChrName: （ってコイツ、アタシの“前科”のことを   知ってるんじゃないだろうねェ……！？）
jpnSearchText:
（ってコイツ、アタシの“前科”のことを
知ってるんじゃないだろうねェ……！？）

engChrName: Inspiration strikes at the weirdest times. All this craziness is giving me some really big ideas for my next picture...
engSearchText:
Inspiration strikes at the weirdest times. All this
craziness is giving me some really big ideas for my
next picture...
jpnChrName: この不可解な状況もまた 次の作品にむけていい刺激になっとるんじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
この不可解な状況もまた
次の作品にむけていい刺激になっとるんじゃが……

engChrName: Man, though, what a place! Everybody here is just a whack ass, and I love it! You can't make these folks up!
engSearchText:
Man, though, what a place! Everybody here is just a
whack ass, and I love it! You can't make these
folks up!
jpnChrName: ううむ、興味深い話ばかりじゃわい！ こんな時じゃがワクワクしてしまうのう！？
jpnSearchText:
ううむ、興味深い話ばかりじゃわい！
こんな時じゃがワクワクしてしまうのう！？

engChrName: Er, not that I'm getting distracted! No, no, I'm still keeping an eye on Nina and Judith, making sure they're safe!
engSearchText:
Er, not that I'm getting distracted! No, no, I'm still
keeping an eye on Nina and Judith, making sure
they're safe!
jpnChrName: あ、モチロンジュディス君や ニナ君の事も心配しとるんじゃがな～！
jpnSearchText:
あ、モチロンジュディス君や
ニナ君の事も心配しとるんじゃがな～！

engChrName: Van, baby! Good to see you! I'm guessing you're about to take off?
engSearchText:
Van, baby! Good to see you! I'm guessing you're
about to take off?
jpnChrName: おおヴァン君たち。 そろそろ出発するようじゃが。
jpnSearchText:
おおヴァン君たち。
そろそろ出発するようじゃが。

engChrName: Hey, you're not in THAT much of a rush, are you? Grab a seat and join the fun. C'mon, it'll cheer you all up!
engSearchText:
Hey, you're not in THAT much of a rush, are you?
Grab a seat and join the fun. C'mon, it'll cheer you
all up!
jpnChrName: よかったら景気づけに 少しばかり付き合っていかんかね？
jpnSearchText:
よかったら景気づけに
少しばかり付き合っていかんかね？

engChrName: Sorry, Gotti, we're gonna have to take a rain check on that. Once this is all over, though, I'm down to shoot the shit.
engSearchText:
Sorry, Gotti, we're gonna have to take a rain check
on that. Once this is all over, though, I'm down to
shoot the shit.
jpnChrName: ま、今は遠慮しときますよ。 ケリが付いた暁には喜んで。
jpnSearchText:
ま、今は遠慮しときますよ。
ケリが付いた暁には喜んで。

engChrName: As for you, Golden Butterfly... You guys at the society takin' a back seat to all this? What's the plan?
engSearchText:
As for you, Golden Butterfly... You guys at the
society takin' a back seat to all this? What's the plan?
jpnChrName: ところで黄金蝶──結社（アンタら）の方で この状況に対処する見込みはねぇのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
ところで黄金蝶──結社（アンタら）の方で
この状況に対処する見込みはねぇのかよ？

engChrName: That's a difficult question to answer, hon. Truth is, Ellroy's the one in charge here.
engSearchText:
That's a difficult question to answer, hon. Truth is,
Ellroy's the one in charge here.
jpnChrName: うーん、微妙なとこやねぇ。 今回は旦さんが完全に仕切っとるし。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、微妙なとこやねぇ。
今回は旦さんが完全に仕切っとるし。

engChrName: With the city frozen in place, there's not much point in the other Anguis getting their hands dirty, as it were.
engSearchText:
With the city frozen in place, there's not much point
in the other Anguis getting their hands dirty, as
it were.
jpnChrName: そもそも首都自体が“停まって”るんなら 他の使徒はん達も干渉しようがないしなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも首都自体が“停まって”るんなら
他の使徒はん達も干渉しようがないしなぁ。

engChrName: That said, I wouldn't be surprised if McBurn and the Grandmaster throw their caps in the ring. They're in a position to do so, anyway.
engSearchText:
That said, I wouldn't be surprised if McBurn and the
Grandmaster throw their caps in the ring. They're in
a position to do so, anyway.
jpnChrName: ああ──盟主はんにマクバーンなら それでも“入り込め”そうやけど。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──盟主はんにマクバーンなら
それでも“入り込め”そうやけど。

engChrName: Greeeat. Just what I wanted to hear.
engSearchText: Greeeat. Just what I wanted to hear.

engChrName: Hmm... The Blazing Demon and his master, you say?
engSearchText: Hmm... The Blazing Demon and his master, you say?
jpnChrName: 結社の首領《グランドマスター》に “最強”と呼ばれるＮｏ．Ⅰの魔人か。
jpnSearchText:
結社の首領《グランドマスター》に
“最強”と呼ばれるＮｏ．Ⅰの魔人か。

engChrName: Whoa, whoa, whoa! 'Grandmaster'? 'Blazing Demon'? What're these names you're throwing around? That's some juicy stuff! C'mon, fill a guy in!
engSearchText:
Whoa, whoa, whoa! 'Grandmaster'? 'Blazing Demon'?
What're these names you're throwing around?
That's some juicy stuff! C'mon, fill a guy in!
jpnChrName: おおっ、なんじゃあそりゃあ！？ ワクワクするような響きじゃのう！
jpnSearchText:
おおっ、なんじゃあそりゃあ！？
ワクワクするような響きじゃのう！

engChrName: Dude, I know you like sticking your face in every orifice you can find, but you don't want to know. Trust me.
engSearchText:
Dude, I know you like sticking your face in every
orifice you can find, but you don't want to know.
Trust me.
jpnChrName: あー、アンタはちょい黙ってな。
jpnSearchText: あー、アンタはちょい黙ってな。

engChrName: I've heard rumblings about those individuals. They're not your average criminals, for certain.
engSearchText:
I've heard rumblings about those individuals.
They're not your average criminals, for certain.
jpnChrName: ……噂は存じておりますが つくづく常識外の方々のようですね。
jpnSearchText:
……噂は存じておりますが
つくづく常識外の方々のようですね。

engChrName: Said the pot to the kettle, heehee. Your own organization is just brimming with secrets, I hear.
engSearchText:
Said the pot to the kettle, heehee. Your own
organization is just brimming with secrets, I hear.
jpnChrName: うふふ、お姉さんのところも 大概やと思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、お姉さんのところも
大概やと思うけど。

engChrName: At any rate, A and the Gardens may very well get their wish if something isn't done to stop them.
engSearchText:
At any rate, A and the Gardens may very well get
their wish if something isn't done to stop them.
jpnChrName: ──ま、このままやと《Ａ》に庭園（あの子たち）の 為すがままになるかもしれへんし。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、このままやと《Ａ》に庭園（あの子たち）の
為すがままになるかもしれへんし。

engChrName: Perhaps that's a sign I should play my hand—albeit, only after I've had some time to rest. You can't rush a woman on these things.
engSearchText:
Perhaps that's a sign I should play my hand—albeit,
only after I've had some time to rest. You can't rush a
woman on these things.
jpnChrName: ウチも少しは働かせてもらおかな？ もぉすこーしノンビリしてからやけど。
jpnSearchText:
ウチも少しは働かせてもらおかな？
もぉすこーしノンビリしてからやけど。

engChrName: You really march to the beat of your own drum, don'tcha? Just, once you DO make a move, make it count.
engSearchText:
You really march to the beat of your own
drum, don'tcha? Just, once you DO make a move,
make it count.
jpnChrName: アンタはアンタでブレねえっつーか…… ま、少しは期待させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタはアンタでブレねえっつーか……
ま、少しは期待させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Good luck with that! We're really happy for any help we can get.
engSearchText:
Good luck with that! We're really happy for any help
we can get.
jpnChrName: よろしくお願いしますっ。
jpnSearchText: よろしくお願いしますっ。

engChrName: I'm sure you are, sweetheart—just don't wait on my account, all right? I'm going to be a good while yet.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you are, sweetheart—just don't wait on my
account, all right? I'm going to be a good while yet.
jpnChrName: はいはい～、まぁボチボチなぁ。
jpnSearchText: はいはい～、まぁボチボチなぁ。

engChrName: ...You don't say. You telling me the Far East has its share of pleasure quarters, too?
engSearchText:
...You don't say. You telling me the Far East has its
share of pleasure quarters, too?
jpnChrName: ──ほほう、すると 極東にも“遊郭”なる場所がっ？
jpnSearchText:
──ほほう、すると
極東にも“遊郭”なる場所がっ？

engChrName: Correct. They're not as abundant as you might be accustomed to, but they do still exist.
engSearchText:
Correct. They're not as abundant as you might be
accustomed to, but they do still exist.
jpnChrName: 左様──ごく一部ではあるが 残っている郭（くるわ）もありますな。
jpnSearchText:
左様──ごく一部ではあるが
残っている郭（くるわ）もありますな。

engChrName: Of course, they're not quite as active as they once were.
engSearchText:
Of course, they're not quite as active as they
once were.
jpnChrName: 無論、往事の華やぎはござらぬが。
jpnSearchText: 無論、往事の華やぎはござらぬが。

engChrName: Can't say I'm surprised, given how things are out there.
engSearchText:
Can't say I'm surprised, given how things are
out there.
jpnChrName: 無理もあるまい── 東部があの有様ではな。
jpnSearchText:
無理もあるまい──
東部があの有様ではな。

engChrName: Indeed. They do still sound like interesting little venues. I'll have to visit when I get the chance.
engSearchText:
Indeed. They do still sound like interesting
little venues. I'll have to visit when I get the chance.
jpnChrName: ふむ……それでもなお、 興味深い場所ではありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……それでもなお、
興味深い場所ではありそうですね。

engChrName: (Yeah, I'm, uh... I'm not touchin' that one. They sound pretty into that discussion.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, I'm, uh... I'm not touchin' that one.
They sound pretty into that discussion.)
jpnChrName: （いや、モロモロ濃すぎんだろ……   首を突っ込まねえ方が良さそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（いや、モロモロ濃すぎんだろ……
首を突っ込まねえ方が良さそうだな。）

engChrName: As for Walter, in case you were wondering, I imagine he's celebrating. He's always been looking for fighters who can match his strength.
engSearchText:
As for Walter, in case you were wondering, I imagine
he's celebrating. He's always been looking for fighters
who can match his strength.
jpnChrName: 旦さんはともかく、ヴァルターはんは今頃 格好の獲物を見つけてはしゃいでるやろねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
旦さんはともかく、ヴァルターはんは今頃
格好の獲物を見つけてはしゃいでるやろねぇ。

engChrName: That said, I can't help but wonder how a certain alumna of ours will respond to this whole imbroglio.
engSearchText:
That said, I can't help but wonder how a certain
alumna of ours will respond to this whole imbroglio.
jpnChrName: それに、この状況であの子（レン）が どう動くかも気になるわぁ。
jpnSearchText:
それに、この状況であの子（レン）が
どう動くかも気になるわぁ。

engChrName: Perhaps once I've gotten my beauty rest, I'll venture up to the surface and have a look around for myself.
engSearchText:
Perhaps once I've gotten my beauty rest, I'll venture
up to the surface and have a look around for myself.
jpnChrName: もぉすこーしのんびりしたら 地上に様子を見に行ってみるとしましょ。
jpnSearchText:
もぉすこーしのんびりしたら
地上に様子を見に行ってみるとしましょ。

engChrName: I can almost see the heads spinning over at the Bracer Guild. The Immovable, joining forces with yours truly? Scandalous.
engSearchText:
I can almost see the heads spinning over at the
Bracer Guild. The Immovable, joining forces with
yours truly? Scandalous.
jpnChrName: 《不動》とウチが組む、とだけ聞いたら 遊撃士協会はひっくり返るやろうねえ。
jpnSearchText:
《不動》とウチが組む、とだけ聞いたら
遊撃士協会はひっくり返るやろうねえ。

engChrName: We may only be fighting together for a short while, but I fully intend to savor this little treat. Teehee.
engSearchText:
We may only be fighting together for a short while,
but I fully intend to savor this little treat. Teehee.
jpnChrName: ふふ、お祭り騒ぎの束の間だけの共闘、 しっかり味わわせてもらおうやないの。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、お祭り騒ぎの束の間だけの共闘、
しっかり味わわせてもらおうやないの。

engChrName: We meet again. Got a job to do right now, I take it?
engSearchText:
We meet again. Got a job to do right now,
I take it?
jpnChrName: その様子だと裏解決屋は 仕事の途中なのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
その様子だと裏解決屋は
仕事の途中なのかしら？

engChrName: That's a bummer. Wouldn't you prefer calling it a day and having fun with your assistants instead?
engSearchText:
That's a bummer. Wouldn't you prefer calling it a day
and having fun with your assistants instead?
jpnChrName: 今日くらいは早めに切り上げて 事務所の皆で遊んできたらいいのに。
jpnSearchText:
今日くらいは早めに切り上げて
事務所の皆で遊んできたらいいのに。

engChrName: ...Not that I'm one to talk, admittedly. I've got deliveries to handle all day and all night, so no time off for me.
engSearchText:
...Not that I'm one to talk, admittedly. I've got
deliveries to handle all day and all night, so no time
off for me.
jpnChrName: ……なんて、夜まで配達の仕事が入ってる 私が言えたことじゃないんだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
……なんて、夜まで配達の仕事が入ってる
私が言えたことじゃないんだけどね。

engChrName: Gotta say, I didn't expect to find you here—how long've you been down here?
engSearchText:
Gotta say, I didn't expect to find you here—how
long've you been down here?
jpnChrName: エルメス──お前も顔を出してたとはな。 いつから来てやがったんだ？
jpnSearchText:
エルメス──お前も顔を出してたとはな。
いつから来てやがったんだ？

engChrName: Oh, not too long—I'm just here for work. I'm guessing you and the rest of your office are taking a breather?
engSearchText:
Oh, not too long—I'm just here for work.
I'm guessing you and the rest of your office are
taking a breather?
jpnChrName: ええ、さっき仕事の関係でね。 裏解決屋のみんなは息抜きかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ええ、さっき仕事の関係でね。
裏解決屋のみんなは息抜きかしら？

engChrName: Whatever you're up to, be careful. This place has no shortage of 'unique' characters to look out for.
engSearchText:
Whatever you're up to, be careful. This place has no
shortage of 'unique' characters to look out for.
jpnChrName: 気を付けてね、ココ癖の強い人が多いから。
jpnSearchText: 気を付けてね、ココ癖の強い人が多いから。

engChrName: You can say that again...
engSearchText: You can say that again...
jpnChrName: そ、そうみたいですね……
jpnSearchText: そ、そうみたいですね……

engChrName: Y'know, you're givin' em too much credit. 'Characters' almost makes 'em sound reasonable.
engSearchText:
Y'know, you're givin' em too much credit.
'Characters' almost makes 'em sound reasonable.
jpnChrName: その程度の認識で済むのは お前くらいな気がするけどな。
jpnSearchText:
その程度の認識で済むのは
お前くらいな気がするけどな。

engChrName: Haha. Well, when you have all these different factions here, I find it best to stay neutral and avoid ruffling any feathers.
engSearchText:
Haha. Well, when you have all these different
factions here, I find it best to stay neutral and avoid
ruffling any feathers.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、色んな“勢力”も顔を出してるけど 私は一応、中立の立場だから。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、色んな“勢力”も顔を出してるけど
私は一応、中立の立場だから。

engChrName: I don't shy away from anyone. You need something hauled, I'm your mule—for the right price and the right conditions, of course.
engSearchText:
I don't shy away from anyone. You need something
hauled, I'm your mule—for the right price and the
right conditions, of course.
jpnChrName: 頼まれたら何でも運ぶわ。 ミラと条件は付けさせてもらうけど♪
jpnSearchText:
頼まれたら何でも運ぶわ。
ミラと条件は付けさせてもらうけど♪

engChrName: (And here I thought she'd gone batshit in setting up shop down here. Guess it's not that surprising in retrospect, though.)
engSearchText:
(And here I thought she'd gone batshit in setting up
shop down here. Guess it's not that surprising in
retrospect, though.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、大したタマだと思っちゃいたが   腑に落ちた気がするぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハッ、大したタマだと思っちゃいたが
腑に落ちた気がするぜ。）

engChrName: (She might not technically be part of the underworld, but she's got one foot in it for sure.)
engSearchText:
(She might not technically be part of the underworld,
but she's got one foot in it for sure.)
jpnChrName: （ま、エルメスは裏の人間じゃねえが   どっちも渡り歩いてるのは確かだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、エルメスは裏の人間じゃねえが
どっちも渡り歩いてるのは確かだな。）

engChrName: Just for reference, there's no alcohol in this. I can't go ferrying around orders all drunk and dizzy, now, can I?
engSearchText:
Just for reference, there's no alcohol in this. I can't go
ferrying around orders all drunk and dizzy, now,
can I?
jpnChrName: ああ、言っておくけどこれはノンアルよ。 昼間から酔っ払ってたら仕事にならないもの。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、言っておくけどこれはノンアルよ。
昼間から酔っ払ってたら仕事にならないもの。

engChrName: Once I'm done with this, it's straight off to the next job. *sigh* No rest for us weary freelancers, is there?
engSearchText:
Once I'm done with this, it's straight off to the next
job. *sigh* No rest for us weary freelancers, is there?
jpnChrName: 飲み切ったら次の配達に向かわなくちゃ…… ふう、お互いに忙しいわよね。
jpnSearchText:
飲み切ったら次の配達に向かわなくちゃ……
ふう、お互いに忙しいわよね。

engChrName: Ain't that the truth. (...Wait, booze or no booze, how the hell is she able to down that with her helmet still on?!)
engSearchText:
Ain't that the truth.
(...Wait, booze or no booze, how the hell is she able
to down that with her helmet still on?!)
jpnChrName: ああ…… （つーか、メットは外さねえんだな。）
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
（つーか、メットは外さねえんだな。）

engChrName: (You know, that's a really good question. I'm curious now, too.)
engSearchText:
(You know, that's a really good question. I'm curious
now, too.)
jpnChrName: （う～ん、どうしても   気になっちゃいますよね……）
jpnSearchText:
（う～ん、どうしても
気になっちゃいますよね……）

engChrName: Well, if it isn't the spriggan and his merry band of part-timers. How's it going?
engSearchText:
Well, if it isn't the spriggan and his merry band
of part-timers. How's it going?
jpnChrName: あら、アークライド達じゃない。
jpnSearchText: あら、アークライド達じゃない。

engChrName: You've got a funny way of celebrating the festival if you're spending it down here with us.
engSearchText:
You've got a funny way of celebrating the festival if
you're spending it down here with us.
jpnChrName: フフ、こんな祝いの日に 黒芒街に来るなんて物好きだね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、こんな祝いの日に
黒芒街に来るなんて物好きだね。

engChrName: Yo there. Heh, I could say the same for you. All the places you could get your booze on and you pick this skeevy dump?
engSearchText:
Yo there. Heh, I could say the same for you. All the
places you could get your booze on and you pick this
skeevy dump?
jpnChrName: そういうお前達は仲良く酒盛りってか？ 一丁前に記念祭を満喫してるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
そういうお前達は仲良く酒盛りってか？
一丁前に記念祭を満喫してるじゃねえか。

engChrName: Well, let's not jump to conclusions, Arkride. I've still got work to do, so no alcohol for me.
engSearchText:
Well, let's not jump to conclusions, Arkride. I've still
got work to do, so no alcohol for me.
jpnChrName: ええ、この後も仕事があるから 私はノンアルで我慢してるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、この後も仕事があるから
私はノンアルで我慢してるけどね。

engChrName: She and I do have a lot in common—we both extend our services to the less savory parts of society, for one.
engSearchText:
She and I do have a lot in common—we both extend
our services to the less savory parts of society, for one.
jpnChrName: イザベルとは裏稼業のキャリアウーマン同士 結構仲良くさせてもらってるのよ。
jpnSearchText:
イザベルとは裏稼業のキャリアウーマン同士
結構仲良くさせてもらってるのよ。

engChrName: That's right. We're pretty close—so close, in fact, that I've actually seen her face beneath that helmet of hers.
engSearchText:
That's right. We're pretty close—so close, in fact, that
I've actually seen her face beneath that helmet of hers.
jpnChrName: ああ、それもエルメスの素顔を 見せてもらった事がある程の仲だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それもエルメスの素顔を
見せてもらった事がある程の仲だ。

engChrName: Heh, no kidding? Guess you two're closer than I thought.
engSearchText:
Heh, no kidding? Guess you two're closer than
I thought.
jpnChrName: へえ……
jpnSearchText: へえ……

engChrName: Y'know, I always just figured that thing was stuck to your head and you couldn't take it off.
engSearchText:
Y'know, I always just figured that thing was stuck to
your head and you couldn't take it off.
jpnChrName: てっきりそのヘルメットは 二度と外せなくなっちまったのかと思ってたが。
jpnSearchText:
てっきりそのヘルメットは
二度と外せなくなっちまったのかと思ってたが。

engChrName: I... Hahaha! You're joking, right? This? This is just a regular old helmet.
engSearchText:
I... Hahaha! You're joking, right? This? This is just a
regular old helmet.
jpnChrName: ふふ、何よそれ。 普通のヘルメットなんだけど？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、何よそれ。
普通のヘルメットなんだけど？

engChrName: You keep buttering me up like that, though, maybe you'll get to see beneath it, too.
engSearchText:
You keep buttering me up like that, though, maybe
you'll get to see beneath it, too.
jpnChrName: そんな意地悪を言うようじゃ 貴方に素顔を見せてあげるのは当分先になりそうね。
jpnSearchText:
そんな意地悪を言うようじゃ
貴方に素顔を見せてあげるのは当分先になりそうね。

engChrName: Damn, hah. You know how to lead a guy on.
engSearchText: Damn, hah. You know how to lead a guy on.
jpnChrName: はは、そいつは残念だ。
jpnSearchText: はは、そいつは残念だ。

engChrName: I get the feeling something interesting is right around the corner... I'll stick around and keep an eye out.
engSearchText:
I get the feeling something interesting is right around
the corner... I'll stick around and keep an eye out.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、思いがけず 面白いものが見れそうですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、思いがけず
面白いものが見れそうですねぇ。

engChrName: And at any rate, this isn't the worst place to kill time. I have to wait for Celis to rendezvous with me anyway.
engSearchText:
And at any rate, this isn't the worst place to kill time.
I have to wait for Celis to rendezvous with
me anyway.
jpnChrName: セリスさんから連絡がくるまでの 暇つぶしにでも……
jpnSearchText:
セリスさんから連絡がくるまでの
暇つぶしにでも……

engChrName: ...Ah, wait, that's right. I forgot that I was asked to do something. I guess I can't hang around here after all.
engSearchText:
...Ah, wait, that's right. I forgot that I was asked to
do something. I guess I can't hang around here
after all.
jpnChrName: と、そういえば頼まれ事もあるんでした。 あまり悠長にはしてられなさそうですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
と、そういえば頼まれ事もあるんでした。
あまり悠長にはしてられなさそうですねぇ。

engChrName: This looks rather intriguing... Oh, I'm sorry, did I say intriguing? I meant serious.
engSearchText:
This looks rather intriguing... Oh, I'm sorry, did I
say intriguing? I meant serious.
jpnChrName: いやはや、なんと興味深── じゃなかった、大変な事になってしまったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、なんと興味深──
じゃなかった、大変な事になってしまったんだ。

engChrName: I could sever the wound and derive a sample from it. Cultivating it might reveal an as of yet undiscovered pathogen.
engSearchText:
I could sever the wound and derive a sample from it.
Cultivating it might reveal an as of yet
undiscovered pathogen.
jpnChrName: この傷口は切断してサンプルに…… 培養したら未知の病原菌が見つかる可能性も……
jpnSearchText:
この傷口は切断してサンプルに……
培養したら未知の病原菌が見つかる可能性も……

engChrName: But is it fresh enough for that? Hmm... Maybe it'd be faster if I simply injured myself instead.
engSearchText:
But is it fresh enough for that? Hmm... Maybe it'd be
faster if I simply injured myself instead.
jpnChrName: しかし鮮度が……う～んいっそ 私が出向いて傷を負った方が早いだろうか？
jpnSearchText:
しかし鮮度が……う～んいっそ
私が出向いて傷を負った方が早いだろうか？

engChrName: Glad to see you're batshit as ever, doc.
engSearchText: Glad to see you're batshit as ever, doc.
jpnChrName: 相変わらずヤバすぎんだろ、 この闇医者がよ。
jpnSearchText:
相変わらずヤバすぎんだろ、
この闇医者がよ。

engChrName: There certainly are some colorful people down here, aren't there? She fits right in.
engSearchText:
There certainly are some colorful people down here,
aren't there? She fits right in.
jpnChrName: いやはや、面白い人もいるものですねぇ。
jpnSearchText: いやはや、面白い人もいるものですねぇ。

engChrName: I have an idea, Doctor: what if I went out and captured some subjects for you?
engSearchText:
I have an idea, Doctor: what if I went out and
captured some subjects for you?
jpnChrName: もしよろしければ、 何体か捕獲してきましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
もしよろしければ、
何体か捕獲してきましょうか？

engChrName: I'd love to help, personally. I'm simply fascinated by the idea of dissecting some unlucky devils!
engSearchText:
I'd love to help, personally. I'm simply fascinated by
the idea of dissecting some unlucky devils!
jpnChrName: 悪魔の“解剖”── 僕も興味がないわけじゃありませんし♪
jpnSearchText:
悪魔の“解剖”──
僕も興味がないわけじゃありませんし♪

engChrName: Oooh, you're my favorite kind of assistant! Deal. Get me those devils and for your reward, you get to watch me take them apart.
engSearchText:
Oooh, you're my favorite kind of assistant! Deal.
Get me those devils and for your reward, you get to
watch me take them apart.
jpnChrName: おお！　君はなんてイイ奴なんだ！ では報酬は解剖の見学という事で……！
jpnSearchText:
おお！　君はなんてイイ奴なんだ！
では報酬は解剖の見学という事で……！

engChrName: That sounds perfect! Oh, but do be careful. I AM still charged with punishing heretics, so no grafts or other unholy business, understood?
engSearchText:
That sounds perfect! Oh, but do be careful. I AM still
charged with punishing heretics, so no grafts or other
unholy business, understood?
jpnChrName: ぜひぜひ──あ、でも人間に“移植”したら 即座に外法認定ですからご注意を！
jpnSearchText:
ぜひぜひ──あ、でも人間に“移植”したら
即座に外法認定ですからご注意を！

row: Dark Doctor Isabel / Guardian Knight Lion
engChrName: Heeheeheehee! / Aaahahahaha!
engSearchText: Heeheeheehee! / Aaahahahaha!
engHtmlText: 闇女医イザベル／守護騎士リオン
jpnChrName: ヒーッヒッヒッヒ！！ アーッハッハッハ！！
jpnSearchText:
ヒーッヒッヒッヒ！！
アーッハッハッハ！！

engChrName: Nope. No problems here. Just a sadist and a quack feeding off each other. Your average day in the underground.
engSearchText:
Nope. No problems here. Just a sadist and a quack
feeding off each other. Your average day in
the underground.
jpnChrName: ……ドＳとヤバいのごった煮で カオスになってねーか……？
jpnSearchText:
……ドＳとヤバいのごった煮で
カオスになってねーか……？

engChrName: I don't anticipate things getting too out of hand with Leon to mediate, but you two exercise restraint nonetheless, yes?
engSearchText:
I don't anticipate things getting too out of hand with
Leon to mediate, but you two exercise restraint
nonetheless, yes?
jpnChrName: ふむ……リオンが付いていれば 大事には至らぬと思うが……程々にな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……リオンが付いていれば
大事には至らぬと思うが……程々にな。

engChrName: The fact that Zin and Walter haven't come back yet tells me that they've found a promising lead above ground.
engSearchText:
The fact that Zin and Walter haven't come back yet
tells me that they've found a promising lead
above ground.
jpnChrName: ジンとヴァルターが戻らない所を見ると、 地上の方の調査はそれぞれ順調なようね。
jpnSearchText:
ジンとヴァルターが戻らない所を見ると、
地上の方の調査はそれぞれ順調なようね。

engChrName: I'm just keeping an eye on things down here, for my part. I'm still prepared to rendezvous with them, should the need arise.
engSearchText:
I'm just keeping an eye on things down here, for
my part. I'm still prepared to rendezvous with them,
should the need arise.
jpnChrName: 私の方でも状況を見極めつつ 必要な時に合流できるよう手を打ちましょう。
jpnSearchText:
私の方でも状況を見極めつつ
必要な時に合流できるよう手を打ちましょう。

engChrName: Granted, it's not exactly a good look for the CID to just play catch-up to the other factions out and about.
engSearchText:
Granted, it's not exactly a good look for the CID to
just play catch-up to the other factions out and about.
jpnChrName: ……しかし、後手に回ってばかりでは ＣＩＤの名が廃るというもの。
jpnSearchText:
……しかし、後手に回ってばかりでは
ＣＩＤの名が廃るというもの。

engChrName: We may not have the answers to everything, but I think we're close. Now's the time to pool our evidence together and start connecting the dots.
engSearchText:
We may not have the answers to everything, but I
think we're close. Now's the time to pool our
evidence together and start connecting the dots.
jpnChrName: まだ不明瞭なことはあれど そろそろ終局を見据えて動く必要がありそうね。
jpnSearchText:
まだ不明瞭なことはあれど
そろそろ終局を見据えて動く必要がありそうね。

engChrName: Ulgh... I can't make sense of all this shit. I'm getting a headache just thinking about it.
engSearchText:
Ulgh... I can't make sense of all this shit. I'm getting a
headache just thinking about it.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、理解が追い付かない事ばかりで 頭が痛いが……
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、理解が追い付かない事ばかりで
頭が痛いが……

engChrName: At least my older sister is okay. That's a relief... Now we just gotta figure out how to stop this mess.
engSearchText:
At least my older sister is okay. That's a relief...
Now we just gotta figure out how to stop this mess.
jpnChrName: ひとまず姉は無事なようで安心した。 あとはどうにか解決の糸口を見つけないとな。
jpnSearchText:
ひとまず姉は無事なようで安心した。
あとはどうにか解決の糸口を見つけないとな。

engChrName: *sigh* I'm concerned how President Gramheart is going to act in reaction to all this. Just gotta wait and see, I guess.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'm concerned how President Gramheart is
going to act in reaction to all this. Just gotta wait and
see, I guess.
jpnChrName: ふう、この状況でグラムハート大統領が どう動くのかも気になる所だが……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、この状況でグラムハート大統領が
どう動くのかも気になる所だが……

engChrName: I saw a ton of booze brands I've never seen at Langport or Bermotti's joint, so I decided to give 'em a whirl, and...
engSearchText:
I saw a ton of booze brands I've never seen at
Langport or Bermotti's joint, so I decided to give 'em
a whirl, and...
jpnChrName: 煌都でもベルモッティのところでも 見ねえ酒があったから、色々試したんだが……
jpnSearchText:
煌都でもベルモッティのところでも
見ねえ酒があったから、色々試したんだが……

engChrName: ...it was not a good idea. U-Urf! Goddess, I'm gonna be sick.
engSearchText:
...it was not a good idea. U-Urf! Goddess, I'm gonna
be sick.
jpnChrName: うっぷ……それがマズかったのかもな……
jpnSearchText: うっぷ……それがマズかったのかもな……

engChrName: You guys working right now? Nice, keep it up—just don't work TOO hard, all right? No shame in taking a break every now and again.
engSearchText:
You guys working right now? Nice, keep it up—just
don't work TOO hard, all right? No shame in taking
a break every now and again.
jpnChrName: お前らは仕事中か？ まあ適当に息抜きでもしながら頑張れよ。
jpnSearchText:
お前らは仕事中か？
まあ適当に息抜きでもしながら頑張れよ。

engChrName: We've got lots of colorful folks down here already, and it's not even festival time yet.
engSearchText:
We've got lots of colorful folks down here already,
and it's not even festival time yet.
jpnChrName: そういえば記念祭前だってのに 色々と面白い人が集まってるみたいじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば記念祭前だってのに
色々と面白い人が集まってるみたいじゃない。

engChrName: Hardly any point trying to babysit Jack here—it'll turn out like it always does. Maybe I'll just take a walk and see what's around here.
engSearchText:
Hardly any point trying to babysit Jack here—it'll
turn out like it always does. Maybe I'll just take a walk
and see what's around here.
jpnChrName: ジャックの介護ばっかしてるのも割に合わないし、 ぶらっと街を周ってみようかな～。
jpnSearchText:
ジャックの介護ばっかしてるのも割に合わないし、
ぶらっと街を周ってみようかな～。

engChrName: *hic* Water... I need...water...
engSearchText: *hic* Water... I need...water...
jpnChrName: ヒック……水をくれ水を～……
jpnSearchText: ヒック……水をくれ水を～……

engChrName: I told you to take it easy on the hard stuff while we're here. We're not on our home turf! You can't expect them to make stuff the same here.
engSearchText:
I told you to take it easy on the hard stuff while
we're here. We're not on our home turf! You can't
expect them to make stuff the same here.
jpnChrName: だから程々にしなって言ったのに…… ここはウチの店じゃないんだからね！？
jpnSearchText:
だから程々にしなって言ったのに……
ここはウチの店じゃないんだからね！？

engChrName: Oh, hey. Didn't realize you two were in Edith. Looks like you're havin' a real fun time.
engSearchText:
Oh, hey. Didn't realize you two were in Edith.
Looks like you're havin' a real fun time.
jpnChrName: よう、お前らも首都に来てたのか。 随分楽しそうにしてるじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
よう、お前らも首都に来てたのか。
随分楽しそうにしてるじゃねえか？

engChrName: Hey there, good to see you.
engSearchText: Hey there, good to see you.
jpnChrName: あら、ヴァン達じゃない。
jpnSearchText: あら、ヴァン達じゃない。

engChrName: We've been working like dogs on the broker stuff. Thought we could use a break and now here we are. Just having the time of our lives...
engSearchText:
We've been working like dogs on the broker stuff.
Thought we could use a break and now here we are.
Just having the time of our lives...
jpnChrName: ここ最近は情報屋として働き詰めだったんで 息抜きにと思ってな……
jpnSearchText:
ここ最近は情報屋として働き詰めだったんで
息抜きにと思ってな……

engChrName: So what dragged you two all the way here? You on their tail, I take it?
engSearchText:
So what dragged you two all the way here? You on
their tail, I take it?
jpnChrName: また首都に来てるくらいだしな。 ……やっぱり《Ａ》絡みって所か。
jpnSearchText:
また首都に来てるくらいだしな。
……やっぱり《Ａ》絡みって所か。

engChrName: Yup. We're trying to figure out how the underworld's changing now that they're gone—and you can really only do that on the ground.
engSearchText:
Yup. We're trying to figure out how the underworld's
changing now that they're gone—and you can really
only do that on the ground.
jpnChrName: ええ、あれだけの組織が消えたとなると “裏”への余波は計り知れないからね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、あれだけの組織が消えたとなると
“裏”への余波は計り知れないからね。

engChrName: It's pretty calm so far, surprisingly—more than I expected. Maybe it's because the CID was so on top of the stragglers.
engSearchText:
It's pretty calm so far, surprisingly—more than
I expected. Maybe it's because the CID was so on top
of the stragglers.
jpnChrName: でも思ってたよりは、落ち着いてる印象かな。 ＣＩＤが徹底的に関係者を検挙してるおかげかも。
jpnSearchText:
でも思ってたよりは、落ち着いてる印象かな。
ＣＩＤが徹底的に関係者を検挙してるおかげかも。

engChrName: Probably. Now that those smug pricks aren't running around, the underground's settling back down.
engSearchText:
Probably. Now that those smug pricks aren't running
around, the underground's settling back down.
jpnChrName: ああ、今までデカい顔をしてた連中が消えた事で、 裏社会なりの秩序が段々と戻ってきてる印象だな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、今までデカい顔をしてた連中が消えた事で、
裏社会なりの秩序が段々と戻ってきてる印象だな。

engChrName: Those drugs, though... Those'll be sticking around for a while. It's a lot tougher to get those off the streets.
engSearchText:
Those drugs, though... Those'll be sticking around for
a while. It's a lot tougher to get those off the streets.
jpnChrName: とはいえ《Ａ》が蒔いた薬の影響は 簡単に消えそうにはねえが。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ《Ａ》が蒔いた薬の影響は
簡単に消えそうにはねえが。

engChrName: That does make sense... That's unfortunate.
engSearchText: That does make sense... That's unfortunate.
jpnChrName: 薬、ですか……
jpnSearchText: 薬、ですか……

engChrName: Actually, this chat just reminded me of something.
engSearchText: Actually, this chat just reminded me of something.
jpnChrName: あ、そういえば。
jpnSearchText: あ、そういえば。

engChrName: I've heard whispers about some two-bit gangster who's on the run from the feds now, after he did some work for those guys.
engSearchText:
I've heard whispers about some two-bit gangster
who's on the run from the feds now, after he did
some work for those guys.
jpnChrName: 下請けをしてた半グレが 当局から必死で逃げてるって噂もあったわね。
jpnSearchText:
下請けをしてた半グレが
当局から必死で逃げてるって噂もあったわね。

engChrName: Word is, he's camping out somewhere in the Tyrell District. I don't have anything else to go on, but I figured you might wanna know.
engSearchText:
Word is, he's camping out somewhere in the
Tyrell District. I don't have anything else to go on,
but I figured you might wanna know.
jpnChrName: タイレル地区のどこかに潜伏してるかもって 話だったけど……まあ参考程度にしておいて。
jpnSearchText:
タイレル地区のどこかに潜伏してるかもって
話だったけど……まあ参考程度にしておいて。

engChrName: The Tyrell District, huh? Hmm...
engSearchText: The Tyrell District, huh? Hmm...
jpnChrName: う～ん、タイレル地区ですか……
jpnSearchText: う～ん、タイレル地区ですか……

engChrName: Oh, that's a good tip. 'Preciate it.
engSearchText: Oh, that's a good tip. 'Preciate it.
jpnChrName: 情報提供ありがとよ。
jpnSearchText: 情報提供ありがとよ。

engChrName: Well, have fun, you two. Just try to stay on your feet, Jack, all right?
engSearchText:
Well, have fun, you two. Just try to stay on your feet,
Jack, all right?
jpnChrName: ま、これ以上酔い潰れねえ程度に ゆっくりしてけよな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、これ以上酔い潰れねえ程度に
ゆっくりしてけよな。

engChrName: Before I forget, I wanted to mention that you might see a familiar airship above the skies of Edith in time for the festival.
engSearchText:
Before I forget, I wanted to mention that you might
see a familiar airship above the skies of Edith in time
for the festival.
jpnChrName: そういえば記念祭の日には 例の飛行船を持って来る予定なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば記念祭の日には
例の飛行船を持って来る予定なんだ。

engChrName: The Principality plans to make a big splash with it— all part of our efforts to strengthen our ties with Calvard.
engSearchText:
The Principality plans to make a big splash with it—
all part of our efforts to strengthen our ties
with Calvard.
jpnChrName: 公国から式典への協力の一環として、 催し物を行う予定だそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
公国から式典への協力の一環として、
催し物を行う予定だそうだ。

engChrName: You should receive more information on the details erelong.
engSearchText:
You should receive more information on the
details erelong.
jpnChrName: ふふ、詳細については 近い内に君たちにも連絡が行くと思うよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、詳細については
近い内に君たちにも連絡が行くと思うよ。

engChrName: Whoa... THAT airship? The one you were kind enough to lend me in Oración? That's amazing!
engSearchText:
Whoa... THAT airship? The one you were kind
enough to lend me in Oración? That's amazing!
jpnChrName: 飛行船ですか……！ オラシオンの一件では貸して頂きましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
飛行船ですか……！
オラシオンの一件では貸して頂きましたけど……

engChrName: Man, subtlety ain't in your vocabulary, is it? Still, thanks for lettin' us know. We'll keep an eye out for that follow-up.
engSearchText:
Man, subtlety ain't in your vocabulary, is it?
Still, thanks for lettin' us know. We'll keep an eye out
for that follow-up.
jpnChrName: 勿体ぶるじゃないですか。 ま、連絡を待たせてもらいますよ。
jpnSearchText:
勿体ぶるじゃないですか。
ま、連絡を待たせてもらいますよ。

engChrName: I knew my time wouldn't be wasted exploring this district, but I wasn't expecting to find all this down here... Very curious, indeed.
engSearchText:
I knew my time wouldn't be wasted exploring this
district, but I wasn't expecting to find all this
down here... Very curious, indeed.
jpnChrName: はは、黒芒街も散策のし甲斐がありそうだが この巡り会わせもまた興味深い。
jpnSearchText:
はは、黒芒街も散策のし甲斐がありそうだが
この巡り会わせもまた興味深い。

engChrName: Naje may grumble about being here, but deep down, I can tell she's intrigued herself.
engSearchText:
Naje may grumble about being here, but deep down, I
can tell she's intrigued herself.
jpnChrName: ナージェも口ではああ言いながら 興味があるんじゃないかな。
jpnSearchText:
ナージェも口ではああ言いながら
興味があるんじゃないかな。

engChrName: You should join us and watch. We would love your company, my friend.
engSearchText:
You should join us and watch. We would love your
company, my friend.
jpnChrName: 良ければ君たちも観戦していくといい。
jpnSearchText: 良ければ君たちも観戦していくといい。

engChrName: I really object to staying in this vulgar den... We have no further business down here. I say we leave posthaste.
engSearchText:
I really object to staying in this vulgar den...
We have no further business down here.
I say we leave posthaste.
jpnChrName: 用事も済みましたし、これ以上このような 猥雑な場所に留まる事は望ましくないのですが。
jpnSearchText:
用事も済みましたし、これ以上このような
猥雑な場所に留まる事は望ましくないのですが。

engChrName: But, as His Highness is wont to do, he'll be staying down here as long as he pleases... *sigh*
engSearchText:
But, as His Highness is wont to do, he'll be staying
down here as long as he pleases... *sigh*
jpnChrName: 殿下の様子をみるに、 大人しく引き上げるつもりは無さそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
殿下の様子をみるに、
大人しく引き上げるつもりは無さそうですね。

engChrName: Bah! Money-grubbin' fox, tryna gouge me at a time like this...
engSearchText:
Bah! Money-grubbin' fox, tryna gouge me at a time
like this...
jpnChrName: チッ、何だこの爺さん 足元見て来やがって……
jpnSearchText:
チッ、何だこの爺さん
足元見て来やがって……

engChrName: *sigh* But I can't go without that stuff. Price hike or no, I gotta deal with it.
engSearchText:
*sigh* But I can't go without that stuff. Price hike or
no, I gotta deal with it.
jpnChrName: だが、少し割高でも必要なモンは必要だしな……
jpnSearchText: だが、少し割高でも必要なモンは必要だしな……

engChrName: Everything good? If someone's gougin' you, I can try and give 'em a word or two.
engSearchText:
Everything good? If someone's gougin' you, I can try
and give 'em a word or two.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫か？　ぼったくられそうなら手を貸すぜ。
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫か？　ぼったくられそうなら手を貸すぜ。

engChrName: Oh, you guys. Good work on everything you've done so far. I can only imagine how rough it's been out there.
engSearchText:
Oh, you guys. Good work on everything you've done
so far. I can only imagine how rough it's been
out there.
jpnChrName: おお、お前らか。 こんな所までわざわざご苦労なこったな。
jpnSearchText:
おお、お前らか。
こんな所までわざわざご苦労なこったな。

engChrName: Don't worry about me, though—I'm just a stubborn bastard. I'll figure this out one way or the other.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about me, though—I'm just a
stubborn bastard. I'll figure this out one way or
the other.
jpnChrName: こちとら譲れねえ所は譲らねえよ。 一丁前に心配してんじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
こちとら譲れねえ所は譲らねえよ。
一丁前に心配してんじゃねえ。

engChrName: Oh. Hello, Supervisor. I didn't know you were here.
engSearchText: Oh. Hello, Supervisor. I didn't know you were here.
jpnChrName: 親方、こちらにいたんですね。
jpnSearchText: 親方、こちらにいたんですね。

engChrName: Yep. I'm gatherin' up parts for a li'l bunker buster.
engSearchText: Yep. I'm gatherin' up parts for a li'l bunker buster.
jpnChrName: ああ、障壁解除の装置に 使えそうなパーツを調達してる所だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、障壁解除の装置に
使えそうなパーツを調達してる所だ。

engChrName: Looks like this place has some good stuff to work with, thankfully—shouldn't take me long to get packed up here.
engSearchText:
Looks like this place has some good stuff to work
with, thankfully—shouldn't take me long to get
packed up here.
jpnChrName: 偶然とはいえ使えそうな連中もいるし、 手早く見繕えるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
偶然とはいえ使えそうな連中もいるし、
手早く見繕えるだろ。

engChrName: Like I said, I'm doing just fine. You kids focus on your own business instead. I'm sure that's been givin' you enough grief as is.
engSearchText:
Like I said, I'm doing just fine. You kids focus on
your own business instead. I'm sure that's been givin'
you enough grief as is.
jpnChrName: こっちの事は心配いらねえから、 お前らはテメエの心配でもしておくこったな。
jpnSearchText:
こっちの事は心配いらねえから、
お前らはテメエの心配でもしておくこったな。

engChrName: Heh heh. 'Preciate it, sir. You take care out there, yeah?
engSearchText:
Heh heh. 'Preciate it, sir. You take care out
there, yeah?
jpnChrName: ハッ、そいつは頼もしいな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、そいつは頼もしいな。

engChrName: What he said. We'll see you later, Supervisor!
engSearchText: What he said. We'll see you later, Supervisor!
jpnChrName: はは、本当にね。 それじゃあまた後で……！
jpnSearchText:
はは、本当にね。
それじゃあまた後で……！

engChrName: What is it? You need somethin' from me?
engSearchText: What is it? You need somethin' from me?
jpnChrName: どうした？　俺に用事か。
jpnSearchText: どうした？　俺に用事か。

engChrName: Yeah. Wanted you to check somethin' out.
engSearchText: Yeah. Wanted you to check somethin' out.
jpnChrName: ああ、ちょいと 見て貰いたいモンがあってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ちょいと
見て貰いたいモンがあってな。

engChrName: Van showed Giscard the Onyx Stel.
engSearchText: Van showed Giscard the Onyx Stel.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはジスカール技術長に黒玉鋼を見せた。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンはジスカール技術長に黒玉鋼を見せた。

engChrName: ...Well, I'll be damned. That's real Onyx Steel, all right.
engSearchText:
...Well, I'll be damned. That's real Onyx Steel,
all right.
jpnChrName: 驚いた……こいつは黒玉鋼じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: 驚いた……こいつは黒玉鋼じゃねえか。

engChrName: Goes by Star Steel as well. It's a real potent metal— dangerous, too.
engSearchText:
Goes by Star Steel as well. It's a real potent metal—
dangerous, too.
jpnChrName: 星鋼とも呼ばれる、 脅威的な硬度を持つ鉱石だ。
jpnSearchText:
星鋼とも呼ばれる、
脅威的な硬度を持つ鉱石だ。

engChrName: Nice. I figured you'd know a thing or two about it.
engSearchText: Nice. I figured you'd know a thing or two about it.
jpnChrName: 流石は親方、知ってんだな。
jpnSearchText: 流石は親方、知ってんだな。

engChrName: That I do. But this is only my second time layin' eyes on it... It's been ages and ages.
engSearchText:
That I do. But this is only my second time layin' eyes
on it... It's been ages and ages.
jpnChrName: つっても、俺も若い頃に一度見ただけだが。
jpnSearchText: つっても、俺も若い頃に一度見ただけだが。

engChrName: As I recall, only a precious few Eastern blacksmiths had the skill—and the right—to work with it.
engSearchText:
As I recall, only a precious few Eastern blacksmiths
had the skill—and the right—to work with it.
jpnChrName: そん時は確か、東方でも指折りの名工にしか 加工できないっつう話だったな。
jpnSearchText:
そん時は確か、東方でも指折りの名工にしか
加工できないっつう話だったな。

engChrName: Lookin' at it, though, this isn't just one thing. It's a Zemurian Ore alloy.
engSearchText:
Lookin' at it, though, this isn't just one thing. It's a
Zemurian Ore alloy.
jpnChrName: だが今なら分かるぜ……こいつは ゼムリア鉱を含んだ特殊な合金だってことがな。
jpnSearchText:
だが今なら分かるぜ……こいつは
ゼムリア鉱を含んだ特殊な合金だってことがな。

engChrName: Zemurian Ore? That rings a bell...
engSearchText: Zemurian Ore? That rings a bell...
jpnChrName: ゼムリア鉱……聞いたことはあるな。
jpnSearchText: ゼムリア鉱……聞いたことはあるな。

engChrName: Aren't the Empire's Divine Knights made from that stuff?
engSearchText:
Aren't the Empire's Divine Knights made from
that stuff?
jpnChrName: 確か帝国の《騎神》が そいつで出来てたんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
確か帝国の《騎神》が
そいつで出来てたんじゃねえか。

engChrName: Yup.
engSearchText: Yup.
jpnChrName: ああ、その通りだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、その通りだ。

engChrName: Incidentally, it was Professor Russell who figured out how to process it.
engSearchText:
Incidentally, it was Professor Russell who figured out
how to process it.
jpnChrName: ちなみにゼムリア鉱の加工法は ラッセル博士が……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにゼムリア鉱の加工法は
ラッセル博士が……

engChrName: After that, Professor Schmidt synthesized this alloy with it—called it Black Zemurian Ore.
engSearchText:
After that, Professor Schmidt synthesized this alloy
with it—called it Black Zemurian Ore.
jpnChrName: その合金でもある黒ゼムリア鉱については シュミット博士が加工法を確立してある。
jpnSearchText:
その合金でもある黒ゼムリア鉱については
シュミット博士が加工法を確立してある。

engChrName: Man, those three sure get around, huh?
engSearchText: Man, those three sure get around, huh?
jpnChrName: って、おなじみ三高弟かよ。
jpnSearchText: って、おなじみ三高弟かよ。

engChrName: This, though, this would be as hard to process— harder, even—than Black Zemurian Ore.
engSearchText:
This, though, this would be as hard to process—
harder, even—than Black Zemurian Ore.
jpnChrName: ま、つうわけで加工難易度は黒ゼムリア鉱に 匹敵するレベルかそれ以上ってとこだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、つうわけで加工難易度は黒ゼムリア鉱に
匹敵するレベルかそれ以上ってとこだろうが……

engChrName: I do know a thing or two about processin' the stuff, though. Given enough time, I can probably make this work.
engSearchText:
I do know a thing or two about processin' the
stuff, though. Given enough time, I can probably
make this work.
jpnChrName: 博士たちが確立した加工法なら頭に入ってるからな。 俺なら黒玉鋼を扱うことができるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
博士たちが確立した加工法なら頭に入ってるからな。
俺なら黒玉鋼を扱うことができるはずだ。

engChrName: Bein' honest, it's a good chance to test my skills, heh heh. You want a weapon outta this? I'll do it for free.
engSearchText:
Bein' honest, it's a good chance to test my skills,
heh heh. You want a weapon outta this? I'll do it
for free.
jpnChrName: ま、こちらとしてもいい機会だ。 武器を造るってんならタダで引き受けてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、こちらとしてもいい機会だ。
武器を造るってんならタダで引き受けてやるよ。

engChrName: Yo, heh. I ain't sayin' no to that.
engSearchText: Yo, heh. I ain't sayin' no to that.
jpnChrName: はは、そいつは助かるぜ。
jpnSearchText: はは、そいつは助かるぜ。

engChrName: Full disclosure, making weapons with this amount is only going to be enough to arm a single person.
engSearchText:
Full disclosure, making weapons with this amount is
only going to be enough to arm a single person.
jpnChrName: ちなみにこの量なら、一人分の メインパーツを造ってやれるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにこの量なら、一人分の
メインパーツを造ってやれるだろう。

engChrName: Once you've picked what you want, come lemme know.
engSearchText:
Once you've picked what you want, come
lemme know.
jpnChrName: 誰の武器にするか決まったら声をかけな。
jpnSearchText: 誰の武器にするか決まったら声をかけな。

engChrName: Got it. Thanks.
engSearchText: Got it. Thanks.
jpnChrName: 了解だ。
jpnSearchText: 了解だ。

engChrName: I've gotta make do with the stuff I've got here. It's all well built, at least, so I can't complain too much.
engSearchText:
I've gotta make do with the stuff I've got here. It's all
well built, at least, so I can't complain too much.
jpnChrName: 即席の装置になるが、どいつもこいつも 的確な構築をして来やがってな。
jpnSearchText:
即席の装置になるが、どいつもこいつも
的確な構築をして来やがってな。

engChrName: Ultimately, I just gotta shut up and get those eggheads what they need. I'm the chief engineer for a reason!
engSearchText:
Ultimately, I just gotta shut up and get those
eggheads what they need. I'm the chief engineer for
a reason!
jpnChrName: “天才”達のご要望に答えていいモンを 造ってみせねえと技術長の名が廃るってモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
“天才”達のご要望に答えていいモンを
造ってみせねえと技術長の名が廃るってモンだ。

engChrName: So don't you worry about us. You just do your prep work and I'll make sure you head out there in the best equipment you can get.
engSearchText:
So don't you worry about us. You just do your prep
work and I'll make sure you head out there in the best
equipment you can get.
jpnChrName: 必ずお前らを送り出してみせる。 だから今はテメエの心配をしておくこったな。
jpnSearchText:
必ずお前らを送り出してみせる。
だから今はテメエの心配をしておくこったな。

engChrName: All right. Whose weapon do you need me to work on?
engSearchText:
All right. Whose weapon do you need me to
work on?
jpnChrName: で、誰の武器パーツが必要なんだ？
jpnSearchText: で、誰の武器パーツが必要なんだ？

engChrName: Could you make me a stun caliber?
engSearchText: Could you make me a stun caliber?
jpnChrName: なら──俺の撃剣（スタンキャリバー）を頼めるか？
jpnSearchText: なら──俺の撃剣（スタンキャリバー）を頼めるか？

engChrName: Could you make Agnès an orbal staff?
engSearchText: Could you make Agnès an orbal staff?
jpnChrName: なら── アニエスの導力杖（オーバルスタッフ）を頼めるか。
jpnSearchText:
なら──
アニエスの導力杖（オーバルスタッフ）を頼めるか。

engChrName: A-Are you sure? I appreciate it.
engSearchText: A-Are you sure? I appreciate it.
jpnChrName: い、いいんですか…… ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
い、いいんですか……
ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Could you make Feri a rifleblade?
engSearchText: Could you make Feri a rifleblade?
jpnChrName: なら── フェリの突撃剣（アサルトソード）を頼めるか。
jpnSearchText:
なら──
フェリの突撃剣（アサルトソード）を頼めるか。

engChrName: Oh, thank you so much! This is an honor!
engSearchText: Oh, thank you so much! This is an honor!
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます、光栄です！
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございます、光栄です！

engChrName: Could you make Aaron a set of twin blades?
engSearchText: Could you make Aaron a set of twin blades?
jpnChrName: なら── アーロンの双星剣を頼めるか。
jpnSearchText:
なら──
アーロンの双星剣を頼めるか。

engChrName: Heh, much obliged. They won't go to waste.
engSearchText: Heh, much obliged. They won't go to waste.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、分かってんじゃねえかオッサン。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、分かってんじゃねえかオッサン。

engChrName: Could you make Risette a blade gear?
engSearchText: Could you make Risette a blade gear?
jpnChrName: なら── リゼットのブレードギアを頼めるか。
jpnSearchText:
なら──
リゼットのブレードギアを頼めるか。

engChrName: Oh, goodness. Most appreciated, thank you.
engSearchText: Oh, goodness. Most appreciated, thank you.
jpnChrName: すみません、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: すみません、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Could you make Quatre an orbal pulse gun?
engSearchText: Could you make Quatre an orbal pulse gun?
jpnChrName: なら── カトルのパルスガンを頼めるか。
jpnSearchText:
なら──
カトルのパルスガンを頼めるか。

engChrName: R-Really? I... Thank you, Van.
engSearchText: R-Really? I... Thank you, Van.
jpnChrName: い、いいんですか…… すみません、ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText:
い、いいんですか……
すみません、ヴァンさん。

engChrName: Could you make Judith a shooting star whip?
engSearchText: Could you make Judith a shooting star whip?
jpnChrName: なら── ジュディスの流星鞭（ステラビュート）を頼めるか。
jpnSearchText:
なら──
ジュディスの流星鞭（ステラビュート）を頼めるか。

engChrName: My, you're a class act!
engSearchText: My, you're a class act!
jpnChrName: フフ、いい心がけね。
jpnSearchText: フフ、いい心がけね。

engChrName: Could you make Master some gauntlets?
engSearchText: Could you make Master some gauntlets?
jpnChrName: なら──師父（せんせい）の籠手を頼めるか。
jpnSearchText: なら──師父（せんせい）の籠手を頼めるか。

engChrName: Oho? Well, thank you, Van.
engSearchText: Oho? Well, thank you, Van.
jpnChrName: ふむ、すまぬなヴァン。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、すまぬなヴァン。

engChrName: Sorry. Need a moment to think about it.
engSearchText: Sorry. Need a moment to think about it.
jpnChrName: すまねえ、もう少し 考える時間をもらっていいか？
jpnSearchText:
すまねえ、もう少し
考える時間をもらっていいか？

engChrName: Take your time.
engSearchText: Take your time.
jpnChrName: ハッ、別に構わねえよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、別に構わねえよ。
