engChrName: Bet'cher ass.
engSearchText: Bet'cher ass.
jpnChrName: 任せときな。
jpnSearchText: 任せときな。

engChrName: Van's group retrieved the equipment from Old Town and put Giscard to work on their new weapons.
engSearchText:
Van's group retrieved the equipment from Old Town
and put Giscard to work on their new weapons.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは旧市街の工房を借りて、 ジスカール親方に武器を造ってもらうのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは旧市街の工房を借りて、
ジスカール親方に武器を造ってもらうのだった。

engChrName: Aaand there ya go! She's all finished!
engSearchText: Aaand there ya go! She's all finished!
jpnChrName: そらよ、完成だ！
jpnSearchText: そらよ、完成だ！

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_VAN_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_VAN_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Oh, yeah... This here's the GOOD shit.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah... This here's the GOOD shit.
jpnChrName: こいつは……すげえ武器だな。
jpnSearchText: こいつは……すげえ武器だな。

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_AGNES_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_AGNES_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Oh, goodness. I can already tell this is an incredible staff.
engSearchText:
Oh, goodness. I can already tell this is an
incredible staff.
jpnChrName: これは……すごい性能ですね。
jpnSearchText: これは……すごい性能ですね。

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_FERI_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_FERI_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Whoooa! This looks incredible!
engSearchText: Whoooa! This looks incredible!
jpnChrName: これは──素晴らしい武器ですね！
jpnSearchText: これは──素晴らしい武器ですね！

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_AARON_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_AARON_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Well, holy hot damn. I'm giddy already.
engSearchText: Well, holy hot damn. I'm giddy already.
jpnChrName: ハッ、こいつはすげえワザモンだな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、こいつはすげえワザモンだな。

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_RISETTE_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_RISETTE_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: This craftsmanship is just transcendent. My thanks.
engSearchText: This craftsmanship is just transcendent. My thanks.
jpnChrName: これは……見事な逸品ですね。
jpnSearchText: これは……見事な逸品ですね。

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_QUATRE_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_QUATRE_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: This is an excellent weapon.
engSearchText: This is an excellent weapon.
jpnChrName: これは……凄まじい出力ですね。
jpnSearchText: これは……凄まじい出力ですね。

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_JUDITH_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_JUDITH_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Oooh! I can't believe how good this thing is!
engSearchText: Oooh! I can't believe how good this thing is!
jpnChrName: 驚いた──本当に見事な武器ね。
jpnSearchText: 驚いた──本当に見事な武器ね。

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_BERGARD_80}を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_BERGARD_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Now, this... This is a fine weapon indeed.
engSearchText: Now, this... This is a fine weapon indeed.
jpnChrName: ほう……これは見事な武器だな。
jpnSearchText: ほう……これは見事な武器だな。

engChrName: Your skills are the real deal. No wonder you're the head of Basel's artisans.
engSearchText:
Your skills are the real deal. No wonder you're the
head of Basel's artisans.
jpnChrName: にしても、見事な腕前だぜ。 伊達にバーゼルの職人を束ねてねえな。
jpnSearchText:
にしても、見事な腕前だぜ。
伊達にバーゼルの職人を束ねてねえな。

engChrName: Oh, it ain't nothin'. Plenty of people who could make those.
engSearchText:
Oh, it ain't nothin'. Plenty of people who could
make those.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、このくらい俺じゃなくても出来ら。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、このくらい俺じゃなくても出来ら。

engChrName: Anyway, if you pick up any more Onyx Steel, you let me know.
engSearchText:
Anyway, if you pick up any more Onyx Steel, you let
me know.
jpnChrName: ともあれ、またどっかで 黒玉鋼が手に入ったら俺に言え。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、またどっかで
黒玉鋼が手に入ったら俺に言え。

engChrName: If you're okay with me working it, I'll always be happy to help.
engSearchText:
If you're okay with me working it, I'll always be happy
to help.
jpnChrName: 俺の腕で良けりゃあ、いつでも振るってやる。
jpnSearchText: 俺の腕で良けりゃあ、いつでも振るってやる。

engChrName: 'Preciate it, Supervisor.
engSearchText: 'Preciate it, Supervisor.
jpnChrName: はは、助かるぜ親方。
jpnSearchText: はは、助かるぜ親方。

engChrName: I've gotta make do with the stuff I've got here. It's all well built, at least, so I can't complain too much.
engSearchText:
I've gotta make do with the stuff I've got here. It's all
well built, at least, so I can't complain too much.
jpnChrName: 即席の装置になるが、どいつもこいつも 的確な構築をして来やがってな。
jpnSearchText:
即席の装置になるが、どいつもこいつも
的確な構築をして来やがってな。

engChrName: Ultimately, I just gotta shut up and get those eggheads what they need. I'm the chief engineer for a reason!
engSearchText:
Ultimately, I just gotta shut up and get those
eggheads what they need. I'm the chief engineer for
a reason!
jpnChrName: “天才”達のご要望に答えていいモンを 造ってみせねえと技術長の名が廃るってモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
“天才”達のご要望に答えていいモンを
造ってみせねえと技術長の名が廃るってモンだ。

engChrName: So don't you worry about us. You just do your prep work and I'll make sure you head out there in the best equipment you can get.
engSearchText:
So don't you worry about us. You just do your prep
work and I'll make sure you head out there in the best
equipment you can get.
jpnChrName: 必ずお前らを送り出してみせる。 だから今はテメエの心配をしておくこったな。
jpnSearchText:
必ずお前らを送り出してみせる。
だから今はテメエの心配をしておくこったな。

engChrName: Oh? I see you got your hands on some Onyx Steel.
engSearchText: Oh? I see you got your hands on some Onyx Steel.
jpnChrName: ほう、黒玉鋼が手に入ったのか。
jpnSearchText: ほう、黒玉鋼が手に入ったのか。

engChrName: All right. Whose weapon do you need me to work on?
engSearchText:
All right. Whose weapon do you need me to
work on?
jpnChrName: いいぜ、誰の武器パーツが必要だ？
jpnSearchText: いいぜ、誰の武器パーツが必要だ？

engChrName: Bet'cher ass.
engSearchText: Bet'cher ass.
jpnChrName: 任せときな。
jpnSearchText: 任せときな。

engChrName: Van's group retrieved the equipment from Old Town and put Giscard to work on their new weapons.
engSearchText:
Van's group retrieved the equipment from Old Town
and put Giscard to work on their new weapons.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは旧市街の工房を借りて、 ジスカール親方に武器を造ってもらうのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは旧市街の工房を借りて、
ジスカール親方に武器を造ってもらうのだった。

engChrName: Aaand there ya go! She's all finished!
engSearchText: Aaand there ya go! She's all finished!
jpnChrName: そらよ、完成だ！
jpnSearchText: そらよ、完成だ！

engChrName: Obtained  .
engSearchText:
Obtained
.

jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_VAN_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Obtained  .

jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_WEAP_M_BERGARD_80}を手に入れた。

engChrName: Seein' you go at it never fails to impress.
engSearchText: Seein' you go at it never fails to impress.
jpnChrName: ハッ、何度見ても惚れ惚れすんな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、何度見ても惚れ惚れすんな。

engChrName: Thanks, Supervisor.
engSearchText: Thanks, Supervisor.
jpnChrName: あんがとよ、親方。
jpnSearchText: あんがとよ、親方。

engChrName: I've gotta make do with the stuff I've got here. It's all well built, at least, so I can't complain too much.
engSearchText:
I've gotta make do with the stuff I've got here. It's all
well built, at least, so I can't complain too much.
jpnChrName: 即席の装置になるが、どいつもこいつも 的確な構築をして来やがってな。
jpnSearchText:
即席の装置になるが、どいつもこいつも
的確な構築をして来やがってな。

engChrName: Ultimately, I just gotta shut up and get those eggheads what they need. I'm the chief engineer for a reason!
engSearchText:
Ultimately, I just gotta shut up and get those
eggheads what they need. I'm the chief engineer for
a reason!
jpnChrName: “天才”達のご要望に答えていいモンを 造ってみせねえと技術長の名が廃るってモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
“天才”達のご要望に答えていいモンを
造ってみせねえと技術長の名が廃るってモンだ。

engChrName: So don't you worry about us. You just do your prep work and I'll make sure you head out there in the best equipment you can get.
engSearchText:
So don't you worry about us. You just do your prep
work and I'll make sure you head out there in the best
equipment you can get.
jpnChrName: 必ずお前らを送り出してみせる。 だから今はテメエの心配をしておくこったな。
jpnSearchText:
必ずお前らを送り出してみせる。
だから今はテメエの心配をしておくこったな。

engChrName: I never thought I'd get another opportunity like this after that whole game in Oración.
engSearchText:
I never thought I'd get another opportunity like this
after that whole game in Oración.
jpnChrName: ふふ、オラシオンでのゲーム以外で こんな縁に恵まれるだなんて思わなかったよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、オラシオンでのゲーム以外で
こんな縁に恵まれるだなんて思わなかったよ。

engChrName: Maybe I should make a habit of visiting the Revolution Festival EVERY year, if it's gonna be like this!
engSearchText:
Maybe I should make a habit of visiting the
Revolution Festival EVERY year, if it's gonna be
like this!
jpnChrName: 今年から記念祭には 毎年参加するようにしようかな？
jpnSearchText:
今年から記念祭には
毎年参加するようにしようかな？

engChrName: Please, no. You stir up enough trouble as is.
engSearchText: Please, no. You stir up enough trouble as is.
jpnChrName: マジで迷惑だから止めてくれ……
jpnSearchText: マジで迷惑だから止めてくれ……

engChrName: Enough about me, though. You guys look like you've got your hands full with things as usual, which I totally get.
engSearchText:
Enough about me, though. You guys look like you've
got your hands full with things as usual, which I
totally get.
jpnChrName: 君たちの方は相変わらず忙しそうだね。
jpnSearchText: 君たちの方は相変わらず忙しそうだね。

engChrName: Can't take it easy just yet, what with the festival just around the corner and the fallout from everything with you-know-who.
engSearchText:
Can't take it easy just yet, what with the festival just
around the corner and the fallout from everything
with you-know-who.
jpnChrName: 《Ａ》の反動、記念祭直前のこの時期、 確かに油断ならない状況だろうが──
jpnSearchText:
《Ａ》の反動、記念祭直前のこの時期、
確かに油断ならない状況だろうが──

engChrName: But don't you guys get the feeling there has to be more going on? I don't know what, but it's like there's something else brewing in the air.
engSearchText:
But don't you guys get the feeling there has to be
more going on? I don't know what, but it's like there's
something else brewing in the air.
jpnChrName: 今首都に果たしてそれだけかな──？ どうにも予感めいたものを感じるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
今首都に果たしてそれだけかな──？
どうにも予感めいたものを感じるけどね。

engChrName: Sure you're not just being paranoid? Keep talking like that and you're going to jinx us, girl.
engSearchText:
Sure you're not just being paranoid? Keep talking like
that and you're going to jinx us, girl.
jpnChrName: なんだそりゃ？ 不吉な事言うんじゃねーよ。
jpnSearchText:
なんだそりゃ？
不吉な事言うんじゃねーよ。

engChrName: Never a dull moment with you, is there, Van Arkride? Heehee.
engSearchText:
Never a dull moment with you, is there, Van Arkride?
Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふ、やっぱり君は面白いな。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、やっぱり君は面白いな。

engChrName: What is it people like to say about you? That you have a 'nose' for things? It reminds me a lot of the Unclouded Eye.
engSearchText:
What is it people like to say about you? That you
have a 'nose' for things? It reminds me a lot of the
Unclouded Eye.
jpnChrName: 観の眼にも似た…… いや、君特有の“嗅覚”だったかな？
jpnSearchText:
観の眼にも似た……
いや、君特有の“嗅覚”だったかな？

engChrName: Well, whatever comes our way, both in the festival and beyond, I'm gonna take it all in stride and have a blast doing it!
engSearchText:
Well, whatever comes our way, both in the festival
and beyond, I'm gonna take it all in stride and have a
blast doing it!
jpnChrName: いずれにせよ、来たる記念祭ともども 気ままに楽しませてもらうとしようじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
いずれにせよ、来たる記念祭ともども
気ままに楽しませてもらうとしようじゃないか。

engChrName: I know you guys can't help being busy right now, but you should consider taking some time off, too. I think you'll be glad you did.
engSearchText:
I know you guys can't help being busy right now, but
you should consider taking some time off, too. I think
you'll be glad you did.
jpnChrName: ふふ、君たちが忙しいのは分かるけど 少しくらい楽しんで行ったらどう？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、君たちが忙しいのは分かるけど
少しくらい楽しんで行ったらどう？

engChrName: If you ever want more company, I'm always happy to tag along!
engSearchText:
If you ever want more company, I'm always happy to
tag along!
jpnChrName: 乱入だっていつでも歓迎するよ。
jpnSearchText: 乱入だっていつでも歓迎するよ。

engChrName: I didn't think there was any fun to be had at the festival, but this might've changed my mind.
engSearchText:
I didn't think there was any fun to be had at the
festival, but this might've changed my mind.
jpnChrName: 記念祭なんざ面白みのねえ祭りだと思ってたが、 こういう縁があるってんなら悪くねえ。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭なんざ面白みのねえ祭りだと思ってたが、
こういう縁があるってんなら悪くねえ。

engChrName: I can't even remember the last time I squared off against the Golden Butterfly. Bet your ass I'm booking this rematch.
engSearchText:
I can't even remember the last time I squared off
against the Golden Butterfly. Bet your ass I'm
booking this rematch.
jpnChrName: 黄金蝶とやり合うのなんざいつぶりだ？ この機会に楽しませてもらおうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
黄金蝶とやり合うのなんざいつぶりだ？
この機会に楽しませてもらおうじゃねえか。

engChrName: Why? Why must a pure, Goddess-fearing Calvardian such as I endure such humiliation?!
engSearchText:
Why? Why must a pure, Goddess-fearing Calvardian
such as I endure such humiliation?!
jpnChrName: く……何故俺が……… 真のカルバード国民がこんな目に……！？
jpnSearchText:
く……何故俺が………
真のカルバード国民がこんな目に……！？

engChrName: I had to be rescued from those monsters breathing down my neck—and not by one of my own, but by... by a MIGRANT girl!
engSearchText:
I had to be rescued from those monsters breathing
down my neck—and not by one of my own, but by...
by a MIGRANT girl!
jpnChrName: 化物に追われ、命からがら逃げ回り…… しかも途中で移民の娘に救われるなどと……！
jpnSearchText:
化物に追われ、命からがら逃げ回り……
しかも途中で移民の娘に救われるなどと……！

engChrName: Unbelievable. Simply unbelievable! This is an outrage!
engSearchText:
Unbelievable. Simply unbelievable! This is
an outrage!
jpnChrName: あ、あり得ぬ……あり得ぬぞぉぉぉ！！！
jpnSearchText: あ、あり得ぬ……あり得ぬぞぉぉぉ！！！

engChrName: What a farce! Having my funding cut off was bad enough. Now people are accusing me of working for Almata! Can you believe that?!
engSearchText:
What a farce! Having my funding cut off was bad
enough. Now people are accusing me of working
for Almata! Can you believe that?!
jpnChrName: く……何たる事だ、資金源が断たれたばかりか、 俺までアルマータとの関係を疑われるとは！
jpnSearchText:
く……何たる事だ、資金源が断たれたばかりか、
俺までアルマータとの関係を疑われるとは！

engChrName: I couldn't care less what happens to those goons—the last thing I need is the authorities going after me!
engSearchText:
I couldn't care less what happens to those goons—the
last thing I need is the authorities going after me!
jpnChrName: あんな連中、どうでもいいが こっちまで当局に追われかねないぞ──！
jpnSearchText:
あんな連中、どうでもいいが
こっちまで当局に追われかねないぞ──！

engChrName: Heh, what's got your panties in a bunch, old man?
engSearchText: Heh, what's got your panties in a bunch, old man?
jpnChrName: ハッ、どうしたオッサン。 ンなところで何をブツクサ言ってやがんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、どうしたオッサン。
ンなところで何をブツクサ言ってやがんだ？

engChrName: Har har har! Hey, barkeep! Get this stuffy fart some drinks! The man's still too sober, and that won't do!
engSearchText:
Har har har! Hey, barkeep! Get this stuffy fart
some drinks! The man's still too sober, and that
won't do!
jpnChrName: ヒヒャヒャ！　俺らが酔い潰してやろうかァ！？
jpnSearchText: ヒヒャヒャ！　俺らが酔い潰してやろうかァ！？

engChrName: You stay out of this, you backward cretins! You people epitomize everything I detest—you and this wretched district are the scum of the earth!
engSearchText:
You stay out of this, you backward cretins!
You people epitomize everything I detest—you and
this wretched district are the scum of the earth!
jpnChrName: ええい！！　下品な連中どもめ！！ イーディスの暗黒街の斯様（かよう）な堕落ぶりよ！！
jpnSearchText:
ええい！！　下品な連中どもめ！！
イーディスの暗黒街の斯様（かよう）な堕落ぶりよ！！

engChrName: Hmph! And I'll pull this whole bloodsucking weed from the ground up if I have to! That is my duty to this fine country!
engSearchText:
Hmph! And I'll pull this whole bloodsucking weed
from the ground up if I have to! That is my duty to
this fine country!
jpnChrName: くっ……やはりこの俺が 新たな体制を立ち上げねば──！！
jpnSearchText:
くっ……やはりこの俺が
新たな体制を立ち上げねば──！！

engChrName: (Oh, I remember this racist prick. Still up his own ass, from the sounds of it.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, I remember this racist prick. Still up his own ass,
from the sounds of it.)
jpnChrName: （あの時のレイシスト野郎か……さして   懲りちゃいないようではあるが……）
jpnSearchText:
（あの時のレイシスト野郎か……さして
懲りちゃいないようではあるが……）

engChrName: (Think I'll just leave him be for now. He won't be causin' any trouble lookin' as scrawny as that— everybody here'll just laugh at him.)
engSearchText:
(Think I'll just leave him be for now. He won't be
causin' any trouble lookin' as scrawny as that—
everybody here'll just laugh at him.)
jpnChrName: （ま、この様子じゃ当分はデカい事も   起こせそうにもねぇし放っておくか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、この様子じゃ当分はデカい事も
起こせそうにもねぇし放っておくか。）

engChrName: (There's that far-right 'activist' again. Guess those assholes in Oración were funding his efforts, too.)
engSearchText:
(There's that far-right 'activist' again. Guess those
assholes in Oración were funding his efforts, too.)
jpnChrName: （時折見かける極右の活動家か……こいつも   やはりオラシオンの連中が資金源だったか。）
jpnSearchText:
（時折見かける極右の活動家か……こいつも
やはりオラシオンの連中が資金源だったか。）

engChrName: (Guess he flew a little too close to the sun. Maybe if we're lucky, he'll wise up and start changin' his tune. Maybe.)
engSearchText:
(Guess he flew a little too close to the sun. Maybe if
we're lucky, he'll wise up and start changin' his tune.
Maybe.)
jpnChrName: （ま、調子に乗り過ぎていたようだし、これで   少しは懲りてくれるとせいせいするな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、調子に乗り過ぎていたようだし、これで
少しは懲りてくれるとせいせいするな。）

engChrName: Despite calling themselves the 'Patriot League,' those spineless fools are all too quick to silence us ACTUAL patriots.
engSearchText:
Despite calling themselves the 'Patriot League,' those
spineless fools are all too quick to silence us
ACTUAL patriots.
jpnChrName: このままでは我々のような 憂国の徒がますます委縮する一方だ！
jpnSearchText:
このままでは我々のような
憂国の徒がますます委縮する一方だ！

engChrName: We're a dying breed, I tell you. The more they reject us, the more they kill the idea of patriotism itself!
engSearchText:
We're a dying breed, I tell you. The more they reject
us, the more they kill the idea of patriotism itself!
jpnChrName: 現政権も《愛国同盟》を名乗りながら俺達には 当然のように弾圧を加えてくるし……
jpnSearchText:
現政権も《愛国同盟》を名乗りながら俺達には
当然のように弾圧を加えてくるし……

engChrName: Surely there must be SOMEONE who sympathizes with us? Someone who truly cares...but where? Where are they hiding?!
engSearchText:
Surely there must be SOMEONE who sympathizes
with us? Someone who truly cares...but where?
Where are they hiding?!
jpnChrName: くそ、どこかに……他に、我々を 支えてくれる同志はいないのか……！？
jpnSearchText:
くそ、どこかに……他に、我々を
支えてくれる同志はいないのか……！？

engChrName: Well, here we are. The place the city's very worst call home.
engSearchText:
Well, here we are. The place the city's very worst
call home.
jpnChrName: 《黒芒街》── 首都イーディスの吹き溜まり。
jpnSearchText:
《黒芒街》──
首都イーディスの吹き溜まり。

engChrName: For how long it's been around, it's kinda crazy how much more lively it's gotten in the past few years.
engSearchText:
For how long it's been around, it's kinda crazy how
much more lively it's gotten in the past few years.
jpnChrName: 昔からあったが、 この２年で更に賑わいやがったな。
jpnSearchText:
昔からあったが、
この２年で更に賑わいやがったな。

engChrName: No kidding. You won't find it on any map, yet people are still somehow finding their way down here.
engSearchText:
No kidding. You won't find it on any map, yet people
are still somehow finding their way down here.
jpnChrName: ああ、地図には載っていない “十三番目”の街区。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、地図には載っていない
“十三番目”の街区。

engChrName: But what criminal WOULDN'T be tempted by a literal lawless zone where they can let off all the steam they damn well please?
engSearchText:
But what criminal WOULDN'T be tempted by a
literal lawless zone where they can let off all the steam
they damn well please?
jpnChrName: 地下に広がる治外法権地域にして、 裏の住人のガス抜きの溜まり場……
jpnSearchText:
地下に広がる治外法権地域にして、
裏の住人のガス抜きの溜まり場……

engChrName: Might be a bit much for your little ones to handle right now, though.
engSearchText:
Might be a bit much for your little ones to handle
right now, though.
jpnChrName: お前さんのとこの若いのには ちょいと刺激が強すぎるかもな。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんのとこの若いのには
ちょいと刺激が強すぎるかもな。

engChrName: ...Yeah. Hate to do it, but I gotta introduce 'em to it eventually.
engSearchText:
...Yeah. Hate to do it, but I gotta introduce 'em to
it eventually.
jpnChrName: ……ま、その内にとは思ってるさ。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、その内にとは思ってるさ。

engChrName: Can't stay ignorant of its existence forever when you're in this line of work.
engSearchText:
Can't stay ignorant of its existence forever when
you're in this line of work.
jpnChrName: こういう商売をやる以上、 知らねえわけにはいかねぇからな。
jpnSearchText:
こういう商売をやる以上、
知らねえわけにはいかねぇからな。

engChrName: Heh. True enough.
engSearchText: Heh. True enough.
jpnChrName: そうか……フフ。
jpnSearchText: そうか……フフ。

engChrName: So my impression of you being a mother hen looking after her chicks wasn't so far off after all, huh?
engSearchText:
So my impression of you being a mother hen looking
after her chicks wasn't so far off after all, huh?
jpnChrName: そんな気はしちゃいたが ちゃんと保護者してるじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
そんな気はしちゃいたが
ちゃんと保護者してるじゃないか？

engChrName: Oh, can it. So where're we goin'?
engSearchText: Oh, can it. So where're we goin'?
jpnChrName: うるせえな。 ……で、どこに向かうんだ？
jpnSearchText:
うるせえな。
……で、どこに向かうんだ？

engChrName: Well, let's peek in at the nearby bars for starters.
engSearchText: Well, let's peek in at the nearby bars for starters.
jpnChrName: ああ、とりあえずは そこらの飲み屋を覗いていくぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、とりあえずは
そこらの飲み屋を覗いていくぞ。

engChrName: Watch your back, all right?
engSearchText: Watch your back, all right?
jpnChrName: 一応、気を付けとけよ？
jpnSearchText: 一応、気を付けとけよ？

engChrName: I know.
engSearchText: I know.
jpnChrName: ああ、分かってる。
jpnSearchText: ああ、分かってる。

engChrName: ...You're shittin' me, right?
engSearchText: ...You're shittin' me, right?

engChrName: Sorry to hold things up.
engSearchText: Sorry to hold things up.
jpnChrName: すまん、待たせたようだな。
jpnSearchText: すまん、待たせたようだな。

engChrName: How delightful it is to see you, Mr. Arkride. And you as well, Immovable.
engSearchText:
How delightful it is to see you, Mr. Arkride. And you
as well, Immovable.
jpnChrName: やあヴァンさん、しばらく。 《不動》殿もご無沙汰しています。
jpnSearchText:
やあヴァンさん、しばらく。
《不動》殿もご無沙汰しています。

engChrName: You sure took your sweet-ass time.
engSearchText: You sure took your sweet-ass time.
jpnChrName: クク、遅かったじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: クク、遅かったじゃねえか。

engChrName: Didn't expect Arkride to be with ya, though.
engSearchText: Didn't expect Arkride to be with ya, though.
jpnChrName: しかしお前まで来るとはなァ、 アークライド。
jpnSearchText:
しかしお前まで来るとはなァ、
アークライド。

engChrName: I'm just here to do him a favor.
engSearchText: I'm just here to do him a favor.
jpnChrName: ……ただの付き添いだ、付き添い。
jpnSearchText: ……ただの付き添いだ、付き添い。

engChrName: But if I'd known we were comin' to see SCUMBAGS like YOU, I'd have turned him straight down.
engSearchText:
But if I'd known we were comin' to see
SCUMBAGS like YOU, I'd have turned him
straight down.
jpnChrName: こんなロクでもねぇ集まりだと 分かってたら、ハナから断ってたが。
jpnSearchText:
こんなロクでもねぇ集まりだと
分かってたら、ハナから断ってたが。

engChrName: Come on, now. No need to be like that.
engSearchText: Come on, now. No need to be like that.
jpnChrName: まあ、そう言うなよ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、そう言うなよ。

engChrName: I knew you were in Calvard, but it's hard to believe it's been two years since I last saw your face, eh, Walter?
engSearchText:
I knew you were in Calvard, but it's hard to believe
it's been two years since I last saw your face,
eh, Walter?
jpnChrName: ヴァルター──２年ぶりだな。 共和国に来ているのは知ってたが。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァルター──２年ぶりだな。
共和国に来ているのは知ってたが。

engChrName: Not since Jormungandr, huh?
engSearchText: Not since Jormungandr, huh?
jpnChrName: クク、大地の竜（ヨルムンガンド）以来か。
jpnSearchText: クク、大地の竜（ヨルムンガンド）以来か。

engChrName: Bugged the hell outta me we weren't even able to use that chance to settle the score between us.
engSearchText:
Bugged the hell outta me we weren't even able to use
that chance to settle the score between us.
jpnChrName: 結局あの時も決着が付かなかったのだけは 心残りだがなァ。
jpnSearchText:
結局あの時も決着が付かなかったのだけは
心残りだがなァ。

engChrName: Heh. Same here.
engSearchText: Heh. Same here.
jpnChrName: フッ、それはこっちも同じとして……
jpnSearchText: フッ、それはこっちも同じとして……

engChrName: So, I'm sure it's no coincidence I was suddenly able to meet you so easily?
engSearchText:
So, I'm sure it's no coincidence I was suddenly able to
meet you so easily?
jpnChrName: こんなにあっさり会えたってことは そういう事でいいんだな？
jpnSearchText:
こんなにあっさり会えたってことは
そういう事でいいんだな？

engChrName: Aye. Spoke to these two before you showed up, but...
engSearchText: Aye. Spoke to these two before you showed up, but...
jpnChrName: ああ──てめぇが来る前に 《白蘭竜》やソイツとも確認したが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ──てめぇが来る前に
《白蘭竜》やソイツとも確認したが……

engChrName: ...meetups like this here and there ain't such a bad idea with how little we know about those guys.
engSearchText:
...meetups like this here and there ain't such a bad
idea with how little we know about those guys.
jpnChrName: たまにはこういうのもアリだろう。 奴らの底がまだ見えてこねぇ以上は。
jpnSearchText:
たまにはこういうのもアリだろう。
奴らの底がまだ見えてこねぇ以上は。

engChrName: ...I see now.
engSearchText: ...I see now.
jpnChrName: ……なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほどな。

engChrName: We're all after Almata, so we're here to trade information on 'em.
engSearchText:
We're all after Almata, so we're here to trade
information on 'em.
jpnChrName: つまりは“情報交換”ってワケか。 《アルマータ》を追う者同士としての。
jpnSearchText:
つまりは“情報交換”ってワケか。
《アルマータ》を追う者同士としての。

engChrName: Didn't think I'd chance into a gathering this major. So, who's our imposing friend?
engSearchText:
Didn't think I'd chance into a gathering this major.
So, who's our imposing friend?
jpnChrName: ここまでの面子とは思わなかったが── で、そっちのいかにもやりそうな御仁は？
jpnSearchText:
ここまでの面子とは思わなかったが──
で、そっちのいかにもやりそうな御仁は？

engChrName: I ask that you proceed as though I am not present.
engSearchText: I ask that you proceed as though I am not present.
jpnChrName: ……自分については 居ないものとして扱って頂こう。
jpnSearchText:
……自分については
居ないものとして扱って頂こう。

engChrName: Think of me as a random traveler who happened to be here when you arrived.
engSearchText:
Think of me as a random traveler who happened to
be here when you arrived.
jpnChrName: 偶然飲み屋で行き合わせた 旅行者とでも思ってくれればいい。
jpnSearchText:
偶然飲み屋で行き合わせた
旅行者とでも思ってくれればいい。

engChrName: That's, uh, asking a lot...
engSearchText: That's, uh, asking a lot...
jpnChrName: いや、無理があんだろ……
jpnSearchText: いや、無理があんだろ……

engChrName: Though the coat and you being part of this group gives me an idea of who you're affiliated with.
engSearchText:
Though the coat and you being part of this group
gives me an idea of who you're affiliated with.
jpnChrName: その外套に、この集まりにいる時点で どこ関係かは絞れそうな気がするがね。
jpnSearchText:
その外套に、この集まりにいる時点で
どこ関係かは絞れそうな気がするがね。

engChrName: To kick this thing off, it's proving impossible to even learn more about Almata at this point.
engSearchText:
To kick this thing off, it's proving impossible to even
learn more about Almata at this point.
jpnChrName: ……実際、アルマータについては 探りを入れることすらままならなくてな。
jpnSearchText:
……実際、アルマータについては
探りを入れることすらままならなくてな。

engChrName: Heard a report the other day that a bracer on an undercover op on them still hasn't come back.
engSearchText:
Heard a report the other day that a bracer on an
undercover op on them still hasn't come back.
jpnChrName: 先日も、内偵していた地方の遊撃士が いまだに戻らないって報告を受けている。
jpnSearchText:
先日も、内偵していた地方の遊撃士が
いまだに戻らないって報告を受けている。

engChrName: We have been in much the same position ever since the situation in Langport.
engSearchText:
We have been in much the same position ever since
the situation in Langport.
jpnChrName: 成程──煌都の事件以降、 黒月（うち）も似たような状況でして。
jpnSearchText:
成程──煌都の事件以降、
黒月（うち）も似たような状況でして。

engChrName: Not long ago, a cold-blooded warning video was sent to our council of elders. The kind meant to serve as an example.
engSearchText:
Not long ago, a cold-blooded warning video was sent
to our council of elders. The kind meant to serve as
an example.
jpnChrName: 少し前に長老会に“見せしめ”の 映像が送り付けられたこともありました。
jpnSearchText:
少し前に長老会に“見せしめ”の
映像が送り付けられたこともありました。

engChrName: Ugh...
engSearchText: Ugh...
jpnChrName: ………そうか。
jpnSearchText: ………そうか。

engChrName: They just keep getting worse.
engSearchText: They just keep getting worse.
jpnChrName: チッ、加速してやがるな……
jpnSearchText: チッ、加速してやがるな……

engChrName: We've had nothin' like that on our end, but there is one guy up top who can't seem to wipe the smile off his face since they cropped up.
engSearchText:
We've had nothin' like that on our end, but there is
one guy up top who can't seem to wipe the smile off
his face since they cropped up.
jpnChrName: 結社（ウチ）はそういうのはねぇが 上に一人、妙に面白がってるのがいてな。
jpnSearchText:
結社（ウチ）はそういうのはねぇが
上に一人、妙に面白がってるのがいてな。

engChrName: He's one real shitbag, so if HE likes 'em, you know they're real monsters.
engSearchText:
He's one real shitbag, so if HE likes 'em, you know
they're real monsters.
jpnChrName: あの面倒くせぇオヤジが乗り気な時点で 最高にイカれた連中なのは間違いねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText:
あの面倒くせぇオヤジが乗り気な時点で
最高にイカれた連中なのは間違いねぇだろ。

engChrName: Sounds to me like we all think we're better off crushin' 'em before they become even more of a headache.
engSearchText:
Sounds to me like we all think we're better off
crushin' 'em before they become even more of
a headache.
jpnChrName: クク──これ以上面倒にならねえうちに 潰すべきっつーのは同じみたいだなァ？
jpnSearchText:
クク──これ以上面倒にならねえうちに
潰すべきっつーのは同じみたいだなァ？

engChrName: This guy—he the one you mentioned a while back?
engSearchText: This guy—he the one you mentioned a while back?
jpnChrName: 面倒くせぇオヤジ…… アンタが言ってたヤツか。
jpnSearchText:
面倒くせぇオヤジ……
アンタが言ってたヤツか。

engChrName: I've got a list of questions from the Oathbreaker, so start running your mouth—or I'll run my fist through your face.
engSearchText:
I've got a list of questions from the Oathbreaker, so
start running your mouth—or I'll run my fist through
your face.
jpnChrName: 《破戒》のオッサンのリクエストだ。 少しばかり話を聞かせてもらおうかァ？
jpnSearchText:
《破戒》のオッサンのリクエストだ。
少しばかり話を聞かせてもらおうかァ？

engChrName: (The infamous Fourth Anguis, huh? Doesn't quite sit right...)
engSearchText:
(The infamous Fourth Anguis, huh? Doesn't quite
sit right...)
jpnChrName: （噂の“第四柱”……   ……微妙に引っかかるが………）
jpnSearchText:
（噂の“第四柱”……
……微妙に引っかかるが………）

engChrName: I imagine our definitions of 'crush' differ here, but at least we know where we all stand now.
engSearchText:
I imagine our definitions of 'crush' differ here, but at
least we know where we all stand now.
jpnChrName: ……潰すというのの解釈はどうあれ、 お互いのスタンスは確認できたか。
jpnSearchText:
……潰すというのの解釈はどうあれ、
お互いのスタンスは確認できたか。

engChrName: Save for our friend keeping his cards to his chest there, anyway. It sounds like the CID's up to something, too.
engSearchText:
Save for our friend keeping his cards to his chest
there, anyway. It sounds like the CID's up to
something, too.
jpnChrName: そちらの御仁はノーコメントみたいだが ＣＩＤも独自に動いているようだ。
jpnSearchText:
そちらの御仁はノーコメントみたいだが
ＣＩＤも独自に動いているようだ。

engChrName: Still, wish I could figure out just what their 'boss' is thinking.
engSearchText:
Still, wish I could figure out just what their 'boss'
is thinking.
jpnChrName: まぁ、あちらさんの“バック”は イマイチ何を考えてるか分からんがなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
まぁ、あちらさんの“バック”は
イマイチ何を考えてるか分からんがなぁ。

engChrName: Old Rocksmith's successor, huh? Heard some colorful rumors about him myself.
engSearchText:
Old Rocksmith's successor, huh? Heard some colorful
rumors about him myself.
jpnChrName: クク、ロックスミスの後釜かよ。 色々面白そうな噂も聞いているが……
jpnSearchText:
クク、ロックスミスの後釜かよ。
色々面白そうな噂も聞いているが……

engChrName: But knowin' he's turned a blind eye to a hole like this makes him all right in my book.
engSearchText:
But knowin' he's turned a blind eye to a hole like this
makes him all right in my book.
jpnChrName: こんな場所を黙認してる時点で なかなかハナシが判りそうじゃねーか？
jpnSearchText:
こんな場所を黙認してる時点で
なかなかハナシが判りそうじゃねーか？

engChrName: Indeed. President Rocksmith was a broadminded fellow in his own right...
engSearchText:
Indeed. President Rocksmith was a broadminded
fellow in his own right...
jpnChrName: ええ、ロックスミス閣下も 清濁併せ呑むところはありましたが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ロックスミス閣下も
清濁併せ呑むところはありましたが……

engChrName: ...but the current president has proven even more receptive toward us. Some of the elders are rather fond of him.
engSearchText:
...but the current president has proven even more
receptive toward us. Some of the elders are rather
fond of him.
jpnChrName: “当代”の方が融通が利いて 歓迎されている長老方もおりますねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
“当代”の方が融通が利いて
歓迎されている長老方もおりますねぇ。

engChrName: Though that does also make him a far more formidable foe during negotiations.
engSearchText:
Though that does also make him a far more
formidable foe during negotiations.
jpnChrName: まあその分──いえそれ以上に 油断ならない交渉相手とも言えますが。
jpnSearchText:
まあその分──いえそれ以上に
油断ならない交渉相手とも言えますが。

engChrName: *sigh* From our perspective, the president's willingness to work with you guys is one giant, flapping red flag.
engSearchText:
*sigh* From our perspective, the president's
willingness to work with you guys is one giant,
flapping red flag.
jpnChrName: ふう、俺たちからすりゃあ 組まれてる時点で大問題なんだがなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
ふう、俺たちからすりゃあ
組まれてる時点で大問題なんだがなぁ？

engChrName: Oh, do not misunderstand! All of our cooperative efforts are in line with your guild's code. Heaven forbid otherwise.
engSearchText:
Oh, do not misunderstand! All of our cooperative
efforts are in line with your guild's code.
Heaven forbid otherwise.
jpnChrName: いえいえ、あくまでそちらの規約には 配慮させていただいていますので……
jpnSearchText:
いえいえ、あくまでそちらの規約には
配慮させていただいていますので……

engChrName: Can you guys not probe each other while I'm stuck right in the middle?
engSearchText:
Can you guys not probe each other while I'm stuck
right in the middle?
jpnChrName: って、人の頭越しに 腹の探り合いしてんじゃねーよ……
jpnSearchText:
って、人の頭越しに
腹の探り合いしてんじゃねーよ……

engChrName: I feel like I don't even need to be here anymore.
engSearchText: I feel like I don't even need to be here anymore.
jpnChrName: 情報交換はともかく俺がいる必要あんのか？
jpnSearchText: 情報交換はともかく俺がいる必要あんのか？

engChrName: Easy, Arkride. Your part's just about to come up.
engSearchText: Easy, Arkride. Your part's just about to come up.
jpnChrName: クク、まあ待てやアークライド。 ここからが“俺たち”の本題だからよ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、まあ待てやアークライド。
ここからが“俺たち”の本題だからよ。

engChrName: Walter...
engSearchText: Walter...
jpnChrName: ヴァルター……
jpnSearchText: ヴァルター……

engChrName: Heh. It ain't often we get a chance like this, and you can't PICK a better place.
engSearchText:
Heh. It ain't often we get a chance like this, and you
can't PICK a better place.
jpnChrName: クク……滅多にない機会に、 おあつらえ向きの場所──
jpnSearchText:
クク……滅多にない機会に、
おあつらえ向きの場所──

engChrName: You weren't satisfied with how we ended two years ago, either, so what say we pick it up where we left off? Right here, right now.
engSearchText:
You weren't satisfied with how we ended two years
ago, either, so what say we pick it up where we
left off? Right here, right now.
jpnChrName: 消化不良だった２年前の続き、 片付けたいのはてめぇも同じだろうが？
jpnSearchText:
消化不良だった２年前の続き、
片付けたいのはてめぇも同じだろうが？

engChrName: Hah. Sounds like a plan.
engSearchText: Hah. Sounds like a plan.
jpnChrName: ……フフ、違いない。
jpnSearchText: ……フフ、違いない。

engChrName: Wait! You saw this coming, didn't you?!
engSearchText: Wait! You saw this coming, didn't you?!
jpnChrName: って、アンタ予想してやがったな！？
jpnSearchText: って、アンタ予想してやがったな！？

engChrName: Hell no! I ain't here to watch two monsters beatin' the crap outta—
engSearchText:
Hell no! I ain't here to watch two monsters beatin'
the crap outta—
jpnChrName: 冗談じゃねえ、 化物同士の立ち会いなんかに──
jpnSearchText:
冗談じゃねえ、
化物同士の立ち会いなんかに──

engChrName: Who said you'd watch? You and White Orchid Dragon are joinin'.
engSearchText:
Who said you'd watch? You and White Orchid
Dragon are joinin'.
jpnChrName: つーわけでアークライド、 《白蘭竜》も付き合ってけや。
jpnSearchText:
つーわけでアークライド、
《白蘭竜》も付き合ってけや。

engChrName: Come on. Exchange info, exchange blows—either way, we're gettin' to know each other.
engSearchText:
Come on. Exchange info, exchange blows—either
way, we're gettin' to know each other.
jpnChrName: なぁに、これもあくまで“交流”だ。 お互いのことを分かり合うっつうなァ。
jpnSearchText:
なぁに、これもあくまで“交流”だ。
お互いのことを分かり合うっつうなァ。

engChrName: I admit to some reluctance standing between combatants of your caliber...
engSearchText:
I admit to some reluctance standing between
combatants of your caliber...
jpnChrName: フフ、達人同士の立ち会いに 水を差すのも気が引けますが──
jpnSearchText:
フフ、達人同士の立ち会いに
水を差すのも気が引けますが──

engChrName: ...but I am also not one to pass up a chance to face Mr. Arkride and the famed Zin the Immovable.
engSearchText:
...but I am also not one to pass up a chance to face
Mr. Arkride and the famed Zin the Immovable.
jpnChrName: 《不動》殿にヴァンさんの手並みを 拝見できるのなら仕方ありませんねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
《不動》殿にヴァンさんの手並みを
拝見できるのなら仕方ありませんねぇ。

engChrName: Well, you SHOULD BE!
engSearchText: Well, you SHOULD BE!
jpnChrName: ってオイ！？
jpnSearchText: ってオイ！？

engChrName: Sorry, Arkride. But this is just how it's gotta be.
engSearchText: Sorry, Arkride. But this is just how it's gotta be.
jpnChrName: すまんなアークライド…… そういうわけで付き合ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
すまんなアークライド……
そういうわけで付き合ってくれ。

engChrName: We'd lose sight of ourselves if it was just one on one—and who knows how much damage we'd cause then?
engSearchText:
We'd lose sight of ourselves if it was just one on
one—and who knows how much damage we'd
cause then?
jpnChrName: 俺とコイツだけじゃあタガが外れて 周りにどれだけ被害を出すか判らんからな。
jpnSearchText:
俺とコイツだけじゃあタガが外れて
周りにどれだけ被害を出すか判らんからな。

engChrName: Ugh... You damn asshole!
engSearchText: Ugh... You damn asshole!
jpnChrName: ッ…… ～～～っこの熊野郎……！！
jpnSearchText:
ッ……
～～～っこの熊野郎……！！

engChrName: I shall act as observer. Fight to your hearts' content.
engSearchText: I shall act as observer. Fight to your hearts' content.
jpnChrName: 立ち会いは自分が引き受けよう。 方々、存分にやり合われるがよい。
jpnSearchText:
立ち会いは自分が引き受けよう。
方々、存分にやり合われるがよい。

engChrName: Why're you so up for this?! You're welcome to my spot, you know!
engSearchText:
Why're you so up for this?! You're welcome to my
spot, you know!
jpnChrName: アンタもノリいいな！ つーか俺の代わりに入れよ！？
jpnSearchText:
アンタもノリいいな！
つーか俺の代わりに入れよ！？

engChrName: Haha. Perhaps another time.
engSearchText: Haha. Perhaps another time.
jpnChrName: フフ…… それはまたの機会という事で。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
それはまたの機会という事で。

engChrName: Ohhhhhhhhhh! / Haaaaaaaaah!
engSearchText: Ohhhhhhhhhh! / Haaaaaaaaah!
jpnChrName: コオオオオオオオオオオッッ……          はああああああああああっっ……
jpnSearchText:
コオオオオオオオオオオッッ……
はああああああああああっっ……

engChrName: Ready...
engSearchText: Ready...
jpnChrName: いざ──
jpnSearchText: いざ──

engChrName: Ready...
engSearchText: Ready...
jpnChrName: 尋常に勝負！！！
jpnSearchText: 尋常に勝負！！！

engChrName: Begin!
engSearchText: Begin!
jpnChrName: クハハハハハハハ…… 準Ｓ級か……なんで受けねぇんだ？
jpnSearchText:
クハハハハハハハ……
準Ｓ級か……なんで受けねぇんだ？

engChrName: HAHAHAHA! And ya STILL won't accept that S-rank promotion! Why the hell not?!
engSearchText:
HAHAHAHA! And ya STILL won't accept that
S-rank promotion! Why the hell not?!
jpnChrName: まだ足りんというだけさ…… …………泰斗とは関係ない…………
jpnSearchText:
まだ足りんというだけさ……
…………泰斗とは関係ない…………

engChrName: I'm just not ready for it. My Taito skills have nothing to do with it.
engSearchText:
I'm just not ready for it. My Taito skills have nothing
to do with it.
jpnChrName: お前をここで止められれば 少しは自信が付くというものだがな……！
jpnSearchText:
お前をここで止められれば
少しは自信が付くというものだがな……！

engChrName: Though it'll sure give me a boost in confidence if I can beat you here!
engSearchText:
Though it'll sure give me a boost in confidence if I
can beat you here!
jpnChrName: カカカ……面白ぇじゃねえか…………！！
jpnSearchText: カカカ……面白ぇじゃねえか…………！！

engChrName: Heheh! Oh, yeah? Will it, now?
engSearchText: Heheh! Oh, yeah? Will it, now?
jpnChrName: ちょ、まてやオッサン共……！？
jpnSearchText: ちょ、まてやオッサン共……！？

engChrName: Wh-Whoa! The hell're you—
engSearchText: Wh-Whoa! The hell're you—
jpnChrName: おいおい……これって……
jpnSearchText: おいおい……これって……

engChrName: Uhh... Hold on a sec...
engSearchText: Uhh... Hold on a sec...
jpnChrName: ……な、なんかヤバいんじゃ……
jpnSearchText: ……な、なんかヤバいんじゃ……

engChrName: Th-This is looking real bad...
engSearchText: Th-This is looking real bad...
jpnChrName: 逃げ──あ、足が動かねえっ！？
jpnSearchText: 逃げ──あ、足が動かねえっ！？

engChrName: I gotta scram—huh? I-I can't move!
engSearchText: I gotta scram—huh? I-I can't move!
jpnChrName: これは止められなさそうですねぇ。
jpnSearchText: これは止められなさそうですねぇ。

engChrName: I fear there is no stopping this.
engSearchText: I fear there is no stopping this.
jpnChrName: フム……立ち会えて光栄だ。
jpnSearchText: フム……立ち会えて光栄だ。

engChrName: I am honored to bear witness.
engSearchText: I am honored to bear witness.
jpnChrName: オオオオオオオオオオッ……！！ はあああああああああっ……！！
jpnSearchText:
オオオオオオオオオオッ……！！
はあああああああああっ……！！

engChrName: Ohhhhhhhhhh! / Haaaaaaaaah!
engSearchText: Ohhhhhhhhhh! / Haaaaaaaaah!
jpnChrName: ──いい加減になさい。
jpnSearchText: ──いい加減になさい。

engChrName: THAT IS ENOUGH.
engSearchText: THAT IS ENOUGH.
jpnSearchText: ッ……！？

jpnChrName: おや……
jpnSearchText: おや……

engChrName: Well, then...
engSearchText: Well, then...
jpnChrName: アンタは……
jpnSearchText: アンタは……

engChrName: You're...
engSearchText: You're...
jpnChrName: キリカ……！
jpnSearchText: キリカ……！

engChrName: Kilika!
engSearchText: Kilika!
jpnChrName: ……チッ、意外と早かったな。 もう少しくらいは粘れると思ったが。
jpnSearchText:
……チッ、意外と早かったな。
もう少しくらいは粘れると思ったが。

engChrName: Tch. You got here quick. And here I was hopin' we could duke it out a little longer.
engSearchText:
Tch. You got here quick. And here I was hopin' we
could duke it out a little longer.
jpnChrName: 男同士、積もる話でもあるだろうと 気を使って見逃してあげてれば……
jpnSearchText:
男同士、積もる話でもあるだろうと
気を使って見逃してあげてれば……

engChrName: I figured you'd have a lot of catching up to do, so I thought to give you some space. A mistake on my part, I see.
engSearchText:
I figured you'd have a lot of catching up to do, so I
thought to give you some space. A mistake on my
part, I see.
jpnChrName: ──準Ｓ級にＮｏ．Ⅷが いい歳して何をやっているのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
──準Ｓ級にＮｏ．Ⅷが
いい歳して何をやっているのかしら？

engChrName: Are you a future S-rank bracer and a society Enforcer, or are you infants?
engSearchText:
Are you a future S-rank bracer and a society Enforcer,
or are you infants?
jpnChrName: ま、まあ待て！ 元はと言えばコイツがだな……
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあ待て！
元はと言えばコイツがだな……

engChrName: W-Wait a minute! This was all his fault!
engSearchText: W-Wait a minute! This was all his fault!
jpnChrName: ああ……？ テメェもノッてただろうが！？
jpnSearchText:
ああ……？
テメェもノッてただろうが！？

engChrName: Don't gimme that! You were all gung-ho until she showed up, buddy.
engSearchText:
Don't gimme that! You were all gung-ho until she
showed up, buddy.
jpnChrName: ……ガキの喧嘩かよ。
jpnSearchText: ……ガキの喧嘩かよ。

engChrName: Lookin' more and more like 'infants' from where I'm standing...
engSearchText:
Lookin' more and more like 'infants' from where
I'm standing...
jpnChrName: フフ、残念です。 最後まで見届けたかったものですが。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、残念です。
最後まで見届けたかったものですが。

engChrName: What a shame. I was rather looking forward to seeing that to its end.
engSearchText:
What a shame. I was rather looking forward to seeing
that to its end.
jpnChrName: 《飛燕紅児》殿の気当たりも見事でした。
jpnSearchText: 《飛燕紅児》殿の気当たりも見事でした。

engChrName: You are a force to be reckoned with, Flying Swallow.
engSearchText: You are a force to be reckoned with, Flying Swallow.
jpnChrName: ──解決屋さんは先月ぶりね。 ジンに巻き込まれたみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
──解決屋さんは先月ぶりね。
ジンに巻き込まれたみたいだけど。

engChrName: It's good to see you, spriggan. I see Zin is causing you trouble yet again.
engSearchText:
It's good to see you, spriggan. I see Zin is causing you
trouble yet again.
jpnChrName: それとツァオ“社長”…… クロスベル方面はいいのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
それとツァオ“社長”……
クロスベル方面はいいのかしら？

engChrName: As for you, Cao...are you sure it's all right for you to be out of Crossbell after your promotion to president?
engSearchText:
As for you, Cao...are you sure it's all right for you to
be out of Crossbell after your promotion to president?
jpnChrName: ええ、そちらは《銀》殿と 支援課に丸投げしてきましたので。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そちらは《銀》殿と
支援課に丸投げしてきましたので。

engChrName: Worry not. I foisted all responsibility there to Yin and the SSS.
engSearchText:
Worry not. I foisted all responsibility there to Yin and
the SSS.
jpnChrName: サラっと言ってんじゃねえよ……
jpnSearchText: サラっと言ってんじゃねえよ……

engChrName: This guy has no shame...
engSearchText: This guy has no shame...
jpnChrName: ──アンタはアンタで 妙な客人を連れてるみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
──アンタはアンタで
妙な客人を連れてるみたいだが。

engChrName: Looks like you brought more suspicious folks to the party.
engSearchText:
Looks like you brought more suspicious folks to
the party.
jpnChrName: ああん……？ アタシらに文句あんのか？
jpnSearchText:
ああん……？
アタシらに文句あんのか？

engChrName: What? You got a problem with us, punk?
engSearchText: What? You got a problem with us, punk?
jpnChrName: 共和国の裏解決屋（スプリガン）── いや、《崑崙（コンロン）流》の落ちこぼれ伝承者が。
jpnSearchText:
共和国の裏解決屋（スプリガン）──
いや、《崑崙（コンロン）流》の落ちこぼれ伝承者が。

engChrName: So you're the spriggan of the Republic—but personally, I think of you as the dropout of the Kunlun school.
engSearchText:
So you're the spriggan of the Republic—but
personally, I think of you as the dropout of the
Kunlun school.
jpnChrName: アンタら、まさか……
jpnSearchText: アンタら、まさか……

engChrName: Wait. Are you...?
engSearchText: Wait. Are you...?
jpnChrName: まあまあ、セリスさん。 すぐにガン付けるのは良くないですよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあまあ、セリスさん。
すぐにガン付けるのは良くないですよ。

engChrName: Now, now, Celis. It's not good to pick fights with him when you've only just met.
engSearchText:
Now, now, Celis. It's not good to pick fights with
him when you've only just met.
jpnChrName: いくら表と裏の間でフラフラしている、 どこの馬の骨とも知れない人だからって。
jpnSearchText:
いくら表と裏の間でフラフラしている、
どこの馬の骨とも知れない人だからって。

engChrName: Even if he is a shady piece of human waste from Aidios-knows-where who can't figure out which half of the moral fence he's standing on.
engSearchText:
Even if he is a shady piece of human waste from
Aidios-knows-where who can't figure out which half
of the moral fence he's standing on.

engChrName: Uhh...
engSearchText: Uhh...
jpnChrName: アタシはそこまで言ってねぇぞ…… お前の方がヒデーじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
アタシはそこまで言ってねぇぞ……
お前の方がヒデーじゃねえか。

engChrName: Wow. Even I wasn't tryin' to be THAT harsh.
engSearchText: Wow. Even I wasn't tryin' to be THAT harsh.
jpnChrName: ほう……？
jpnSearchText: ほう……？

engChrName: Curious...
engSearchText: Curious...
jpnChrName: ふむ……
jpnSearchText: ふむ……

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: いや、それにしても 案内してもらった甲斐がありますね。
jpnSearchText:
いや、それにしても
案内してもらった甲斐がありますね。

engChrName: Still, I see it was worth our while to come down here.
engSearchText: Still, I see it was worth our while to come down here.
jpnChrName: 三大拳法の使い手と、東方武術を極めた 《蛇》きっての武術（ウーシュウ）使い──
jpnSearchText:
三大拳法の使い手と、東方武術を極めた
《蛇》きっての武術（ウーシュウ）使い──

engChrName: Who knew a battle between the society's finest Eastern martial artist and a student of one of the three great schools would be waiting for us?
engSearchText:
Who knew a battle between the society's finest
Eastern martial artist and a student of one of the
three great schools would be waiting for us?
jpnChrName: それにまさか貴方と こんな場所でお目に掛かるなんて。
jpnSearchText:
それにまさか貴方と
こんな場所でお目に掛かるなんて。

engChrName: But perhaps the greatest surprise of all is seeing you.
engSearchText: But perhaps the greatest surprise of all is seeing you.
jpnSearchText: ………………………………

jpnChrName: ハッ……最近チョロチョロと 妙な動きをしてると思ってたが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……最近チョロチョロと
妙な動きをしてると思ってたが。

engChrName: Heh. Thought you were acting kinda funny lately...
engSearchText: Heh. Thought you were acting kinda funny lately...
jpnChrName: まさか《蛇》とヨロシクやってるとは いい度胸してるじゃねえか、アア？
jpnSearchText:
まさか《蛇》とヨロシクやってるとは
いい度胸してるじゃねえか、アア？

engChrName: ...but findin' out you're all buddy-buddy with the society is one thing I didn't see coming.
engSearchText:
...but findin' out you're all buddy-buddy with the
society is one thing I didn't see coming.
jpnChrName: ……何の事か分かりかねるな。
jpnSearchText: ……何の事か分かりかねるな。

engChrName: ...I haven't the faintest idea what you're talking about.
engSearchText:
...I haven't the faintest idea what you're
talking about.
jpnChrName: 自分は通りすがりの旅行者── 彼らとは偶然居合わせたにすぎない。
jpnSearchText:
自分は通りすがりの旅行者──
彼らとは偶然居合わせたにすぎない。

engChrName: I am a mere traveler who chanced upon this place and its current company. Nothing more.
engSearchText:
I am a mere traveler who chanced upon this place and
its current company. Nothing more.
jpnChrName: 捨て置いていただこうか、 オルテシア卿、バルタザール卿。
jpnSearchText:
捨て置いていただこうか、
オルテシア卿、バルタザール卿。

engChrName: I ask that you pay me no mind, Mother Celis, Father Leon.
engSearchText:
I ask that you pay me no mind, Mother Celis,
Father Leon.
jpnChrName: って認めてんじゃねーか！？
jpnSearchText: って認めてんじゃねーか！？

engChrName: You're not even trying to hide it!
engSearchText: You're not even trying to hide it!
jpnChrName: あはは、面白い人だなぁ、 “副兵長”さんは。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、面白い人だなぁ、
“副兵長”さんは。

engChrName: Ahaha! You are quite the interesting fellow, vice captain.
engSearchText:
Ahaha! You are quite the interesting fellow,
vice captain.
jpnChrName: クク、お前も大変だな？ こんな跳ねっ返りどもの引率とは。
jpnSearchText:
クク、お前も大変だな？
こんな跳ねっ返りどもの引率とは。

engChrName: Heh. Must've been a hard job bringin' a couple of runts like them down here.
engSearchText:
Heh. Must've been a hard job bringin' a couple of
runts like them down here.
jpnChrName: まあ、一応協定を結んでいるから。 貴方たちには打ってつけでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、一応協定を結んでいるから。
貴方たちには打ってつけでしょうし。

engChrName: I thought they would make a fine match for you. We do have an agreement right now, after all.
engSearchText:
I thought they would make a fine match for you.
We do have an agreement right now, after all.
jpnChrName: ──コラ、誰が跳ねっ返りだって？
jpnSearchText: ──コラ、誰が跳ねっ返りだって？

engChrName: Who're you callin' a couple of runts?!
engSearchText: Who're you callin' a couple of runts?!
jpnChrName: ブイブイ言わせてるみてーだが、 いい気になんなよ、“痩せ犬”のオッサン。
jpnSearchText:
ブイブイ言わせてるみてーだが、
いい気になんなよ、“痩せ犬”のオッサン。

engChrName: You sure can run your mouth, Direwhelp, but don't go gettin' cocky.
engSearchText:
You sure can run your mouth, Direwhelp, but don't
go gettin' cocky.
jpnChrName: そこの堅物とまとめて 思い知らせてやってもいいんだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
そこの堅物とまとめて
思い知らせてやってもいいんだぜ？

engChrName: How about I show you and that hardhead what I can REALLY do?
engSearchText:
How about I show you and that hardhead what I can
REALLY do?
jpnChrName: ……へえ。
jpnSearchText: ……へえ。

engChrName: ...Yeah?
engSearchText: ...Yeah?
jpnChrName: どう思い知らせてくれんだ、小娘？ 背中のデカいのに振り回されてそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
どう思い知らせてくれんだ、小娘？
背中のデカいのに振り回されてそうだが。

engChrName: With what, missy? That sword? Sure you're gonna be swingin' it and not the other way around?
engSearchText:
With what, missy? That sword? Sure you're gonna be
swingin' it and not the other way around?
jpnChrName: 毛も生え揃ってなさそうなガキのくせ──
jpnSearchText: 毛も生え揃ってなさそうなガキのくせ──

engChrName: How'd a teenybopper like you even get that damn—
engSearchText: How'd a teenybopper like you even get that damn—
jpnSearchText: ……２７だ。

engChrName: ...I'm twenty-seven.
engSearchText: ...I'm twenty-seven.
jpnChrName: へ。
jpnSearchText: へ。

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: アタシは２７だ、文句あるか？
jpnSearchText: アタシは２７だ、文句あるか？

engChrName: I said, I'm TWENTY-SEVEN. Any questions?
engSearchText: I said, I'm TWENTY-SEVEN. Any questions?
jpnChrName: ……ああ、そう。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、そう。

engChrName: ...Huh.
engSearchText: ...Huh.
jpnChrName: まァ……需要はあんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText: まァ……需要はあんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: Well...I guess some guys are into that kinda thing.
engSearchText: Well...I guess some guys are into that kinda thing.
jpnChrName: 殺す。
jpnSearchText: 殺す。

engChrName: You are SO dead.
engSearchText: You are SO dead.
jpnChrName: あーあ、踏んじゃいましたねぇ。 背と童顔だけは禁句なんですから。
jpnSearchText:
あーあ、踏んじゃいましたねぇ。
背と童顔だけは禁句なんですから。

engChrName: You had to step on a landmine... She hates when people talk about her little babyface and impressively short height.
engSearchText:
You had to step on a landmine... She hates when
people talk about her little babyface and impressively
short height.
jpnChrName: リオン、てめーも殺す。
jpnSearchText: リオン、てめーも殺す。

engChrName: Also dead.
engSearchText: Also dead.
jpnChrName: たく……アークライド。 代わりに相手でもしてやれよ？
jpnSearchText:
たく……アークライド。
代わりに相手でもしてやれよ？

engChrName: Ugh... I'll leave this crap to you, Arkride.
engSearchText: Ugh... I'll leave this crap to you, Arkride.
jpnChrName: なんでだよッ！！？
jpnSearchText: なんでだよッ！！？

engChrName: Why me?!
engSearchText: Why me?!
jpnChrName: ……やれやれ。 （しかしこの３人はやはり……）
jpnSearchText:
……やれやれ。
（しかしこの３人はやはり……）

engChrName: *sigh* (I have a feeling I know where these three are from...)
engSearchText:
*sigh* (I have a feeling I know where these three
are from...)
jpnChrName: あっ……いました！
jpnSearchText: あっ……いました！

engChrName: Oh! There he is!
engSearchText: Oh! There he is!

engChrName: Guys?
engSearchText: Guys?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！ ──って、ええっ！？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん……！
──って、ええっ！？

engChrName: Van! ...Wait. Huh?!
engSearchText: Van! ...Wait. Huh?!
jpnChrName: ツァオ……！？ つうかなんだそのカオスな面子！？
jpnSearchText:
ツァオ……！？
つうかなんだそのカオスな面子！？

engChrName: Cao! ...What kinda crazy party is this?!
engSearchText: Cao! ...What kinda crazy party is this?!
jpnChrName: おやアーロン、一月ぶりですねぇ。
jpnSearchText: おやアーロン、一月ぶりですねぇ。

engChrName: Well, if it isn't Aaron.
engSearchText: Well, if it isn't Aaron.
jpnChrName: おいおい…… 撒いたはずなのにどうして……
jpnSearchText:
おいおい……
撒いたはずなのにどうして……

engChrName: How'd you even find this place? I thought I threw you off my tail.
engSearchText:
How'd you even find this place? I thought I threw
you off my tail.
jpnChrName: まったく……中途半端に 関わらせるからこうなるのよ。
jpnSearchText:
まったく……中途半端に
関わらせるからこうなるのよ。

engChrName: *sigh* This is what happens when you only keep people half in the loop.
engSearchText:
*sigh* This is what happens when you only keep
people half in the loop.
jpnChrName: エレイン……
jpnSearchText: エレイン……

engChrName: Elaine...
engSearchText: Elaine...
jpnChrName: ふう、お前さんも来たのか。
jpnSearchText: ふう、お前さんも来たのか。

engChrName: *sigh* I didn't think you'd wander down here, too.
engSearchText: *sigh* I didn't think you'd wander down here, too.
jpnChrName: ちっ…… って、ありゃあ噂の──
jpnSearchText:
ちっ……
って、ありゃあ噂の──

engChrName: Ugh... Wait. Isn't she...?
engSearchText: Ugh... Wait. Isn't she...?
jpnChrName: 《乙女》殿でしたか。 ……？　隣の女性は──
jpnSearchText:
《乙女》殿でしたか。
……？　隣の女性は──

engChrName: The one and only Beauty's Blade. But the woman next to her...
engSearchText:
The one and only Beauty's Blade. But the woman
next to her...
jpnChrName: ……アニエスさんたちが 貴方を探してるのを見かけてね。
jpnSearchText:
……アニエスさんたちが
貴方を探してるのを見かけてね。

engChrName: I happened to run into them during their search for you.
engSearchText:
I happened to run into them during their search
for you.
jpnChrName: ちょっと迷ったけど── 心当たりがあったから連れてきたわ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと迷ったけど──
心当たりがあったから連れてきたわ。

engChrName: I did have my doubts on whether to bring them here or not, but as you can see... Well, in any case, I had a feeling you were here.
engSearchText:
I did have my doubts on whether to bring them here
or not, but as you can see... Well, in any case, I had a
feeling you were here.
jpnChrName: 申し訳ありません……ここまでの 状況になっているとはつゆ知らず。
jpnSearchText:
申し訳ありません……ここまでの
状況になっているとはつゆ知らず。

engChrName: My apologies. I had no idea what we were getting ourselves into.
engSearchText:
My apologies. I had no idea what we were getting
ourselves into.
jpnChrName: ですが成程──興味深い場所ですね。
jpnSearchText: ですが成程──興味深い場所ですね。

engChrName: But now that I see it, this place certainly does pique my interest.
engSearchText:
But now that I see it, this place certainly does pique
my interest.
jpnChrName: ふう、お前さんには いずれ案内するつもりだったが……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、お前さんには
いずれ案内するつもりだったが……

engChrName: *sigh* Well, I was gonna bring YOU down here at some point...
engSearchText:
*sigh* Well, I was gonna bring YOU down here at
some point...
jpnChrName: ──つーかエレイン！ なんでわざわざ連れてきやがった！？
jpnSearchText:
──つーかエレイン！
なんでわざわざ連れてきやがった！？

engChrName: ...but what's with you beating me to it, Elaine?!
engSearchText: ...but what's with you beating me to it, Elaine?!
jpnChrName: あれだけ危険に近づけんなって──
jpnSearchText: あれだけ危険に近づけんなって──

engChrName: You're the one who's constantly harpin' on about keepin' 'em outta danger!
engSearchText:
You're the one who's constantly harpin' on about
keepin' 'em outta danger!
jpnChrName: ハッ、今更だろーが。 寝ぼけてんじゃねーぞジジイ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、今更だろーが。
寝ぼけてんじゃねーぞジジイ。

engChrName: You going senile? We're used to danger.
engSearchText: You going senile? We're used to danger.
jpnChrName: ……見たところ子供も 居ないわけではありませんし。
jpnSearchText:
……見たところ子供も
居ないわけではありませんし。

engChrName: And besides, I see some other kids down here, too.
engSearchText: And besides, I see some other kids down here, too.
jpnChrName: 私たちへの配慮も分かりますが…… ただ遠ざけられるのは、寂しいです。
jpnSearchText:
私たちへの配慮も分かりますが……
ただ遠ざけられるのは、寂しいです。

engChrName: I know that you have our best interests at heart, but no one likes being kept at arm's length forever.
engSearchText:
I know that you have our best interests at heart, but
no one likes being kept at arm's length forever.

engChrName: Erk...
engSearchText: Erk...
jpnChrName: いや、すまねぇな。 巻き込んじまったみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
いや、すまねぇな。
巻き込んじまったみたいで。

engChrName: Sorry for all the trouble this ended up causing, man.
engSearchText: Sorry for all the trouble this ended up causing, man.
jpnChrName: だが良いきっかけにはなっただろう？
jpnSearchText: だが良いきっかけにはなっただろう？

engChrName: But hey, it ended up being a good chance to teach 'em about this place, no?
engSearchText:
But hey, it ended up being a good chance to teach
'em about this place, no?
jpnChrName: クソ、どの口が……
jpnSearchText: クソ、どの口が……

engChrName: Oh, please. Don't start actin' like you did nothin' wrong.
engSearchText:
Oh, please. Don't start actin' like you did
nothin' wrong.
jpnChrName: そうですよ、ジンさん。 私たちに一言の相談も無しで──
jpnSearchText:
そうですよ、ジンさん。
私たちに一言の相談も無しで──

engChrName: I'll say. I have some choice words for you, too, Zin. You didn't think to discuss your coming here with anyone else?
engSearchText:
I'll say. I have some choice words for you, too, Zin.
You didn't think to discuss your coming here with
anyone else?
jpnChrName: さすがに独断専行が過ぎるのでは？
jpnSearchText: さすがに独断専行が過ぎるのでは？

engChrName: Quite the arrogant move on your part.
engSearchText: Quite the arrogant move on your part.
jpnChrName: い、いや、それはだな……
jpnSearchText: い、いや、それはだな……

engChrName: Uhh... Well...
engSearchText: Uhh... Well...
jpnChrName: ……やれやれ。
jpnSearchText: ……やれやれ。

engChrName: *sigh*
engSearchText: *sigh*
jpnChrName: ハッ……諸々白けたぜ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……諸々白けたぜ。

engChrName: Well, fun's over. I've had enough of bein' here.
engSearchText: Well, fun's over. I've had enough of bein' here.
jpnChrName: まあいい、今日はあくまで顔合わせだ。 これ以上てめえらに用はねえ。
jpnSearchText:
まあいい、今日はあくまで顔合わせだ。
これ以上てめえらに用はねえ。

engChrName: Today was more about sayin' hi anyway. I've done what I came for.
engSearchText:
Today was more about sayin' hi anyway. I've done
what I came for.
jpnChrName: ヴァルター……
jpnSearchText: ヴァルター……

engChrName: Walter...
engSearchText: Walter...
jpnChrName: ──また会いましょう。 ここ以外だと塀の中でだけど。
jpnSearchText:
──また会いましょう。
ここ以外だと塀の中でだけど。

engChrName: We will see each other again at some point—even if the only other place I can imagine that happening is your prison cell.
engSearchText:
We will see each other again at some point—even if
the only other place I can imagine that happening is
your prison cell.
jpnChrName: ハッ……
jpnSearchText: ハッ……

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: ──それでは見知らぬ方々、 自分も失礼する。
jpnSearchText:
──それでは見知らぬ方々、
自分も失礼する。

engChrName: Well, kind strangers. If you would excuse me.
engSearchText: Well, kind strangers. If you would excuse me.
jpnChrName: ハン……ま、挨拶はこんな所か。
jpnSearchText: ハン……ま、挨拶はこんな所か。

engChrName: Yeah, that's enough hellos.
engSearchText: Yeah, that's enough hellos.
jpnChrName: 案内すまねぇな、室長さん。 アタシらも一足先に失礼するぜ。
jpnSearchText:
案内すまねぇな、室長さん。
アタシらも一足先に失礼するぜ。

engChrName: Sorry for making you show us down here, Chief. We're outta here.
engSearchText:
Sorry for making you show us down here, Chief.
We're outta here.
jpnChrName: 《不動》に《乙女》── そこの眼鏡に裏解決屋もまたな。
jpnSearchText:
《不動》に《乙女》──
そこの眼鏡に裏解決屋もまたな。

engChrName: See you all around sometime.
engSearchText: See you all around sometime.
jpnChrName: またお会いする機会もあるでしょう。 ──《Ａ》の動向次第ではね。
jpnSearchText:
またお会いする機会もあるでしょう。
──《Ａ》の動向次第ではね。

engChrName: I wouldn't be surprised if we met again—though that depends on what A does.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't be surprised if we met again—though that
depends on what A does.
jpnChrName: ──さて、一段落したところで。
jpnSearchText: ──さて、一段落したところで。

engChrName: Well, now that the air has calmed down a touch...
engSearchText: Well, now that the air has calmed down a touch...
jpnChrName: 残った顔触れで改めて “情報交換”といきましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
残った顔触れで改めて
“情報交換”といきましょうか？

engChrName: ...perhaps those of us who remain might continue sharing information?
engSearchText:
...perhaps those of us who remain might continue
sharing information?
jpnChrName: アンタはマジでブレねぇな……
jpnSearchText: アンタはマジでブレねぇな……

engChrName: Man, you never change...
engSearchText: Man, you never change...
jpnChrName: つまり、ほぼ確定ってわけだな。
jpnSearchText: つまり、ほぼ確定ってわけだな。

engChrName: Sounds like there's no room for doubt, then.
engSearchText: Sounds like there's no room for doubt, then.
jpnChrName: ──アルマータが “外部勢力”を使っているのは。
jpnSearchText:
──アルマータが
“外部勢力”を使っているのは。

engChrName: Almata's got some other organization workin' for 'em.
engSearchText: Almata's got some other organization workin' for 'em.
jpnChrName: ええ──間違いないでしょう。
jpnSearchText: ええ──間違いないでしょう。

engChrName: So it would appear.
engSearchText: So it would appear.
jpnChrName: そしてその資金源は、かつてあった “民族テロ”からも流れているようね。
jpnSearchText:
そしてその資金源は、かつてあった
“民族テロ”からも流れているようね。

engChrName: Their funding is at least partly coming from those who funded the racial terrorism of the past, too.
engSearchText:
Their funding is at least partly coming from those
who funded the racial terrorism of the past, too.
jpnChrName: ！　そんな……
jpnSearchText: ！　そんな……

engChrName: That's...awful.
engSearchText: That's...awful.
jpnChrName: 前に聞いた……
jpnSearchText: 前に聞いた……

engChrName: Van was telling us about that not too long ago.
engSearchText: Van was telling us about that not too long ago.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、我が社の リスク分析とも一致しています。
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、我が社の
リスク分析とも一致しています。

engChrName: Our company's risk assessment led us to the same conclusion.
engSearchText:
Our company's risk assessment led us to the
same conclusion.
jpnChrName: ……数年前まであった、 東方系や中東系を標的としたテロ……
jpnSearchText:
……数年前まであった、
東方系や中東系を標的としたテロ……

engChrName: Up until a few years ago, racially motivated attacks on those of Eastern and Central Eastern descent were all too common.
engSearchText:
Up until a few years ago, racially motivated attacks on
those of Eastern and Central Eastern descent were all
too common.
jpnChrName: 旧王国系の流れを汲む白人系グループが いくつも存在していましたね。
jpnSearchText:
旧王国系の流れを汲む白人系グループが
いくつも存在していましたね。

engChrName: They were known to be orchestrated by white supremacist groups who traced their origins back to the old kingdom.
engSearchText:
They were known to be orchestrated by white
supremacist groups who traced their origins back to
the old kingdom.
jpnChrName: ──４年前に最大規模の組織が クロスベルの通商会議を襲撃するまでは。
jpnSearchText:
──４年前に最大規模の組織が
クロスベルの通商会議を襲撃するまでは。

engChrName: But the situation changed significantly when a rather large group attacked the trade conference in Crossbell four years ago.
engSearchText:
But the situation changed significantly when a rather
large group attacked the trade conference in Crossbell
four years ago.
jpnChrName: ええ、その時は“保険”をかけて なんとか事無きを得たけれど。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、その時は“保険”をかけて
なんとか事無きを得たけれど。

engChrName: Fortunately, we were able to quell the situation thanks to an 'insurance policy' we had in place...
engSearchText:
Fortunately, we were able to quell the situation
thanks to an 'insurance policy' we had in place...
jpnChrName: ……事件後、前大統領の指示で 摘発が進められてからは鳴りを潜めたわ。
jpnSearchText:
……事件後、前大統領の指示で
摘発が進められてからは鳴りを潜めたわ。

engChrName: ...and as soon as the crisis was put to rest, the former president started an aggressive crackdown on those groups.
engSearchText:
...and as soon as the crisis was put to rest, the former
president started an aggressive crackdown on
those groups.
jpnChrName: 大戦後も帝国からの賠償金による好景気で 話題には上がらなくなっていたけど……
jpnSearchText:
大戦後も帝国からの賠償金による好景気で
話題には上がらなくなっていたけど……

engChrName: You didn't hear much from them after that—then the post-war reparations put the entire issue on the back burner.
engSearchText:
You didn't hear much from them after that—then the
post-war reparations put the entire issue on the
back burner.
jpnChrName: むしろその好景気が格好の “隠れ蓑”になっていたわけですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
むしろその好景気が格好の
“隠れ蓑”になっていたわけですねぇ。

engChrName: That's not to say they disbanded, however. If anything, the economic prosperity provided an ideal cover for them to continue in secret.
engSearchText:
That's not to say they disbanded, however.
If anything, the economic prosperity provided an
ideal cover for them to continue in secret.
jpnChrName: 賠償金の支払いも終わりつつある今── 顕在化しつつある問題の一つでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
賠償金の支払いも終わりつつある今──
顕在化しつつある問題の一つでしょうか？

engChrName: And now their cover is coming to an end, bringing the issue of them to the surface once again.
engSearchText:
And now their cover is coming to an end, bringing
the issue of them to the surface once again.

jpnChrName: ……アルマータとどんな風に 繋がってるのかは知らねえが……
jpnSearchText:
……アルマータとどんな風に
繋がってるのかは知らねえが……

engChrName: Well, I don't know how those assholes are tied to Almata...
engSearchText:
Well, I don't know how those assholes are tied
to Almata...
jpnChrName: そんな資金源もあるってんなら あの勢力拡大っぷりも頷けるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そんな資金源もあるってんなら
あの勢力拡大っぷりも頷けるぜ。

engChrName: ...but if they've got all those fat stacks at their disposal, that explains how they got so big so fast.
engSearchText:
...but if they've got all those fat stacks at their
disposal, that explains how they got so big so fast.
jpnChrName: そしてそれだけのミラがあれば “外”を引き込むことも叶うわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
そしてそれだけのミラがあれば
“外”を引き込むことも叶うわけだ。

engChrName: Yeah. And with that kind of mira, they could bring people on the outside into the fold.
engSearchText:
Yeah. And with that kind of mira, they could bring
people on the outside into the fold.
jpnChrName: 例のメルキオルって幹部の古巣にして 新たな人形遣いなんかも所属する組織。
jpnSearchText:
例のメルキオルって幹部の古巣にして
新たな人形遣いなんかも所属する組織。

engChrName: Like the group Melchior and that new puppeteer come from.
engSearchText:
Like the group Melchior and that new puppeteer
come from.
jpnChrName: 高位猟兵中隊を一方的に殲滅できる、 恐らくは“異能”の持ち主の集団……
jpnSearchText:
高位猟兵中隊を一方的に殲滅できる、
恐らくは“異能”の持ち主の集団……

engChrName: A group able to wipe out a high-ranking company of jaegers single-handedly—and likely with special abilities at their disposal.
engSearchText:
A group able to wipe out a high-ranking company of
jaegers single-handedly—and likely with special
abilities at their disposal.

jpnChrName: なるほど── 《庭園（ガーデン）》って連中か。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど──
《庭園（ガーデン）》って連中か。

engChrName: So they ARE from the Gardens.
engSearchText: So they ARE from the Gardens.
jpnChrName: フフ、流石よくご存じですね？
jpnSearchText: フフ、流石よくご存じですね？

engChrName: Heh. I am thoroughly unsurprised you've heard of them.
engSearchText:
Heh. I am thoroughly unsurprised you've heard
of them.
jpnChrName: 裏の世界でも余り知られていない 名前のはずですが。
jpnSearchText:
裏の世界でも余り知られていない
名前のはずですが。

engChrName: Few have, even in the criminal underworld.
engSearchText: Few have, even in the criminal underworld.
jpnChrName: 《庭園（ガーデン）》……
jpnSearchText: 《庭園（ガーデン）》……

engChrName: What's the Gardens?
engSearchText: What's the Gardens?
jpnChrName: い、いったいどういう……？
jpnSearchText: い、いったいどういう……？

engChrName: Is it some kind of group?
engSearchText: Is it some kind of group?
jpnChrName: ……アルマータみたいな “マフィア”とはまた別系統ね。
jpnSearchText:
……アルマータみたいな
“マフィア”とはまた別系統ね。

engChrName: They're a criminal organization that's of a different breed to mafias like Almata.
engSearchText:
They're a criminal organization that's of a different
breed to mafias like Almata.
jpnChrName: ９年前から存在が確認されている、 《結社》とも違う闇の集団──
jpnSearchText:
９年前から存在が確認されている、
《結社》とも違う闇の集団──

engChrName: They don't have much in common with the society, either, mind. We first learned of their existence nine years ago.
engSearchText:
They don't have much in common with the society,
either, mind. We first learned of their existence nine
years ago.
jpnChrName: あちこちから身寄りのない子供を集め、 英才教育を施すという──“暗殺組織”よ。
jpnSearchText:
あちこちから身寄りのない子供を集め、
英才教育を施すという──“暗殺組織”よ。

engChrName: Their modus operandi is gathering orphans and giving them a first-class education...in assassination.
engSearchText:
Their modus operandi is gathering orphans and
giving them a first-class education...in assassination.

jpnChrName: おいおい…… んなモンが現実にいるのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
おいおい……
んなモンが現実にいるのかよ？

engChrName: Damn... Didn't know stuff like that was even real.
engSearchText: Damn... Didn't know stuff like that was even real.
jpnChrName: ええ──構成員こそ少ないものの、 依頼達成率は凄まじかったみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──構成員こそ少ないものの、
依頼達成率は凄まじかったみたいね。

engChrName: Unfortunately, it very much is. Their members are few in number, but they complete their missions with startling success.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, it very much is. Their members are
few in number, but they complete their missions with
startling success.
jpnChrName: いくつかの“園”とそれを統括する “管理人”の存在が確認されているわ。
jpnSearchText:
いくつかの“園”とそれを統括する
“管理人”の存在が確認されているわ。

engChrName: The organization is divided into several groups, called gardens, with each being led by an 'overseer.'
engSearchText:
The organization is divided into several groups, called
gardens, with each being led by an 'overseer.'
jpnChrName: ……ＭＫ社でも把握されています。 脅威度Ｓ＋の詳細不明集団として。
jpnSearchText:
……ＭＫ社でも把握されています。
脅威度Ｓ＋の詳細不明集団として。

engChrName: We are aware of their presence at Marduk as well. Their threat level is considered to be S+.
engSearchText:
We are aware of their presence at Marduk as well.
Their threat level is considered to be S+.
jpnChrName: 一時期、未解決の暗殺事件の殆どが 彼らの仕業と分析されていたくらいで。
jpnSearchText:
一時期、未解決の暗殺事件の殆どが
彼らの仕業と分析されていたくらいで。

engChrName: Internally, it was at one point believed that most unsolved assassinations were their handiwork.
engSearchText:
Internally, it was at one point believed that most
unsolved assassinations were their handiwork.
jpnChrName: ああ、しまいには手口を模倣しようとした 連中まで出てくる始末でな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、しまいには手口を模倣しようとした
連中まで出てくる始末でな。

engChrName: Yeah. You can imagine the headache when we even had another group trying to mimic their playbook.
engSearchText:
Yeah. You can imagine the headache when we even
had another group trying to mimic their playbook.
jpnChrName: だがここ２年くらいは ほとんど名前も聞かなくなっていた。
jpnSearchText:
だがここ２年くらいは
ほとんど名前も聞かなくなっていた。

engChrName: Still, their name hasn't cropped up very much over the past couple years.
engSearchText:
Still, their name hasn't cropped up very much over
the past couple years.
jpnChrName: 幹部の一人──《剣》の管理人ってのが 脱走者の返り討ちに遭ってからみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
幹部の一人──《剣》の管理人ってのが
脱走者の返り討ちに遭ってからみたいだが。

engChrName: Not since the overseer of the Garden of Swords was taken out by two members who fled the organization.
engSearchText:
Not since the overseer of the Garden of Swords was
taken out by two members who fled the organization.
jpnChrName: そ、そんな事が……
jpnSearchText: そ、そんな事が……

engChrName: Oh, wow...
engSearchText: Oh, wow...
jpnChrName: （……えっと……   どこかで読んだような……）
jpnSearchText:
（……えっと……
どこかで読んだような……）

engChrName: (I feel like I've read that story somewhere before...)
engSearchText: (I feel like I've read that story somewhere before...)

jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンさん？

engChrName: ...What is it, Van?
engSearchText: ...What is it, Van?
jpnChrName: いや……そのヤバイ連中が 今はアルマータに協力してるわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
いや……そのヤバイ連中が
今はアルマータに協力してるわけだ。

engChrName: Nothin'. Anyway, now we know that that group of monsters is workin' with Almata.
engSearchText:
Nothin'. Anyway, now we know that that group of
monsters is workin' with Almata.
jpnChrName: 民族テロからの資金と合わせて どう繋がっているかは分からねえが……
jpnSearchText:
民族テロからの資金と合わせて
どう繋がっているかは分からねえが……

engChrName: It's still a mystery how they ended up that way—same with how they wound up with all that terrorist funding...
engSearchText:
It's still a mystery how they ended up that way—same
with how they wound up with all that
terrorist funding...
jpnChrName: ──問題は“何のために”だろう。
jpnSearchText: ──問題は“何のために”だろう。

engChrName: ...but maybe a more pressing question is WHY they're workin' together.
engSearchText:
...but maybe a more pressing question is WHY
they're workin' together.

engChrName: True...
engSearchText: True...
jpnChrName: “最悪”っつー牌を３つ揃えて どんな“役”を狙ってるってことか。
jpnSearchText:
“最悪”っつー牌を３つ揃えて
どんな“役”を狙ってるってことか。

engChrName: They've got three of the worst tiles that exist. Just a matter of working out what hand they're going for.
engSearchText:
They've got three of the worst tiles that exist. Just a
matter of working out what hand they're going for.
jpnChrName: おっ、お前さんも龍雀（ロンジャン）をやんのか。 じゃなくて──
jpnSearchText:
おっ、お前さんも龍雀（ロンジャン）をやんのか。
じゃなくて──

engChrName: You a mahjong player, too? Erm, I mean...
engSearchText: You a mahjong player, too? Erm, I mean...
jpnChrName: いずれにせよ今後の対応は そのあたりが焦点になりそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
いずれにせよ今後の対応は
そのあたりが焦点になりそうだな。

engChrName: You're right. We're gonna need to focus on that going forward.
engSearchText:
You're right. We're gonna need to focus on that
going forward.
jpnChrName: ええ──勿論それぞれの立場で “対応”は異なってくるでしょうが。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──勿論それぞれの立場で
“対応”は異なってくるでしょうが。

engChrName: Indeed—albeit in our own unique ways, no doubt.
engSearchText: Indeed—albeit in our own unique ways, no doubt.
jpnChrName: フフ……本日の交流は このあたりまでになりそうね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……本日の交流は
このあたりまでになりそうね。

engChrName: Well, I believe we've had enough discussions for one day.
engSearchText:
Well, I believe we've had enough discussions for
one day.
jpnChrName: ええ──ですが“他”よりは 歩み寄れる余地もあるはずです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──ですが“他”よりは
歩み寄れる余地もあるはずです。

engChrName: Still, it seems clear there's more room for negotiations between us than some other groups going forward.
engSearchText:
Still, it seems clear there's more room for negotiations
between us than some other groups going forward.
jpnChrName: フフ、その“余地”に 私共も加えて頂けるとは光栄ですが。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、その“余地”に
私共も加えて頂けるとは光栄ですが。

engChrName: Heh. I am most humbled you are including us in that.
engSearchText: Heh. I am most humbled you are including us in that.
jpnChrName: ま、お前さんやギエン老はともかく、 ファン大人みたいな穏健派もいるしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、お前さんやギエン老はともかく、
ファン大人みたいな穏健派もいるしな。

engChrName: Well, I don't know about you and Gien, but Heiyue has its moderates, too. Like Fan.
engSearchText:
Well, I don't know about you and Gien, but Heiyue
has its moderates, too. Like Fan.
jpnChrName: アークライド── お前さんたちも構わんか？
jpnSearchText:
アークライド──
お前さんたちも構わんか？

engChrName: Take it we can include you guys in that, too, Arkride?
engSearchText: Take it we can include you guys in that, too, Arkride?
jpnChrName: 構うも何も、アンタら全てと 関わりあんのはウチだけだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
構うも何も、アンタら全てと
関わりあんのはウチだけだろうが……

engChrName: Goes without saying. Hell, we're the common thread between all of you.
engSearchText:
Goes without saying. Hell, we're the common thread
between all of you.
jpnChrName: つーか“繋ぎ”に使う気満々だな？
jpnSearchText: つーか“繋ぎ”に使う気満々だな？

engChrName: And you're just gonna keep using us as a bridge between you anyways.
engSearchText:
And you're just gonna keep using us as a bridge
between you anyways.
jpnChrName: バレたか／バレた？／バレましたか。
jpnSearchText: バレたか／バレた？／バレましたか。

engChrName: You got that right. / So we would. / But of course.
engSearchText: You got that right. / So we would. / But of course.
jpnChrName: ハモってんじゃねえっ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>ハモってんじゃねえっ！！

engChrName: Stop being so in sync!
engSearchText: Stop being so in sync!
jpnChrName: フフ、首都での生活、 さっそく馴染んでいるようですね？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、首都での生活、
さっそく馴染んでいるようですね？

engChrName: I see it didn't take you long to adjust to life in the capital.
engSearchText:
I see it didn't take you long to adjust to life in
the capital.
jpnChrName: アシェン様も心配していましたし あまり羽目を外しすぎないように。
jpnSearchText:
アシェン様も心配していましたし
あまり羽目を外しすぎないように。

engChrName: Just bear in mind that Lady Ashen is rather worried about you back in Langport. Do try to exercise restraint in your daily life, hmm?
engSearchText:
Just bear in mind that Lady Ashen is rather worried
about you back in Langport. Do try to exercise
restraint in your daily life, hmm?
jpnChrName: あいつも小うるせぇな…… アンタこそマメに帰ってやれよ。
jpnSearchText:
あいつも小うるせぇな……
アンタこそマメに帰ってやれよ。

engChrName: Man, she could stand to chill out a little—and you should be the one checking in on home more often.
engSearchText:
Man, she could stand to chill out a little—and you
should be the one checking in on home more often.
jpnChrName: そういやシンはどうしてんだ？ レミフェリアに留学して半年か。
jpnSearchText:
そういやシンはどうしてんだ？
レミフェリアに留学して半年か。

engChrName: How's Xin doing, by the way? He's been abroad in Remiferia for half a year now, right?
engSearchText:
How's Xin doing, by the way? He's been abroad in
Remiferia for half a year now, right?
jpnChrName: ええ、現地名門校の中等部で ご学友にも恵まれたらしく……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、現地名門校の中等部で
ご学友にも恵まれたらしく……

engChrName: I believe he is doing rather well. He attends a distinguished middle school there and is blessed with many good friends.
engSearchText:
I believe he is doing rather well. He attends a
distinguished middle school there and is blessed with
many good friends.
jpnChrName: そういや室長さん、そこの 熊野郎たちの因縁があるとはいえ……
jpnSearchText:
そういや室長さん、そこの
熊野郎たちの因縁があるとはいえ……

engChrName: Come to think of it, Chief, I know you go way back with him and the Direwolf...
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, Chief, I know you go way back
with him and the Direwolf...
jpnChrName: こういった合意についてだったら てっきりルネの領分かと思ったが。
jpnSearchText:
こういった合意についてだったら
てっきりルネの領分かと思ったが。

engChrName: ...but I would've figured René would handle this kinda thing.
engSearchText:
...but I would've figured René would handle this
kinda thing.

engChrName: That's right...
engSearchText: That's right...
jpnChrName: ああ、お前さんとエレインの 昔馴染みっていうキレ者か。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、お前さんとエレインの
昔馴染みっていうキレ者か。

engChrName: The smart guy you and Elaine grew up with, yeah?
engSearchText: The smart guy you and Elaine grew up with, yeah?
jpnChrName: フフ、彼にはちょうど 別件で動いてもらっていてね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、彼にはちょうど
別件で動いてもらっていてね。

engChrName: He's actually quite occupied with another case for us.
engSearchText: He's actually quite occupied with another case for us.
jpnChrName: まあすぐに分かるでしょう。
jpnSearchText: まあすぐに分かるでしょう。

engChrName: As for what that case is...you will soon see.
engSearchText: As for what that case is...you will soon see.
jpnChrName: ……？　そいつは──
jpnSearchText: ……？　そいつは──

engChrName: Huh? That's sure an ominous way of puttin' it...
engSearchText: Huh? That's sure an ominous way of puttin' it...
jpnChrName: ……ったく、比較的マシな 室長さんですらアレだからな。
jpnSearchText:
……ったく、比較的マシな
室長さんですらアレだからな。

engChrName: And she's one of the more reasonable ones, too.
engSearchText: And she's one of the more reasonable ones, too.
jpnChrName: 揃いも揃って濃すぎだろ……
jpnSearchText: 揃いも揃って濃すぎだろ……

engChrName: Why can't the CID be staffed by more... normal people?
engSearchText:
Why can't the CID be staffed by more...
normal people?
jpnChrName: ヴァン様も人のことは 余り言えないのではないかと。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様も人のことは
余り言えないのではないかと。

engChrName: Forgive me for saying so, but you're a fine one to talk.
engSearchText: Forgive me for saying so, but you're a fine one to talk.
jpnChrName: そ、そうですよっ。 内緒でこんなところに来て……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうですよっ。
内緒でこんなところに来て……！

engChrName: Yeah! I can't believe you came to a place like this without us!
engSearchText:
Yeah! I can't believe you came to a place like this
without us!
jpnChrName: 撒かれたっつーのはムカつくが ま、そいつはもうどうでもいい。
jpnSearchText:
撒かれたっつーのはムカつくが
ま、そいつはもうどうでもいい。

engChrName: Kinda pisses me off I let you shake me in the first place, but that's in the past now.
engSearchText:
Kinda pisses me off I let you shake me in the first
place, but that's in the past now.
jpnChrName: それで結局── この場所は一体どういう……？
jpnSearchText:
それで結局──
この場所は一体どういう……？

engChrName: So...just what is this place?
engSearchText: So...just what is this place?
jpnChrName: ここは《黒芒街（こくぼうがい）》──
jpnSearchText: ここは《黒芒街（こくぼうがい）》──

engChrName: It's called the Blacklight District.
engSearchText: It's called the Blacklight District.
jpnChrName: 存在しないはずの“十三区”にして イーディスの“裏の顔”と呼ばれている。
jpnSearchText:
存在しないはずの“十三区”にして
イーディスの“裏の顔”と呼ばれている。

engChrName: It's the city's unofficial 13th District—and its dark side.
engSearchText:
It's the city's unofficial 13th District—and its
dark side.
jpnChrName: 昔から場所を変えながら存続してきた、 警察も基本立ち寄らねえ“無法地帯”……
jpnSearchText:
昔から場所を変えながら存続してきた、
警察も基本立ち寄らねえ“無法地帯”……

engChrName: A lawless zone that changes location from time to time and that few cops dare to tread.
engSearchText:
A lawless zone that changes location from time to
time and that few cops dare to tread.
jpnChrName: “裏”の住民やら、勢力なんかが 逃げ込んだり交流したりする“街区”だ。
jpnSearchText:
“裏”の住民やら、勢力なんかが
逃げ込んだり交流したりする“街区”だ。

engChrName: It's home to criminals of every kind. Good place for 'em to get together, too.
engSearchText:
It's home to criminals of every kind. Good place for
'em to get together, too.
jpnChrName: ……十三区……そんな場所が……
jpnSearchText: ……十三区……そんな場所が……

engChrName: To think that all this time, such a place was right under my nose...
engSearchText:
To think that all this time, such a place was right
under my nose...
jpnChrName: そういえば前にお父さん（アブ）から……
jpnSearchText: そういえば前にお父さん（アブ）から……

engChrName: You know, I feel like Abi said something about it to me before.
engSearchText:
You know, I feel like Abi said something about it to
me before.
jpnChrName: 事前に把握しておりましたが、 このような場所だったのですね。
jpnSearchText:
事前に把握しておりましたが、
このような場所だったのですね。

engChrName: I was aware of its existence, but this is my first time seeing it in person.
engSearchText:
I was aware of its existence, but this is my first time
seeing it in person.
jpnChrName: 恐らくは都市計画から取り残された 複数街区の地下に跨がっている空間……
jpnSearchText:
恐らくは都市計画から取り残された
複数街区の地下に跨がっている空間……

engChrName: It looks to be a combination of multiple underground areas that went unused during the city's urban planning.
engSearchText:
It looks to be a combination of multiple underground
areas that went unused during the city's
urban planning.
jpnChrName: あの女に、迷路みてぇな地下道を 延々と案内されて辿り着いたからな。
jpnSearchText:
あの女に、迷路みてぇな地下道を
延々と案内されて辿り着いたからな。

engChrName: Good spot to hang out. We had to walk through a whole damn maze just to get here.
engSearchText:
Good spot to hang out. We had to walk through a
whole damn maze just to get here.
jpnChrName: 違法品販売やら地下闘技場── なかなか痺れる場所みてぇじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
違法品販売やら地下闘技場──
なかなか痺れる場所みてぇじゃねえか？

engChrName: An underground colosseum and contraband as far as the eye can see... It's like it was made for me.
engSearchText:
An underground colosseum and contraband as far as
the eye can see... It's like it was made for me.
jpnChrName: ……ま、来ちまったからには仕方ねえ。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、来ちまったからには仕方ねえ。

engChrName: ...Well, too late to do anything now that you're here.
engSearchText:
...Well, too late to do anything now that
you're here.
jpnChrName: エレインがいたから絡まれなかっただろうが ここじゃあ喧嘩や小競り合いは日常茶飯事だ。
jpnSearchText:
エレインがいたから絡まれなかっただろうが
