ここじゃあ喧嘩や小競り合いは日常茶飯事だ。

engChrName: I'm gonna guess people stayed away 'cause you had Elaine, but people are always gettin' into scuffles around here.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna guess people stayed away 'cause you had
Elaine, but people are always gettin' into scuffles
around here.
jpnChrName: ──それを含めての“作法”を教える。
jpnSearchText: ──それを含めての“作法”を教える。

engChrName: So let me teach you how to speak this district's language.
engSearchText:
So let me teach you how to speak this
district's language.
jpnChrName: 地上に戻る前に一通り回ってみるが くれぐれも気を抜くんじゃねえぞ……？
jpnSearchText:
地上に戻る前に一通り回ってみるが
くれぐれも気を抜くんじゃねえぞ……？

engChrName: We'll take a tour while we do, but just keep your eyes peeled, all right?
engSearchText:
We'll take a tour while we do, but just keep your eyes
peeled, all right?
jpnChrName: ！　はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: ！　はいっ……！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）っ。
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）っ。

engChrName: Of course!
engSearchText: Of course!
jpnChrName: ハッ、望むところだっつーの。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、望むところだっつーの。

engChrName: I'm down.
engSearchText: I'm down.
jpnChrName: 《黒芒街》を出て地上に戻りますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>《黒芒街》を出て地上に戻りますか？

engChrName: Leave the Blacklight District and return to the surface?
engSearchText:
Leave the Blacklight District and return to
the surface?
jpnChrName: それにしても凄いな…… こんな場所があるなんて。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても凄いな……
こんな場所があるなんて。

engChrName: I never would have imagined there was a place like this in Edith before coming here...
engSearchText:
I never would have imagined there was a place like
this in Edith before coming here...
jpnChrName: ええ……でもいつもより ピリピリした雰囲気ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……でもいつもより
ピリピリした雰囲気ですね。

engChrName: I'm not surprised. And is it just me, or does this district seem even more on edge than usual?
engSearchText:
I'm not surprised. And is it just me, or does this
district seem even more on edge than usual?
jpnChrName: かの事件の影響──当然内偵も ある程度は入っているでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
かの事件の影響──当然内偵も
ある程度は入っているでしょう。

engChrName: It makes sense that it would be. I imagine a number of secret agents are down here investigating after what happened.
engSearchText:
It makes sense that it would be. I imagine a number
of secret agents are down here investigating after
what happened.
jpnChrName: はい……いくら治外法権地域とはいえ 当局としても外せないと思います。
jpnSearchText:
はい……いくら治外法権地域とはいえ
当局としても外せないと思います。

engChrName: I'd assume so, too. This may be the closest thing Edith has to a lawless district, but the authorities can't afford to turn a blind eye right now.
engSearchText:
I'd assume so, too. This may be the closest thing
Edith has to a lawless district, but the authorities can't
afford to turn a blind eye right now.
jpnChrName: ハン、改めて店でも覗きながら あの女記者が来てねぇか確かめるか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、改めて店でも覗きながら
あの女記者が来てねぇか確かめるか。

engChrName: Well, I guess we should snoop around the shops and see if anyone's seen that reporter anywhere?
engSearchText:
Well, I guess we should snoop around the shops and
see if anyone's seen that reporter anywhere?
jpnChrName: ああ、行くぞ。 （しかしこの気配は……）
jpnSearchText:
ああ、行くぞ。
（しかしこの気配は……）

engChrName: Yeah. Let's get movin'. (This feels like...)
engSearchText:
Yeah. Let's get movin'.
(This feels like...)
jpnChrName: や、やめてくださいっ……！
jpnSearchText: や、やめてくださいっ……！

engChrName: Wh-What are you doing?!
engSearchText: Wh-What are you doing?!
jpnChrName: この声は……！
jpnSearchText: この声は……！

engChrName: Did you hear that?
engSearchText: Did you hear that?
jpnChrName: やっぱりか……！
jpnSearchText: やっぱりか……！

engChrName: Yeah. I knew it!
engSearchText: Yeah. I knew it!
jpnChrName: 離して、離してよぉっ……！
jpnSearchText: 離して、離してよぉっ……！

engChrName: Let go of me! I said, let GO!
engSearchText: Let go of me! I said, let GO!
jpnChrName: フン、そっちが あれこれ聞いてきたんだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
フン、そっちが
あれこれ聞いてきたんだろうが。

engChrName: Hmph. YOU were the one who started piling on the questions.
engSearchText:
Hmph. YOU were the one who started piling on
the questions.
jpnChrName: 何でもタダじゃねえぞ、お嬢ちゃーん。
jpnSearchText: 何でもタダじゃねえぞ、お嬢ちゃーん。

engChrName: Nothing in life comes free, young lady.
engSearchText: Nothing in life comes free, young lady.
jpnChrName: 正当な報酬として、俺たちに 少しばかり付き合ってもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
正当な報酬として、俺たちに
少しばかり付き合ってもらおうか？

engChrName: Now we get to enjoy our rightful reward. C'mon...
engSearchText: Now we get to enjoy our rightful reward. C'mon...
jpnChrName: ──“正当”って言葉の意味を 日曜学校で学び直すんだな。
jpnSearchText:
──“正当”って言葉の意味を
日曜学校で学び直すんだな。

engChrName: Someone needs to go back to Sunday School, 'cause that sure doesn't sound like the definition of 'rightful' to me.
engSearchText:
Someone needs to go back to Sunday School, 'cause
that sure doesn't sound like the definition of 'rightful'
to me.
jpnChrName: なんだお前らは……？
jpnSearchText: なんだお前らは……？

engChrName: And just who the hell are you guys?
engSearchText: And just who the hell are you guys?
jpnChrName: う、裏解決屋の皆さんっ！？
jpnSearchText: う、裏解決屋の皆さんっ！？

engChrName: A-Arkride Solutions!
engSearchText: A-Arkride Solutions!
jpnChrName: ふう、こんな場所まで 入り込んじゃってるとはね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、こんな場所まで
入り込んじゃってるとはね。

engChrName: *sigh* She really was down here...
engSearchText: *sigh* She really was down here...
jpnChrName: 猟兵……でしょうか？
jpnSearchText: 猟兵……でしょうか？

engChrName: Are those people jaegers?
engSearchText: Are those people jaegers?
jpnChrName: いえ、あの装束…… どこかで見たことがあります。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、あの装束……
どこかで見たことがあります。

engChrName: I don't think so. That getup they're wearing looks familiar, though.
engSearchText:
I don't think so. That getup they're wearing looks
familiar, though.
jpnChrName: たしか《バグベアー》…… ……そんな名前だったような。
jpnSearchText:
たしか《バグベアー》……
……そんな名前だったような。

engChrName: I think their name is Bugbear?
engSearchText: I think their name is Bugbear?
jpnChrName: であれば──脅威度 Ｃランクマイナスの武装集団ですね。
jpnSearchText:
であれば──脅威度
Ｃランクマイナスの武装集団ですね。

engChrName: Ah, them. Their threat level is a mere C-.
engSearchText: Ah, them. Their threat level is a mere C-.
jpnChrName: な、なんだと……！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだと……！？

engChrName: H-Hey! You lookin' for a fight, lady?!
engSearchText: H-Hey! You lookin' for a fight, lady?!
jpnChrName: クソ、こちとらアルマータが起こした 混乱に乗じて名乗りを上げるつもりが──
jpnSearchText:
クソ、こちとらアルマータが起こした
混乱に乗じて名乗りを上げるつもりが──

engChrName: Man, this sucks. We were gonna take advantage of the mess Almata's made to finally get our name out there...
engSearchText:
Man, this sucks. We were gonna take advantage of
the mess Almata's made to finally get our name
out there...
jpnChrName: 非常事態宣言で身動きを取れなくされて イライラが溜まりまくってんだ……！
jpnSearchText:
非常事態宣言で身動きを取れなくされて
イライラが溜まりまくってんだ……！

engChrName: ...but all this state of emergency crap has got us stuck where we are, and it's pissin' me off!
engSearchText:
...but all this state of emergency crap has got us stuck
where we are, and it's pissin' me off!
jpnChrName: ハッ、ダセえ連中だな。 いわゆる“猟兵崩れ”ってヤツか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ダセえ連中だな。
いわゆる“猟兵崩れ”ってヤツか。

engChrName: Wow. What a bunch of losers. No wonder they're called jaeger dropouts.
engSearchText:
Wow. What a bunch of losers. No wonder they're
called jaeger dropouts.
jpnChrName: うん、それなりには 実戦も潜ってるんだろうけど……
jpnSearchText:
うん、それなりには
実戦も潜ってるんだろうけど……

engChrName: I'm sure they've still seen enough combat to be a problem, though.
engSearchText:
I'm sure they've still seen enough combat to be a
problem, though.
jpnChrName: って、よく見りゃこいつら とんでもない上玉連れてやがるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
って、よく見りゃこいつら
とんでもない上玉連れてやがるぜ！

engChrName: Huh. I only just realized, but they've got some real lookers with 'em, too.
engSearchText:
Huh. I only just realized, but they've got some real
lookers with 'em, too.
jpnChrName: フン、ちょうどいい。 仕置きついでに味見させてもらうか。
jpnSearchText:
フン、ちょうどいい。
仕置きついでに味見させてもらうか。

engChrName: Guess we'll get to have some fun after we show 'em who's boss!
engSearchText:
Guess we'll get to have some fun after we show 'em
who's boss!
jpnChrName: ったく、面倒だな……
jpnSearchText: ったく、面倒だな……

engChrName: Ugh. This is so dumb...
engSearchText: Ugh. This is so dumb...
jpnChrName: 速やかに無力化します。
jpnSearchText: 速やかに無力化します。

engChrName: Time to take them down.
engSearchText: Time to take them down.
jpnChrName: ハッ、やっぱこの程度かよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、やっぱこの程度かよ。

engChrName: Now that was just pathetic.
engSearchText: Now that was just pathetic.
jpnChrName: 脅威度Ｄ── いえＤ－が妥当そうですね。
jpnSearchText:
脅威度Ｄ──
いえＤ－が妥当そうですね。

engChrName: Their threat level is closer to a D or D-, it would seem.
engSearchText:
Their threat level is closer to a D or D-, it
would seem.
jpnChrName: クソッ、素人じゃなかったのかよ！？
jpnSearchText: クソッ、素人じゃなかったのかよ！？

engChrName: Damn it! I thought these guys were just a bunch of rookies!
engSearchText:
Damn it! I thought these guys were just a bunch
of rookies!
jpnChrName: くっ、こうなったら……！
jpnSearchText: くっ、こうなったら……！

engChrName: Ugh... Fine! Have it your way!
engSearchText: Ugh... Fine! Have it your way!
jpnChrName: “増援”の息吹です……！
jpnSearchText: “増援”の息吹です……！

engChrName: Reinforcements coming in!
engSearchText: Reinforcements coming in!
jpnChrName: ワ、ワンちゃんたち……！？
jpnSearchText: ワ、ワンちゃんたち……！？

engChrName: D-Doggies?!
engSearchText: D-Doggies?!
jpnChrName: チッ、一丁前に軍用魔獣か……
jpnSearchText: チッ、一丁前に軍用魔獣か……

engChrName: Tch. Course they'd have military monsters at their beck and call.
engSearchText:
Tch. Course they'd have military monsters at their
beck and call.
jpnChrName: くっ…… この子を守りながらこの数は……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ……
この子を守りながらこの数は……！

engChrName: Mmgh... It's not going to be easy fighting off this many while defending her.
engSearchText:
Mmgh... It's not going to be easy fighting off this
many while defending her.
jpnChrName: ハハハ、形勢逆転だな！？
jpnSearchText: ハハハ、形勢逆転だな！？

engChrName: Heh heh. Looks like the tables have turned, huh?
engSearchText: Heh heh. Looks like the tables have turned, huh?
jpnChrName: 所詮今のカルバードなど 平和ボケした連中ばかりだろう！
jpnSearchText:
所詮今のカルバードなど
平和ボケした連中ばかりだろう！

engChrName: It figures, though. These days, Calvard's full of wusses who're so used to peace, they've forgotten how to fight.
engSearchText:
It figures, though. These days, Calvard's full of wusses
who're so used to peace, they've forgotten how
to fight.
jpnChrName: 黒月ってのも大したことなさそうだし、 いっそ例の連中に雇われてもいいかもな！
jpnSearchText:
黒月ってのも大したことなさそうだし、
いっそ例の連中に雇われてもいいかもな！

engChrName: I bet Heiyue would just roll over, too. Maybe we should try getting ourselves hired by the new big boys in town!
engSearchText:
I bet Heiyue would just roll over, too. Maybe we
should try getting ourselves hired by the new big boys
in town!
jpnChrName: ！　……よくもそんな………
jpnSearchText: ！　……よくもそんな………

engChrName: What?! How can you suggest that?!
engSearchText: What?! How can you suggest that?!
jpnChrName: 自分たちが何を言ってるのか 分かっているのか……！？
jpnSearchText:
自分たちが何を言ってるのか
分かっているのか……！？

engChrName: Do you even understand what you're saying?!
engSearchText: Do you even understand what you're saying?!
jpnChrName: ──ほう、大した事がないか。
jpnSearchText: ──ほう、大した事がないか。

engChrName: 'Heiyue would just roll over,' would they?
engSearchText: 'Heiyue would just roll over,' would they?
jpnChrName: アン……？
jpnSearchText: アン……？

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnChrName: ……アンタは………
jpnSearchText: ……アンタは………

engChrName: Wait...
engSearchText: Wait...
jpnChrName: ギ、ギエン爺さん──！？
jpnSearchText: ギ、ギエン爺さん──！？

engChrName: G-Gien?!
engSearchText: G-Gien?!
jpnChrName: ぐはっ！？
jpnSearchText: ぐはっ！？

engChrName: Argh!
engSearchText: Argh!
jpnChrName: ぷぎゃっ！！
jpnSearchText: ぷぎゃっ！！

engChrName: Ugh!
engSearchText: Ugh!
jpnChrName: な、なな……
jpnSearchText: な、なな……

engChrName: Wh... Wh...
engSearchText: Wh... Wh...
jpnChrName: なんだああああっ！！？
jpnSearchText: なんだああああっ！！？

engChrName: What just happened?!
engSearchText: What just happened?!
jpnChrName: フム、たわいないのう。 猟兵風の出で立ちも飾りか。
jpnSearchText:
フム、たわいないのう。
猟兵風の出で立ちも飾りか。

engChrName: Well, you aren't putting up much of a fight. Perhaps you ought to consider hanging up the jaegers' uniform if you cannot act the part.
engSearchText:
Well, you aren't putting up much of a fight.
Perhaps you ought to consider hanging up the jaegers'
uniform if you cannot act the part.
jpnChrName: あ、あの方たちは……
jpnSearchText: あ、あの方たちは……

engChrName: Th-Those are...
engSearchText: Th-Those are...
jpnChrName: 黒月の“凶手”たちですか……
jpnSearchText: 黒月の“凶手”たちですか……

engChrName: Heiyue's xiongshou!
engSearchText: Heiyue's xiongshou!
jpnChrName: ……噂には聞いてたけど。 （“彼女”に迫るっていう……）
jpnSearchText:
……噂には聞いてたけど。
（“彼女”に迫るっていう……）

engChrName: I've heard rumors, but never seen them in person... (Their strength is supposed to be comparable to hers...)
engSearchText:
I've heard rumors, but never seen them in person...
(Their strength is supposed to be comparable
to hers...)
jpnChrName: ひ、怯むな……！ 数は俺たちの方がまだ上だ！！
jpnSearchText:
ひ、怯むな……！
数は俺たちの方がまだ上だ！！

engChrName: D-Don't be scared! We still have the upper hand in numbers!
engSearchText:
D-Don't be scared! We still have the upper hand
in numbers!
jpnChrName: こ、こうなったら 軍用魔獣を全部投入して──
jpnSearchText:
こ、こうなったら
軍用魔獣を全部投入して──

engChrName: Y-Yeah! Deploy all of the military monsters—
engSearchText: Y-Yeah! Deploy all of the military monsters—
jpnChrName: いやいや。 我らはあくまでついでじゃよ。
jpnSearchText:
いやいや。
我らはあくまでついでじゃよ。

engChrName: So that you don't misunderstand, we are not the main threat you face here.
engSearchText:
So that you don't misunderstand, we are not the main
threat you face here.
jpnChrName: へ？
jpnSearchText: へ？

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnChrName: むうんッ……！！
jpnSearchText: むうんッ……！！

engChrName: MMGH!
engSearchText: MMGH!

engChrName: H-How...?
engSearchText: H-How...?

engChrName: Urk...
engSearchText: Urk...
jpnChrName: やれやれ──功夫（クンフー）が足らぬな。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ──功夫（クンフー）が足らぬな。

engChrName: That is a shame. Your prowess is sorely lacking.
engSearchText: That is a shame. Your prowess is sorely lacking.

jpnChrName: おいおい、まさかこの前、 龍來旅行の行きですれ違った……
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、まさかこの前、
龍來旅行の行きですれ違った……

engChrName: ...Isn't that the guy we passed on the way to Longlai?
engSearchText: ...Isn't that the guy we passed on the way to Longlai?
jpnChrName: あ……エトワスの 大型バイクを運転していた！？
jpnSearchText:
あ……エトワスの
大型バイクを運転していた！？

engChrName: Oh! The one on that giant ETWS bike!
engSearchText: Oh! The one on that giant ETWS bike!
jpnChrName: ──すまぬな、 やり過ぎてしまったか。
jpnSearchText:
──すまぬな、
やり過ぎてしまったか。

engChrName: I must apologize. I see I overdid it some.
engSearchText: I must apologize. I see I overdid it some.
jpnChrName: これでも加減はしたのだが……
jpnSearchText: これでも加減はしたのだが……

engChrName: Though I did restrain myself...
engSearchText: Though I did restrain myself...
jpnChrName: うむ、大人しくしていればそれでよい。
jpnSearchText: うむ、大人しくしていればそれでよい。

engChrName: That's a good boy. No trouble caused, no trouble faced.
engSearchText:
That's a good boy. No trouble caused, no
trouble faced.
jpnChrName: ──それで、 おぬしらはどうするつもりだ？
jpnSearchText:
──それで、
おぬしらはどうするつもりだ？

engChrName: ...So, then, what will the rest of you be doing?
engSearchText: ...So, then, what will the rest of you be doing?
jpnChrName: し、失礼しました～！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>し、失礼しました～！！

engChrName: E-Excuse us, sir!
engSearchText: E-Excuse us, sir!
jpnChrName: ──て、撤収うううッ！！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>──て、撤収うううッ！！！

engChrName: W-We're leaving! NOW!
engSearchText: W-We're leaving! NOW!
jpnChrName: え、えっと……
jpnSearchText: え、えっと……

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: いやいやいや…… どんな特殊撮影（ＳＦＸ）よ……
jpnSearchText:
いやいやいや……
どんな特殊撮影（ＳＦＸ）よ……

engChrName: Can't top real life for the best visual effects, huh...?
engSearchText: Can't top real life for the best visual effects, huh...?
jpnChrName: ……人もそうだけど 魔獣も空を飛んでたよね……
jpnSearchText:
……人もそうだけど
魔獣も空を飛んでたよね……

engChrName: He sent both man and monster flying through the air...
engSearchText:
He sent both man and monster flying through
the air...
jpnChrName: フフ、流石は“獅子殿”だ。 現役の時より漲ってはおらぬか？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、流石は“獅子殿”だ。
現役の時より漲ってはおらぬか？

engChrName: I would expect no less from the famed Lion. Your strength only seems to have grown since your active days.
engSearchText:
I would expect no less from the famed Lion.
Your strength only seems to have grown since your
active days.
jpnChrName: フフ…… 捨てた名ゆえお忘れ頂きたい。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
捨てた名ゆえお忘れ頂きたい。

engChrName: Heh. I no longer go by that name, and I would very much appreciate you forgetting it.
engSearchText:
Heh. I no longer go by that name, and I would
very much appreciate you forgetting it.
jpnChrName: 案内（あない）感謝する、ギエン老。
jpnSearchText: 案内（あない）感謝する、ギエン老。

engChrName: Thank you for leading me here, Elder.
engSearchText: Thank you for leading me here, Elder.
jpnChrName: なんの、我らの仕切りのついででもある。
jpnSearchText: なんの、我らの仕切りのついででもある。

engChrName: Not at all. That wasn't the only reason I came here.
engSearchText: Not at all. That wasn't the only reason I came here.
jpnChrName: それに──こうなった以上 貴殿には諸々頼らざるを得ぬからの。
jpnSearchText:
それに──こうなった以上
貴殿には諸々頼らざるを得ぬからの。

engChrName: And I'm sure, with circumstances as they are, that I am going to be relying on you significantly in the days to come.
engSearchText:
And I'm sure, with circumstances as they are, that I
am going to be relying on you significantly in the days
to come.
jpnChrName: それは………
jpnSearchText: それは………

engChrName: I see...
engSearchText: I see...
jpnChrName: 久しいなアーロン、解決屋の面々も。 到着してすぐとは思わなんだぞ。
jpnSearchText:
久しいなアーロン、解決屋の面々も。
到着してすぐとは思わなんだぞ。

engChrName: It's good to see you all again. I hadn't expected we would meet so soon upon my arrival.
engSearchText:
It's good to see you all again. I hadn't expected we
would meet so soon upon my arrival.
jpnChrName: いきなりジジイ２人で 全部持っていってんじゃねーよ！
jpnSearchText:
いきなりジジイ２人で
全部持っていってんじゃねーよ！

engChrName: Argh... Can't believe two old codgers rolled right up and hogged all the limelight.
engSearchText:
Argh... Can't believe two old codgers rolled right up
and hogged all the limelight.
jpnChrName: ど、どうして爺さんが首都に──
jpnSearchText: ど、どうして爺さんが首都に──

engChrName: B-But what are you even doing here?
engSearchText: B-But what are you even doing here?
jpnChrName: うむ、方針が定まったのでな。
jpnSearchText: うむ、方針が定まったのでな。

engChrName: Our course of action has been decided, you see.
engSearchText: Our course of action has been decided, you see.
jpnChrName: 此度の一件── 《黒月》としてどう動くかが。
jpnSearchText:
此度の一件──
《黒月》としてどう動くかが。

engChrName: Heiyue's response to currently unfolding events.
engSearchText: Heiyue's response to currently unfolding events.

jpnChrName: ……ついに “準備”を整えられましたか。
jpnSearchText:
……ついに
“準備”を整えられましたか。

engChrName: So your preparations are complete, then.
engSearchText: So your preparations are complete, then.
jpnChrName: 然り──既に“霧”は晴れ、 我らも過不足ない“手”を揃えた。
jpnSearchText:
然り──既に“霧”は晴れ、
我らも過不足ない“手”を揃えた。

engChrName: Indeed. The mists have cleared, and we have exactly the number of pieces that we require.
engSearchText:
Indeed. The mists have cleared, and we have exactly
the number of pieces that we require.
jpnChrName: 決するまでの間、この黒芒街は 我らの仕切りとさせてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
決するまでの間、この黒芒街は
我らの仕切りとさせてもらう。

engChrName: Until the matter has been fully resolved, we will also be assuming control of the Blacklight District.
engSearchText:
Until the matter has been fully resolved, we will also
be assuming control of the Blacklight District.
jpnChrName: “最高権力府”との約定により、な。
jpnSearchText: “最高権力府”との約定により、な。

engChrName: That is in accordance with our agreement with this nation's supreme authority.
engSearchText:
That is in accordance with our agreement with this
nation's supreme authority.

jpnChrName: それって大統領さんの……
jpnSearchText: それって大統領さんの……

engChrName: Then the president signed off on this?
engSearchText: Then the president signed off on this?
jpnChrName: それに“霧”が晴れたって……
jpnSearchText: それに“霧”が晴れたって……

engChrName: And what do you mean by 'the mists have cleared'?
engSearchText: And what do you mean by 'the mists have cleared'?
jpnChrName: フフ……ヌシらがどう動くか、 その御仁の話を聞いて決めるがよい。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……ヌシらがどう動くか、
その御仁の話を聞いて決めるがよい。

engChrName: Heh. It's time you decided your next move—though I would suggest you listen to what my friend here has to say before doing so.
engSearchText:
Heh. It's time you decided your next move—though I
would suggest you listen to what my friend here has
to say before doing so.
jpnChrName: ではなアーロン──また連絡する。
jpnSearchText: ではなアーロン──また連絡する。

engChrName: Farewell for now, Aaron. I will be in touch.
engSearchText: Farewell for now, Aaron. I will be in touch.
jpnChrName: っておい……！？
jpnSearchText: っておい……！？

engChrName: H-Hey!
engSearchText: H-Hey!
jpnChrName: ったく…… ギエン爺さんが直接来るとはな。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……
ギエン爺さんが直接来るとはな。

engChrName: Man... Didn't think he'd come all this way in person.
engSearchText: Man... Didn't think he'd come all this way in person.
jpnChrName: ファンのオッサンは煌都だろうし、 揃えた“手”っつうのは……
jpnSearchText:
ファンのオッサンは煌都だろうし、
揃えた“手”っつうのは……

engChrName: Fan's probably still in Langport, but now I really wanna know what the 'pieces' he mentioned refer to.
engSearchText:
Fan's probably still in Langport, but now I really
wanna know what the 'pieces' he mentioned refer to.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……？

engChrName: ...Are you all right, Van?
engSearchText: ...Are you all right, Van?
jpnChrName: ……そうだ……こういう人だったぜ……
jpnSearchText: ……そうだ……こういう人だったぜ……

engChrName: ...Yep. This is him, all right. This is how he's always been.
engSearchText:
...Yep. This is him, all right. This is how he's
always been.
jpnChrName: 常識人に見えてやる事なす事、 あまりにブッ飛んでるっつーか……
jpnSearchText:
常識人に見えてやる事なす事、
あまりにブッ飛んでるっつーか……

engChrName: He looks normal on the surface, yet everything he does is batshit crazy.
engSearchText:
He looks normal on the surface, yet everything he
does is batshit crazy.
jpnChrName: そりゃ若い頃に正体不明の Ｓ級危険物を持ち帰るワケだよな……
jpnSearchText:
そりゃ若い頃に正体不明の
Ｓ級危険物を持ち帰るワケだよな……

engChrName: Like wanderin' off with some stupid-dangerous object back when he was younger.
engSearchText:
Like wanderin' off with some stupid-dangerous
object back when he was younger.
jpnChrName: ハハ、また懐かしい話を。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、また懐かしい話を。

engChrName: Haha! That certainly brings back memories.
engSearchText: Haha! That certainly brings back memories.
jpnChrName: されどあくまで捨てた“過去”のこと。 そこはおぬしもどうか弁えてもらいたい。
jpnSearchText:
されどあくまで捨てた“過去”のこと。
そこはおぬしもどうか弁えてもらいたい。

engChrName: Yet I have discarded my past now, and I would ask that you discard it as well...
engSearchText:
Yet I have discarded my past now, and I would ask
that you discard it as well...
jpnChrName: 我が不肖の“元弟子”──ヴァンよ。
jpnSearchText: 我が不肖の“元弟子”──ヴァンよ。

engChrName: ...my old greenhorn student, Van.
engSearchText: ...my old greenhorn student, Van.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんの師匠、 いや“師父（せんせい）”……！？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんの師匠、
いや“師父（せんせい）”……！？

engChrName: This is Van's former master? The one he said was like a father to him?!
engSearchText:
This is Van's former master? The one he said was like
a father to him?!
jpnChrName: えと、でもその方って確か──
jpnSearchText: えと、でもその方って確か──

engChrName: Umm... But wasn't he...?
engSearchText: Umm... But wasn't he...?
jpnChrName: 言いたいことは星の数ほどあるが まず、これだけは突っ込ませてください……
jpnSearchText:
言いたいことは星の数ほどあるが
まず、これだけは突っ込ませてください……

engChrName: I've got more to say than there are stars in the sky, but let me start with this:
engSearchText:
I've got more to say than there are stars in the sky, but
let me start with this:
jpnChrName: ──どうして３年前に死んだはずのアンタが 生きてるんですか、バルクホルン師父（せんせい）ッ！！
jpnSearchText:
──どうして３年前に死んだはずのアンタが
生きてるんですか、バルクホルン師父（せんせい）ッ！！

engChrName: Why are you still alive when you supposedly died three years ago, Master Barkhorn?!
engSearchText:
Why are you still alive when you supposedly
died three years ago, Master Barkhorn?!
jpnChrName: ……ご迷惑かけてすみませんでした。
jpnSearchText: ……ご迷惑かけてすみませんでした。

engChrName: I'm so sorry for all the trouble I caused you.
engSearchText: I'm so sorry for all the trouble I caused you.
jpnChrName: わたし、ホントに駄目ですね…… 勝手に突っ走って、周りが見えなくなって……
jpnSearchText:
わたし、ホントに駄目ですね……
勝手に突っ走って、周りが見えなくなって……

engChrName: I'm such an idiot... I just got tunnel vision and let myself get all carried away.
engSearchText:
I'm such an idiot... I just got tunnel vision and let
myself get all carried away.
jpnChrName: グス……ディンゴさんにも ずっとずっと言われてたことなのに………
jpnSearchText:
グス……ディンゴさんにも
ずっとずっと言われてたことなのに………

engChrName: *sniffle* Dingo always warned me about this, but look at me—I haven't learned a thing...
engSearchText:
*sniffle* Dingo always warned me about this, but look
at me—I haven't learned a thing...
jpnChrName: マリエルさん……
jpnSearchText: マリエルさん……

engChrName: Marielle...
engSearchText: Marielle...
jpnChrName: ……ま、無茶をするなとは言わねえ。 それも記者の本分なんだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、無茶をするなとは言わねえ。
それも記者の本分なんだろうしな。

engChrName: ...Well, I ain't gonna tell you not to push the envelope. That's in a reporter's job description.
engSearchText:
...Well, I ain't gonna tell you not to push
the envelope. That's in a reporter's job description.
jpnChrName: だが──ディンゴの言葉を思い出せ。
jpnSearchText: だが──ディンゴの言葉を思い出せ。

engChrName: Just make sure you don't forget what Dingo said.
engSearchText: Just make sure you don't forget what Dingo said.
jpnChrName: 今、自分に出来ることは何なのか、 それと自分がやりたい事は何なのか。
jpnSearchText:
今、自分に出来ることは何なのか、
それと自分がやりたい事は何なのか。

engChrName: 'Think about what you can do, and what you want to do.'
engSearchText:
'Think about what you can do, and what you want
to do.'
jpnChrName: そこの“ギャップ”にこそ、 前に進むためのヒントがあるってな。
jpnSearchText:
そこの“ギャップ”にこそ、
前に進むためのヒントがあるってな。

engChrName: 'You'll find a clue on how to move forward in the gap between the two.'
engSearchText:
'You'll find a clue on how to move forward in the gap
between the two.'

jpnChrName: ……俺も会ったばかりの頃、 アイツから散々言われちまった言葉だ。
jpnSearchText:
……俺も会ったばかりの頃、
アイツから散々言われちまった言葉だ。

engChrName: ...He used to tell me that a lot back when we first met.
engSearchText:
...He used to tell me that a lot back when we
first met.
jpnChrName: そしてギャップを何とかする方法は 幾らだってある──考え続ける限り。
jpnSearchText:
そしてギャップを何とかする方法は
幾らだってある──考え続ける限り。

engChrName: As long as you don't stop thinkin', there's gonna be a way to bridge that gap. You just gotta find it.
engSearchText:
As long as you don't stop thinkin', there's gonna be a
way to bridge that gap. You just gotta find it.
jpnChrName: ──今、俺たちはあいつの “最期の依頼”で色々動いている。
jpnSearchText:
──今、俺たちはあいつの
“最期の依頼”で色々動いている。

engChrName: We're working on his last request right now.
engSearchText: We're working on his last request right now.
jpnChrName: それを達成するための“ギャップ”は 各方面から“借りて”何とかするつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
それを達成するための“ギャップ”は
各方面から“借りて”何とかするつもりだ。

engChrName: We won't be able to do it alone, but we're plannin' to make up for our shortcomings with help from others.
engSearchText:
We won't be able to do it alone, but we're plannin' to
make up for our shortcomings with help from others.
jpnChrName: それこそお前さんのような“表”の人間に 力を借りることがあるかもしれねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
それこそお前さんのような“表”の人間に
力を借りることがあるかもしれねぇ……

engChrName: Hell, I wouldn't be surprised if that brought us to you before long. We'll need help from more than shady folks.
engSearchText:
Hell, I wouldn't be surprised if that brought us to you
before long. We'll need help from more than
shady folks.
jpnChrName: だからお互い、適材適所で動くとしようぜ。 ──アイツの言葉が正しいと証明するためにも。
jpnSearchText:
だからお互い、適材適所で動くとしようぜ。
──アイツの言葉が正しいと証明するためにも。

engChrName: So keep your head high, and let's all do the jobs we're best for—if nothin' else than to prove his words right.
engSearchText:
So keep your head high, and let's all do the jobs we're
best for—if nothin' else than to prove his words right.
jpnChrName: ……はい！ どこまで出来るか分かりませんが！
jpnSearchText:
……はい！
どこまで出来るか分かりませんが！

engChrName: ...Right! I don't know how much of a contribution I'll be able to make...
engSearchText:
...Right! I don't know how much of a contribution I'll
be able to make...
jpnChrName: 自分の出来ること、やりたい事を ちゃんと整理して前に進んでみせます！
jpnSearchText:
自分の出来ること、やりたい事を
ちゃんと整理して前に進んでみせます！

engChrName: ...but I'll start being more mindful of my cans and wants—and I'll do it while finding a way to move forward!
engSearchText:
...but I'll start being more mindful of my cans and
wants—and I'll do it while finding a way to
move forward!
jpnChrName: 予備線路を抜けたヴァンたちは その後、悪魔に遭遇することもなく──
jpnSearchText:
予備線路を抜けたヴァンたちは
その後、悪魔に遭遇することもなく──

engChrName: They made their way across the underground railway tracks, fortunately encountering no more devils as they did.
engSearchText:
They made their way across the underground railway
tracks, fortunately encountering no more devils as
they did.
jpnChrName: 程なくして無事、黒芒街へと辿り着いた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>程なくして無事、黒芒街へと辿り着いた。

engChrName: Before long, they arrived in the Blacklight District.
engSearchText: Before long, they arrived in the Blacklight District.
jpnChrName: ここも紋様が来ていますけど……
jpnSearchText: ここも紋様が来ていますけど……

engChrName: There are lots of colored lines here, too...
engSearchText: There are lots of colored lines here, too...
jpnChrName: 停まってねぇヤツも多そうだし 地上より随分マシみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText:
停まってねぇヤツも多そうだし
地上より随分マシみてぇだな。

engChrName: Yeah, but notice how there's a good amount of people who aren't frozen. This area's in better shape than the surface, looks like.
engSearchText:
Yeah, but notice how there's a good amount of people
who aren't frozen. This area's in better shape than the
surface, looks like.
jpnChrName: 見たところ地上から 避難されてきた方々もいますね。
jpnSearchText:
見たところ地上から
避難されてきた方々もいますね。

engChrName: I imagine many of them deliberately came here from the surface believing it to be safer.
engSearchText:
I imagine many of them deliberately came here from
the surface believing it to be safer.
jpnChrName: ああ……
jpnSearchText: ああ……

engChrName: Would be a smart move.
engSearchText: Would be a smart move.
jpnChrName: （……やはり見覚えはねえか。   流れ着いたばかりの新参者ってことか。）
jpnSearchText:
（……やはり見覚えはねえか。
流れ着いたばかりの新参者ってことか。）

engChrName: (I don't recognize either of those guys. Must be new here.)
engSearchText:
(I don't recognize either of those guys. Must be
new here.)
jpnChrName: （無事そうなのは見知った顔ばかりだし……）
jpnSearchText: （無事そうなのは見知った顔ばかりだし……）

engChrName: (The only people who're moving around are people I remember seein' at some point before.)
engSearchText:
(The only people who're moving around are people I
remember seein' at some point before.)
jpnChrName: お、お前たちは……！？
jpnSearchText: お、お前たちは……！？

engChrName: I-It's you guys!
engSearchText: I-It's you guys!
jpnChrName: えっと……どこかで見たような。
jpnSearchText: えっと……どこかで見たような。

engChrName: Hmm... I feel like we've seen you somewhere before...
engSearchText: Hmm... I feel like we've seen you somewhere before...
jpnChrName: 先日こちらでマリエル様に絡んで ベルガルド様に一蹴された方々ですね。
jpnSearchText:
先日こちらでマリエル様に絡んで
ベルガルド様に一蹴された方々ですね。

engChrName: They were the men Mr. Zeman trounced effortlessly when they were causing trouble for Ms. Aymé.
engSearchText:
They were the men Mr. Zeman trounced effortlessly
when they were causing trouble for Ms. Aymé.
jpnChrName: ギエン爺さんの凶手たちに 秒で制圧されてた連中か。
jpnSearchText:
ギエン爺さんの凶手たちに
秒で制圧されてた連中か。

engChrName: Yeah, along with Gien and his xiongshou.
engSearchText: Yeah, along with Gien and his xiongshou.
jpnChrName: あっという間だったから忘れてたぜ。
jpnSearchText: あっという間だったから忘れてたぜ。

engChrName: They got owned so fast, I forgot all about them.
engSearchText: They got owned so fast, I forgot all about them.
jpnChrName: たしか《バグベアー》だっけ？ （昔Ⅶ組でやり合ったような。）
jpnSearchText:
たしか《バグベアー》だっけ？
（昔Ⅶ組でやり合ったような。）

engChrName: I think their name is Bugbear? (I vaguely remember us running into them back when I was in school.)
engSearchText:
I think their name is Bugbear?
(I vaguely remember us running into them back when
I was in school.)
jpnChrName: Ｃ級傭兵団《バグベアー》か。 まだ首都から出ていなかったとは。
jpnSearchText:
Ｃ級傭兵団《バグベアー》か。
まだ首都から出ていなかったとは。

engChrName: They're a C-rank jaeger corps by the name of Bugbear. I'd thought they pulled out of Edith already.)
engSearchText:
They're a C-rank jaeger corps by the name
of Bugbear. I'd thought they pulled out of
Edith already.)
jpnChrName: 《バグベアー》──ギエン老が 仰っていた“セミプロ”の方々ですか。
jpnSearchText:
《バグベアー》──ギエン老が
仰っていた“セミプロ”の方々ですか。

engChrName: Their name is Bugbear. I remember Elder Gien confessing he was being very generous when calling them 'professionals.'
engSearchText:
Their name is Bugbear. I remember Elder Gien
confessing he was being very generous when calling
them 'professionals.'
jpnChrName: ったく、確かに面識はあるが お前等が“停まって”ねぇのかよ……
jpnSearchText:
ったく、確かに面識はあるが
お前等が“停まって”ねぇのかよ……

engChrName: Ugh. Why couldn't you guys just be frozen, too?
engSearchText: Ugh. Why couldn't you guys just be frozen, too?
jpnChrName: な、なにを溜息をついている！？ 相変わらず無礼な連中だ。
jpnSearchText:
な、なにを溜息をついている！？
相変わらず無礼な連中だ。

engChrName: 'U-Ugh,' yourself! You don't have to be so rude every time!
engSearchText:
'U-Ugh,' yourself! You don't have to be so rude
every time!
jpnChrName: 地上の混乱から何とか撤退して 一息ついたところだったがよぉ……
jpnSearchText:
地上の混乱から何とか撤退して
一息ついたところだったがよぉ……

engChrName: I thought we could finally rest easy now that we're away from all the chaos on the surface, but we HAD to run into you guys.
engSearchText:
I thought we could finally rest easy now that we're
away from all the chaos on the surface, but we HAD
to run into you guys.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋──見たところ 以前より人数も少ないようだな。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋──見たところ
以前より人数も少ないようだな。

engChrName: I see you're traveling in smaller numbers these days, spriggan.
engSearchText:
I see you're traveling in smaller numbers these
days, spriggan.
jpnChrName: フン、情報を持っていそうだし 改めて締め上げてみるか……？
jpnSearchText:
フン、情報を持っていそうだし
改めて締め上げてみるか……？

engChrName: Something tells me they've got info we could do with having. Time to put the screws to 'em!
engSearchText:
Something tells me they've got info we could do
with having. Time to put the screws to 'em!

jpnChrName: ったく、力の差くらい 見極められねえのかよ……
jpnSearchText:
ったく、力の差くらい
見極められねえのかよ……

engChrName: *sigh* Can you dumbasses really not tell when the odds are stacked against you?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Can you dumbasses really not tell when the
odds are stacked against you?
jpnChrName: フフ、ようやく参ったか。
jpnSearchText: フフ、ようやく参ったか。

engChrName: Heh. I've been waiting for your arrival.
engSearchText: Heh. I've been waiting for your arrival.
jpnChrName: ぶぎゃあっ！！
jpnSearchText: ぶぎゃあっ！！

engChrName: AAARGH!
engSearchText: AAARGH!
jpnChrName: ぐはあああっ！？
jpnSearchText: ぐはあああっ！？

engChrName: GAAAH!
engSearchText: GAAAH!
jpnChrName: で、出たああああっ！！？
jpnSearchText: で、出たああああっ！！？

engChrName: H-He's baaaaaack!
engSearchText: H-He's baaaaaack!
jpnChrName: ば、化物ジジイがああっ！！
jpnSearchText: ば、化物ジジイがああっ！！

engChrName: I-It's that crazy old guy again!
engSearchText: I-It's that crazy old guy again!
jpnChrName: 猥雑さは嫌いじゃないけど 勘違いは美しくないですね。
jpnSearchText:
猥雑さは嫌いじゃないけど
勘違いは美しくないですね。

engChrName: I'm not entirely opposed to vulgarities, but such foolishness is downright repulsive.
engSearchText:
I'm not entirely opposed to vulgarities, but such
foolishness is downright repulsive.

jpnChrName: なああっ……！？
jpnSearchText: なああっ……！？

engChrName: What the—?!
engSearchText: What the—?!
jpnChrName: まぁ、こういう兄はんたちがいてこそ “粋”も引き立つというものやろ。
jpnSearchText:
まぁ、こういう兄はんたちがいてこそ
“粋”も引き立つというものやろ。

engChrName: I do so appreciate how lowlifes like these help us cream of the crop stand out.
engSearchText:
I do so appreciate how lowlifes like these help us
cream of the crop stand out.

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?

engChrName: Oh... Oh, no...
engSearchText: Oh... Oh, no...
jpnChrName: いや……師父（せんせい）も含めて 居るのは分かってたけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
いや……師父（せんせい）も含めて
居るのは分かってたけどよ。

engChrName: I knew you were gonna turn up here, but I didn't expect you to make a whole show of it.
engSearchText:
I knew you were gonna turn up here, but I didn't
expect you to make a whole show of it.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、凄そうなのが 残ってたみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、凄そうなのが
残ってたみたいだね。

engChrName: Looks like some strong guys on guard here.
engSearchText: Looks like some strong guys on guard here.
jpnChrName: フッ、恐るべき手練れが 残っていたようだな。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、恐るべき手練れが
残っていたようだな。

engChrName: I see there are some formidable allies guarding the place.
engSearchText:
I see there are some formidable allies guarding
the place.
jpnChrName: フフ、心強い方々が 残ってらっしゃったご様子。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、心強い方々が
残ってらっしゃったご様子。

engChrName: I see we have some formidable allies here.
engSearchText: I see we have some formidable allies here.
jpnChrName: あ、相変わらず凄いです……
jpnSearchText: あ、相変わらず凄いです……

engChrName: You put a stop to them just like that...
engSearchText: You put a stop to them just like that...
jpnChrName: つーか秒で終わらせんなよ……
jpnSearchText: つーか秒で終わらせんなよ……

engChrName: You could've at least let them THINK they had a chance of winning.
engSearchText:
You could've at least let them THINK they had a
chance of winning.
jpnChrName: まあ、この者たちはともかく、 そろそろ来る頃と思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、この者たちはともかく、
そろそろ来る頃と思ってな。

engChrName: Well, we may not have been counting on their arrival, but we suspected it was about time for yours.
engSearchText:
Well, we may not have been counting on their arrival,
but we suspected it was about time for yours.
jpnChrName: 少し前にＣＩＤの補佐官殿と 白蘭竜殿がいらっしゃったんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
少し前にＣＩＤの補佐官殿と
白蘭竜殿がいらっしゃったんですよ。

engChrName: That CID aide and the White Orchid Dragon arrived not long ago, too.
engSearchText:
That CID aide and the White Orchid Dragon arrived
not long ago, too.
jpnChrName: 少し前にクラウゼル嬢と 白蘭竜殿がいらっしゃったんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
少し前にクラウゼル嬢と
白蘭竜殿がいらっしゃったんですよ。

engChrName: Claussell and the White Orchid Dragon arrived not long ago, too.
engSearchText:
Claussell and the White Orchid Dragon arrived not
long ago, too.
jpnChrName: 少し前にクラウゼル嬢とＣＩＤの 補佐官殿がいらっしゃったんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
少し前にクラウゼル嬢とＣＩＤの
補佐官殿がいらっしゃったんですよ。

engChrName: Claussell and that CID aide arrived not long ago, too.
engSearchText: Claussell and that CID aide arrived not long ago, too.
jpnChrName: あなた方が動き始めていることも 教えてもらいました。
jpnSearchText:
あなた方が動き始めていることも
教えてもらいました。

engChrName: They informed us of what you were up to.
engSearchText: They informed us of what you were up to.
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: Then that makes things easy.
engSearchText: Then that makes things easy.
jpnChrName: お二人ともこちらを経由して 動いてらっしゃるみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
お二人ともこちらを経由して
動いてらっしゃるみたいですね。

engChrName: So the two of them passed through here as well, then.
engSearchText: So the two of them passed through here as well, then.
jpnChrName: うちもエルロイ旦さんから ちょっとだけ聞いとってなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
うちもエルロイ旦さんから
ちょっとだけ聞いとってなぁ。

engChrName: Ellroy also filled me in on our current predicament.
engSearchText: Ellroy also filled me in on our current predicament.
jpnChrName: なんや大変やったみたいやし ゆるりとしていかはったら？
jpnSearchText:
なんや大変やったみたいやし
ゆるりとしていかはったら？

engChrName: It sounds like it's quite the mess—but why not let the mess wait and indulge yourselves with a good rest first?
engSearchText:
It sounds like it's quite the mess—but why not let the
mess wait and indulge yourselves with a good
rest first?
jpnChrName: あんたもあんたで通常運転だな……
jpnSearchText: あんたもあんたで通常運転だな……

engChrName: Of course you'd say that...
engSearchText: Of course you'd say that...
jpnChrName: つーか、破戒も来たみたいだが、 異変前は不動や痩せ狼もいなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
つーか、破戒も来たみたいだが、
異変前は不動や痩せ狼もいなかったか？

engChrName: Anyway, the Oathbreaker's a given, but did the Direwolf and the Immovable stop by before all this went down?
engSearchText:
Anyway, the Oathbreaker's a given, but did the
Direwolf and the Immovable stop by before all this
went down?
jpnChrName: そうだ、ジンさん。 こっちに居ると思ったけど……
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、ジンさん。
こっちに居ると思ったけど……

engChrName: I was expecting Zin to be here.
engSearchText: I was expecting Zin to be here.
jpnChrName: それ以外にも気になる面々が 居たとは聞いているが……
jpnSearchText:
それ以外にも気になる面々が
居たとは聞いているが……

engChrName: I'd heard we could expect some other surprising faces here.
engSearchText:
I'd heard we could expect some other surprising
faces here.
jpnChrName: ふむ、他にも気になる面々が いらっしゃったようですが。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、他にも気になる面々が
いらっしゃったようですが。

engChrName: Hmm... I had heard we could expect some other surprising faces here.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I had heard we could expect some other
surprising faces here.
jpnChrName: うむ、ジン殿と痩せ狼は 先ほど地上に向かったばかりでな。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、ジン殿と痩せ狼は
先ほど地上に向かったばかりでな。

engChrName: Zin and the Direwolf were here not long ago, but they have since returned to the surface.
engSearchText:
Zin and the Direwolf were here not long ago, but
they have since returned to the surface.
jpnChrName: アシュラッドに斑鳩の忍びも 既にこの場所にはおらぬ。
jpnSearchText:
アシュラッドに斑鳩の忍びも
既にこの場所にはおらぬ。

engChrName: Ashladd and the shinobi of Ikaruga have also departed.
engSearchText:
Ashladd and the shinobi of Ikaruga have
also departed.
jpnChrName: 代わりに思わぬ面々が こちらにいらっしゃっていてな。
jpnSearchText:
代わりに思わぬ面々が
こちらにいらっしゃっていてな。

engChrName: We do have some other unexpected guests in their place, however.
engSearchText:
We do have some other unexpected guests in their
place, however.

jpnChrName: ハッハッハッ、アークライド君。 無事だったようで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッハッハッ、アークライド君。
無事だったようで何よりだ。

engChrName: I'm pleased to see you're doing well, Arkride.
engSearchText: I'm pleased to see you're doing well, Arkride.
jpnChrName: ロックスミス閣下……！ それに室長さんたちも。
jpnSearchText:
ロックスミス閣下……！
それに室長さんたちも。

engChrName: President Rocksmith! That's some party you've got with you.
engSearchText:
President Rocksmith! That's some party you've got
with you.
jpnChrName: おいおい、ゴッチのオッサンが 来てるのは知ってたが……
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、ゴッチのオッサンが
来てるのは知ってたが……

engChrName: I knew Gotti was gonna be around, but...
engSearchText: I knew Gotti was gonna be around, but...
jpnChrName: ガッハッハッ、ヴァン君たち。 地上は凄いことになっとるらしいなぁ！
jpnSearchText:
ガッハッハッ、ヴァン君たち。
地上は凄いことになっとるらしいなぁ！

engChrName: Gahaha! Good to see you guys! Hear the surface's gone down the shitter!
engSearchText:
Gahaha! Good to see you guys! Hear the surface's
gone down the shitter!
jpnChrName: よかった、無事だったんだ。 サイデン地区にいたと思ったけど。
jpnSearchText:
よかった、無事だったんだ。
サイデン地区にいたと思ったけど。

engChrName: I thought you were in the Seiden District. I'm glad you're okay.
engSearchText:
I thought you were in the Seiden District. I'm glad
you're okay.
jpnChrName: ふふ、貴女も無事で何よりね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、貴女も無事で何よりね。

engChrName: Heh. You as well.
engSearchText: Heh. You as well.
jpnChrName: 室長、お疲れ様です。 コーディ准尉もご苦労。
jpnSearchText:
室長、お疲れ様です。
コーディ准尉もご苦労。

engChrName: I'm glad to see the both of you are faring well.
engSearchText: I'm glad to see the both of you are faring well.
jpnChrName: 閣下もご無事で何よりでした。
jpnSearchText: 閣下もご無事で何よりでした。

engChrName: And you also, of course, Mr. President.
engSearchText: And you also, of course, Mr. President.
jpnChrName: ふふ、キンケイド君もね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、キンケイド君もね。

engChrName: Heh. The same to you, Kincaid.
engSearchText: Heh. The same to you, Kincaid.
jpnChrName: ……補佐官もお疲れ様です。
jpnSearchText: ……補佐官もお疲れ様です。

engChrName: ...It's good to see you, sir.
engSearchText: ...It's good to see you, sir.
jpnChrName: これはこれは…… ふふ、ご無事で何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
これはこれは……
ふふ、ご無事で何よりです。

engChrName: Well, well... I'm relieved to see you're all right.
engSearchText: Well, well... I'm relieved to see you're all right.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そちらこそ。 まあ貴方に万一はないでしょうけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そちらこそ。
まあ貴方に万一はないでしょうけど。

engChrName: Heh. Same to you—not that there's anything in this world capable of taking you out.
engSearchText:
Heh. Same to you—not that there's anything in
this world capable of taking you out.
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: いや、殿下やファン殿と語らった後、 改めてこちらに赴くことにしてね。
jpnSearchText:
いや、殿下やファン殿と語らった後、
改めてこちらに赴くことにしてね。

engChrName: I decided to make my way here after I finished talking with Fan and the crown prince.
engSearchText:
I decided to make my way here after I finished talking
with Fan and the crown prince.
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: 在任中から色々変わったと聞いて、 今一度訪れたいと思っていたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
在任中から色々変わったと聞いて、
今一度訪れたいと思っていたんだ。

engChrName: I've heard that this place has changed quite a bit since I held my position, so I've been meaning to revisit it for some time.
engSearchText:
I've heard that this place has changed quite a bit since
I held my position, so I've been meaning to revisit it
for some time.
jpnChrName: お気持ちは分かりますぞ、閣下！
jpnSearchText: お気持ちは分かりますぞ、閣下！

engChrName: And I see why you'd want to come, Mr. President!
engSearchText: And I see why you'd want to come, Mr. President!
jpnChrName: バイオレンスとエロスを掻き立てる この饐（す）えた空気に程よい廃墟美！
jpnSearchText:
バイオレンスとエロスを掻き立てる
この饐（す）えた空気に程よい廃墟美！

engChrName: The rotten air of this dirty, dingy hellscape STINKS of magnifical eros and savagery!
engSearchText:
The rotten air of this dirty, dingy hellscape STINKS
of magnifical eros and savagery!
jpnChrName: いや～、なんという カメラ映えするロケ地なことかッ！
jpnSearchText:
いや～、なんという
カメラ映えするロケ地なことかッ！

engChrName: Oh, pinch me, Aidios! I'm already DYING to film something here!
engSearchText:
Oh, pinch me, Aidios! I'm already DYING to film
something here!
jpnChrName: オッサンもオッサンで全開だな……
jpnSearchText: オッサンもオッサンで全開だな……

engChrName: How is this guy so predictable...?
engSearchText: How is this guy so predictable...?
jpnChrName: いや、監督もいつもの調子で 安心しましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、監督もいつもの調子で
安心しましたよ。

engChrName: I'd be more concerned if he changed overnight.
engSearchText: I'd be more concerned if he changed overnight.
jpnChrName: ………ばいおれんすとえろす？
jpnSearchText: ………ばいおれんすとえろす？

engChrName: ...What does 'eros' mean?
engSearchText: ...What does 'eros' mean?
jpnChrName: フェリ様にはお早いかと。
jpnSearchText: フェリ様にはお早いかと。

engChrName: That's a word you need not concern yourself with for a while, Ms. Al-Fayed.
engSearchText:
That's a word you need not concern yourself with for
a while, Ms. Al-Fayed.
jpnChrName: フフ……とりあえず あちらの方で落ち着くがいい。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……とりあえず
あちらの方で落ち着くがいい。

engChrName: Well, then, how about we take a seat over there for the time being?
engSearchText:
Well, then, how about we take a seat over there for
the time being?
jpnChrName: ……やはり異変は ヴァンタイユ地区からですか。
jpnSearchText:
……やはり異変は
ヴァンタイユ地区からですか。

engChrName: So this originated in the Vantail District after all.
engSearchText: So this originated in the Vantail District after all.
jpnChrName: うむ、きっかけは間違いなく あの通信での顛末であろうがな。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、きっかけは間違いなく
あの通信での顛末であろうがな。

engChrName: Indeed—no doubt as a result of what we saw in that transmission.
engSearchText:
Indeed—no doubt as a result of what we saw in
that transmission.
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: そちらは私は見なかったが……
jpnSearchText: そちらは私は見なかったが……

engChrName: I wasn't able to see it myself, and so I've had to rely on hearsay...
engSearchText:
I wasn't able to see it myself, and so I've had to rely
on hearsay...
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: 逃げていたアルマータの幹部に 死んだはずの首領が映っていたとか？
jpnSearchText:
逃げていたアルマータの幹部に
死んだはずの首領が映っていたとか？

engChrName: ...but I hear that Almata's missing executive member and their deceased leader made an appearance?
engSearchText:
...but I hear that Almata's missing executive member
and their deceased leader made an appearance?
jpnChrName: ……本人である確証はありませんが その可能性は高いでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
……本人である確証はありませんが
その可能性は高いでしょうね。

engChrName: ...Yeah. There's no guarantee it's really them, but there's a good chance it is.
engSearchText:
...Yeah. There's no guarantee it's really them, but
there's a good chance it is.
jpnChrName: 先生、ジェラールの死亡は その目で見届けられたのですよね？
jpnSearchText:
先生、ジェラールの死亡は
その目で見届けられたのですよね？

engChrName: You witnessed Dantès' death firsthand, didn't you, Master?
engSearchText:
You witnessed Dantès' death firsthand, didn't
you, Master?
jpnChrName: うむ、しかとな…… あれで生きていることはあり得まい。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、しかとな……
あれで生きていることはあり得まい。

engChrName: I did. He should most certainly be dead after what he endured.
engSearchText:
I did. He should most certainly be dead after what
he endured.
jpnChrName: 普通であれば何らかのカラクリが あるとしか考えられぬが……
jpnSearchText:
普通であれば何らかのカラクリが
あるとしか考えられぬが……

engChrName: As such, I would ordinarily suspect that some manner of trickery is at work here. Ordinarily.
engSearchText:
As such, I would ordinarily suspect that some manner
of trickery is at work here. Ordinarily.
jpnChrName: うーん、死んだ筈のメンバーも あの場にいたっぽいし……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、死んだ筈のメンバーも
あの場にいたっぽいし……

engChrName: He wasn't the only deceased Almata member there, either...
engSearchText:
He wasn't the only deceased Almata member
there, either...
jpnChrName: 死亡が確認されたメンバーも あの場所にいたようだが……
jpnSearchText:
死亡が確認されたメンバーも
あの場所にいたようだが……

engChrName: He wasn't the only deceased Almata member there, either...
engSearchText:
He wasn't the only deceased Almata member
there, either...
jpnChrName: フフ、死亡した筈のメンバーも あの場にいたようですが……
jpnSearchText:
フフ、死亡した筈のメンバーも
あの場にいたようですが……

engChrName: He wasn't the only deceased Almata member there, either.
engSearchText:
He wasn't the only deceased Almata member
there, either.
jpnChrName: うふふ、普通であればですやろ？
jpnSearchText: うふふ、普通であればですやろ？

engChrName: We're without a doubt dealing with something far from ordinary here.
engSearchText:
We're without a doubt dealing with something far
from ordinary here.
jpnChrName: 何でも２年前の帝国の騒動の時は “死んだ筈”の人たちが蘇ったとか。
jpnSearchText:
何でも２年前の帝国の騒動の時は
“死んだ筈”の人たちが蘇ったとか。

engChrName: I heard that people came back from the dead during the chaos in the Empire two years ago, too.
engSearchText:
I heard that people came back from the dead during
the chaos in the Empire two years ago, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、獅子さんもそれだったり？
jpnSearchText: ああ、獅子さんもそれだったり？

engChrName: And as it so happens, weren't you one of them?
engSearchText: And as it so happens, weren't you one of them?
jpnChrName: ……私は表向きというだけだ。 帝国の“不死者”は根本的に違う。
jpnSearchText:
……私は表向きというだけだ。
帝国の“不死者”は根本的に違う。

engChrName: ...I was only believed to be dead. My situation is fundamentally different to that of the Empire's Immortals.
engSearchText:
...I was only believed to be dead. My situation is
fundamentally different to that of the
Empire's Immortals.
jpnChrName: 俺も話だけは聞いちゃいるが 帝国ならではの呪いだったそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺も話だけは聞いちゃいるが
帝国ならではの呪いだったそうだ。

engChrName: I wasn't part of all that, but from what I've heard, that was tied up in a curse specific to the Empire.
engSearchText:
I wasn't part of all that, but from what I've heard, that
was tied up in a curse specific to the Empire.
jpnChrName: だがその元凶は消滅し…… これ以上不死者が現れることはねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
だがその元凶は消滅し……
これ以上不死者が現れることはねぇ。

engChrName: The being responsible for it is dead and gone, too. We shouldn't have to deal with Immortals again.
engSearchText:
The being responsible for it is dead and gone, too.
We shouldn't have to deal with Immortals again.
jpnChrName: ……つーかアンタだったら俺以上に そこらへんは詳しいはずだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
……つーかアンタだったら俺以上に
そこらへんは詳しいはずだろうが。

engChrName: ...Not sure why I'm even tellin' you this. You probably know way more about the whole thing than I do.
engSearchText:
...Not sure why I'm even tellin' you this. You probably
know way more about the whole thing than I do.
jpnChrName: うふふ、バレてしもた？
jpnSearchText: うふふ、バレてしもた？

engChrName: Heehee. Aren't you a bright boy?
engSearchText: Heehee. Aren't you a bright boy?
jpnChrName: フェイクか本物か……いずれにせよ、 全く別の背景だと思うべきでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
フェイクか本物か……いずれにせよ、
全く別の背景だと思うべきでしょう。

engChrName: It sounds like they're unrelated to the Empire's troubles, then, whether they are the actual Almata members living again or impostors.
engSearchText:
It sounds like they're unrelated to the Empire's
troubles, then, whether they are the actual Almata
members living again or impostors.
jpnChrName: まあ、アークライド所長には 何か心当たりがあるんでしょうけど。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、アークライド所長には
何か心当たりがあるんでしょうけど。

engChrName: Though you seem to have your own theory as to what is at work here, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
Though you seem to have your own theory as to what
is at work here, Mr. Arkride.

jpnChrName: （……確かにアイーダさんの   ことを考えると……）
jpnSearchText:
（……確かにアイーダさんの
ことを考えると……）

engChrName: (After what happened with Aida...)
engSearchText: (After what happened with Aida...)
jpnChrName: （《ゲネシス》の働き……   その可能性は否定できませんね。）
jpnSearchText:
（《ゲネシス》の働き……
その可能性は否定できませんね。）

engChrName: (It isn't impossible that this is the work of a Genesis...)
engSearchText:
(It isn't impossible that this is the work of
a Genesis...)
jpnChrName: （ああ……   決めつけもできねえがな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ……
決めつけもできねえがな。）

engChrName: (Yeah. It's too early to say for sure, though.)
engSearchText: (Yeah. It's too early to say for sure, though.)
jpnChrName: ふむ……
jpnSearchText: ふむ……

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

jpnChrName: ふむ……
jpnSearchText: ふむ……

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: まあ、サルバッドの時も とんでもない事をしでかした連中だ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、サルバッドの時も
とんでもない事をしでかした連中だ。

engChrName: Almata did do some crazy mindbending stuff in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
Almata did do some crazy mindbending stuff
in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: これだけの事を起こした以上、 常識で計れんのは確かだろうなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
これだけの事を起こした以上、
常識で計れんのは確かだろうなぁ。

engChrName: So I think we can safely say that common sense doesn't always apply to them.
engSearchText:
So I think we can safely say that common sense
doesn't always apply to them.
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: それ以上の真相に迫るには あえて踏み込んでみるしかない……
jpnSearchText:
それ以上の真相に迫るには
あえて踏み込んでみるしかない……

engChrName: Yet it seems the only way to find out the truth now is to charge right into the matter and find it.
engSearchText:
Yet it seems the only way to find out the truth now is
to charge right into the matter and find it.
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: そういうことかな、アークライド君？
jpnSearchText: そういうことかな、アークライド君？

engChrName: Is that your thinking also, Arkride?
engSearchText: Is that your thinking also, Arkride?
jpnChrName: ええ、オラシオンでジェラールに 止めを刺したのは俺です。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、オラシオンでジェラールに
止めを刺したのは俺です。

engChrName: It is. I was the one who dealt the killing blow to Dantès in Oración.
engSearchText:
It is. I was the one who dealt the killing blow to
Dantès in Oración.
jpnChrName: 仕方なくじゃない── ダチの復讐のつもりでもなかった。
jpnSearchText:
仕方なくじゃない──
ダチの復讐のつもりでもなかった。

engChrName: It wasn't 'cause I didn't have a choice. And it wasn't to avenge a friend.
engSearchText:
It wasn't 'cause I didn't have a choice. And it wasn't
to avenge a friend.
jpnChrName: ただ裏解決屋の流儀として、 一線を越えたヤツを止めるために。
jpnSearchText:
ただ裏解決屋の流儀として、
一線を越えたヤツを止めるために。

engChrName: No, he'd just gone too far off the rails—and as a spriggan, I couldn't let him go one step further.
engSearchText:
No, he'd just gone too far off the rails—and as a
spriggan, I couldn't let him go one step further.
jpnChrName: だからヤツの真相を暴くのは あくまで俺の仕事でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
だからヤツの真相を暴くのは
あくまで俺の仕事でしょう。

engChrName: So finding out the truth is on me now.
engSearchText: So finding out the truth is on me now.
jpnChrName: これでも一度請けた仕事は 放り出さないのがポリシーなんでね。
jpnSearchText:
これでも一度請けた仕事は
放り出さないのがポリシーなんでね。

engChrName: Because I don't believe in leaving any job half done.
engSearchText: Because I don't believe in leaving any job half done.
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: Very well, then.
engSearchText: Very well, then.
jpnChrName: ふふ……
jpnSearchText: ふふ……

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: フフ……
jpnSearchText: フフ……

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: ……ＣＩＤとしてもその方針に 異議を唱えるものではないわね。
jpnSearchText:
……ＣＩＤとしてもその方針に
異議を唱えるものではないわね。

engChrName: The CID has no opposition to that.
engSearchText: The CID has no opposition to that.

engChrName: Heehee...
engSearchText: Heehee...
jpnChrName: わたしたちもアルマータと ずっとやり合ってきました……！
jpnSearchText:
わたしたちもアルマータと
ずっとやり合ってきました……！

engChrName: We've had plenty of run-ins with Almata in the past...
engSearchText:
We've had plenty of run-ins with Almata in
the past...
jpnChrName: ここで引き下がるわけにはいきません！
jpnSearchText: ここで引き下がるわけにはいきません！

engChrName: We're not gonna turn back now!
engSearchText: We're not gonna turn back now!
jpnChrName: ああ、ダチの仇もあるし、 今度こそ引導を渡してやらねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ダチの仇もあるし、
今度こそ引導を渡してやらねえとな。

engChrName: Nope. After what they did to my bros, I'm not gonna stop until they're gone for good.
engSearchText:
Nope. After what they did to my bros, I'm not gonna
stop until they're gone for good.
jpnChrName: わたくしもＳＣとして 危機管理業務を全うするために……
jpnSearchText:
わたくしもＳＣとして
危機管理業務を全うするために……

engChrName: As a concierge, it is my job to intercept and mitigate potential risks, and that is just what I'll do.
engSearchText:
As a concierge, it is my job to intercept and
mitigate potential risks, and that is just what
I'll do.
jpnChrName: 無論、アニエス様やカトル様、 ジュディス様の意向もありますが。
jpnSearchText:
無論、アニエス様やカトル様、
ジュディス様の意向もありますが。

engChrName: We also still have to find Ms. Claudel, Mr. Salision, and Ms. Lanster to ask for their input on our next move.
engSearchText:
We also still have to find Ms. Claudel, Mr. Salision,
and Ms. Lanster to ask for their input on
our next move.
jpnChrName: そ、そうです……！　その前に アニエスさんたちと合流しないと！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうです……！　その前に
アニエスさんたちと合流しないと！

engChrName: Absolutely! We can't make a decision without them!
engSearchText: Absolutely! We can't make a decision without them!
jpnChrName: ま、あのチート娘が近くにいたら 心配ねえとは思うが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あのチート娘が近くにいたら
心配ねえとは思うが。

engChrName: Miss Perfect's got her big-brained friend with her, so I'm sure she's sitting pretty, at least.
engSearchText:
Miss Perfect's got her big-brained friend with her, so
I'm sure she's sitting pretty, at least.
jpnChrName: ジュディスは事務所の 正式なメンバーでもねえんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ジュディスは事務所の
正式なメンバーでもねえんだが……

engChrName: Judith's not even one of my part-timers...
engSearchText: Judith's not even one of my part-timers...
jpnChrName: ま、それを言い出したら 師父（せんせい）も同じですか。
jpnSearchText:
ま、それを言い出したら
師父（せんせい）も同じですか。

engChrName: Though I guess that's technically true for my master, too.
engSearchText:
Though I guess that's technically true for my
master, too.
jpnChrName: フフ、私ももちろん、 おぬしらに付き合うつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、私ももちろん、
おぬしらに付き合うつもりだ。

engChrName: It may be, but rest assured I will be accompanying you till the very end.
engSearchText:
It may be, but rest assured I will be accompanying you
till the very end.
jpnChrName: どうやらビクトル殿の家族も 助け出す必要がありそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
どうやらビクトル殿の家族も
助け出す必要がありそうだしな。

engChrName: We need to bring Victor's family home safely as well.
engSearchText: We need to bring Victor's family home safely as well.
jpnChrName: ユメちゃん……！ 当然そっちもありますねっ。
jpnSearchText:
ユメちゃん……！
当然そっちもありますねっ。

engChrName: Yeah! We can't forget about Yumé and Paulette!
engSearchText: Yeah! We can't forget about Yumé and Paulette!
jpnChrName: クク、ポーレットも当然として 残念レーサーはスルーでいいか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、ポーレットも当然として
残念レーサーはスルーでいいか。

engChrName: And that useless racecar driver, but he can just rot out there for all I care.
engSearchText:
And that useless racecar driver, but he can just rot out
there for all I care.
jpnChrName: それは流石にお可哀想かと……
jpnSearchText: それは流石にお可哀想かと……

engChrName: That is rather harsh...
engSearchText: That is rather harsh...
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: ──ならば何も言うまい、 君たちの流儀を貫きたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
──ならば何も言うまい、
君たちの流儀を貫きたまえ。

engChrName: It sounds like there's nothing more that needs to be said. Go on, then, and follow your hearts.
engSearchText:
It sounds like there's nothing more that needs to
be said. Go on, then, and follow your hearts.
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: 個人的にアニエス嬢の無事は 何とか確認したいところだしね。
jpnSearchText:
個人的にアニエス嬢の無事は
何とか確認したいところだしね。

engChrName: It would do mine good to see that young Agnès is safe and well.
engSearchText:
It would do mine good to see that young Agnès is
safe and well.
jpnChrName: たしかタイレル地区にいた筈ですし、 準備を整えたらすぐに行ってみます。
jpnSearchText:
たしかタイレル地区にいた筈ですし、
準備を整えたらすぐに行ってみます。

engChrName: She was headin' to Tyrell, so as soon as we're ready, we should head there next.
engSearchText:
She was headin' to Tyrell, so as soon as we're ready,
we should head there next.
jpnChrName: 彼女の親父さんがどうしてるのか そっちも気になりますがね。
jpnSearchText:
彼女の親父さんがどうしてるのか
そっちも気になりますがね。

engChrName: Can't say I'm not curious what her dad's up to, too.
engSearchText: Can't say I'm not curious what her dad's up to, too.
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: ふむ、確かに…… 彼なら滅多なことはないと思うが。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、確かに……
彼なら滅多なことはないと思うが。

engChrName: Hmm... Indeed. I'm sure he's fine wherever he is, of course.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Indeed. I'm sure he's fine wherever he is,
of course.
jpnChrName: フフ…… 話が纏まったようで何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
話が纏まったようで何よりです。

engChrName: Well, with that out of the way, I also have something I would like to discuss.
engSearchText:
Well, with that out of the way, I also have something
I would like to discuss.
jpnChrName: 先生がそちらに付かれるのは 僕としても異存はありませんが……
jpnSearchText:
先生がそちらに付かれるのは
僕としても異存はありませんが……

engChrName: I have no specific problem with our master accompanying you on your travels.
engSearchText:
I have no specific problem with our master
accompanying you on your travels.
jpnChrName: ヴァン・アークライドさん。
jpnSearchText: ヴァン・アークライドさん。

engChrName: That being said, Mr. Van Arkride...
engSearchText: That being said, Mr. Van Arkride...
jpnChrName: あなた方の事務所の案件となっている “なにがしかの物”とはまた別に──
jpnSearchText:
あなた方の事務所の案件となっている
“なにがしかの物”とはまた別に──

engChrName: While I am aware that your group is handling some peculiar items that have their share of interesting effects...
engSearchText:
While I am aware that your group is handling some
peculiar items that have their share of
interesting effects...
jpnChrName: 今回の異常現象について 何か他に心当たりはありませんか？
jpnSearchText:
今回の異常現象について
何か他に心当たりはありませんか？

engChrName: ...you wouldn't happen to have any other ideas on what could be causing all of this, would you?
engSearchText:
...you wouldn't happen to have any other ideas on
what could be causing all of this, would you?

jpnChrName: え、え……
jpnSearchText: え、え……

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: そいつはどういう……いや。
jpnSearchText: そいつはどういう……いや。

engChrName: What do you mean? ...Wait a sec.
engSearchText: What do you mean? ...Wait a sec.

jpnChrName: 現在イーディスで起きている状況…… 特に悪魔が現界している現象ですが。
jpnSearchText:
現在イーディスで起きている状況……
特に悪魔が現界している現象ですが。

engChrName: While unofficial and known only to a select few, there just so happens to be a word in the church's lexicon that refers to what we are seeing.
engSearchText:
While unofficial and known only to a select few,
there just so happens to be a word in the church's
lexicon that refers to what we are seeing.
jpnChrName: 七耀教会において非公式に それを定義する言葉があります。
jpnSearchText:
七耀教会において非公式に
それを定義する言葉があります。

engChrName: Specifically, to the state of devils descending upon the real world and bringing about chaos.
engSearchText:
Specifically, to the state of devils descending upon the
real world and bringing about chaos.
jpnChrName: そうですよね──ベルガルド先生？
jpnSearchText: そうですよね──ベルガルド先生？

engChrName: Isn't that right, Master Bergard?
engSearchText: Isn't that right, Master Bergard?
jpnChrName: うむ、教会でも“裏”に関わる者しか 聞き覚えがないであろうその言葉──
jpnSearchText:
うむ、教会でも“裏”に関わる者しか
聞き覚えがないであろうその言葉──

engChrName: You are correct. Only those involved with the darker side of the church will ever come into contact with it...
engSearchText:
You are correct. Only those involved with the darker
side of the church will ever come into contact
with it...
jpnChrName: 『汎魔（パンデモニウム）化』と呼ばれておる。
jpnSearchText: 『汎魔（パンデモニウム）化』と呼ばれておる。

engChrName: ...but Edith is currently in a state of what we would call 'Pandemonium.'
engSearchText:
...but Edith is currently in a state of what we would
call 'Pandemonium.'

jpnChrName: ぱんで……もにうむ……
jpnSearchText: ぱんで……もにうむ……

engChrName: Pandemonium...
engSearchText: Pandemonium...
jpnChrName: ……聞いたこともねぇが……
jpnSearchText: ……聞いたこともねぇが……

engChrName: Never heard that one before.
engSearchText: Never heard that one before.
jpnChrName: ……どこか 心ざわめくような響きですね。
jpnSearchText:
……どこか
心ざわめくような響きですね。

engChrName: Neither have I, but it has a chilling ring to it.
engSearchText: Neither have I, but it has a chilling ring to it.
jpnChrName: 記されているのは『エゼル記』──
jpnSearchText: 記されているのは『エゼル記』──

engChrName: It's mentioned in a text called the Book of Ezer.
engSearchText: It's mentioned in a text called the Book of Ezer.
jpnChrName: 僕たち星杯騎士や隠密僧兵のみが 目を通すことができる『外典』です。
jpnSearchText:
僕たち星杯騎士や隠密僧兵のみが
目を通すことができる『外典』です。

engChrName: It's an Apocrypha that only members of the Gralsritter, Iscariot, and chosen others are permitted to read.
engSearchText:
It's an Apocrypha that only members of the
Gralsritter, Iscariot, and chosen others are permitted
to read.
jpnChrName: まあ曰くつきの、読むと精神が ガリガリ削れるような書なんですが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ曰くつきの、読むと精神が
ガリガリ削れるような書なんですが……

engChrName: For good reason, too. It's a book that eats away at the reader's soul the longer they peruse it.
engSearchText:
For good reason, too. It's a book that eats away at the
reader's soul the longer they peruse it.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん── どこかで読んだことはおありですか？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん──
どこかで読んだことはおありですか？

engChrName: Now, forgive me if I'm wrong, but might you have been one of its perusers at some point?
engSearchText:
Now, forgive me if I'm wrong, but might you have
been one of its perusers at some point?
jpnChrName: ……そいつは…………
jpnSearchText: ……そいつは…………

engChrName: Well...
engSearchText: Well...

jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん………
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンさん………

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: まさか高校中退の後、いや──
jpnSearchText: まさか高校中退の後、いや──

engChrName: Was this after you quit school? Or...
engSearchText: Was this after you quit school? Or...

jpnChrName: よく分からんが発禁書のたぐいか？ それを読んだからどうしたというんじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
よく分からんが発禁書のたぐいか？
それを読んだからどうしたというんじゃ。

engChrName: You kinda lost me near the start of all that, but your only problem's that Van read some banned book, right?
engSearchText:
You kinda lost me near the start of all that, but your
only problem's that Van read some banned
book, right?
jpnChrName: ワシも内緒だが山ほど発禁本を持っとるぞ！ お宝からエグいのまでよりどりみどりじゃ！
jpnSearchText:
ワシも内緒だが山ほど発禁本を持っとるぞ！
お宝からエグいのまでよりどりみどりじゃ！

engChrName: What's the big deal with reading a banned book or two? I've got mountains of 'em hidden away— some real juicy ones, too!
engSearchText:
What's the big deal with reading a banned book
or two? I've got mountains of 'em hidden away—
some real juicy ones, too!
jpnChrName: い、いえそういう話では……
jpnSearchText: い、いえそういう話では……

engChrName: I-It isn't quite that simple—
engSearchText: I-It isn't quite that simple—
jpnChrName: いーや、そういう話じゃろうが。
jpnSearchText: いーや、そういう話じゃろうが。

engChrName: Oh, I think it is!
engSearchText: Oh, I think it is!
jpnChrName: ヴァン君のことはよく知っておるが それは漢気に溢れた趣味もいい若者じゃ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン君のことはよく知っておるが
それは漢気に溢れた趣味もいい若者じゃ。

engChrName: I know Van. I know he's a man's man with a good head on his shoulders and a burning passion for all that's right.
engSearchText:
I know Van. I know he's a man's man with a good
head on his shoulders and a burning passion for all
that's right.
jpnChrName: このゴッチの魂の 後継者に指名してもいいくらいになっ！
jpnSearchText:
このゴッチの魂の
後継者に指名してもいいくらいになっ！

engChrName: Hell, I'd be happy to appoint him the successor of my 'Gotti Spirit' if anything ever happened to me!
engSearchText:
Hell, I'd be happy to appoint him the successor of my
'Gotti Spirit' if anything ever happened to me!
jpnChrName: あらまあ。
jpnSearchText: あらまあ。

engChrName: Oh, my.
engSearchText: Oh, my.
jpnChrName: 監督……いやそこまで 濃い趣味じゃありませんが。
jpnSearchText:
監督……いやそこまで
濃い趣味じゃありませんが。

engChrName: 'Preciate the support, really, but I dunno if I'm THAT much like you, Director.
engSearchText:
'Preciate the support, really, but I dunno if I'm
THAT much like you, Director.
jpnChrName: 君もなかなか良い趣味をしておるが、 ならば色眼鏡で人を計るのは止めたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
君もなかなか良い趣味をしておるが、
ならば色眼鏡で人を計るのは止めたまえ。

engChrName: You're a smart one, too—which is why I thought you'd be able to see him beyond your personal bias.
engSearchText:
You're a smart one, too—which is why I thought
you'd be able to see him beyond your personal bias.
jpnChrName: 漢（オトコ）なら“立場”からの物差しではなく、 己の目と心で感じたもので判断すべきじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
漢（オトコ）なら“立場”からの物差しではなく、
己の目と心で感じたもので判断すべきじゃ。

engChrName: A real man follows his eyes and his heart! He doesn't let his position blindly turn him into some prejudicial schmuck.
engSearchText:
A real man follows his eyes and his heart! He doesn't
let his position blindly turn him into some
prejudicial schmuck.
jpnChrName: ──違うかね、リオン君？
jpnSearchText: ──違うかね、リオン君？

engChrName: Got a counter to that, Leon?
engSearchText: Got a counter to that, Leon?

jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督……
jpnSearchText: ゴッチ監督……

engChrName: Director...
engSearchText: Director...
jpnChrName: フフ……
jpnSearchText: フフ……

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: どういう理屈だっつーの……
jpnSearchText: どういう理屈だっつーの……

engChrName: What the hell kinda logic is that?
engSearchText: What the hell kinda logic is that?
jpnChrName: えと…… よく分かりませんけど！
jpnSearchText:
えと……
よく分かりませんけど！

engChrName: I don't know what you said, but it sounded really cool!
engSearchText: I don't know what you said, but it sounded really cool!
jpnChrName: わたくし共の所長への色眼鏡、 所員としても不本意ではありますね。
jpnSearchText:
わたくし共の所長への色眼鏡、
所員としても不本意ではありますね。

engChrName: It displeases all of us at Arkride Solutions to see our boss be dismissed over these personal biases, too.
engSearchText:
It displeases all of us at Arkride Solutions to see our
boss be dismissed over these personal biases, too.
jpnChrName: 確かに僕もアークライドさんのことは 正直、よく知りません。
jpnSearchText:
確かに僕もアークライドさんのことは
正直、よく知りません。

engChrName: You're right, I admit it. I don't know Arkride very well.
engSearchText:
You're right, I admit it. I don't know Arkride
very well.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、どちらかというと 教会の人間でもないクセに──
jpnSearchText:
……ああ、どちらかというと
教会の人間でもないクセに──

engChrName: I've also had a negative image of him since before we even met.
engSearchText:
I've also had a negative image of him since before we
even met.
jpnChrName: 半年も先生の手を煩わせていた 劣等生という先入観ならありましたが。
jpnSearchText:
半年も先生の手を煩わせていた
劣等生という先入観ならありましたが。

engChrName: Specifically, that he was an irritating little dandiprat who gave my master six months of headaches when he's not even part of the church.
engSearchText:
Specifically, that he was an irritating little dandiprat
who gave my master six months of headaches when
he's not even part of the church.
jpnChrName: ってオイ……！ まあ否定はしねぇけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
ってオイ……！
まあ否定はしねぇけどよ。

engChrName: Hey! ...I mean, yeah, but...
engSearchText: Hey! ...I mean, yeah, but...
jpnChrName: だからこれ以上の追求は 今の時点では止めておきましょう。
jpnSearchText:
だからこれ以上の追求は
今の時点では止めておきましょう。

engChrName: Either way, in deference to the director's words, I won't push this subject any further.
engSearchText:
Either way, in deference to the director's words, I
won't push this subject any further.
jpnChrName: ──どうやら貴方も 何か思う所があるようですから。
jpnSearchText:
──どうやら貴方も
何か思う所があるようですから。

engChrName: You seem to have your own concerns about what is happening as it is.
engSearchText:
You seem to have your own concerns about what is
happening as it is.

jpnChrName: たしか同い年だったか…… 流石は《守護騎士》を張るだけはある。
jpnSearchText:
たしか同い年だったか……
流石は《守護騎士》を張るだけはある。

engChrName: We're the same age, right? Kinda crazy to me that you're a Gralsritter.
engSearchText:
We're the same age, right? Kinda crazy to me that
you're a Gralsritter.
jpnChrName: だが──俺もあんたらの手を そこまで煩わせるつもりはねえ。
jpnSearchText:
だが──俺もあんたらの手を
そこまで煩わせるつもりはねえ。

engChrName: But don't worry. I know I'm a pain, but I don't plan on causin' as much trouble as you're fearing.
engSearchText:
But don't worry. I know I'm a pain, but I don't plan
on causin' as much trouble as you're fearing.
jpnChrName: 裏とはいえ師父（せんせい）の弟子の身で “外法”に認定されたくはねえしな。
jpnSearchText:
裏とはいえ師父（せんせい）の弟子の身で
“外法”に認定されたくはねえしな。

engChrName: The last thing I'd want is to soil our master's good name by bein' hunted down after bein' branded a heretic.
engSearchText:
The last thing I'd want is to soil our master's good
name by bein' hunted down after bein' branded
a heretic.
jpnChrName: っ………まったく。 つくづく裏表に通じてる人だ。
jpnSearchText:
っ………まったく。
つくづく裏表に通じてる人だ。

engChrName: ...Ha. Unbelievable. You really are disturbingly well informed.
engSearchText:
...Ha. Unbelievable. You really are disturbingly
well informed.
jpnChrName: 同じ兄弟弟子でもある── 改めてよろしく、ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText:
同じ兄弟弟子でもある──
改めてよろしく、ヴァンさん。

engChrName: Very well. As students under the same master, I will be counting on you, Van.
engSearchText:
Very well. As students under the same master, I will
be counting on you, Van.
jpnChrName: 僕は役目があるのでしばらく ここで待機するつもりですが……
jpnSearchText:
僕は役目があるのでしばらく
ここで待機するつもりですが……

engChrName: My work requires me to stay here for a while longer...
engSearchText: My work requires me to stay here for a while longer...
jpnChrName: セリスさんを見かけたら よろしく伝えておいてください。
jpnSearchText:
セリスさんを見かけたら
よろしく伝えておいてください。

engChrName: ...but should you run into Celis on the outside, then please give her my regards.
engSearchText:
...but should you run into Celis on the outside, then
please give her my regards.
jpnChrName: はっ……分かったぜ。
jpnSearchText: はっ……分かったぜ。

engChrName: Yeah. Will do.
engSearchText: Yeah. Will do.
jpnChrName: “悪魔”が顕れている以上、 あんたらの力は見込んでおきたい。
jpnSearchText:
“悪魔”が顕れている以上、
あんたらの力は見込んでおきたい。

engChrName: With devils for days in the capital right now, we're gonna need you guys big time.
engSearchText:
With devils for days in the capital right now, we're
gonna need you guys big time.
jpnChrName: この事態を解決するまでは 色々呑み込んでもらえると助かるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
この事態を解決するまでは
色々呑み込んでもらえると助かるぜ。

engChrName: So here's hopin' we can put our differences aside—at least until this is over.
engSearchText:
So here's hopin' we can put our differences aside—at
least until this is over.
jpnChrName: フフ、考えておきましょう。
jpnSearchText: フフ、考えておきましょう。

engChrName: Heh. I can give it some thought, I suppose.
engSearchText: Heh. I can give it some thought, I suppose.
jpnChrName: うんうん、これぞ漢の友情じゃ！ よければこのまま熱いエロ談義を──
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、これぞ漢の友情じゃ！
よければこのまま熱いエロ談義を──

engChrName: That's what I like to see! Bromances are a bond forged through sweat and tears! Speaking of sweat, who's up for a talk about sweating it up while fu—
engSearchText:
That's what I like to see! Bromances are a bond
forged through sweat and tears! Speaking of sweat,
who's up for a talk about sweating it up while fu—
jpnChrName: 監督……その発禁本について 少々伺っても宜しいでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
監督……その発禁本について
少々伺っても宜しいでしょうか？

engChrName: Mr. Director, I would VERY much like to hear about those 'mountains of banned books' you profess to have.
engSearchText:
Mr. Director, I would VERY much like to hear about
those 'mountains of banned books' you profess
to have.
jpnChrName: ギクッ……
jpnSearchText: ギクッ……

engChrName: Erk...
engSearchText: Erk...
jpnChrName: うふふ、うちも興味あるなぁ。
jpnSearchText: うふふ、うちも興味あるなぁ。

engChrName: Heehee. I have to admit, my interest is piqued.
engSearchText: Heehee. I have to admit, my interest is piqued.
jpnChrName: な、何がなんだか……
jpnSearchText: な、何がなんだか……

engChrName: My head's starting to hurt...
engSearchText: My head's starting to hurt...
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: ハッハッハッ、 キリカ君、お手柔らかにな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッハッハッ、
キリカ君、お手柔らかにな。

engChrName: Hahaha! Go easy on him, now, Kilika.
engSearchText: Hahaha! Go easy on him, now, Kilika.
jpnChrName: ケッ……
jpnSearchText: ケッ……

engChrName: Ugh...
engSearchText: Ugh...
jpnChrName: あ…… “じぇらしー”ですか？
jpnSearchText:
あ……
“じぇらしー”ですか？

engChrName: Oh! Are you jealous?
engSearchText: Oh! Are you jealous?
jpnChrName: なわけねえだろ！
jpnSearchText: なわけねえだろ！

engChrName: Like hell I am!
engSearchText: Like hell I am!
jpnChrName: ふふ……ともあれ、 これで先に進めそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……ともあれ、
これで先に進めそうですね。

engChrName: It appears we can now finally move forward.
engSearchText: It appears we can now finally move forward.
jpnChrName: うむ…… ──おぬしも世話をかけたな。
jpnSearchText:
うむ……
──おぬしも世話をかけたな。

engChrName: That we can. You have my appreciation for helping them in my absence.
engSearchText:
That we can. You have my appreciation for helping
them in my absence.
jpnChrName: ううん、こちらこそ。 力になれて良かった。
jpnSearchText:
ううん、こちらこそ。
力になれて良かった。

engChrName: I'm glad I was able to help—'cause they helped me, too.
engSearchText:
I'm glad I was able to help—'cause they helped
me, too.
jpnChrName: 状況が厳しいのは同じだけど ちょっとは光が見えてきたかな？
jpnSearchText:
状況が厳しいのは同じだけど
ちょっとは光が見えてきたかな？

engChrName: Things are still looking grim, but it feels like there's at least light at the end of the tunnel now.
engSearchText:
Things are still looking grim, but it feels like there's at
least light at the end of the tunnel now.
jpnChrName: はいっ……！ わたしもそう思います！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ……！
わたしもそう思います！

engChrName: I feel the same way!
engSearchText: I feel the same way!
jpnChrName: いえ、どちらかというと 礼を言うのは自分の方でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、どちらかというと
礼を言うのは自分の方でしょう。

engChrName: Not at all. I should be the one thanking you.
engSearchText: Not at all. I should be the one thanking you.
jpnChrName: ヤツの腐れ縁として──肝心な時に 側にいてやれなかった兄貴分として。
jpnSearchText:
ヤツの腐れ縁として──肝心な時に
側にいてやれなかった兄貴分として。

engChrName: Van and I go back a long time, and you've done much for my younger brother in times when I could do nothing.
engSearchText:
Van and I go back a long time, and you've done much
for my younger brother in times when I could
do nothing.
jpnChrName: キンケイド様……
jpnSearchText: キンケイド様……

engChrName: Mr. Kincaid...
engSearchText: Mr. Kincaid...
jpnChrName: いえいえ、こちらこそ。 それに個人的な趣味でもあります。
jpnSearchText:
いえいえ、こちらこそ。
それに個人的な趣味でもあります。

engChrName: Not at all. I chose to travel with them in part due to my own curiosity.
engSearchText:
Not at all. I chose to travel with them in part due to
my own curiosity.
jpnChrName: ──黒月に限らず前途有望な 若者の行く末を見届けるのがね。
jpnSearchText:
──黒月に限らず前途有望な
若者の行く末を見届けるのがね。

engChrName: I enjoy seeing promising young people develop, even if they aren't part of Heiyue.
engSearchText:
I enjoy seeing promising young people develop, even
if they aren't part of Heiyue.
jpnChrName: ま、アンタはそうだよな。
jpnSearchText: ま、アンタはそうだよな。

engChrName: Sounds about right for you.
engSearchText: Sounds about right for you.
jpnChrName: その後、フィーは遊撃士として動くため 一足先に首都の北側エリアへと出発し……
jpnSearchText:
その後、フィーは遊撃士として動くため
一足先に首都の北側エリアへと出発し……

engChrName: Fie left for the northern part of the city, saying that she was going to resume her activities as a bracer.
engSearchText:
Fie left for the northern part of the city, saying that
she was going to resume her activities as a bracer.
jpnChrName: その後、別件で動くというキンケイドは 一足先に首都の北側エリアへと出発し……
jpnSearchText:
その後、別件で動くというキンケイドは
一足先に首都の北側エリアへと出発し……

engChrName: Kincaid left for the northern part of the city, saying that he had another task to attend to.
engSearchText:
Kincaid left for the northern part of the city, saying
that he had another task to attend to.
jpnChrName: その後、ツァオは黒月として動くため 一足先に首都の北側エリアへと出発し……
jpnSearchText:
その後、ツァオは黒月として動くため
一足先に首都の北側エリアへと出発し……

engChrName: Cao left for the northern part of the city, saying that he was going to resume his work as part of Heiyue.
engSearchText:
Cao left for the northern part of the city, saying that
he was going to resume his work as part of Heiyue.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちはベルガルドを改めて迎え、 行動を再開することとなった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちはベルガルドを改めて迎え、
行動を再開することとなった。

engChrName: With Bergard taking their place, they then readied themselves to continue their mission.
engSearchText:
With Bergard taking their place, they then readied
themselves to continue their mission.
jpnChrName: ……妙な話になっちまったが とりあえずやるべき事は決まっている。
jpnSearchText:
……妙な話になっちまったが
とりあえずやるべき事は決まっている。

engChrName: Well, there were some surprises along the way, but we've got our next objective now.
engSearchText:
Well, there were some surprises along the way, but
we've got our next objective now.
jpnChrName: 準備を整えたら そろそろタイレル地区に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
準備を整えたら
そろそろタイレル地区に向かうぞ。

engChrName: So as soon as we're ready, we should make for the Tyrell District.
engSearchText:
So as soon as we're ready, we should make for the
Tyrell District.
jpnChrName: はいっ……！ アニエスさんがいる筈ですし。
jpnSearchText:
はいっ……！
アニエスさんがいる筈ですし。

engChrName: Right! Agnès should be there waiting for us.
engSearchText: Right! Agnès should be there waiting for us.
jpnChrName: ま、ここは結構そのままだから 補給なんかには持って来いかもな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ここは結構そのままだから
補給なんかには持って来いかもな。

engChrName: Everything here seems to be mostly how I remembered it, so it should be a good place to stock up.
engSearchText:
Everything here seems to be mostly how I
remembered it, so it should be a good place to
stock up.
jpnChrName: うむ、首都北部は悪魔の数も多い様子。 万全の態勢を整えておくがよい。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、首都北部は悪魔の数も多い様子。
万全の態勢を整えておくがよい。

engChrName: Indeed. The northern part of the city is crawling with devils—we should prepare carefully before we depart.
engSearchText:
Indeed. The northern part of the city is crawling with
devils—we should prepare carefully before we depart.
jpnChrName: 承知しました──ちなみに そちらから出れば宜しいのですね？
jpnSearchText:
承知しました──ちなみに
そちらから出れば宜しいのですね？

engChrName: That door is the exit we want, I assume?
engSearchText: That door is the exit we want, I assume?
jpnChrName: ああ、少し複雑だが タイレルに直接出るルートがある。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、少し複雑だが
タイレルに直接出るルートがある。

engChrName: Yeah. Kind of a maze on the other side, but there's a path that'll lead us directly to the Tyrell District.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Kind of a maze on the other side, but there's a
path that'll lead us directly to the Tyrell District.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ行動再開、ですねっ。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ行動再開、ですねっ。

engChrName: Well, let's get to work!
engSearchText: Well, let's get to work!
jpnChrName: フィーがゲストから離脱し ベルガルドがパーティに合流しました。
jpnSearchText:
フィーがゲストから離脱し
ベルガルドがパーティに合流しました。

engChrName: Bergard rejoined the party, and Fie left the party.
engSearchText: Bergard rejoined the party, and Fie left the party.
jpnChrName: キンケイドがゲストから離脱し ベルガルドがパーティに合流しました。
jpnSearchText:
キンケイドがゲストから離脱し
ベルガルドがパーティに合流しました。

engChrName: Bergard rejoined the party, and Kincaid left the party.
engSearchText: Bergard rejoined the party, and Kincaid left the party.
jpnChrName: ツァオがゲストから離脱し ベルガルドがパーティに合流しました。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオがゲストから離脱し
ベルガルドがパーティに合流しました。

engChrName: Bergard rejoined the party, and Cao left the party.
engSearchText: Bergard rejoined the party, and Cao left the party.
jpnChrName: ざっとこんなもんか。
jpnSearchText: ざっとこんなもんか。

engChrName: And that's how it's done.
engSearchText: And that's how it's done.
jpnChrName: なんつーか、相手が 可哀そうになってくるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
なんつーか、相手が
可哀そうになってくるぜ。

engChrName: Almost feel sorry for the bastards in hindsight. Almost.
engSearchText:
Almost feel sorry for the bastards in hindsight.
Almost.
jpnChrName: ま、《不動》に突っかかる時点で 戦力差も見切れねえ未熟モンだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、《不動》に突っかかる時点で
戦力差も見切れねえ未熟モンだろうが。

engChrName: Gotta be pretty wet behind the ears to pick a fight with the Immovable and not know what they're gettin' into.
engSearchText:
Gotta be pretty wet behind the ears to pick a fight
