with the Immovable and not know what they're
gettin' into.
jpnChrName: 《泰斗》の技──改めて恐れ入ったぜ。 さすが三大流派の本家筋だな。
jpnSearchText:
《泰斗》の技──改めて恐れ入ったぜ。
さすが三大流派の本家筋だな。

engChrName: Goes to show why the Taito School's still got its rep.
engSearchText: Goes to show why the Taito School's still got its rep.
jpnChrName: 三大流派と言っても、泰斗流はもはや 昔ほど盛んじゃないがな。
jpnSearchText:
三大流派と言っても、泰斗流はもはや
昔ほど盛んじゃないがな。

engChrName: It's lost some of its luster from back in the day, alas.
engSearchText: It's lost some of its luster from back in the day, alas.
jpnChrName: １０年前にリュウガ師範が亡くなって、 宗家の道場がなくなっちまって以来は。
jpnSearchText:
１０年前にリュウガ師範が亡くなって、
宗家の道場がなくなっちまって以来は。

engChrName: The central dojo closed down ten years ago after Master Ryuga passed.
engSearchText:
The central dojo closed down ten years ago after
Master Ryuga passed.
jpnChrName: 今は各地の道場で細々と 引き継がれているに過ぎん。
jpnSearchText:
今は各地の道場で細々と
引き継がれているに過ぎん。

engChrName: Now it hangs on by a thread, split between several disparate dojos.
engSearchText:
Now it hangs on by a thread, split between several
disparate dojos.
jpnChrName: （宗家の道場か……）
jpnSearchText: （宗家の道場か……）

engChrName: (Speakin' of those...)
engSearchText: (Speakin' of those...)

engChrName: Hmm? Got something on your mind?
engSearchText: Hmm? Got something on your mind?
jpnChrName: 聞いた話じゃ、たまに各地の道場に出向いて 指導はしてるみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
聞いた話じゃ、たまに各地の道場に出向いて
指導はしてるみたいだな。

engChrName: I remember you liked to go visit those rinky-dink dojos every now and then to train with the disciples.
engSearchText:
I remember you liked to go visit those rinky-dink
dojos every now and then to train with the disciples.
jpnChrName: いっそアンタが泰斗の看板を継いで、 本格的に流派を再興しようとは思わねぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
いっそアンタが泰斗の看板を継いで、
本格的に流派を再興しようとは思わねぇのか？

engChrName: Why not take up the mantle and revive the Taito School outright? You ever think of doing that?
engSearchText:
Why not take up the mantle and revive the Taito
School outright? You ever think of doing that?
jpnChrName: アンタなら反対する奴もいねえだろ。
jpnSearchText: アンタなら反対する奴もいねえだろ。

engChrName: Can't imagine anyone would have a problem with you takin' the reins.
engSearchText:
Can't imagine anyone would have a problem with you
takin' the reins.
jpnChrName: いやあ、さすがに俺じゃ役者不足ってヤツさ。 流派を再興したいって気持ちは確かにあるが。
jpnSearchText:
いやあ、さすがに俺じゃ役者不足ってヤツさ。
流派を再興したいって気持ちは確かにあるが。

engChrName: I'd love to see that as much as anyone, believe me, but I don't think I'm cut out to lead the whole school like that.
engSearchText:
I'd love to see that as much as anyone, believe me, but
I don't think I'm cut out to lead the whole school
like that.
jpnChrName: と言っても、今の遊撃士の務めを 放り出すわけにもいかねぇからな。
jpnSearchText:
と言っても、今の遊撃士の務めを
放り出すわけにもいかねぇからな。

engChrName: And I can't just shirk my duty as a bracer to chase some pipe dream of mine.
engSearchText:
And I can't just shirk my duty as a bracer to chase
some pipe dream of mine.
jpnChrName: ハハ、引退後にでも考えるかねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、引退後にでも考えるかねぇ。

engChrName: Maybe once I'm retired, I'll give it some thought.
engSearchText: Maybe once I'm retired, I'll give it some thought.
jpnChrName: 確かに、遊撃士協会もアンタに 抜けられると、大騒ぎどころの話じゃねえな。
jpnSearchText:
確かに、遊撃士協会もアンタに
抜けられると、大騒ぎどころの話じゃねえな。

engChrName: True. Guild probably can't afford to lose somebody as high up as you.
engSearchText:
True. Guild probably can't afford to lose somebody as
high up as you.
jpnChrName: 今の共和国の情勢を考えりゃあ特に。
jpnSearchText: 今の共和国の情勢を考えりゃあ特に。

engChrName: Given everything goin' on right now... Yeah.
engSearchText: Given everything goin' on right now... Yeah.
jpnChrName: ハハ、それはそうとお前さんもやるじゃないか。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、それはそうとお前さんもやるじゃないか。

engChrName: You flatter me. I can't take all the credit, though— you really held your own in that fight back there.
engSearchText:
You flatter me. I can't take all the credit, though—
you really held your own in that fight back there.
jpnChrName: 変則的な技も多用しているが── 流石《崑崙（コンロン）》の流れを汲むだけはある。
jpnSearchText:
変則的な技も多用しているが──
流石《崑崙（コンロン）》の流れを汲むだけはある。

engChrName: You've got a lot of oddball moves in your arsenal. I can tell you're trained in Kunlun, clear as day.
engSearchText:
You've got a lot of oddball moves in your arsenal.
I can tell you're trained in Kunlun, clear as day.
jpnChrName: よほど良い師に恵まれたみたいだな？
jpnSearchText: よほど良い師に恵まれたみたいだな？

engChrName: Must have a hell of a master to be able to fight like that.
engSearchText:
Must have a hell of a master to be able to fight
like that.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… 俺には勿体ないくらいのな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
俺には勿体ないくらいのな。

engChrName: Heh. Hell of a master is right—he went and wasted his talent on a punk ass like me.
engSearchText:
Heh. Hell of a master is right—he went and wasted
his talent on a punk ass like me.
jpnChrName: ロクに恩も返せなかったが……
jpnSearchText: ロクに恩も返せなかったが……

engChrName: Couldn't even repay him for everything he did.
engSearchText: Couldn't even repay him for everything he did.
jpnChrName: ふむ…… （そうか、もしかすると……）
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……
（そうか、もしかすると……）

engChrName: Ah, you don't say? (Could he mean...?)
engSearchText:
Ah, you don't say?
(Could he mean...?)
jpnChrName: ──とにかくこのまま進むぞ。 待ち人は奥の方みたいだしな。
jpnSearchText:
──とにかくこのまま進むぞ。
待ち人は奥の方みたいだしな。

engChrName: Anyway, let's keep moving. Our destination should be further in.
engSearchText:
Anyway, let's keep moving. Our destination should be
further in.
jpnChrName: ここまでで分かると思うが、 黒芒街は気軽に来ていい場所じゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ここまでで分かると思うが、
黒芒街は気軽に来ていい場所じゃねえ。

engChrName: I'm sure you guys've figured it out, but the Blacklight District ain't exactly the kind of place you visit for fun.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you guys've figured it out, but the Blacklight
District ain't exactly the kind of place you visit
for fun.
jpnChrName: アーロンはともかく、お前らは見た目上も 絡まれやすそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンはともかく、お前らは見た目上も
絡まれやすそうだしな。

engChrName: Aaron's another story, but the rest of you make easy pickings for scumbags and lowlifes hackin' it down here.
engSearchText:
Aaron's another story, but the rest of you make easy
pickings for scumbags and lowlifes hackin' it
down here.
jpnChrName: 間違っても単独で来たりするんじゃねえぞ。
jpnSearchText: 間違っても単独で来たりするんじゃねえぞ。

engChrName: You don't come down here by yourselves, understood?
engSearchText: You don't come down here by yourselves, understood?
jpnChrName: なるほど……いきなり囲まれたら 少し厄介かもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……いきなり囲まれたら
少し厄介かもしれません。

engChrName: Yeah, I get what you mean. Things can get really dicey if you get surrounded here...
engSearchText:
Yeah, I get what you mean. Things can get really
dicey if you get surrounded here...
jpnChrName: せめて背中を任せられる仲間が一人…… 二人で戦えば、いい感じになると思います！
jpnSearchText:
せめて背中を任せられる仲間が一人……
二人で戦えば、いい感じになると思います！

engChrName: ...but if you bring a buddy along, I bet it'd make for a fun fight!
engSearchText:
...but if you bring a buddy along, I bet it'd make for a
fun fight!
jpnChrName: そういう問題でしょうか……
jpnSearchText: そういう問題でしょうか……

engChrName: Well, ideally, you won't be fighting in a city at all...
engSearchText: Well, ideally, you won't be fighting in a city at all...
jpnChrName: それにしても、さっきのような 人たちがこんなにも……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、さっきのような
人たちがこんなにも……

engChrName: Still, I didn't realize there were so many people like that down here.
engSearchText:
Still, I didn't realize there were so many people like
that down here.
jpnChrName: 不安か？　住んでる街のすぐ地下に 無法者どもが大勢集まってるってのが。
jpnSearchText:
不安か？　住んでる街のすぐ地下に
無法者どもが大勢集まってるってのが。

engChrName: Yup. Pretty spooky when you think about it—this world here's a lot closer to yours than you might be comfortable with.
engSearchText:
Yup. Pretty spooky when you think about it—this
world here's a lot closer to yours than you might be
comfortable with.
jpnChrName: 不安……もあるかもしれませんが、 どちらかと言えば意外でした。
jpnSearchText:
不安……もあるかもしれませんが、
どちらかと言えば意外でした。

engChrName: It is, but...honestly, I'm just more surprised this all existed right under my nose.
engSearchText:
It is, but...honestly, I'm just more surprised this all
existed right under my nose.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも普通に暮らしている イーディスの住民にとっては──
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも普通に暮らしている
イーディスの住民にとっては──

engChrName: At least, it's surprising to someone as well-to-do as me. Perhaps I'm just not very aware of my surroundings.
engSearchText:
At least, it's surprising to someone as well-to-do
as me. Perhaps I'm just not very aware of
my surroundings.
jpnChrName: 問題にされるどころか、存在すら 気付かれていないみたいですから。
jpnSearchText:
問題にされるどころか、存在すら
気付かれていないみたいですから。

engChrName: You'd think this would be something of a problem, but it's like everyone just turns a blind eye to it...
engSearchText:
You'd think this would be something of a problem,
but it's like everyone just turns a blind eye to it...
jpnChrName: 無法地帯ではあるが、完全に ルールがないわけじゃねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
無法地帯ではあるが、完全に
ルールがないわけじゃねぇ。

engChrName: I hear ya. Blacklight's a lawless place, but they have their own rules instead.
engSearchText:
I hear ya. Blacklight's a lawless place, but they have
their own rules instead.
jpnChrName: 『外の、カタギの人間は巻き込まない』 ってのがここでの一線だ。
jpnSearchText:
『外の、カタギの人間は巻き込まない』
ってのがここでの一線だ。

engChrName: The big one being, you don't drag innocent civilians into your messes down here.
engSearchText:
The big one being, you don't drag innocent civilians
into your messes down here.
jpnChrName: それが一応守られてるから お目こぼしをもらってるってのもあるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
それが一応守られてるから
お目こぼしをもらってるってのもあるだろ。

engChrName: Most tend to follow that, so they'll leave you alone... Keyword bein' most.
engSearchText:
Most tend to follow that, so they'll leave you alone...
Keyword bein' most.
jpnChrName: 例外もあるし守れねえロクデナシもいるがな。
jpnSearchText: 例外もあるし守れねえロクデナシもいるがな。

engChrName: Some of 'em step outta line, like we just saw.
engSearchText: Some of 'em step outta line, like we just saw.
jpnChrName: ハッ、黒月の掟と似たようなもんか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、黒月の掟と似たようなもんか。

engChrName: Reminds me of Heiyue's own code.
engSearchText: Reminds me of Heiyue's own code.
jpnChrName: ここについてかなり詳しいようですが、 ヴァン様はよく来られるのですね？
jpnSearchText:
ここについてかなり詳しいようですが、
ヴァン様はよく来られるのですね？

engChrName: Do you visit here often, Mr. Arkride? You seem to be rather well informed about this area.
engSearchText:
Do you visit here often, Mr. Arkride? You seem to be
rather well informed about this area.
jpnChrName: たまにな、こんなところでしか 集められねえ情報もある。
jpnSearchText:
たまにな、こんなところでしか
集められねえ情報もある。

engChrName: I check in from time to time. There's intel down here that you can't find anywhere else.
engSearchText:
I check in from time to time. There's intel down here
that you can't find anywhere else.
jpnChrName: それに、“人間相手の実戦のカン”を 養うのにも役に立つしな。
jpnSearchText:
それに、“人間相手の実戦のカン”を
養うのにも役に立つしな。

engChrName: And as you guys might've noticed by now, it's a good place to sharpen your street smarts.
engSearchText:
And as you guys might've noticed by now, it's a good
place to sharpen your street smarts.
jpnChrName: 確かにちょうど良さそうな場所ですね。 今日一番の収穫でした。
jpnSearchText:
確かにちょうど良さそうな場所ですね。
今日一番の収穫でした。

engChrName: Yeah, I totally get what you mean. That's gotta be like the best part of this whole trip!
engSearchText:
Yeah, I totally get what you mean. That's gotta be
like the best part of this whole trip!
jpnChrName: やけに食いつきがいいな……
jpnSearchText: やけに食いつきがいいな……

engChrName: ...Man. Jaeger born and bred, ain'tcha?
engSearchText: ...Man. Jaeger born and bred, ain'tcha?
jpnChrName: あ！　仕合をやってますよ！
jpnSearchText: あ！　仕合をやってますよ！

engChrName: Oh, cool! There's a match going on right now!
engSearchText: Oh, cool! There's a match going on right now!
jpnChrName: お、ここが闘技場か？
jpnSearchText: お、ここが闘技場か？

engChrName: This some kind of arena? Nice.
engSearchText: This some kind of arena? Nice.
jpnChrName: ああ、その通りだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、その通りだ。

engChrName: Yup. This here's where they hold fightin' tournaments—you go in and beat the shit out of each other.
engSearchText:
Yup. This here's where they hold fightin'
tournaments—you go in and beat the shit out of
each other.
jpnChrName: 定期的に“地下闘技大会”とかが開かれて、 賭けの対象にもなってるな。
jpnSearchText:
定期的に“地下闘技大会”とかが開かれて、
賭けの対象にもなってるな。

engChrName: Makes for a gamblin' hotbed, as you can imagine.
engSearchText: Makes for a gamblin' hotbed, as you can imagine.
jpnChrName: へえ、なかなかそそるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: へえ、なかなかそそるじゃねえか。

engChrName: Oh? Color me intrigued.
engSearchText: Oh? Color me intrigued.
jpnChrName: 闘技大会…… いい訓練になりそうです！
jpnSearchText:
闘技大会……
いい訓練になりそうです！

engChrName: Wow, that's awesome! Sounds like an amazing place to train!
engSearchText:
Wow, that's awesome! Sounds like an amazing place
to train!
jpnChrName: やめとけ……闇討ち、薬物強化、違法改造の武器、 何でもござれの場所だ。
jpnSearchText:
やめとけ……闇討ち、薬物強化、違法改造の武器、
何でもござれの場所だ。

engChrName: Yeah, no. Literally ANYTHING goes in there— roids, mods, explosives, you name it. It ain't the place to train.
engSearchText:
Yeah, no. Literally ANYTHING goes in there—
roids, mods, explosives, you name it. It ain't the place
to train.
jpnChrName: 時には理由を付けられて 魔獣や人形兵器と戦わされることもある。
jpnSearchText:
時には理由を付けられて
魔獣や人形兵器と戦わされることもある。

engChrName: It's straight-up bloodsport in there. The organizers'll even come up with bullshit reasons to make you fight monsters and archaisms.
engSearchText:
It's straight-up bloodsport in there. The organizers'll
even come up with bullshit reasons to make you fight
monsters and archaisms.
jpnChrName: そういうのも全部含めて 訓練と言えば訓練にはなるがな。
jpnSearchText:
そういうのも全部含めて
訓練と言えば訓練にはなるがな。

engChrName: Even if you survive all the shit they throw at you, it really ain't worth it. Just steer clear of it, all right?
engSearchText:
Even if you survive all the shit they throw at you, it
really ain't worth it. Just steer clear of it, all right?
jpnChrName: なるほど、覚悟が必要ですか……
jpnSearchText: なるほど、覚悟が必要ですか……

engChrName: That's fair. Sounds like you really have to be on your toes in there...
engSearchText:
That's fair. Sounds like you really have to be on your
toes in there...
jpnChrName: ちなみに優勝したら賞金はそこそこ入るぜ。 どうしても金欠になったら選択肢の一つにはなる。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに優勝したら賞金はそこそこ入るぜ。
どうしても金欠になったら選択肢の一つにはなる。

engChrName: Pretty decent prize money if you win, though. I'll give 'em that much credit. It's one way to make ends meet down here.
engSearchText:
Pretty decent prize money if you win, though. I'll give
'em that much credit. It's one way to make ends meet
down here.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様、もしかして大会に……
jpnSearchText: ヴァン様、もしかして大会に……

engChrName: Mr. Arkride, you're not speaking from experience, are you...?
engSearchText:
Mr. Arkride, you're not speaking from experience, are
you...?
jpnChrName: いや俺は出てねえよ…… …………最近はな。
jpnSearchText:
いや俺は出てねえよ……
…………最近はな。

engChrName: Nah, that shit ain't my scene... Well, not anymore, I mean...
engSearchText:
Nah, that shit ain't my scene... Well, not anymore,
I mean...
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえだろ！　《痩せ狼》に愛車を壊された直後は どうしても再改造のミラがだなあっ……！
jpnSearchText:
仕方ねえだろ！　《痩せ狼》に愛車を壊された直後は
どうしても再改造のミラがだなあっ……！

engChrName: ...Look, they were hard times, okay?! That bastard paid for a new truck, but he didn't pay for all the mods like the previous one had!
engSearchText:
...Look, they were hard times, okay?! That bastard
paid for a new truck, but he didn't pay for all the
mods like the previous one had!
jpnChrName: へいへい、じゃ今度出る時は声掛けとけや、 アンタに賭けとくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
へいへい、じゃ今度出る時は声掛けとけや、
アンタに賭けとくぜ。

engChrName: Whatever you say, chief. Next time you decide to enter, let me know so I can put my money on you.
engSearchText:
Whatever you say, chief. Next time you decide to
enter, let me know so I can put my money on you.
jpnChrName: もうやらねえっての！
jpnSearchText: もうやらねえっての！

engChrName: Hell no, I ain't settin' foot in that cesspit again!
engSearchText: Hell no, I ain't settin' foot in that cesspit again!
jpnChrName: そういえば…… ここではチェックしないんですね、掲示板は。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……
ここではチェックしないんですね、掲示板は。

engChrName: Oh, you know what I just realized? We haven't checked any bulletin boards here.
engSearchText:
Oh, you know what I just realized? We haven't
checked any bulletin boards here.
jpnChrName: ああ、そもそもここでは４ｓｐｇを 受け付けないようにしてるからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そもそもここでは４ｓｐｇを
受け付けないようにしてるからな。

engChrName: Don't sweat that. As a rule, I don't take 4SPGs from anybody down here.
engSearchText:
Don't sweat that. As a rule, I don't take 4SPGs from
anybody down here.
jpnChrName: そうなんですか？　むしろここの方が 需要がありそうな気がしますけど。
jpnSearchText:
そうなんですか？　むしろここの方が
需要がありそうな気がしますけど。

engChrName: Why not? There are a lot of people here who could use some help, aren't there?
engSearchText:
Why not? There are a lot of people here who could
use some help, aren't there?
jpnChrName: どいつもこいつも訳ありだしな、 おいそれと警察や遊撃士には頼れねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
どいつもこいつも訳ありだしな、
おいそれと警察や遊撃士には頼れねえだろ。

engChrName: For real. Nobody down here's exactly innocent, so I can't imagine any of them being able to go to the cops or bracers for help.
engSearchText:
For real. Nobody down here's exactly innocent, so
I can't imagine any of them being able to go to
the cops or bracers for help.
jpnChrName: ああ、例外もあるが ここの人間はほぼ全員が“裏”の住人だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、例外もあるが
ここの人間はほぼ全員が“裏”の住人だ。

engChrName: That's the problem. There are some rare exceptions, but almost everyone down here has a checkered past in some way.
engSearchText:
That's the problem. There are some rare exceptions,
but almost everyone down here has a checkered past
in some way.
jpnChrName: だから４ｓｐｇを悪用したり、 もしくは書き込み自体が罠の可能性があってな。
jpnSearchText:
だから４ｓｐｇを悪用したり、
もしくは書き込み自体が罠の可能性があってな。

engChrName: Ultimately, I can't trust 'em not to abuse the system. Worst case scenario, I get farmed out as a grunt for some real sketchy shit. Not worth it.
engSearchText:
Ultimately, I can't trust 'em not to abuse the
system. Worst case scenario, I get farmed out as
a grunt for some real sketchy shit. Not worth it.
jpnChrName: なるほど、裏解決屋は見方によれば グレー案件専門な便利屋のようなもの。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、裏解決屋は見方によれば
グレー案件専門な便利屋のようなもの。

engChrName: That does make sense, given spriggans' reputation for assisting in legally gray matters.
engSearchText:
That does make sense, given spriggans' reputation for
assisting in legally gray matters.
jpnChrName: 契約違反などを前提に悪用しても リスクは少ないと思われるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
契約違反などを前提に悪用しても
リスクは少ないと思われるでしょう。

engChrName: I can see how a bad faith actor might exploit them for their own gain—and how society at large would offer little to defend them.
engSearchText:
I can see how a bad faith actor might exploit them for
their own gain—and how society at large would offer
little to defend them.
jpnChrName: そういう輩からの依頼は 特に受けねえようにしてるが……
jpnSearchText:
そういう輩からの依頼は
特に受けねえようにしてるが……

engChrName: To be clear, I already make a point of filtering out those garbage posts to start with.
engSearchText:
To be clear, I already make a point of filtering out
those garbage posts to start with.
jpnChrName: 一々確かめるのも時間の無駄だからな。 だからここでは４ｓｐｇは受けねえ。
jpnSearchText:
一々確かめるのも時間の無駄だからな。
だからここでは４ｓｐｇは受けねえ。

engChrName: More than anything else, it'd just be a giant time sink trying to vet requests from these parts. That's the biggest reason I don't bother.
engSearchText:
More than anything else, it'd just be a giant time sink
trying to vet requests from these parts. That's the
biggest reason I don't bother.
jpnChrName: そもそも俺が掬い上げるのは “狭間”で困っている人間であって──
jpnSearchText:
そもそも俺が掬い上げるのは
“狭間”で困っている人間であって──

engChrName: As much as some folks might think otherwise, I don't deal with criminals. I deal with people who have complicated problems.
engSearchText:
As much as some folks might think otherwise, I don't
deal with criminals. I deal with people who have
complicated problems.
jpnChrName: 自ら好んで“裏”に染まる連中まで 相手してやる筋合いはねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
自ら好んで“裏”に染まる連中まで
相手してやる筋合いはねえからな。

engChrName: When somebody has a problem they can't rely on the law or the guild to solve, they come to me. That's all there is to it.
engSearchText:
When somebody has a problem they can't rely on the
law or the guild to solve, they come to me. That's all
there is to it.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんなりの流儀、ですね。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんなりの流儀、ですね。

engChrName: That's Van for you!
engSearchText: That's Van for you!
jpnChrName: そういうことだ。
jpnSearchText: そういうことだ。

engChrName: What can I say? It's worked for me so far. Must be doin' somethin' right.
engSearchText:
What can I say? It's worked for me so far. Must be
doin' somethin' right.
jpnChrName: ま、どうしてもっつー状況なら 他の区で４ｓｐｇを出すか──
jpnSearchText:
ま、どうしてもっつー状況なら
他の区で４ｓｐｇを出すか──

engChrName: End of the day, if someone here really wants my services, they're not completely out of luck. They've still got two options.
engSearchText:
End of the day, if someone here really wants my
services, they're not completely out of luck.
They've still got two options.
jpnChrName: もしくは直接事務所を訪ねてくれば、 話くらいは聞いてやるけどな。
jpnSearchText:
もしくは直接事務所を訪ねてくれば、
話くらいは聞いてやるけどな。

engChrName: They can post a 4SPG in another part of town, or they can come talk to me. Same as anybody else, really.
engSearchText:
They can post a 4SPG in another part of town, or
they can come talk to me. Same as anybody
else, really.
jpnChrName: 受けるかどうかはまた別だろう。
jpnSearchText: 受けるかどうかはまた別だろう。

engChrName: Doesn't mean I'll agree to help, but I'll hear 'em out, at least.
engSearchText:
Doesn't mean I'll agree to help, but I'll hear 'em out,
at least.
jpnChrName: ……ふふ、ヴァンさんらしいです。
jpnSearchText: ……ふふ、ヴァンさんらしいです。

engChrName: Heehee. That's our boss, always trying to keep the door open.
engSearchText:
Heehee. That's our boss, always trying to keep the
door open.
jpnChrName: ん？　なんだこいつら、 いつになくビビりやがって。
jpnSearchText:
ん？　なんだこいつら、
いつになくビビりやがって。

engChrName: Huh? Everybody's scared shitless here... What's going on?
engSearchText:
Huh? Everybody's scared shitless here... What's
going on?
jpnChrName: あっちを見てください！
jpnSearchText: あっちを見てください！

engChrName: Look over there!
engSearchText: Look over there!
jpnChrName: 全員気絶しておるな。
jpnSearchText: 全員気絶しておるな。

engChrName: They have all fainted.
engSearchText: They have all fainted.
jpnChrName: 全員気絶してるな。
jpnSearchText: 全員気絶してるな。

engChrName: They're all knocked out.
engSearchText: They're all knocked out.
jpnChrName: 一体何があったのでしょう……
jpnSearchText: 一体何があったのでしょう……

engChrName: What the...? What could've happened?
engSearchText: What the...? What could've happened?
jpnChrName: あ～、こいつら、手を出しちゃ いけねえ連中に絡んじまったようだ。
jpnSearchText:
あ～、こいつら、手を出しちゃ
いけねえ連中に絡んじまったようだ。

engChrName: Oh, I think I might know. Got a hunch these fools tried barking up the wrong tree...and they paid the price. Hard.
engSearchText:
Oh, I think I might know. Got a hunch these fools
tried barking up the wrong tree...and they paid
the price. Hard.

engChrName: Oh, shit.
engSearchText: Oh, shit.
jpnChrName: なるほど……
jpnSearchText: なるほど……

engChrName: That would explain it.
engSearchText: That would explain it.
jpnChrName: これはまあ、自業自得ね。
jpnSearchText: これはまあ、自業自得ね。

engChrName: Well, I'd say they had it coming, then.
engSearchText: Well, I'd say they had it coming, then.
jpnChrName: これはまあ、ご愁傷様かな。
jpnSearchText: これはまあ、ご愁傷様かな。

engChrName: I almost feel sorry for them...
engSearchText: I almost feel sorry for them...
jpnChrName: ふふ、むしろこのくらいで済んで 運が良かったでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、むしろこのくらいで済んで
運が良かったでしょう。

engChrName: If anything, they're lucky to have gotten off so lightly.
engSearchText: If anything, they're lucky to have gotten off so lightly.
jpnChrName: おや、ヴァン君たちじゃないか。
jpnSearchText: おや、ヴァン君たちじゃないか。

engChrName: Van, my friend! How wonderful to see you. And the rest of you, as well!
engSearchText:
Van, my friend! How wonderful to see you. And the
rest of you, as well!
jpnChrName: こんにちはシェリド殿下。 随分と派手にやりましたね。
jpnSearchText:
こんにちはシェリド殿下。
随分と派手にやりましたね。

engChrName: Good to see you, Your Highness. You sure roughed those poor bastards up good, huh?
engSearchText:
Good to see you, Your Highness. You sure roughed
those poor bastards up good, huh?
jpnChrName: いやいや私は何もしていないさ。
jpnSearchText: いやいや私は何もしていないさ。

engChrName: Oh, I had no hand in this. None whatsoever!
engSearchText: Oh, I had no hand in this. None whatsoever!
jpnChrName: 彼女たちがナンパされてね、断られて尚 強引に手を出そうとしたらあのざまだ。
jpnSearchText:
彼女たちがナンパされてね、断られて尚
強引に手を出そうとしたらあのざまだ。

engChrName: You see, they attempted to make moves on these ladies here—and they just wouldn't take no for an answer. They got physical, and...well.
engSearchText:
You see, they attempted to make moves on these
ladies here—and they just wouldn't take no for
an answer. They got physical, and...well.
jpnChrName: いや～、女性というものは本当に怖い怖い。
jpnSearchText: いや～、女性というものは本当に怖い怖い。

engChrName: These women, they're truly a force to be reckoned with. Even yours truly quivers before them!
engSearchText:
These women, they're truly a force to be
reckoned with. Even yours truly quivers before them!
jpnChrName: えっと………
jpnSearchText: えっと………

engChrName: Er...
engSearchText: Er...
jpnChrName: フフ、ひどいな公太子殿は。
jpnSearchText: フフ、ひどいな公太子殿は。

engChrName: Hey, don't you think that's a little mean, Prince?
engSearchText: Hey, don't you think that's a little mean, Prince?
jpnChrName: こちらは職務を果たしたに過ぎません。
jpnSearchText: こちらは職務を果たしたに過ぎません。

engChrName: I was simply performing my duties. Nothing more, and nothing less.
engSearchText:
I was simply performing my duties. Nothing more,
and nothing less.
jpnChrName: つーかなんでこんな 珍しい面子が揃ってんだ？
jpnSearchText:
つーかなんでこんな
珍しい面子が揃ってんだ？

engChrName: Okay, but that doesn't explain why you all were hanging out. You guys make for one weird posse, however you slice it.
engSearchText:
Okay, but that doesn't explain why you all were
hanging out. You guys make for one weird posse,
however you slice it.
jpnChrName: 共通の知人の紹介で殿下に挨拶しようと ここで待ち合わせをしていたんですが……
jpnSearchText:
共通の知人の紹介で殿下に挨拶しようと
ここで待ち合わせをしていたんですが……

engChrName: A mutual acquaintance of ours was kind enough to put me in touch with His Highness, so I came down here to meet with him. But then...
engSearchText:
A mutual acquaintance of ours was kind enough to
put me in touch with His Highness, so I came down
here to meet with him. But then...
jpnChrName: そこでそちらの方と“偶然” 行き合わせたというわけです。
jpnSearchText:
そこでそちらの方と“偶然”
行き合わせたというわけです。

engChrName: As fate would have it, she happened to run into us here as well.
engSearchText:
As fate would have it, she happened to run into us
here as well.
jpnChrName: 一仕事を終えたから、私は久々の休暇だよ。 記念祭までのんびり首都の観光をしてたのさ。
jpnSearchText:
一仕事を終えたから、私は久々の休暇だよ。
記念祭までのんびり首都の観光をしてたのさ。

engChrName: I'm on a break for once after wrapping up a job. I came into town to unwind until the festival, take in some of the local sights.
engSearchText:
I'm on a break for once after wrapping up a job.
I came into town to unwind until the festival, take in
some of the local sights.
jpnChrName: ここに来たのは何か刺激的なものはないか 探してのことだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ここに来たのは何か刺激的なものはないか
探してのことだけど……

engChrName: Anyway, I wandered down here looking for a little... excitement, I guess you could say.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I wandered down here looking for a little...
excitement, I guess you could say.
jpnChrName: ちょうどいい場所に ちょうどいい相手がいたものでね。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうどいい場所に
ちょうどいい相手がいたものでね。

engChrName: And I got everything I bargained for and more!
engSearchText: And I got everything I bargained for and more!
jpnChrName: ここで会ったのも何かの縁だ、 《銀》殿と護衛官殿、ひとつどうかな？
jpnSearchText:
ここで会ったのも何かの縁だ、
《銀》殿と護衛官殿、ひとつどうかな？

engChrName: This is too good to just be some kind of coincidence. Destiny must've brought us together. What do you say, Yin, Ms. Bodyguard? Want to go a round?
engSearchText:
This is too good to just be some kind of coincidence.
Destiny must've brought us together. What do you
say, Yin, Ms. Bodyguard? Want to go a round?
jpnChrName: いえ、私は別に……
jpnSearchText: いえ、私は別に……

engChrName: I... I think I'm good, thank—
engSearchText: I... I think I'm good, thank—
jpnChrName: ふむ、面白そうじゃないか。 ナージェ、遠慮なくやりたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、面白そうじゃないか。
ナージェ、遠慮なくやりたまえ。

engChrName: Well, that sounds like a delightful proposal! Don't worry about me, Naje. I encourage—nay, IMPLORE you to take her up on it!
engSearchText:
Well, that sounds like a delightful proposal!
Don't worry about me, Naje. I encourage—nay,
IMPLORE you to take her up on it!
jpnChrName: ふう、殿下………
jpnSearchText: ふう、殿下………

engChrName: *sigh* The things you say sometimes, Your Highness...
engSearchText:
*sigh* The things you say sometimes,
Your Highness...
jpnChrName: まあ、ご自分が参加すると 言い出すよりはマシですか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ご自分が参加すると
言い出すよりはマシですか。

engChrName: I suppose I should just be grateful you're not thinking to throw down with her yourself.
engSearchText:
I suppose I should just be grateful you're not thinking
to throw down with her yourself.
jpnChrName: そうだ、ヴァンたちも一緒に──
jpnSearchText: そうだ、ヴァンたちも一緒に──

engChrName: Oh, didn't mean to leave you all out, Van! You guys are more than welcome to—
engSearchText:
Oh, didn't mean to leave you all out, Van! You guys
are more than welcome to—
jpnChrName: 仕事中だから遠慮しとくぜ。
jpnSearchText: 仕事中だから遠慮しとくぜ。

engChrName: Yeah, no. We have this thing called work—strange, I know.
engSearchText:
Yeah, no. We have this thing called work—strange,
I know.
jpnChrName: （こんな化物共に   付き合ってられるかっつうの。）
jpnSearchText:
（こんな化物共に
付き合ってられるかっつうの。）

engChrName: (Damned if I'm gettin' caught in the crossfire between those two. That ain't the kind of threesome I'm into.)
engSearchText:
(Damned if I'm gettin' caught in the crossfire
between those two. That ain't the kind of threesome
I'm into.)
jpnChrName: うーん、つれないなぁ。 また今度に期待するとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、つれないなぁ。
また今度に期待するとしよう。

engChrName: Aww, you're no fun... Oh, well! There's always next time!
engSearchText:
Aww, you're no fun... Oh, well! There's always
next time!
jpnChrName: ……程々にな。
jpnSearchText: ……程々にな。

engChrName: Just don't burn the whole district down, all right?
engSearchText: Just don't burn the whole district down, all right?
jpnChrName: 何でしょう？　周りが怯えているような……
jpnSearchText: 何でしょう？　周りが怯えているような……

engChrName: What's going on? Why does everyone look so...afraid?
engSearchText: What's going on? Why does everyone look so...afraid?
jpnChrName: ここの人たち、何か怯えているような……
jpnSearchText: ここの人たち、何か怯えているような……

engChrName: Huh? Why do all these people look so scared?
engSearchText: Huh? Why do all these people look so scared?
jpnChrName: こいつら、なんかビビってるな……
jpnSearchText: こいつら、なんかビビってるな……

engChrName: Huh. Something's got everybody scared shitless...
engSearchText: Huh. Something's got everybody scared shitless...
jpnChrName: 周囲が怯えているようですね……
jpnSearchText: 周囲が怯えているようですね……

engChrName: Everyone here looks to be afraid of something...or someone, perhaps.
engSearchText:
Everyone here looks to be afraid of something...or
someone, perhaps.
jpnChrName: 周囲の人たちが怖がってるような……
jpnSearchText: 周囲の人たちが怖がってるような……

engChrName: Something feels really off... Everyone's on pins and needles here, and I'm not sure why.
engSearchText:
Something feels really off... Everyone's on pins and
needles here, and I'm not sure why.
jpnChrName: これは……周りが怯えているようね……
jpnSearchText: これは……周りが怯えているようね……

engChrName: What's with the stage fright here? Everybody's stiff as a board...
engSearchText:
What's with the stage fright here? Everybody's stiff as
a board...
jpnChrName: ふむ、周りが怯えておるな。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、周りが怯えておるな。

engChrName: Strange... I can practically smell the fear from these people.
engSearchText:
Strange... I can practically smell the fear from
these people.
jpnChrName: 微妙に既視感があるんだが……
jpnSearchText: 微妙に既視感があるんだが……

engChrName: I'm gettin' déjà vu here...
engSearchText: I'm gettin' déjà vu here...
jpnChrName: 師父、ここにいたんですか。 この騒ぎは？
jpnSearchText:
師父、ここにいたんですか。
この騒ぎは？

engChrName: Oh, hey, Master. Didn't realize you were here. Hey, you got any idea what all this hubbub's about?
engSearchText:
Oh, hey, Master. Didn't realize you were here.
Hey, you got any idea what all this hubbub's about?
jpnChrName: 原因はあそこにあるようだ。
jpnSearchText: 原因はあそこにあるようだ。

engChrName: I believe your answer lies over there.
engSearchText: I believe your answer lies over there.
jpnChrName: やっぱりか…… つーか想像以上だな……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりか……
つーか想像以上だな……

engChrName: Oh, Aidios. I figured it was something along those lines—hopin' it wouldn't be THAT extreme, but, well, Blacklight.
engSearchText:
Oh, Aidios. I figured it was something along those
lines—hopin' it wouldn't be THAT extreme, but,
well, Blacklight.
jpnChrName: 何をするつもりかは分からぬが、 このまま見て見ぬふりはできまい。
jpnSearchText:
何をするつもりかは分からぬが、
このまま見て見ぬふりはできまい。

engChrName: I have no idea what they're planning to do, but I can't just stand idly by and watch.
engSearchText:
I have no idea what they're planning to do, but I can't
just stand idly by and watch.
jpnChrName: そうですね……… 正直近づきたくはないですが……
jpnSearchText:
そうですね………
正直近づきたくはないですが……

engChrName: Yeah, I'd really rather keep my distance, but I don't think we can here. Let's move.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I'd really rather keep my distance, but I don't
think we can here. Let's move.
jpnChrName: よお、せっかくこんな場所で会ったんだ、 さっさと始めようや。
jpnSearchText:
よお、せっかくこんな場所で会ったんだ、
さっさと始めようや。

engChrName: C'mon! Let's get this show on the road, already! You're wasting a good opportunity otherwise. When else will we all meet like this, huh?
engSearchText:
C'mon! Let's get this show on the road, already!
You're wasting a good opportunity otherwise.
When else will we all meet like this, huh?
jpnChrName: 確かに絶好の状況やねぇ。
jpnSearchText: 確かに絶好の状況やねぇ。

engChrName: You make a fine point. Truly, the stars must have aligned to direct us all here.
engSearchText:
You make a fine point. Truly, the stars must have
aligned to direct us all here.
jpnChrName: 先日の“ゲーム”の続きというわけかな？
jpnSearchText: 先日の“ゲーム”の続きというわけかな？

engChrName: Shall we pick up where we left off at the big game, then?
engSearchText:
Shall we pick up where we left off at the big
game, then?
jpnChrName: まあ、仕方ないか……
jpnSearchText: まあ、仕方ないか……

engChrName: Well, no stopping this now.
engSearchText: Well, no stopping this now.
jpnChrName: って何が仕方ねえだ！？
jpnSearchText: って何が仕方ねえだ！？

engChrName: The hell there isn't!
engSearchText: The hell there isn't!
jpnChrName: アンタらの“気”に当てられて 気を失ったヤツまで出てるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
アンタらの“気”に当てられて
気を失ったヤツまで出てるぞ！

engChrName: Hey! Cut that shit out! You're chokin' the whole street with all this chi you guys're puttin' out!
engSearchText:
Hey! Cut that shit out! You're chokin' the whole
street with all this chi you guys're puttin' out!
jpnChrName: あらお兄はんたち。
jpnSearchText: あらお兄はんたち。

engChrName: Ah. So very good to see you again, darling.
engSearchText: Ah. So very good to see you again, darling.
jpnChrName: んな雑魚どものことなんざ知るかよ。
jpnSearchText: んな雑魚どものことなんざ知るかよ。

engChrName: Piss off, spriggan. You expect me to pay attention to those nobodies? I've got bigger fish to fry over here!
engSearchText:
Piss off, spriggan. You expect me to pay attention to
those nobodies? I've got bigger fish to fry over here!
jpnChrName: ちょうどいい、 ヴァンたちも一緒に参加したらどうかな？
jpnSearchText:
ちょうどいい、
ヴァンたちも一緒に参加したらどうかな？

engChrName: Oooh, perfect timing! You guys should hop in and join the fun, too! What do you say?
engSearchText:
Oooh, perfect timing! You guys should hop in and
join the fun, too! What do you say?
jpnChrName: そんなつもりはこれっぽちもねえが……
jpnSearchText: そんなつもりはこれっぽちもねえが……

engChrName: Do I LOOK like I wanna get my face rearranged? Yeah, I thought not.
engSearchText:
Do I LOOK like I wanna get my face rearranged?
Yeah, I thought not.
jpnChrName: つーかアンタは乱闘を止める側だろ？ なんで混ざってんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
つーかアンタは乱闘を止める側だろ？
なんで混ざってんだ！？

engChrName: And you! You're a bracer, for cryin' out loud! What're you doing, eggin' 'em on?!
engSearchText:
And you! You're a bracer, for cryin' out loud!
What're you doing, eggin' 'em on?!
jpnChrName: そうは言ってもなぁ…… こいつらを止められると思うか？
jpnSearchText:
そうは言ってもなぁ……
こいつらを止められると思うか？

engChrName: Look, I'm not gonna contest that, Van, but look at these guys. Do I look like I can hold them all off by myself?
engSearchText:
Look, I'm not gonna contest that, Van, but look at
these guys. Do I look like I can hold them all off
by myself?
jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: Well...
engSearchText: Well...
jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: Er...
engSearchText: Er...
jpnChrName: ……無理だろ。
jpnSearchText: ……無理だろ。

engChrName: ...Yeah, no. Not happening.
engSearchText: ...Yeah, no. Not happening.
jpnChrName: 恐らく無理でしょう……
jpnSearchText: 恐らく無理でしょう……

engChrName: I would assume not.
engSearchText: I would assume not.
jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: Well...no.
engSearchText: Well...no.
jpnChrName: 無理でしょうね……
jpnSearchText: 無理でしょうね……

engChrName: I...wouldn't hold my breath, yeah.
engSearchText: I...wouldn't hold my breath, yeah.

engChrName: *sigh*
engSearchText: *sigh*
jpnChrName: だから上で暴れられるよりは こっちで一旦発散させた方がいいと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
だから上で暴れられるよりは
こっちで一旦発散させた方がいいと思ってな。

engChrName: So, yeah. If this is gonna happen, we might as well take it down here and contain the spread.
engSearchText:
So, yeah. If this is gonna happen, we might as well
take it down here and contain the spread.
jpnChrName: ここなら多少の騒ぎも問題ないだろうからな。
jpnSearchText: ここなら多少の騒ぎも問題ないだろうからな。

engChrName: If there's any part of Edith that can shake off a street fight, it's this place.
engSearchText:
If there's any part of Edith that can shake off a street
fight, it's this place.
jpnChrName: ……一理あるが…………
jpnSearchText: ……一理あるが…………

engChrName: ...Okay, I'll give you that, but still.
engSearchText: ...Okay, I'll give you that, but still.
jpnChrName: おぬしらほどの者が４人での乱戦となると さすがに場が混乱し周囲への被害が免れぬ。
jpnSearchText:
おぬしらほどの者が４人での乱戦となると
さすがに場が混乱し周囲への被害が免れぬ。

engChrName: Even here, collateral damage is all but inevitable. All hell will break loose once that first punch is thrown, whether you intend for it or not.
engSearchText:
Even here, collateral damage is all but inevitable.
All hell will break loose once that first punch is
thrown, whether you intend for it or not.
jpnChrName: せめて闘技場にて２対２の 対戦はいかがだろうか。
jpnSearchText:
せめて闘技場にて２対２の
対戦はいかがだろうか。

engChrName: Why not take the fight to the colosseum, instead? A purpose-built arena should prove a suitable place for a two-on-two match.
engSearchText:
Why not take the fight to the colosseum, instead?
A purpose-built arena should prove a suitable place
for a two-on-two match.
jpnChrName: ふむ、確かにおっしゃる通りだな。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、確かにおっしゃる通りだな。

engChrName: Hmm... The man does have a point.
engSearchText: Hmm... The man does have a point.
jpnChrName: ここは獅子殿のアドバイスに従おうか。
jpnSearchText: ここは獅子殿のアドバイスに従おうか。

engChrName: Agreed. I say we take up the Roaring Lion's suggestion.
engSearchText:
Agreed. I say we take up the Roaring
Lion's suggestion.
jpnChrName: なんでもいいからさっさと行こうぜ、 組み合わせもくじでいいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
なんでもいいからさっさと行こうぜ、
組み合わせもくじでいいだろ。

engChrName: I don't care where we fight. Let's just get this show on the road, already! We'll draw lots to come up with the teams. Everyone good with that?
engSearchText:
I don't care where we fight. Let's just get this show
on the road, already! We'll draw lots to come up with
the teams. Everyone good with that?
jpnChrName: ヴァルターたちは場所を闘技場に移し、 くじで組み合わせを決めた。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァルターたちは場所を闘技場に移し、
くじで組み合わせを決めた。

engChrName: Following Bergard's suggestion, the four stepped into the arena and drew lots to determine the two sides.
engSearchText:
Following Bergard's suggestion, the four stepped into
the arena and drew lots to determine the two sides.
jpnChrName: 《不動》との共闘か…… ふふ、これは楽しみだ。
jpnSearchText:
《不動》との共闘か……
ふふ、これは楽しみだ。

engChrName: So I'm with the Immovable, eh? Heehee... Now, this should be fun.
engSearchText:
So I'm with the Immovable, eh? Heehee... Now, this
should be fun.
jpnChrName: そいつは光栄だな。
jpnSearchText: そいつは光栄だな。

engChrName: It's an honor and pleasure, Silverblade.
engSearchText: It's an honor and pleasure, Silverblade.
jpnChrName: 二人まとめて喰ってやるよ……！ そんじゃ──
jpnSearchText:
二人まとめて喰ってやるよ……！
そんじゃ──

engChrName: Heh. Enjoy the company while you can, 'cause I'm tearing you both down! Now stop yappin' and start—
engSearchText:
Heh. Enjoy the company while you can, 'cause I'm
tearing you both down! Now stop yappin' and start—
jpnChrName: ヴァルターはん、待ち。
jpnSearchText: ヴァルターはん、待ち。

engChrName: Now wait just a minute, Walter, dear.
engSearchText: Now wait just a minute, Walter, dear.
jpnChrName: あんだよ？
jpnSearchText: あんだよ？

engChrName: Oh, what?
engSearchText: Oh, what?
jpnChrName: ウチとヴァルターはんやと オラシオンと代り映えせんと思うてなあ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチとヴァルターはんやと
オラシオンと代り映えせんと思うてなあ。

engChrName: Does this not remind you of our day out in Oración? This team seems rather...stale to me.
engSearchText:
Does this not remind you of our day out in Oración?
This team seems rather...stale to me.
jpnChrName: せっかくやし、もっと他の 組み合わせがええんやない？
jpnSearchText:
せっかくやし、もっと他の
組み合わせがええんやない？

engChrName: It's not every day we get an opportunity like this. What say you we devise a different matchup?
engSearchText:
It's not every day we get an opportunity like this.
What say you we devise a different matchup?
jpnChrName: くじ、引き直すか？
jpnSearchText: くじ、引き直すか？

engChrName: So...what? You guys wanna draw lots again?
engSearchText: So...what? You guys wanna draw lots again?
jpnChrName: ったく、めんどくせーな……
jpnSearchText: ったく、めんどくせーな……

engChrName: Oh, for crying out... Okay, fine. Here we go again...
engSearchText: Oh, for crying out... Okay, fine. Here we go again...
jpnChrName: 今度はこうなったか。
jpnSearchText: 今度はこうなったか。

engChrName: Well, this is certainly different.
engSearchText: Well, this is certainly different.
jpnChrName: フフ、これなら面白そうやねぇ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、これなら面白そうやねぇ。

engChrName: Heehee... Now, THIS, I like. This ought to make for a better match.
engSearchText:
Heehee... Now, THIS, I like. This ought to make for
a better match.
jpnChrName: 泰斗本流の元兄弟弟子だったかな？ その拳の極致、見せてもらおうか！
jpnSearchText:
泰斗本流の元兄弟弟子だったかな？
その拳の極致、見せてもらおうか！

engChrName: You two were both Taito School disciples back in the day, weren't you? Can't wait to see what those fists can do at their very pinnacle!
engSearchText:
You two were both Taito School disciples back in the
day, weren't you? Can't wait to see what those fists
can do at their very pinnacle!
jpnChrName: おいコラ待てや、 こいつと組むなんざ冗談じゃねえ！
jpnSearchText:
おいコラ待てや、
こいつと組むなんざ冗談じゃねえ！

engChrName: ...Are you SERIOUSLY tryna get me to team up with him? You dense?!
engSearchText:
...Are you SERIOUSLY tryna get me to team up
with him? You dense?!
jpnChrName: 珍しく俺も同感だな。 悪いがもう一度替えてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
珍しく俺も同感だな。
悪いがもう一度替えてもらうぜ。

engChrName: For once, I agree with my cantankerous 'friend' here. Sorry, but we're gonna have to veto this one.
engSearchText:
For once, I agree with my cantankerous 'friend' here.
Sorry, but we're gonna have to veto this one.
jpnChrName: そないな面倒言い出して、 男らしゅうないんやから。
jpnSearchText:
そないな面倒言い出して、
男らしゅうないんやから。

engChrName: Oh, hush. I can't believe you two... Fully grown, and you're still bickering like children? Please, it's only for one match.
engSearchText:
Oh, hush. I can't believe you two... Fully grown, and
you're still bickering like children? Please, it's only for
one match.
jpnChrName: てめえが言うなてめぇが！
jpnSearchText: てめえが言うなてめぇが！

engChrName: Can it! I don't give a rat's ass what you have to say! It AIN'T happening!
engSearchText:
Can it! I don't give a rat's ass what you have to say!
It AIN'T happening!
jpnChrName: ふむ、最初からこうなるしか なかったようだな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、最初からこうなるしか
なかったようだな。

engChrName: I suppose this was how it was always going to turn out.
engSearchText:
I suppose this was how it was always going to
turn out.
jpnChrName: くじの意味は……
jpnSearchText: くじの意味は……

engChrName: Then what was the point of drawing lots...?
engSearchText: Then what was the point of drawing lots...?
jpnChrName: くじの意味は……
jpnSearchText: くじの意味は……

engChrName: So there was no point in drawing lots at all... *sigh*
engSearchText: So there was no point in drawing lots at all... *sigh*
jpnChrName: ハッ、ようやく始められるな？
jpnSearchText: ハッ、ようやく始められるな？

engChrName: THERE we go—this is more like it. Now can we get started already or what?
engSearchText:
THERE we go—this is more like it. Now can we get
started already or what?
jpnChrName: 何度も出鼻をくじかれたがな。
jpnSearchText: 何度も出鼻をくじかれたがな。

engChrName: I have to say, after all that, my enthusiasm for this has gone down the drain.
engSearchText:
I have to say, after all that, my enthusiasm for this has
gone down the drain.
jpnChrName: せやから今度こそ──
jpnSearchText: せやから今度こそ──

engChrName: Either way, now that there's nothing to stop us...
engSearchText: Either way, now that there's nothing to stop us...
jpnChrName: 思う存分楽しませてもらおうか！
jpnSearchText: 思う存分楽しませてもらおうか！

engChrName: Let's have ourselves some fun, boys and girls!
engSearchText: Let's have ourselves some fun, boys and girls!
jpnChrName: 巻き込まれでもしたらたまらねえし、 俺たちはもう行くか。
jpnSearchText:
巻き込まれでもしたらたまらねえし、
俺たちはもう行くか。

engChrName: And that's our cue to jet. I don't wanna be in a five arge radius once they're at it.
engSearchText:
And that's our cue to jet. I don't wanna be in a five
arge radius once they're at it.
jpnChrName: 私はもう少しここで 勝負の行く末を見届けるとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
私はもう少しここで
勝負の行く末を見届けるとしよう。

engChrName: You can leave if you wish. I personally am curious to see how this plays out.
engSearchText:
You can leave if you wish. I personally am curious to
see how this plays out.
jpnChrName: では師父、また後程。
jpnSearchText: では師父、また後程。

engChrName: All right, don't let me stop you, Master. See ya later.
engSearchText: All right, don't let me stop you, Master. See ya later.
jpnChrName: まあ、なんだ…… アンタら、闘技場を壊すなよ？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、なんだ……
アンタら、闘技場を壊すなよ？

engChrName: Oh, but before I go, you guys? Just don't destroy the place, will you?
engSearchText:
Oh, but before I go, you guys? Just don't destroy the
place, will you?
jpnChrName: ……いや、最悪闘技場を壊してもいいが 上の地盤は壊すなよマジで………
jpnSearchText:
……いや、最悪闘技場を壊してもいいが
上の地盤は壊すなよマジで………

engChrName: ...Okay, maybe that's too much to ask. Just... Just keep it to yourselves, I guess. I'd better not hear about this up on the surface.
engSearchText:
...Okay, maybe that's too much to ask. Just...
Just keep it to yourselves, I guess. I'd better not hear
about this up on the surface.
jpnChrName: さすがにそこまでは…… ない……ですよね？
jpnSearchText:
さすがにそこまでは……
ない……ですよね？

engChrName: Y-You don't really think that could actually happen...right?
engSearchText:
Y-You don't really think that could actually
happen...right?
jpnChrName: さすがにそんなことには…… ならないといいんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
さすがにそんなことには……
ならないといいんですけど……

engChrName: Don't be silly, Van! That shouldn't happen... e-er, hopefully!
engSearchText:
Don't be silly, Van! That shouldn't happen...
e-er, hopefully!
jpnChrName: おいおいさすがにそこまでは…… ない……よな？
jpnSearchText:
おいおいさすがにそこまでは……
ない……よな？

engChrName: You're awfully serious about that. It's not ACTUALLY gonna happen...right?
engSearchText:
You're awfully serious about that. It's not
ACTUALLY gonna happen...right?
jpnChrName: さすがにそのようなことには…… ならないと信じたいですね……
jpnSearchText:
さすがにそのようなことには……
ならないと信じたいですね……

engChrName: I...would like to believe to everyone has the wherewithal to avoid such a scenario.
engSearchText:
I...would like to believe to everyone has the
wherewithal to avoid such a scenario.
jpnChrName: それは流石に…… ない……よね？
jpnSearchText:
それは流石に……
ない……よね？

engChrName: That... That couldn't possibly happen...right?
engSearchText: That... That couldn't possibly happen...right?
jpnChrName: さすがにそんなことには…… 冗談……よね？
jpnSearchText:
さすがにそんなことには……
冗談……よね？

engChrName: U-Uhh... You're kidding, right, Van? ...Van?
engSearchText:
U-Uhh... You're kidding, right, Van?
...Van?
jpnChrName: いや～、ここの噂は聞いていたが まさかここまで刺激的な場所だとは！
jpnSearchText:
いや～、ここの噂は聞いていたが
まさかここまで刺激的な場所だとは！

engChrName: Hot damn! I knew this place was the talk of the town, but it's even more invigorating than I ever could've imagined!
engSearchText:
Hot damn! I knew this place was the talk of the town,
but it's even more invigorating than I ever
could've imagined!
jpnChrName: リオン君といったか──君も若いのに なかなかに趣味が良いではないか！
jpnSearchText:
リオン君といったか──君も若いのに
なかなかに趣味が良いではないか！

engChrName: Hey, you said your name was Leon? I like the cut of your jib! You've got some fine taste for such a young guy still!
engSearchText:
Hey, you said your name was Leon? I like the cut of
your jib! You've got some fine taste for such a young
guy still!
jpnChrName: いえ、僕の方こそ以前から監督の作品は 一通り拝見させて頂いていまして。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、僕の方こそ以前から監督の作品は
一通り拝見させて頂いていまして。

engChrName: Thank you, Mr. Director. It's an honor to hear that from the man himself, as such an avid fan of yours.
engSearchText:
Thank you, Mr. Director. It's an honor to hear that
from the man himself, as such an avid fan of yours.
jpnChrName: 相方（セリスさん）もお気に入りでしたよ。 ──まあそっちは通常版でしたけど。
jpnSearchText:
相方（セリスさん）もお気に入りでしたよ。
──まあそっちは通常版でしたけど。

engChrName: I've watched your whole catalogue, actually. My partner enjoys them, too—the standard cuts, at least.
engSearchText:
I've watched your whole catalogue, actually.
My partner enjoys them, too—the standard cuts,
at least.
jpnChrName: ほう、すると君もやっぱり 完全版（Ｒ１７）の方が……？
jpnSearchText:
ほう、すると君もやっぱり
完全版（Ｒ１７）の方が……？

engChrName: Interesting choice of words there, my friend. Is that to say you've watched my director's cuts?
engSearchText:
Interesting choice of words there, my friend. Is that
to say you've watched my director's cuts?
jpnChrName: ええ──それは勿論。 男だったら当然でしょう？
jpnSearchText:
ええ──それは勿論。
男だったら当然でしょう？

engChrName: Of course, sir. What tasteful man wouldn't?
engSearchText: Of course, sir. What tasteful man wouldn't?
jpnChrName: セリスさんに言ったら真っ赤な顔で ブッ飛ばされそうなので控えてますけど。
jpnSearchText:
セリスさんに言ったら真っ赤な顔で
ブッ飛ばされそうなので控えてますけど。

engChrName: I've simply chosen not to share that with Celis. She'd fly off the handle if she ever found out.
engSearchText:
I've simply chosen not to share that with Celis.
She'd fly off the handle if she ever found out.
jpnChrName: ワハハ、そう言いながら 言い出すタイミングを狙ってるんじゃろ？
jpnSearchText:
ワハハ、そう言いながら
言い出すタイミングを狙ってるんじゃろ？

engChrName: Gahaha! You say that, but you're still waiting for the right time to tell her, aren't you?
engSearchText:
Gahaha! You say that, but you're still waiting for the
right time to tell her, aren't you?
jpnChrName: 判る、判るぞ若人よ──年上の同僚女性の 羞（は）じらいもまた良き物じゃからなぁ！
jpnSearchText:
判る、判るぞ若人よ──年上の同僚女性の
羞（は）じらいもまた良き物じゃからなぁ！

engChrName: I know how these things go, trust me! There are few things finer on the Goddess' green earth than an older woman hot and bothered!
engSearchText:
I know how these things go, trust me! There are few
things finer on the Goddess' green earth than an
older woman hot and bothered!
jpnChrName: （まあ年上って感じはしませんけど……） いや～、監督には敵いませんねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
（まあ年上って感じはしませんけど……）
いや～、監督には敵いませんねぇ。

engChrName: Hah, I suppose so. Nothing gets past you, sir, does it? (Not that you could ever tell she's the older one from the way she acts...)
engSearchText:
Hah, I suppose so. Nothing gets past you, sir, does it?
(Not that you could ever tell she's the older one from
the way she acts...)
jpnChrName: ガハハ、盛り上がってきたのう！
jpnSearchText: ガハハ、盛り上がってきたのう！

engChrName: Gahaha! Oh, man, this is great! I'm having the time of my life here!
engSearchText:
Gahaha! Oh, man, this is great! I'm having the time
of my life here!
jpnChrName: ここはワシの奢りじゃ！ そちらの君たちも遠慮なく行きたまえっ！
jpnSearchText:
ここはワシの奢りじゃ！
そちらの君たちも遠慮なく行きたまえっ！

engChrName: Tell you what, kid: the whole tab's on me! You guys, too! Don't be shy! C'mon, join us!
engSearchText:
Tell you what, kid: the whole tab's on me! You
guys, too! Don't be shy! C'mon, join us!
jpnChrName: フフ、では遠慮なく。
jpnSearchText: フフ、では遠慮なく。

engChrName: Well, if you insist.
engSearchText: Well, if you insist.
jpnChrName: これも無礼講── 姫が戻るまではお付き合いいたそう。
jpnSearchText:
これも無礼講──
姫が戻るまではお付き合いいたそう。

engChrName: Far be it from me to turn you down. I shall accompany you until my princess has returned.
engSearchText:
Far be it from me to turn you down. I shall
accompany you until my princess has returned.
jpnChrName: いや……カオスすぎんだろ。 つーかどうしてゴッチ監督がここに？
jpnSearchText:
いや……カオスすぎんだろ。
つーかどうしてゴッチ監督がここに？

engChrName: Oh, great. This can only end well. And what the hell's Gotti doin' over here, anyway?
engSearchText:
Oh, great. This can only end well. And what the
hell's Gotti doin' over here, anyway?
jpnChrName: なんでも噂を聞きつけてここに来る途中、 迷ってた所をあの若造に助けられたらしいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
なんでも噂を聞きつけてここに来る途中、
迷ってた所をあの若造に助けられたらしいぜ？

engChrName: Far as I can tell, the guy tried searchin' for this place after he caught wind of it, buuut he got lost. That lad there bailed him out.
engSearchText:
Far as I can tell, the guy tried searchin' for this place
after he caught wind of it, buuut he got lost. That lad
there bailed him out.
jpnChrName: いや～、あの世紀のゴッチがねぇ。 オレの店もロケとかに使わねえかな？
jpnSearchText:
いや～、あの世紀のゴッチがねぇ。
オレの店もロケとかに使わねえかな？

engChrName: Still, that's the one and only Salvatore Gotti, eh? Think I can get him to shoot one of his famous movies here?
engSearchText:
Still, that's the one and only Salvatore Gotti, eh?
Think I can get him to shoot one of his famous
movies here?
jpnChrName: なるほど──ってこの場所が 露出しちまってもいいのかよ！？
jpnSearchText:
なるほど──ってこの場所が
露出しちまってもいいのかよ！？

engChrName: Uh, you sure that's really a good idea, shinin' a light on this joint?
engSearchText:
Uh, you sure that's really a good idea, shinin' a light
on this joint?
jpnChrName: あはは……まあ盛り上がってそうですし、 邪魔するのは遠慮しておきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……まあ盛り上がってそうですし、
邪魔するのは遠慮しておきましょうか。

engChrName: Perhaps not... They're all having fun, at least. Let's just leave them be for now.
engSearchText:
Perhaps not... They're all having fun, at least.
Let's just leave them be for now.
jpnChrName: うーん……盛り上がってるみたいですし、 邪魔するのは遠慮しましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
うーん……盛り上がってるみたいですし、
邪魔するのは遠慮しましょうか。

engChrName: They look like they're having fun. Maybe we should just leave them alone.
engSearchText:
They look like they're having fun. Maybe we should
just leave them alone.
jpnChrName: ま、絡まれそうな予感しかしねぇし、 近寄るのは止めておくか。
jpnSearchText:
ま、絡まれそうな予感しかしねぇし、
近寄るのは止めておくか。

engChrName: Crashing their little bachelor party is just asking for trouble. Probably best we keep our distance from them.
engSearchText:
Crashing their little bachelor party is just asking
for trouble. Probably best we keep our distance
from them.
jpnChrName: フフ、盛り上がっていらっしゃいますし、 お声がけするのは遠慮しましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、盛り上がっていらっしゃいますし、
お声がけするのは遠慮しましょうか。

engChrName: They seem to be enjoying themselves. In my view, we'd best leave them to their devices.
engSearchText:
They seem to be enjoying themselves. In my view,
we'd best leave them to their devices.
jpnChrName: うーん、絡まれそうな気もするし、 邪魔するのは遠慮しておこうか。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、絡まれそうな気もするし、
邪魔するのは遠慮しておこうか。

engChrName: Who knows what'll happen if we get dragged into their orbit? We should probably just leave them be.
engSearchText:
Who knows what'll happen if we get dragged into
their orbit? We should probably just leave them be.
jpnChrName: うーん、ちゃんと帰れるか心配だけど まあしぶとそうだし大丈夫か。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ちゃんと帰れるか心配だけど
まあしぶとそうだし大丈夫か。

engChrName: I'm a little worried, not gonna lie—I'm not sure how they'll get back to the surface. It's a pretty rough crowd down here...
engSearchText:
I'm a little worried, not gonna lie—I'm not sure how
they'll get back to the surface. It's a pretty rough
crowd down here...
jpnChrName: 邪魔するのは遠慮しときましょ。
jpnSearchText: 邪魔するのは遠慮しときましょ。

engChrName: ...but they're tough guys themselves, I guess. They'll figure it out.
engSearchText:
...but they're tough guys themselves, I guess.
They'll figure it out.
jpnChrName: （ふむ、リオンはともかくアシュラッドが   来ているとは思わなんだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ふむ、リオンはともかくアシュラッドが
来ているとは思わなんだが……）

engChrName: (Hmm... It's one thing to find Leon here, but Ashladd? Now, there's an unexpected twist.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... It's one thing to find Leon here,
but Ashladd? Now, there's an unexpected twist.)
jpnChrName: ──まあ、水を差すのも無粋だろう。 声を掛けるのはまたにするぞ。
jpnSearchText:
──まあ、水を差すのも無粋だろう。
声を掛けるのはまたにするぞ。

engChrName: I see no reason for us to rain on their parade—let's just leave well enough alone. We can always talk to them later.
engSearchText:
I see no reason for us to rain on their parade—let's
just leave well enough alone. We can always talk to
them later.
jpnChrName: このガキが…… よくも余計な口出しをしてくれたな。
jpnSearchText:
このガキが……
よくも余計な口出しをしてくれたな。

engChrName: You stupid bitch! You just had to run your mouth, didn't you?
engSearchText:
You stupid bitch! You just had to run your mouth,
didn't you?
jpnChrName: お前は俺の横で黙ってうんうん頷いていれば それでよかったものを。
jpnSearchText:
お前は俺の横で黙ってうんうん頷いていれば
それでよかったものを。

engChrName: All you had to do was sit quietly next to me and nod your head like a good girl—everything would've been just fine!
engSearchText:
All you had to do was sit quietly next to me and nod
your head like a good girl—everything would've been
just fine!
jpnChrName: おかげでババアから ふんだくれたかもしれない大金がパーだ。
jpnSearchText:
おかげでババアから
ふんだくれたかもしれない大金がパーだ。

engChrName: But nooo, you just HAD to run your mouth! Now all that money I could've swindled is gone! All down the drain!
engSearchText:
But nooo, you just HAD to run your mouth! Now all
that money I could've swindled is gone! All down
the drain!
jpnChrName: ダフネさんのことを騙そうだなんて……
jpnSearchText: ダフネさんのことを騙そうだなんて……

engChrName: How... How could you deceive a woman like Daphne? That's just horrible!
engSearchText:
How... How could you deceive a woman
like Daphne? That's just horrible!
jpnChrName: 最初から分かっていたら、 貴方の言うことなんて聞かなかったのに！
jpnSearchText:
最初から分かっていたら、
貴方の言うことなんて聞かなかったのに！

engChrName: If I knew that was what you were after, I never would've gone along with any of this!
engSearchText:
If I knew that was what you were after, I never
would've gone along with any of this!
jpnChrName: とにかく──これで分かっただろう。
jpnSearchText: とにかく──これで分かっただろう。

engChrName: News flash: I don't give a shit. You have a JOB to do, and that's all that matters, you understand?
engSearchText:
News flash: I don't give a shit. You have a JOB to do,
and that's all that matters, you understand?
jpnChrName: お前の役割は、その持ち前の愛嬌を振りまいて ターゲットの警戒を解き、親密になることだ。
jpnSearchText:
お前の役割は、その持ち前の愛嬌を振りまいて
ターゲットの警戒を解き、親密になることだ。

engChrName: You sucker people in with that sweet, innocent face of yours, and then I swoop in for the kill!
engSearchText:
You sucker people in with that sweet, innocent face
of yours, and then I swoop in for the kill!
jpnChrName: あのババアは思っていたほど バカではなかったので失敗はしたが……
jpnSearchText:
あのババアは思っていたほど
バカではなかったので失敗はしたが……

engChrName: I figured that old hag was an easy target, but nope... She's sharper than she looks.
engSearchText:
I figured that old hag was an easy target, but nope...
She's sharper than she looks.
jpnChrName: なに、心配せずとも 詐欺なんてもんは数うちゃ当たる。
jpnSearchText:
なに、心配せずとも
詐欺なんてもんは数うちゃ当たる。

engChrName: But I've still got some tricks up my sleeve... Maybe I can pull something else on her.
engSearchText:
But I've still got some tricks up my sleeve... Maybe I
can pull something else on her.
jpnChrName: 次からは、お前自身に “保険”の契約を取って来てもらうとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
次からは、お前自身に
“保険”の契約を取って来てもらうとしよう。

engChrName: I've got this insurance plan, and you're gonna get her to take it out for me, all right?
engSearchText:
I've got this insurance plan, and you're gonna get her
to take it out for me, all right?
jpnChrName: だ、誰がそんなこと……！
jpnSearchText: だ、誰がそんなこと……！

engChrName: Excuse me?! Why should I—
engSearchText: Excuse me?! Why should I—
jpnChrName: ふむ、どうやらまだ 自分の立場が分かっていないようだな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、どうやらまだ
自分の立場が分かっていないようだな。

engChrName: Ah-ah-ah. Don't even start with me. You took on this job, and you accepted my payment.
engSearchText:
Ah-ah-ah. Don't even start with me. You took on
this job, and you accepted my payment.
jpnChrName: お前は俺からの報酬を受け取った。 つまりは“共犯者”だ。
jpnSearchText:
お前は俺からの報酬を受け取った。
つまりは“共犯者”だ。

engChrName: That means you're obligated to do the work, little lady. Your 'feelings' can't do the job for you.
engSearchText:
That means you're obligated to do the work,
little lady. Your 'feelings' can't do the job for you.
jpnChrName: 間違っても逃げられるだなんて思うなよ？
jpnSearchText: 間違っても逃げられるだなんて思うなよ？

engChrName: So don't you run out on our deal here, or you're gonna regret it, capisce?
engSearchText:
So don't you run out on our deal here, or you're
gonna regret it, capisce?
jpnChrName: だ、だから…… ミラなら返すって言ってるじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
だ、だから……
ミラなら返すって言ってるじゃない。

engChrName: I... I told you. If it's the mira you want, you can have it back. I don't care!
engSearchText:
I... I told you. If it's the mira you want, you can have
it back. I don't care!
jpnChrName: フフ、そんなことをしてもお前が俺から 報酬を受け取った事実は消すことはできん。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、そんなことをしてもお前が俺から
報酬を受け取った事実は消すことはできん。

engChrName: That's not how this works. It's not about the money— it's about the DEAL. You can't just walk back the deal now that you've taken it, see?
engSearchText:
That's not how this works. It's not about the money—
it's about the DEAL. You can't just walk back the
deal now that you've taken it, see?
jpnChrName: いい加減、諦めて俺の手駒に──
jpnSearchText: いい加減、諦めて俺の手駒に──

engChrName: You're in it now, whether you like it or not. Now be a good girl and stop—
engSearchText:
You're in it now, whether you like it or not. Now be a
good girl and stop—
jpnChrName: 待ちな──そこまでだ。
jpnSearchText: 待ちな──そこまでだ。

engChrName: Lemme stop you right there.
engSearchText: Lemme stop you right there.

engChrName: Wh-Who are you?
engSearchText: Wh-Who are you?
jpnChrName: フン……何か用か？
jpnSearchText: フン……何か用か？

engChrName: Tch. The hell do you want?
engSearchText: Tch. The hell do you want?
jpnChrName: ヒャハハ、正義の味方の登場ってか？
jpnSearchText: ヒャハハ、正義の味方の登場ってか？

engChrName: Hahaha! Oh, NO! The hero's come to save the day! I'm just SHAKING in my boots!
engSearchText:
Hahaha! Oh, NO! The hero's come to save the day!
I'm just SHAKING in my boots!
jpnChrName: 残念だが、俺は正義とは無縁の裏解決屋だ。
jpnSearchText: 残念だが、俺は正義とは無縁の裏解決屋だ。

engChrName: Hero, I ain't. I'm a spriggan, and I don't give a rat's ass about that goody-two-shoes shit.
engSearchText:
Hero, I ain't. I'm a spriggan, and I don't give a rat's
ass about that goody-two-shoes shit.
jpnChrName: その娘の捜索を依頼主に頼まれてな。 こちらに引き渡して貰うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
その娘の捜索を依頼主に頼まれてな。
こちらに引き渡して貰うぜ。

engChrName: I'm here 'cause my client told me to fetch that girl, and that's exactly what I'm gonna do. I'm askin' you NICELY to hand her over.
engSearchText:
I'm here 'cause my client told me to fetch that girl,
and that's exactly what I'm gonna do. I'm askin' you
NICELY to hand her over.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋か……面倒な。
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋か……面倒な。

engChrName: Greeeat, one of you pricks. Just what I needed.
engSearchText: Greeeat, one of you pricks. Just what I needed.
jpnChrName: だが筋違いもいい所だ。 この娘、ルルアは我々の仲間でな。
jpnSearchText:
だが筋違いもいい所だ。
この娘、ルルアは我々の仲間でな。

engChrName: Look, buddy, you're barking up the wrong tree. This girl's with us—she's not going anywhere.
engSearchText:
Look, buddy, you're barking up the wrong tree.
This girl's with us—she's not going anywhere.
jpnChrName: どうかお引き取り願おうか。
jpnSearchText: どうかお引き取り願おうか。

engChrName: Now if you don't get outta my face right this instant, we've got problems.
engSearchText:
Now if you don't get outta my face right this instant,
we've got problems.
jpnChrName: そういうこった、消えなオッサン。
jpnSearchText: そういうこった、消えなオッサン。

engChrName: You heard the boss! Scram!
engSearchText: You heard the boss! Scram!
jpnChrName: つうか一人で挑んで来るとはな。 間抜けすぎんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
つうか一人で挑んで来るとはな。
間抜けすぎんだろ。

engChrName: Aww, man. What a friggin' dumbass. Guy really thinks he can just walk up by himself and take on all of us?
engSearchText:
Aww, man. What a friggin' dumbass. Guy really
thinks he can just walk up by himself and take on all
of us?
jpnChrName: ──誰が一人って言ったの？
jpnSearchText: ──誰が一人って言ったの？

engChrName: Who said he was alone?
engSearchText: Who said he was alone?
jpnChrName: ぐおッ！！／ガァッ！！／ぎにゃッ！？
jpnSearchText: ぐおッ！！／ガァッ！！／ぎにゃッ！？

engChrName: Augh!
engSearchText: Augh!
jpnChrName: ゆ、遊撃士の……エレインさん！？
jpnSearchText: ゆ、遊撃士の……エレインさん！？

engChrName: H-Hey, I know that face... Elaine Auclair?!
engSearchText: H-Hey, I know that face... Elaine Auclair?!
jpnChrName: エレイン・オークレール…… くっ、なんでこんな所に。
jpnSearchText:
エレイン・オークレール……
くっ、なんでこんな所に。

engChrName: Oh, of all the goddamn times...!
engSearchText: Oh, of all the goddamn times...!
jpnChrName: やるな、エレイン。 ──おかげで救出成功だ。
jpnSearchText:
やるな、エレイン。
──おかげで救出成功だ。

engChrName: Nice work, Elaine. I've got the girl!
engSearchText: Nice work, Elaine. I've got the girl!
jpnChrName: い、いつの間に……
jpnSearchText: い、いつの間に……

engChrName: H-How did you...?!
engSearchText: H-How did you...?!
jpnChrName: マジかよ……
jpnSearchText: マジかよ……

engChrName: What the—?!
engSearchText: What the—?!
jpnChrName: セイラさん──
jpnSearchText: セイラさん──

engChrName: Seyla? You shouldn't—
engSearchText: Seyla? You shouldn't—
jpnChrName: ルルア──こっちよ！
jpnSearchText: ルルア──こっちよ！

engChrName: Lulua! Over here!
engSearchText: Lulua! Over here!

engChrName: Seyla! Seyla, is that you?!
engSearchText: Seyla! Seyla, is that you?!
jpnChrName: っ……逃がすかよ……！
jpnSearchText: っ……逃がすかよ……！

engChrName: Urk... You're not getting away, you little—
engSearchText: Urk... You're not getting away, you little—
jpnChrName: おっと、お前の相手はこの俺だ。
jpnSearchText: おっと、お前の相手はこの俺だ。

engChrName: Whoopsie there. Forget about me already, pal?
engSearchText: Whoopsie there. Forget about me already, pal?
jpnChrName: 走って──ここは私たちが食い止める！
jpnSearchText: 走って──ここは私たちが食い止める！

engChrName: Run, you two! We'll take care of these guys!
engSearchText: Run, you two! We'll take care of these guys!
jpnChrName: わ、分かりました！
jpnSearchText: わ、分かりました！

engChrName: O-Okay! Thank you!
engSearchText: O-Okay! Thank you!
jpnChrName: あ、ありえねえ……
jpnSearchText: あ、ありえねえ……

engChrName: Are you...SHITTING me...?!
engSearchText: Are you...SHITTING me...?!
jpnChrName: さぁて、改めて相手になるぜ？
jpnSearchText: さぁて、改めて相手になるぜ？

engChrName: You want some more? Looks like you guys dunno when to stay down.
engSearchText:
You want some more? Looks like you guys dunno
when to stay down.
jpnChrName: ──大人しく投降なさい！
jpnSearchText: ──大人しく投降なさい！

engChrName: Put your hands up and surrender yourselves! You're only digging yourselves deeper!
engSearchText:
Put your hands up and surrender yourselves!
You're only digging yourselves deeper!
jpnChrName: ま、まさか裏解決屋と遊撃士が 共闘するとは……
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさか裏解決屋と遊撃士が
共闘するとは……

engChrName: For the love of... Seriously? A bracer AND a spriggan ganging up on me? This shit blows...
engSearchText:
For the love of... Seriously? A bracer AND a spriggan
ganging up on me? This shit blows...
jpnChrName: お前たち──死ぬ気でかかれ……！
jpnSearchText: お前たち──死ぬ気でかかれ……！

engChrName: What are you doing?! Did I say you could just lie there? DID I?! Get your asses up and GET THEM!
engSearchText:
What are you doing?! Did I say you could just
lie there? DID I?! Get your asses up and
GET THEM!
jpnChrName: じょ、上等だ……！
jpnSearchText: じょ、上等だ……！

engChrName: Y-Yeah, okay!
engSearchText: Y-Yeah, okay!
jpnChrName: や、やってやんよ……！
jpnSearchText: や、やってやんよ……！

engChrName: You guys're gonna be real sorry!
engSearchText: You guys're gonna be real sorry!
jpnChrName: ──残るはお前さんだけだな。
jpnSearchText: ──残るはお前さんだけだな。

engChrName: Jig's up, pal. You're the only one left standin'.
engSearchText: Jig's up, pal. You're the only one left standin'.
jpnChrName: ひ、ひぃ……勘弁してくれ！
jpnSearchText: ひ、ひぃ……勘弁してくれ！

engChrName: Eep! I... M-Mercy! Mercy, please!
engSearchText: Eep! I... M-Mercy! Mercy, please!
jpnChrName: 後で改めてギルドで じっくり話を聞かせてもらうから。
jpnSearchText:
後で改めてギルドで
じっくり話を聞かせてもらうから。

engChrName: Of course. I'm taking you to the guild.
engSearchText: Of course. I'm taking you to the guild.
jpnChrName: 《Ａ》との関係も 洗いざらい話してもらうわよ。
jpnSearchText:
《Ａ》との関係も
洗いざらい話してもらうわよ。

engChrName: You have a lot to answer for—your crimes here AND your relationship with A. Do I make myself clear?
engSearchText:
You have a lot to answer for—your crimes here AND
your relationship with A. Do I make myself clear?
jpnChrName: そ、それは……
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……

engChrName: A-Anything but that...!
engSearchText: A-Anything but that...!
jpnChrName: なるほどな、 やっぱこいつも《Ａ》の関係者だったか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな、
やっぱこいつも《Ａ》の関係者だったか。

engChrName: Oh. So he was workin' for 'em all along. That does track, yeah.
engSearchText:
Oh. So he was workin' for 'em all along. That does
track, yeah.
jpnChrName: ま、処遇の方はお前に任せた。 相応のケジメを付けさせてやってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、処遇の方はお前に任せた。
相応のケジメを付けさせてやってくれ。

engChrName: I'll let you handle the rest, then. Make sure the guy pays for what he's done—and pays GOOD.
engSearchText:
I'll let you handle the rest, then. Make sure the guy
pays for what he's done—and pays GOOD.
jpnChrName: ふふ、了解よ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、了解よ。

engChrName: Heehee. Of course. You have a good night.
engSearchText: Heehee. Of course. You have a good night.
jpnChrName: こうして若者たちに闇バイトを斡旋していた クレマンの身柄はギルドが預かることになり──
jpnSearchText:
こうして若者たちに闇バイトを斡旋していた
クレマンの身柄はギルドが預かることになり──

engChrName: Clément was promptly taken into the guild's custody, and made to confess his crimes.
engSearchText:
Clément was promptly taken into the guild's custody,
and made to confess his crimes.
jpnChrName: 事件の顛末をダフネにも説明した上で、 ルルアとセイラをタイレル地区へと送り届けるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
事件の顛末をダフネにも説明した上で、
ルルアとセイラをタイレル地区へと送り届けるのだった。

engChrName: After looping in Daphne to the day's events, Van escorted Lulua and Seyla back to the Tyrell District.
engSearchText:
After looping in Daphne to the day's events, Van
escorted Lulua and Seyla back to the Tyrell District.
jpnChrName: クエスト【大切な後輩の捜索】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>大切な後輩の捜索<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Quest WithoutU completed!
engSearchText: Quest WithoutU completed!
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received

engChrName: Oh, it's...you.
engSearchText: Oh, it's...you.
jpnChrName: 俺もアンタとは一応顔見知りだが ディンゴの昔馴染みとは知らなかったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
俺もアンタとは一応顔見知りだが
ディンゴの昔馴染みとは知らなかったぜ。

engChrName: Y'know, I thought I knew you well, but I had no idea you and Dingo went so far back.
engSearchText:
Y'know, I thought I knew you well, but I had no idea
you and Dingo went so far back.
jpnChrName: 違法風俗方面からのアルマータの調査── あいつに協力してたのはアンタなんだろう？
jpnSearchText:
違法風俗方面からのアルマータの調査──
あいつに協力してたのはアンタなんだろう？

engChrName: Level with me here: you were the one helpin' him investigate Almata's illegal adult business, weren't you?
engSearchText:
Level with me here: you were the one helpin' him
investigate Almata's illegal adult business,
weren't you?
jpnChrName: ごくっ……
jpnSearchText: ごくっ……

jpnChrName: ふう……お互い動きやすいように 大っぴらにはしてなかったけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……お互い動きやすいように
大っぴらにはしてなかったけど。

engChrName: *sigh* Yeah, that's right. We must've worked together for...oh, a decade, I wanna say.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Yeah, that's right. We must've worked together
for...oh, a decade, I wanna say.
jpnChrName: ──ええ、かれこれ１０年くらいの 付き合いだったかしら。
jpnSearchText:
──ええ、かれこれ１０年くらいの
付き合いだったかしら。

engChrName: We both had to keep it on the down-low in order to operate freely, though.
engSearchText:
We both had to keep it on the down-low in order to
operate freely, though.
jpnChrName: 私と彼が北部の メッセルダム港に居た頃からのね。
jpnSearchText:
私と彼が北部の
メッセルダム港に居た頃からのね。

engChrName: He and I had known each other since we were both up in Messeldam.
engSearchText:
He and I had known each other since we were both
up in Messeldam.
jpnChrName: やっぱりそうか……
jpnSearchText: やっぱりそうか……

engChrName: That long, huh? Guess that makes sense.
engSearchText: That long, huh? Guess that makes sense.
jpnChrName: えっと、どういう経緯で お二人はお知り合いに……？
jpnSearchText:
えっと、どういう経緯で
お二人はお知り合いに……？

engChrName: Umm, if you don't mind me asking, how did the two of you...you know, meet?
engSearchText:
Umm, if you don't mind me asking, how did the two
of you...you know, meet?
jpnChrName: フフ、といっても私はしがない風俗嬢、 彼は駆け出しの情報屋だった縁だけど。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、といっても私はしがない風俗嬢、
彼は駆け出しの情報屋だった縁だけど。

engChrName: Oh, it wasn't anything special. He was a newly-minted intel broker...and I was your common whore, making ends meet out on the streets.
engSearchText:
Oh, it wasn't anything special. He was a
newly-minted intel broker...and I was your common
whore, making ends meet out on the streets.
jpnChrName: 仕（・）事（・）方（・）面（・）で仕入れた耳寄りな裏情報なんかを 彼が買い取ったり、逆に便宜を図ったり……
jpnSearchText:
仕（・）事（・）方（・）面（・）で仕入れた耳寄りな裏情報なんかを
彼が買い取ったり、逆に便宜を図ったり……

engChrName: We had a nice little thing going. He'd buy information I 'coaxed' from my clients, and I'd do him some favors in kind.
engSearchText:
We had a nice little thing going. He'd buy
information I 'coaxed' from my clients, and I'd do
him some favors in kind.
jpnChrName: まあ、持ちつ持たれつの関係だったわ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、持ちつ持たれつの関係だったわ。

engChrName: He scratched my back, I scratched his.
engSearchText: He scratched my back, I scratched his.
jpnChrName: そう、だったんですか……
jpnSearchText: そう、だったんですか……

engChrName: Huh... This is all news to me.
engSearchText: Huh... This is all news to me.
jpnChrName: その頃はディンゴさんも、ルポライターのような お仕事とは無縁だったんですね……？
jpnSearchText:
その頃はディンゴさんも、ルポライターのような
お仕事とは無縁だったんですね……？

engChrName: Can we assume that Dingo hadn't started doing any reporting work back then?
engSearchText:
Can we assume that Dingo hadn't started doing any
reporting work back then?
jpnChrName: まあ、裏勢力の使いっ走りだったけど 若いせいか青臭いところもあってね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、裏勢力の使いっ走りだったけど
若いせいか青臭いところもあってね。

engChrName: More or less. I will say, for an errand boy working underground, he had a certain naïveté to him back then. Maybe because he was still so young.
engSearchText:
More or less. I will say, for an errand boy working
underground, he had a certain naïveté to him
back then. Maybe because he was still so young.
jpnChrName: 地元紙の記者とも付き合いがあって そっちに興味も示していたみたい。
jpnSearchText:
地元紙の記者とも付き合いがあって
そっちに興味も示していたみたい。

engChrName: I had an acquaintance who worked at a local paper... I remember he was pretty intrigued about that side of things.
engSearchText:
I had an acquaintance who worked at a local paper...
I remember he was pretty intrigued about that side
of things.
jpnChrName: ──ちなみにあたしは８年前首都に出て こっちに足場を作ったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
──ちなみにあたしは８年前首都に出て
こっちに足場を作ったんだけど……

engChrName: I'll also mention, it was eight years ago when I made the move to Edith and set up shop down here.
engSearchText:
I'll also mention, it was eight years ago when I made
the move to Edith and set up shop down here.
jpnChrName: 彼からの餞別のマル秘情報やコネに ずいぶんと助けられたものだったわ。
jpnSearchText:
彼からの餞別のマル秘情報やコネに
ずいぶんと助けられたものだったわ。

engChrName: But before I left, he gave me some top secret information as a parting gift. His intel and his connections have been a huge help to me.
engSearchText:
But before I left, he gave me some top secret
information as a parting gift. His intel and his
connections have been a huge help to me.
jpnChrName: へぇ…… あのイケメンらしいじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ……
あのイケメンらしいじゃねぇか。

engChrName: Heh. Leave it to the ladykiller to schmooze his way into the underground.
engSearchText:
Heh. Leave it to the ladykiller to schmooze his way
into the underground.
jpnChrName: 色んなヒトに 頼られてたんですね……
jpnSearchText:
色んなヒトに
頼られてたんですね……

engChrName: He really helped a lot of people while he was alive, didn't he?
engSearchText:
He really helped a lot of people while he was alive,
didn't he?

engChrName: That he did.
engSearchText: That he did.
jpnChrName: はい……
jpnSearchText: はい……

engChrName: Indeed...
engSearchText: Indeed...

jpnChrName: その後、メッセルダムであんな事があって 彼の方も首都に流れてきて……
jpnSearchText:
その後、メッセルダムであんな事があって
彼の方も首都に流れてきて……

engChrName: Later on, after everything went down in Messeldam, that's when he ended up drifting into town.
engSearchText:
Later on, after everything went down in Messeldam,
that's when he ended up drifting into town.
jpnChrName: 新たな天職と縁に恵まれたのは 私としても安心だったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
新たな天職と縁に恵まれたのは
私としても安心だったんだけど……

engChrName: Personally, I was happy to see him make a clean break and get into a better line of work with better people.
engSearchText:
Personally, I was happy to see him make a clean break
and get into a better line of work with better people.
jpnChrName: ……分からないものね、人生なんて。 女神に逆に気に入られちゃったのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
……分からないものね、人生なんて。
女神に逆に気に入られちゃったのかしら？

engChrName: Haha... You never know what life has in store for you. Maybe the Goddess took a liking to him and threw him a bone.
engSearchText:
Haha... You never know what life has in store for you.
Maybe the Goddess took a liking to him and threw
him a bone.
jpnChrName: ……そうかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText: ……そうかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: ...Maybe so, yeah.
engSearchText: ...Maybe so, yeah.
jpnChrName: その、メッセルダムであった “あんな事”というのは……？
jpnSearchText:
その、メッセルダムであった
“あんな事”というのは……？

engChrName: Sorry to interject, but what happened to him in Messeldam? I didn't know anything about that.
engSearchText:
Sorry to interject, but what happened to him
in Messeldam? I didn't know anything about that.
jpnChrName: 悪いけど私の口からは言えないわ。 もう首都に来てたから又聞きになるし。
jpnSearchText:
悪いけど私の口からは言えないわ。
もう首都に来てたから又聞きになるし。

engChrName: I wish I could tell you, honey, but it's not really my place to say. That all happened after I left, so I only heard things through the grapevine.
engSearchText:
I wish I could tell you, honey, but it's not really my
place to say. That all happened after I left, so I only
heard things through the grapevine.
jpnChrName: ──代わりと言ってはなんだけど “ネタ帳”に関わりそうな情報ならあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
──代わりと言ってはなんだけど
“ネタ帳”に関わりそうな情報ならあるわ。

engChrName: But I won't leave you empty-handed. If you're looking for his notebook, I've got some information I'd be happy to share.
engSearchText:
But I won't leave you empty-handed. If you're
looking for his notebook, I've got some information
I'd be happy to share.
jpnChrName: ホ、ホントですか！？
jpnSearchText: ホ、ホントですか！？

engChrName: Really? You'd do that?! Oh, thank you! Thank you so much!
engSearchText:
Really? You'd do that?! Oh, thank you! Thank you
so much!
jpnChrName: 黒革の手帳…… 見たことがあるみてぇだな？
jpnSearchText:
黒革の手帳……
見たことがあるみてぇだな？

engChrName: Just to clarify, we're lookin' for this black leather notebook he used to carry around. You've seen it before, I take it?
engSearchText:
Just to clarify, we're lookin' for this black leather
notebook he used to carry around. You've seen it
before, I take it?
jpnChrName: ええ、保管場所を考えてるようだったから 預かろうとしたけど遠慮されちゃったわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、保管場所を考えてるようだったから
預かろうとしたけど遠慮されちゃったわ。

engChrName: Sure have. He'd been looking for a place to stash it away. I offered to hold on to it myself, but he turned me down.
engSearchText:
Sure have. He'd been looking for a place to stash it
away. I offered to hold on to it myself, but he turned
me down.
jpnChrName: アルマータを相手取っていたせいか 念には念を入れたかったみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
アルマータを相手取っていたせいか
念には念を入れたかったみたいで……

engChrName: Can't blame him for being so cautious when he was going up against Almata.
engSearchText:
Can't blame him for being so cautious when he was
going up against Almata.
jpnChrName: 『こうなったら取材に出かけるついでに   頼むとするか』なんて呟いていたわね。
jpnSearchText:
『こうなったら取材に出かけるついでに
頼むとするか』なんて呟いていたわね。

engChrName: But I did hear him mutter about asking someone for help on his way out of town for a piece.
engSearchText:
But I did hear him mutter about asking someone for
help on his way out of town for a piece.
jpnChrName: ……クレイユの事件の３日前のことよ。
jpnSearchText: ……クレイユの事件の３日前のことよ。

engChrName: That was three days before everything went down in Creil, for reference.
engSearchText:
That was three days before everything went down in
Creil, for reference.

jpnChrName: そ、そんなことが……
jpnSearchText: そ、そんなことが……

engChrName: Holy cow! What timing!
engSearchText: Holy cow! What timing!
jpnChrName: 取材に出かけるついでに頼む……
jpnSearchText: 取材に出かけるついでに頼む……

engChrName: On his way out of town, huh? That's rather specific...
engSearchText: On his way out of town, huh? That's rather specific...
jpnChrName: ふむ……有力な情報のようだな。
jpnSearchText: ふむ……有力な情報のようだな。

engChrName: That's a valuable clue, there.
engSearchText: That's a valuable clue, there.
jpnChrName: そういえばディンゴさん、どうやって クレイユ村に向かわれたんでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
そういえばディンゴさん、どうやって
クレイユ村に向かわれたんでしょうか……？

engChrName: Actually, now that she mentions it, how DID Dingo get to Creil? Do you have any ideas, Van?
engSearchText:
Actually, now that she mentions it, how DID Dingo
get to Creil? Do you have any ideas, Van?
jpnChrName: ……あいつも軽導力車を持ってたが 足が付くのを警戒して余り使ってなかったな。
jpnSearchText:
……あいつも軽導力車を持ってたが
足が付くのを警戒して余り使ってなかったな。

engChrName: He had this tiny-ass car, but he never drove it all that much. He was always paranoid of people following him.
engSearchText:
He had this tiny-ass car, but he never drove it all
that much. He was always paranoid of people
following him.
jpnChrName: 地方への取材も大抵は鉄道かバス── たまに飛行船なんかも使っていたはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
地方への取材も大抵は鉄道かバス──
たまに飛行船なんかも使っていたはずだ。

engChrName: Usually he took a train or a bus when he had to go out to the sticks. Probably flew a bit from time to time, too.
engSearchText:
Usually he took a train or a bus when he had to go
out to the sticks. Probably flew a bit from time to
time, too.
jpnChrName: だが………
jpnSearchText: だが………

engChrName: But I dunno what he did here...
engSearchText: But I dunno what he did here...
jpnChrName: アルマータのヤバい動きを掴んで 単身追いかけてやがったみたいだからな。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータのヤバい動きを掴んで
単身追いかけてやがったみたいだからな。

engChrName: Same. We're talking about a guy who knew all their tricks by that point—he might as well have just been moving randomly.
engSearchText:
Same. We're talking about a guy who knew all their
tricks by that point—he might as well have just been
moving randomly.
jpnChrName: 連中に見張られてそうな公共交通機関を 迂闊に使うのは避けてたんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
連中に見張られてそうな公共交通機関を
迂闊に使うのは避けてたんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: He sure as hell wouldn't take something as obvious as public transit—not when Almata had eyes everywhere.
engSearchText:
He sure as hell wouldn't take something as obvious as
public transit—not when Almata had
eyes everywhere.
jpnChrName: ああ、その通りだ。 自分の車を使うのも避けただろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、その通りだ。
自分の車を使うのも避けただろう。

engChrName: Exactly. I think we can rule out his own car, too. That would've carried its own risks.
engSearchText:
Exactly. I think we can rule out his own car, too.
That would've carried its own risks.
jpnChrName: となると可能性としてありそうなのは──
jpnSearchText: となると可能性としてありそうなのは──

engChrName: Thinkin' realistically, he probably would've...
engSearchText: Thinkin' realistically, he probably would've...
jpnChrName: （いや、それこそ営業所にアルマータの   目が光ってないとも限らないし……）
jpnSearchText:
（いや、それこそ営業所にアルマータの
目が光ってないとも限らないし……）

engChrName: (That doesn't track. He couldn't have assumed Almata didn't have eyes on rental companies and their records.)
