engSearchText:
(That doesn't track. He couldn't have assumed
Almata didn't have eyes on rental companies and
their records.)
jpnChrName: （借りてた車が返ってこないんだったら   とっくに警察に情報が入ってきそうだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（借りてた車が返ってこないんだったら
とっくに警察に情報が入ってきそうだ。）

engChrName: (Plus, even if he HAD rented one, the cops probably would've known by now, since it would've gone unreturned.)
engSearchText:
(Plus, even if he HAD rented one, the cops probably
would've known by now, since it would've
gone unreturned.)
jpnChrName: （この線は薄そうだな……）
jpnSearchText: （この線は薄そうだな……）

engChrName: (I think we can scratch that off the list.)
engSearchText: (I think we can scratch that off the list.)
jpnChrName: （首都から地方に向かうトラック便に便乗──   ……かなり可能性はありそうなんだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（首都から地方に向かうトラック便に便乗──
……かなり可能性はありそうなんだが。）

engChrName: (Y'know, ridiculous as it sounds, he probably COULD have gotten all the way out to the countryside on the back of a truck.)
engSearchText:
(Y'know, ridiculous as it sounds, he probably
COULD have gotten all the way out to the
countryside on the back of a truck.)
jpnChrName: （アルマータにマークされてる状況だと   頼んだ相手を巻き込む可能性もある……）
jpnSearchText:
（アルマータにマークされてる状況だと
頼んだ相手を巻き込む可能性もある……）

engChrName: (But if Almata found him, they very well coulda snuffed out the driver in the crossfire.)
engSearchText:
(But if Almata found him, they very well coulda
snuffed out the driver in the crossfire.)
jpnChrName: （ディンゴの性格だと避けた可能性があるな。）
jpnSearchText: （ディンゴの性格だと避けた可能性があるな。）

engChrName: (I just don't see Dingo takin' that kinda risk. He was a lot more methodical than that.)
engSearchText:
(I just don't see Dingo takin' that kinda risk. He was
a lot more methodical than that.)
jpnChrName: （バイクか……小回りは利くし   ルポライター向きではあるんだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（バイクか……小回りは利くし
ルポライター向きではあるんだが……）

engChrName: (An orbal bike's pretty handy for a reporter like him— maneuverable, too.)
engSearchText:
(An orbal bike's pretty handy for a reporter like him—
maneuverable, too.)
jpnChrName: （まだまだ普及してないから目立ちそうだ。   ……可能性は低そうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（まだまだ普及してないから目立ちそうだ。
……可能性は低そうだな。）

engChrName: (But you stick out like a sore thumb when you're on one, with how rare they are. That's not how he did things.)
engSearchText:
(But you stick out like a sore thumb when you're on
one, with how rare they are. That's not how he
did things.)
jpnChrName: ミラは掛かるが、ある程度融通が効いて 公共交通機関ほど目立たない交通手段──
jpnSearchText:
ミラは掛かるが、ある程度融通が効いて
公共交通機関ほど目立たない交通手段──

engChrName: I think chances are pretty good our guy took a taxi.
engSearchText: I think chances are pretty good our guy took a taxi.
jpnChrName: 『導力タクシー』を使った可能性が高いな。
jpnSearchText: 『導力タクシー』を使った可能性が高いな。

engChrName: Sure as hell ain't cheap, but it'd have given him the lowest profile and the most flexibility. They blend right in on the road.
engSearchText:
Sure as hell ain't cheap, but it'd have given him the
lowest profile and the most flexibility. They blend
right in on the road.

engChrName: Oh! Good thinking!
engSearchText: Oh! Good thinking!
jpnChrName: た、確かにちょっと郊外に出るのに タクシーを使う方は結構いますよね。
jpnSearchText:
た、確かにちょっと郊外に出るのに
タクシーを使う方は結構いますよね。

engChrName: You might be on to something, Van. Taxis are pretty commonplace, especially for people heading out of town.
engSearchText:
You might be on to something, Van. Taxis are pretty
commonplace, especially for people heading out
of town.
jpnChrName: それこそアルマータがいちいち監視や チェックをしていられないくらいは……
jpnSearchText:
それこそアルマータがいちいち監視や
チェックをしていられないくらいは……

engChrName: There's no way Almata could've been monitoring every single taxi running in Edith.
engSearchText:
There's no way Almata could've been monitoring
every single taxi running in Edith.
jpnChrName: ふむ、するとどちらかというと 法人タクシーより個人タクシーかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、するとどちらかというと
法人タクシーより個人タクシーかしら？

engChrName: So let's say he did take a taxi. What kind would he have taken? Probably one of those independent ones instead of a company taxi, right?
engSearchText:
So let's say he did take a taxi. What kind would he
have taken? Probably one of those independent ones
instead of a company taxi, right?
jpnChrName: ……すると、どちらかというと 法人タクシーより個人タクシーでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
……すると、どちらかというと
法人タクシーより個人タクシーでしょうか？

engChrName: If that were the case, what sort of taxi would he have taken? Presumably one with a self-employed driver instead of a company, no?
engSearchText:
If that were the case, what sort of taxi would he
have taken? Presumably one with a self-employed
driver instead of a company, no?
jpnChrName: ふむ、するとどちらかというと 法人タクシーより個人タクシーであろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、するとどちらかというと
法人タクシーより個人タクシーであろうな。

engChrName: Hmm... If that's what he did, he likely opted to ride with a self-employed driver rather than someone working for a company.
engSearchText:
Hmm... If that's what he did, he likely opted to ride
with a self-employed driver rather than someone
working for a company.
jpnChrName: 会社に所属しない個人業者だっけ…… 確かにその方がフットワークも軽そうだね。
jpnSearchText:
会社に所属しない個人業者だっけ……
確かにその方がフットワークも軽そうだね。

engChrName: That does make sense. That would have allowed him to move much more erratically, thereby throwing Almata off his trail.
engSearchText:
That does make sense. That would have allowed him
to move much more erratically, thereby throwing
Almata off his trail.
jpnChrName: 会社に所属しない個人業者であったか。 確かにその方が動きやすいであろうな。
jpnSearchText:
会社に所属しない個人業者であったか。
確かにその方が動きやすいであろうな。

engChrName: That's a good point. A self-employed driver would have given him more flexibility.
engSearchText:
That's a good point. A self-employed driver would
have given him more flexibility.
jpnChrName: 会社に所属しない個人業者でしたか…… 確かにその方が動きやすいでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
会社に所属しない個人業者でしたか……
確かにその方が動きやすいでしょうね。

engChrName: That's an excellent point. Hiring a self-employed driver would allow him to chart his own course and movements.
engSearchText:
That's an excellent point. Hiring a self-employed
driver would allow him to chart his own course
and movements.
jpnChrName: フフ、私は心当たりはないけれど 彼の個人的なツテかもしれないわね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、私は心当たりはないけれど
彼の個人的なツテかもしれないわね。

engChrName: Sounds like you guys have your next lead. I have no idea who the driver could be, unfortunately—maybe it was one of his friends.
engSearchText:
Sounds like you guys have your next lead. I have no
idea who the driver could be, unfortunately—maybe it
was one of his friends.
jpnChrName: 普段から贔屓にしてそうだけど お嬢ちゃんに心当たりはないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
普段から贔屓にしてそうだけど
お嬢ちゃんに心当たりはないかしら？

engChrName: My guess is, he had a driver he hired on the regular— someone he could trust. That ring any bells for you, sweetheart?
engSearchText:
My guess is, he had a driver he hired on the regular—
someone he could trust. That ring any bells for
you, sweetheart?
jpnChrName: そ、そういえば……
jpnSearchText: そ、そういえば……

engChrName: Hmm... You know something? It actually does.
engSearchText: Hmm... You know something? It actually does.
jpnChrName: ……ディンゴさん、取材現場にタクシーで 乗り付けてくることがたまにありましたね。
jpnSearchText:
……ディンゴさん、取材現場にタクシーで
乗り付けてくることがたまにありましたね。

engChrName: I remember Dingo would sometimes hail a taxi to get to a reporting site.
engSearchText:
I remember Dingo would sometimes hail a taxi to get
to a reporting site.
jpnChrName: 大抵、黒くて黄色いストライプの車体で、 ちょっと変わった人が運転してたような……
jpnSearchText:
大抵、黒くて黄色いストライプの車体で、
ちょっと変わった人が運転してたような……

engChrName: He mostly took one that had this black and yellow checkered pattern around the bottom. The driver was an eccentric guy, too, from what I recall.
engSearchText:
He mostly took one that had this black and yellow
checkered pattern around the bottom. The driver was
an eccentric guy, too, from what I recall.
jpnChrName: 有力な目撃情報ですね……！
jpnSearchText: 有力な目撃情報ですね……！

engChrName: Oh, wow, that's really good info! Glad you were able to remember that!
engSearchText:
Oh, wow, that's really good info! Glad you were able
to remember that!
jpnChrName: ああ、心当たりを探してみるか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、心当たりを探してみるか。

engChrName: You said it. We'll have to look into that once we're done here.
engSearchText:
You said it. We'll have to look into that once we're
done here.
jpnChrName: ──ありがとよ、ミストレス。 この借りはいずれ返させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
──ありがとよ、ミストレス。
この借りはいずれ返させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Anyway, thanks for the chat, Mistress. I'll pay you back sometime.
engSearchText:
Anyway, thanks for the chat, Mistress. I'll pay you
back sometime.
jpnChrName: その……ありがとうございました！
jpnSearchText: その……ありがとうございました！

engChrName: Yes, thank you so, so much! You have no idea how grateful I am!
engSearchText:
Yes, thank you so, so much! You have no idea how
grateful I am!
jpnChrName: フフ、力になれて良かったわ。 よかったらこれからもご贔屓にね❤
jpnSearchText:
フフ、力になれて良かったわ。
よかったらこれからもご贔屓にね❤

engChrName: Oh, don't mention it, haha. I owe Dingo that much. That said, you can always repay me by coming back here to play, you know! Don't forget that! ❤
engSearchText:
Oh, don't mention it, haha. I owe Dingo that much.
That said, you can always repay me by coming back
here to play, you know! Don't forget that! ❤
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋さんに新米記者さん── ディンゴからたまに聞いていたけれど。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋さんに新米記者さん──
ディンゴからたまに聞いていたけれど。

engChrName: But yeah, Dingo would tell me stories about you two sometimes—the 'punk-ass spriggan' and the 'newbie reporter' he had befriended.
engSearchText:
But yeah, Dingo would tell me stories about you two
sometimes—the 'punk-ass spriggan' and the 'newbie
reporter' he had befriended.
jpnChrName: 貴方たちが受け取るなら彼も本望でしょう。 どうか見つけてあげて頂戴。
jpnSearchText:
貴方たちが受け取るなら彼も本望でしょう。
どうか見つけてあげて頂戴。

engChrName: I do hope you're able to track down his notebook. If there's anyone out there he'd want to inherit it, I have to imagine it'd be you two.
engSearchText:
I do hope you're able to track down his notebook.
If there's anyone out there he'd want to inherit it, I
have to imagine it'd be you two.
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: Thank you! We'll do our best!
engSearchText: Thank you! We'll do our best!
jpnChrName: ああ、ここまで来たからには 何としても辿り着いてみせるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ここまで来たからには
何としても辿り着いてみせるぜ。

engChrName: We're sure as hell gonna try. Be a waste to just let it go after doin' all this work for it.
engSearchText:
We're sure as hell gonna try. Be a waste to just let it
go after doin' all this work for it.
jpnChrName: （黒くて黄色いストライプのタクシー……   ディンゴの馴染みとは知らなかったが。）
jpnSearchText:
（黒くて黄色いストライプのタクシー……
ディンゴの馴染みとは知らなかったが。）

engChrName: (A taxi with a black and yellow checkered pattern... I know exactly which one that is. Had no idea Dingo was a regular in it.)
engSearchText:
(A taxi with a black and yellow checkered pattern...
I know exactly which one that is. Had no idea Dingo
was a regular in it.)
jpnChrName: （普段は駅前だが、この時間だと   ランチにでも行ってるかもしれねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（普段は駅前だが、この時間だと
ランチにでも行ってるかもしれねぇ。）

engChrName: (I see that car out by Central Station a lot. Driver's probably out for lunch right now, though.)
engSearchText:
(I see that car out by Central Station a lot.
Driver's probably out for lunch right now, though.)
jpnChrName: （別街区の屋台なんかも当たってみるか。）
jpnSearchText: （別街区の屋台なんかも当たってみるか。）

engChrName: (Let's check the food stalls first, see if we get lucky.)
engSearchText: (Let's check the food stalls first, see if we get lucky.)
jpnChrName: （黒くて黄色いストライプのタクシー……   何度か見かけたことがあったな。）
jpnSearchText:
（黒くて黄色いストライプのタクシー……
何度か見かけたことがあったな。）

engChrName: (A taxi with a black and yellow checkered pattern... Pretty sure I've seen that once or twice.)
engSearchText:
(A taxi with a black and yellow checkered pattern...
Pretty sure I've seen that once or twice.)
jpnChrName: （駅前だったか……いやたまに   他の街区でも見かけたことがある。）
jpnSearchText:
（駅前だったか……いやたまに
他の街区でも見かけたことがある。）

engChrName: (Pretty sure it's usually out by Central Station...but I wanna say I've seen it out in other places, too.)
engSearchText:
(Pretty sure it's usually out by Central Station...but I
wanna say I've seen it out in other places, too.)
jpnChrName: （とにかくそれらしい車を探してみるか。）
jpnSearchText: （とにかくそれらしい車を探してみるか。）

engChrName: (Well, only one way to find out. Time to hit the pavement.)
engSearchText:
(Well, only one way to find out. Time to hit
the pavement.)
jpnChrName: ハア、ハア……ようやく見つけた……！
jpnSearchText: ハア、ハア……ようやく見つけた……！

engChrName: *huff* *huff* Finally... I finally found you!
engSearchText: *huff* *huff* Finally... I finally found you!
jpnChrName: ハーブ売りのメイジャさんですよね？ 貴女ならあのタブレットも売ってるはずだ！
jpnSearchText:
ハーブ売りのメイジャさんですよね？
貴女ならあのタブレットも売ってるはずだ！

engChrName: Hey, you're Maja, right? The herb seller? Tell me you've got the mints I'm looking for!
engSearchText:
Hey, you're Maja, right? The herb seller? Tell me
you've got the mints I'm looking for!
jpnChrName: あら見ない顔ねえ。 それに、見た所“表”の人間なんじゃないの？
jpnSearchText:
あら見ない顔ねえ。
それに、見た所“表”の人間なんじゃないの？

engChrName: Say, I don't think I recognize you. You look like you came from the surface, the way you're dressed.
engSearchText:
Say, I don't think I recognize you. You look like you
came from the surface, the way you're dressed.
jpnChrName: 貴方の探し物はウチでは扱っていないし 手を引いた方が身の為だと思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
貴方の探し物はウチでは扱っていないし
手を引いた方が身の為だと思うけど。

engChrName: Hate to break it to you, but I don't stock that garbage. Honestly, you should really quit taking those things if you know what's good for you.
engSearchText:
Hate to break it to you, but I don't stock that garbage.
Honestly, you should really quit taking those things if
you know what's good for you.
jpnChrName: そんな事を言って、本当は売ってるんだろ！？ あれがないと僕は……僕は……！
jpnSearchText:
そんな事を言って、本当は売ってるんだろ！？
あれがないと僕は……僕は……！

engChrName: Liar! You have those mints! I know it! If I don't get more of those mints, I... I'm...!
engSearchText:
Liar! You have those mints! I know it! If I don't get
more of those mints, I... I'm...!
jpnChrName: おっ、やっぱりここにいたか。
jpnSearchText: おっ、やっぱりここにいたか。

engChrName: Bingo. Knew this is where we'd find our poindexter.
engSearchText: Bingo. Knew this is where we'd find our poindexter.
jpnChrName: 何なんだアンタ達は！ どこかで見た事がある顔だけど……
jpnSearchText:
何なんだアンタ達は！
どこかで見た事がある顔だけど……

engChrName: Huh? What do you want? I could swear I recognize you from somewhere...
engSearchText:
Huh? What do you want? I could swear I recognize
you from somewhere...
jpnChrName: 貴方がカーチスさん、ですよね？
jpnSearchText: 貴方がカーチスさん、ですよね？

engChrName: You're Curtis, right?
engSearchText: You're Curtis, right?
jpnChrName: やっぱり訳アリみたいだね？ 良ければ私も聞かせてもらおうかしら。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり訳アリみたいだね？
良ければ私も聞かせてもらおうかしら。

engChrName: Clearly something's going on with this kid here. Mind filling me in?
engSearchText:
Clearly something's going on with this kid here.
Mind filling me in?
jpnChrName: ああ、実はコイツの母親から依頼があってな……
jpnSearchText: ああ、実はコイツの母親から依頼があってな……

engChrName: Sure. His mom sent out a request for us...
engSearchText: Sure. His mom sent out a request for us...
jpnChrName: ヴァン達は、依頼を引き受けた経緯を説明しつつ……
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァン達は、依頼を引き受けた経緯を説明しつつ……

engChrName: Van and company brought the two up to speed on the events that brought them there.
engSearchText:
Van and company brought the two up to speed on the
events that brought them there.
jpnChrName: カーチスが服用していたタブレットに、 ドラッグ成分が入っている可能性を伝えた。
jpnSearchText:
カーチスが服用していたタブレットに、
ドラッグ成分が入っている可能性を伝えた。

engChrName: They clarified that the mints Curtis had been eating were reportedly laced with illicit substances.
engSearchText:
They clarified that the mints Curtis had been eating
were reportedly laced with illicit substances.
jpnChrName: そ、そんな…… 簡単に買えない事は分かってたけど……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな……
簡単に買えない事は分かってたけど……

engChrName: Wh-What?! I didn't hear anything about that! All I knew was that they were hard to come by...
engSearchText:
Wh-What?! I didn't hear anything about that! All I
knew was that they were hard to come by...
jpnChrName: タバコの味がするだけの ミントタブレットだと思ってたのに……！
jpnSearchText:
タバコの味がするだけの
ミントタブレットだと思ってたのに……！

engChrName: I thought they were ordinary mints that just happened to taste like tobacco!
engSearchText:
I thought they were ordinary mints that just
happened to taste like tobacco!
jpnChrName: 私の方でも、例のタブレットは 《Ａ》の子会社が製造したって聞いてるわ。
jpnSearchText:
私の方でも、例のタブレットは
《Ａ》の子会社が製造したって聞いてるわ。

engChrName: Oh, there's more to them than that... Much more.
engSearchText: Oh, there's more to them than that... Much more.
jpnChrName: サルバッドの件で回収される前に、 一部が“裏”の市場に流れてしまったみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドの件で回収される前に、
一部が“裏”の市場に流れてしまったみたいね。

engChrName: I heard they were manufactured by A—and that they leaked out onto the streets before the cops did their post-Tharbad roundup.
engSearchText:
I heard they were manufactured by A—and that they
leaked out onto the streets before the cops did their
post-Tharbad roundup.
jpnChrName: 製造ラインはＣＩＤに潰されてるから、 市場からブツが消えるのも時間の問題なんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
製造ラインはＣＩＤに潰されてるから、
市場からブツが消えるのも時間の問題なんだけど。

engChrName: The CID stamped out their pipelines, so they're not being made anymore—it's only a matter of time before they're off the streets completely.
engSearchText:
The CID stamped out their pipelines, so they're not
being made anymore—it's only a matter of time
before they're off the streets completely.
jpnChrName: それなら少しは安心できそうですね……
jpnSearchText: それなら少しは安心できそうですね……

engChrName: Well, that's a relief.
engSearchText: Well, that's a relief.
jpnChrName: ま、親に反抗してえだけなら、 薬物じゃなくて別のモンにしておくこった。
jpnSearchText:
ま、親に反抗してえだけなら、
薬物じゃなくて別のモンにしておくこった。

engChrName: I get you kids like to rebel against your parents, but hard drugs aren't exactly the got'cha you think they are.
engSearchText:
I get you kids like to rebel against your parents, but
hard drugs aren't exactly the got'cha you think
they are.
jpnChrName: いいや…… 僕にはアレが無いと駄目なんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
いいや……
僕にはアレが無いと駄目なんだよ！

engChrName: It's not about that! I'm not trying to rebel— I NEED those mints! Why can't you simpletons understand?!
engSearchText:
It's not about that! I'm not trying to rebel—
I NEED those mints! Why can't you
simpletons understand?!
jpnChrName: でも、そのタブレットを 食べ続けるのは身体に悪いんですよ！？
jpnSearchText:
でも、そのタブレットを
食べ続けるのは身体に悪いんですよ！？

engChrName: It's not worth damaging your body! You really need to stop!
engSearchText:
It's not worth damaging your body! You really need
to stop!
jpnChrName: 現に軽い副作用も現れてる訳だしな。
jpnSearchText: 現に軽い副作用も現れてる訳だしな。

engChrName: You're already showin' side effects, bud. That outburst there? Probably the mints makin' you irritable and prone to withdrawal.
engSearchText:
You're already showin' side effects, bud.
That outburst there? Probably the mints makin' you
irritable and prone to withdrawal.
jpnChrName: その様子だと、タブレットの影響で 感情のコントロールが出来なくなってきてるんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
その様子だと、タブレットの影響で
感情のコントロールが出来なくなってきてるんだろ。

engChrName: Like it or not, those things are havin' an impact on you, and they're only gonna get worse the longer you're on 'em.
engSearchText:
Like it or not, those things are havin' an impact on
you, and they're only gonna get worse the longer
you're on 'em.
jpnChrName: 危険な物だって事は分かってる……！ だけど、あれが無いと僕は勉強ができないんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
危険な物だって事は分かってる……！
だけど、あれが無いと僕は勉強ができないんだよ！

engChrName: I KNOW that, for crying out loud! I KNOW they're dangerous! But I have to take them... If I don't have them, I can't study hard enough!
engSearchText:
I KNOW that, for crying out loud! I KNOW
they're dangerous! But I have to take them... If I don't
have them, I can't study hard enough!
jpnChrName: このままじゃ受験に落ちる…… 僕も他の連中と同じ無能だって事になる！
jpnSearchText:
このままじゃ受験に落ちる……
僕も他の連中と同じ無能だって事になる！

engChrName: And if I can't study hard enough, I'll fail my entrance exam—and then I'll just be another stupid kid like all the rest...!
engSearchText:
And if I can't study hard enough, I'll fail my entrance
exam—and then I'll just be another stupid kid like all
the rest...!
jpnChrName: そんな事になったら、母さんも父さんもなんて言うか……
jpnSearchText: そんな事になったら、母さんも父さんもなんて言うか……

engChrName: I don't even want to imagine how my parents would react if that happens...
engSearchText:
I don't even want to imagine how my parents would
react if that happens...
jpnChrName: はは……失望して家を追い出されるかもしれないな。
jpnSearchText: はは……失望して家を追い出されるかもしれないな。

engChrName: They'll yell and scream and...maybe kick me out of the house... Haha. My life's over, isn't it?
engSearchText:
They'll yell and scream and...maybe kick me out of
the house... Haha. My life's over, isn't it?
jpnChrName: カーチスさん……
jpnSearchText: カーチスさん……

engChrName: This poor kid... I feel awful for him.
engSearchText: This poor kid... I feel awful for him.
jpnChrName: あの様子だと……そう思う気持ちも分かるけど。
jpnSearchText: あの様子だと……そう思う気持ちも分かるけど。

engChrName: That's...uncomfortably close to home. I can understand where he's coming from...
engSearchText:
That's...uncomfortably close to home. I can
understand where he's coming from...
jpnChrName: ……この依頼を完遂するには 根本的な原因を対処する必要がありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
……この依頼を完遂するには
根本的な原因を対処する必要がありそうですね。

engChrName: This mint addiction seems to be a symptom of the real problem, then. We'll need to address the root cause to solve this case.
engSearchText:
This mint addiction seems to be a symptom of the
real problem, then. We'll need to address the root
cause to solve this case.
jpnChrName: この子をここまで追いつめて…… やっぱり許しちゃ置けないわ。
jpnSearchText:
この子をここまで追いつめて……
やっぱり許しちゃ置けないわ。

engChrName: This poor kid's been driven into a corner... We have to hold his parents accountable! No middle-schooler should be stressing like this!
engSearchText:
This poor kid's been driven into a corner... We have
to hold his parents accountable! No middle-schooler
should be stressing like this!
jpnChrName: 安心するがいい、少年よ。
jpnSearchText: 安心するがいい、少年よ。

engChrName: Fear not, young man.
engSearchText: Fear not, young man.
jpnChrName: 我々が依頼を引き受けた以上、 そのような事態にはさせまい。
jpnSearchText:
我々が依頼を引き受けた以上、
そのような事態にはさせまい。

engChrName: So long as we're on this case, we won't let your parents unjustly punish you. That I promise.
engSearchText:
So long as we're on this case, we won't let your
parents unjustly punish you. That I promise.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、俺はそこまで面倒を見るとは 言ってないんですがね……
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、俺はそこまで面倒を見るとは
言ってないんですがね……

engChrName: *sigh* Okay, I didn't sign up to be this family's counselor...
engSearchText:
*sigh* Okay, I didn't sign up to be this
family's counselor...
jpnChrName: いずれにせよ、依頼主と父親には 事情を説明しないと収拾がつかなそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
いずれにせよ、依頼主と父親には
事情を説明しないと収拾がつかなそうだ。

engChrName: ...but it's pretty clear to me that the parents share some of the blame here. We're gonna need to give 'em a talkin' to.
engSearchText:
...but it's pretty clear to me that the parents share
some of the blame here. We're gonna need to give
'em a talkin' to.
jpnChrName: 居心地が悪いかもしれねえが、 お前さんにも同席してもらうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
居心地が悪いかもしれねえが、
お前さんにも同席してもらうぞ。

engChrName: I know you're not gonna like this, but I need you to be part of that discussion with us. Okay?
engSearchText:
I know you're not gonna like this, but I need you to
be part of that discussion with us. Okay?

jpnChrName: ちなみに、この子にタブレットを 売りつけたのはどこの誰なのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、この子にタブレットを
売りつけたのはどこの誰なのかしら？

engChrName: If you don't mind me asking, do you know who sold those mints to him in the first place?
engSearchText:
If you don't mind me asking, do you know who sold
those mints to him in the first place?
jpnChrName: ああ……金髪でひげを生やしたヤツだったな。 街中を転々と商売してるみてえだったが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……金髪でひげを生やしたヤツだったな。
街中を転々と商売してるみてえだったが。

engChrName: We do, actually: blonde guy with a goatee. Seemed like he had a habit of slingin' his stuff around town.
engSearchText:
We do, actually: blonde guy with a goatee.
Seemed like he had a habit of slingin' his stuff
around town.
jpnChrName: ああ、あの新参者ね……そっちは私が お仕置きしておくから任せておいて。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あの新参者ね……そっちは私が
お仕置きしておくから任せておいて。

engChrName: Oh, HIM. Should've figured... Don't you guys worry. He hasn't been on the streets for long—I'll be sure to remind him of the rules we have here.
engSearchText:
Oh, HIM. Should've figured... Don't you guys worry.
He hasn't been on the streets for long—I'll be sure to
remind him of the rules we have here.
jpnChrName: まだ分別も付かないような子供に売りつけるなんて、 最低限の礼儀ってものを教えてあげないと。
jpnSearchText:
まだ分別も付かないような子供に売りつけるなんて、
最低限の礼儀ってものを教えてあげないと。

engChrName: Though frankly, if he's going around selling drugs to children, he won't be on the streets for long.
engSearchText:
Though frankly, if he's going around selling drugs to
children, he won't be on the streets for long.
jpnChrName: そいつは頼もしいな。 それじゃ後は任せるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そいつは頼もしいな。
それじゃ後は任せるぜ。

engChrName: Thanks. We'd really appreciate it—saves us the ballache of havin' to go find him again.
engSearchText:
Thanks. We'd really appreciate it—saves us the
ballache of havin' to go find him again.
jpnChrName: （とはいえ、一応ルネのやつにも   一報を入れといた方がいいかもしれねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（とはいえ、一応ルネのやつにも
一報を入れといた方がいいかもしれねえな。）

engChrName: (I probably oughta report back to René before doin' anything else, though.)
engSearchText:
(I probably oughta report back to René before doin'
anything else, though.)
jpnChrName: さてと、俺達はベルモッティの所に寄りつつ 報告に向かうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、俺達はベルモッティの所に寄りつつ
報告に向かうとするか。

engChrName: Now that we're done here, let's swing back around to Bermotti's place and fill him in on the details.
engSearchText:
Now that we're done here, let's swing back around to
Bermotti's place and fill him in on the details.
jpnChrName: そうですね、ベルモッティさんなら 症状を診てもらう事が出来るかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、ベルモッティさんなら
症状を診てもらう事が出来るかもしれません。

engChrName: Good idea. Maybe he can take a look at Curtis and diagnose his condition, too.
engSearchText:
Good idea. Maybe he can take a look at Curtis and
diagnose his condition, too.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァン達はベルモッティの下へ行き タブレットの件の説明をした。
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァン達はベルモッティの下へ行き
タブレットの件の説明をした。

engChrName: Van and company quickly got to work, paying Bermotti a visit and filling him in on their minty mystery.
engSearchText:
Van and company quickly got to work, paying
Bermotti a visit and filling him in on their
minty mystery.
jpnChrName: 元々、導力シーシャの成分を分析していた事もあって 副作用を緩和させる薬をすぐに処方してくれたのだった。
jpnSearchText:
元々、導力シーシャの成分を分析していた事もあって
副作用を緩和させる薬をすぐに処方してくれたのだった。

engChrName: Having previously analyzed the ingredients found in the orbal hookahs, Bermotti was able to prescribe sorely-needed medicine for the boy.
engSearchText:
Having previously analyzed the ingredients found in
the orbal hookahs, Bermotti was able to prescribe
sorely-needed medicine for the boy.
jpnChrName: カーチスの状態が落ち着いた所で、 ヴァンは依頼主とカーチスの父に連絡をとり……
jpnSearchText:
カーチスの状態が落ち着いた所で、
ヴァンは依頼主とカーチスの父に連絡をとり……

engChrName: And once Curtis' symptoms subsided, Van contacted his parents.
engSearchText:
And once Curtis' symptoms subsided, Van contacted
his parents.
jpnChrName: カーチスの家にて、 依頼の報告を行う運びとなったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
カーチスの家にて、
依頼の報告を行う運びとなったのだった。

engChrName: They agreed to reconvene at the family's home so that the group could report their findings.
engSearchText:
They agreed to reconvene at the family's home so that
the group could report their findings.
jpnChrName: （そういや、走り屋の連中から   レースの面子を集めるよう頼まれてたな。）
jpnSearchText:
（そういや、走り屋の連中から
レースの面子を集めるよう頼まれてたな。）

engChrName: (Oh, right. Those street racers asked me to scout some people.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, right. Those street racers asked me to scout
some people.)
jpnChrName: （となれば、やっぱり彼女には   声をかけておくべきか。）
jpnSearchText:
（となれば、やっぱり彼女には
声をかけておくべきか。）

engChrName: (If there's anybody I oughta talk to, she's at the top of the list.)
engSearchText:
(If there's anybody I oughta talk to, she's at the top of
the list.)
jpnChrName: ──エルメス、ちょっといいか？ 実は走り屋の連中からの依頼でな。
jpnSearchText:
──エルメス、ちょっといいか？
実は走り屋の連中からの依頼でな。

engChrName: Hey, Hermès. Got a sec? I'm doin' a job for some street racers right now.
engSearchText:
Hey, Hermès. Got a sec? I'm doin' a job for some
street racers right now.
jpnChrName: レースの参加者を探してるんだが……
jpnSearchText: レースの参加者を探してるんだが……

engChrName: They're lookin' for some extra racers to fill out their lineup for today.
engSearchText:
They're lookin' for some extra racers to fill out their
lineup for today.
jpnChrName: あら、詳しく聞かせてもらおうかしら。
jpnSearchText: あら、詳しく聞かせてもらおうかしら。

engChrName: Oh, are they now? Well, color me intrigued. Tell me more.
engSearchText:
Oh, are they now? Well, color me intrigued.
Tell me more.
jpnChrName: なるほど、あの時のリベンジマッチを 盛大にやろうってわけね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、あの時のリベンジマッチを
盛大にやろうってわけね。

engChrName: ...Right. So they want to go all out for their big rematch, is the gist.
engSearchText:
...Right. So they want to go all out for their big
rematch, is the gist.
jpnChrName: なるほどね、面白そうじゃない。 そういうの好きよ。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどね、面白そうじゃない。
そういうの好きよ。

engChrName: Well, that seems fun! These guys sound like my kind of people.
engSearchText:
Well, that seems fun! These guys sound like my kind
of people.
jpnChrName: でも今日の仕事が残ってるから…… タイミングが合えば参加させてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
でも今日の仕事が残ってるから……
タイミングが合えば参加させてもらうわ。

engChrName: Unfortunately, I've still got some work to take care of today. If the timing works out, though, I'd be happy to join in.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, I've still got some work to take care
of today. If the timing works out, though, I'd be
happy to join in.
jpnChrName: おっ、ソイツは助かるぜ。 それじゃ手が空いたら現地に来てくれ。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、ソイツは助かるぜ。
それじゃ手が空いたら現地に来てくれ。

engChrName: Nice. That'd be really great! Yeah, once you're free, just head right on over to the meet. Sound good?
engSearchText:
Nice. That'd be really great! Yeah, once you're free,
just head right on over to the meet. Sound good?
jpnChrName: ええ、了解よ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、了解よ。

engChrName: Better than good! Thanks for the invite.
engSearchText: Better than good! Thanks for the invite.
jpnChrName: さてと、これで目ぼしい奴全員に 声をかけ終わったな。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、これで目ぼしい奴全員に
声をかけ終わったな。

engChrName: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
engSearchText: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
jpnChrName: 次は走り屋のあいつらに 報告をしに行くとするか。
jpnSearchText:
次は走り屋のあいつらに
報告をしに行くとするか。

engChrName: Guess all that's left is to loop back with the racers.
engSearchText: Guess all that's left is to loop back with the racers.
jpnChrName: さてと、これで目ぼしい奴全員に 声をかけ終わったな。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、これで目ぼしい奴全員に
声をかけ終わったな。

engChrName: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
engSearchText: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
jpnChrName: 次は走り屋のあいつらに 報告をしに行くとするか。
jpnSearchText:
次は走り屋のあいつらに
報告をしに行くとするか。

engChrName: Guess all that's left is to loop back with the racers.
engSearchText: Guess all that's left is to loop back with the racers.
jpnChrName: （そういや、走り屋の連中から   レースの面子を集めるよう頼まれてたな。）
jpnSearchText:
（そういや、走り屋の連中から
レースの面子を集めるよう頼まれてたな。）

engChrName: (Oh, right. Those street racers asked me to scout some people.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, right. Those street racers asked me to scout
some people.)
jpnChrName: （ヴァルターの野郎は……面倒な事に   なりそうだから置いといて。）
jpnSearchText:
（ヴァルターの野郎は……面倒な事に
なりそうだから置いといて。）

engChrName: (I could hit up Walter, but...yeah, no. That's just askin' for trouble.)
engSearchText:
(I could hit up Walter, but...yeah, no. That's just
askin' for trouble.)
jpnChrName: （ここは師父（せんせい）を誘ってみるとするか。）
jpnSearchText: （ここは師父（せんせい）を誘ってみるとするか。）

engChrName: (Maybe Master's willing to play ball.)
engSearchText: (Maybe Master's willing to play ball.)
jpnChrName: 師父、少し話があるので 少しこちらに来てもらってもいいですか？
jpnSearchText:
師父、少し話があるので
少しこちらに来てもらってもいいですか？

engChrName: Hey, Master, you got a second? There's somethin' I wanted to ask you.
engSearchText:
Hey, Master, you got a second? There's somethin' I
wanted to ask you.
jpnChrName: ああ、別に構わんぞ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、別に構わんぞ。

engChrName: No problem. What is it, Van?
engSearchText: No problem. What is it, Van?
jpnChrName: ……という訳で、 レースの参加者を探してるんですが。
jpnSearchText:
……という訳で、
レースの参加者を探してるんですが。

engChrName: ...Anyway, they're looking for some racers to fill out their lineup for today.
engSearchText:
...Anyway, they're looking for some racers to fill out
their lineup for today.
jpnChrName: 師父（せんせい）も参加してみちゃどうですか？ きっと気持ちいいと思いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
師父（せんせい）も参加してみちゃどうですか？
きっと気持ちいいと思いますよ。

engChrName: Sound like fun to you? I thought it might be up your alley.
engSearchText:
Sound like fun to you? I thought it might be up
your alley.
jpnChrName: ふむ……それは確かに魅力的なお誘いだな。
jpnSearchText: ふむ……それは確かに魅力的なお誘いだな。

engChrName: Hmm... That certainly is a tempting offer.
engSearchText: Hmm... That certainly is a tempting offer.
jpnChrName: しかし、若者同士の勝負だというのに 老骨がしゃしゃり出るのも忍びない。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、若者同士の勝負だというのに
老骨がしゃしゃり出るのも忍びない。

engChrName: That said, I'm not sure they would appreciate some fogey my age crashing their party.
engSearchText:
That said, I'm not sure they would appreciate some
fogey my age crashing their party.
jpnChrName: ゆえに、今回は気持ちだけ受け取っておくとしよう。
jpnSearchText: ゆえに、今回は気持ちだけ受け取っておくとしよう。

engChrName: I think I'll pass, but I appreciate that you thought of me.
engSearchText:
I think I'll pass, but I appreciate that you thought
of me.
jpnChrName: そう遠慮なさらず……と言いたい所ですが。 分かりましたよ、他を当たります。
jpnSearchText:
そう遠慮なさらず……と言いたい所ですが。
分かりましたよ、他を当たります。

engChrName: I don't think that'd be a deal breaker for them, but fair enough. I'll see if I can find someone else.
engSearchText:
I don't think that'd be a deal breaker for them, but
fair enough. I'll see if I can find someone else.
jpnChrName: それならアーロンを誘ってみてはどうだ。
jpnSearchText: それならアーロンを誘ってみてはどうだ。

engChrName: Have you considered asking Aaron, perhaps?
engSearchText: Have you considered asking Aaron, perhaps?
jpnChrName: 実は記念祭の間に私のバイクを 彼に貸す約束をしていてな。
jpnSearchText:
実は記念祭の間に私のバイクを
彼に貸す約束をしていてな。

engChrName: As it happens, I lent him my orbal bike for the duration of the festival.
engSearchText:
As it happens, I lent him my orbal bike for the
duration of the festival.
jpnChrName: おっと、そうでしたか。
jpnSearchText: おっと、そうでしたか。

engChrName: Oh, good thinking! I had no idea!
engSearchText: Oh, good thinking! I had no idea!
jpnChrName: ……とはいえ、レースとなれば 傷を付けちまうかもしれませんよ？
jpnSearchText:
……とはいえ、レースとなれば
傷を付けちまうかもしれませんよ？

engChrName: ...You sure you want him racing on it, though? It could get scuffed up.
engSearchText:
...You sure you want him racing on it, though?
It could get scuffed up.
jpnChrName: 構わんさ、それはそれで 修理する楽しみが増えるというだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
構わんさ、それはそれで
修理する楽しみが増えるというだけだ。

engChrName: A little dent or two is hardly a bother—I enjoy fixing those little gremlins.
engSearchText:
A little dent or two is hardly a bother—I enjoy fixing
those little gremlins.
jpnChrName: 分かりましたよ、 それじゃヤツに連絡を入れてみましょう。
jpnSearchText:
分かりましたよ、
それじゃヤツに連絡を入れてみましょう。

engChrName: All right. Thanks, Master. I'll hit him up and see what he has to say.
engSearchText:
All right. Thanks, Master. I'll hit him up and see
what he has to say.
jpnChrName: 連絡が付きましたよ。 もちろん参加するとの事でした。
jpnSearchText:
連絡が付きましたよ。
もちろん参加するとの事でした。

engChrName: Well, I managed to get a hold of him. He's on board.
engSearchText: Well, I managed to get a hold of him. He's on board.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それは良かった。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、それは良かった。

engChrName: Good to hear! I'm glad it all worked out.
engSearchText: Good to hear! I'm glad it all worked out.
jpnChrName: 法を破っている以上大きな声では言えんが おぬしも存分に楽しんで来るといい。
jpnSearchText:
法を破っている以上大きな声では言えんが
おぬしも存分に楽しんで来るといい。

engChrName: Of course, I can't say this too loudly, given the law-breaking involved, but I hope you all have a fun time at the race.
engSearchText:
Of course, I can't say this too loudly, given the
law-breaking involved, but I hope you all have a fun
time at the race.
jpnChrName: ええ、まあアイツが暴走しないよう 見張らせてもらいますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、まあアイツが暴走しないよう
見張らせてもらいますよ。

engChrName: We will. I'll keep an eye on him so he doesn't fly off the handle...bars.
engSearchText:
We will. I'll keep an eye on him so he doesn't fly off
the handle...bars.
jpnChrName: へぇ？　面白そうな話をしてるじゃねえか。 それなら俺も混ぜてくれや。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ？　面白そうな話をしてるじゃねえか。
それなら俺も混ぜてくれや。

engChrName: Yo. Mind if I join the party? Sounds like you guys are planning something big, and I want in.
engSearchText:
Yo. Mind if I join the party? Sounds like you guys are
planning something big, and I want in.
jpnChrName: げっ……出たな…… 取り込み中じゃなかったのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
げっ……出たな……
取り込み中じゃなかったのかよ。

engChrName: Oh, great. My favorite... Weren't you supposed to be busy right now?
engSearchText:
Oh, great. My favorite... Weren't you supposed to be
busy right now?
jpnChrName: 視界の隅でコソコソと話されちゃ 気になるってモンだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
視界の隅でコソコソと話されちゃ
気になるってモンだろうが。

engChrName: Who cares if I was? I see you bunch shootin' the shit, I get curious. Nothing more to it.
engSearchText:
Who cares if I was? I see you bunch shootin' the shit,
I get curious. Nothing more to it.
jpnChrName: で？　レースをやるんだったか？ バイクでも参加出来るんだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
で？　レースをやるんだったか？
バイクでも参加出来るんだろうな？

engChrName: You said you're putting on a race or something? Bikes're allowed, I take it?
engSearchText:
You said you're putting on a race or something?
Bikes're allowed, I take it?
jpnChrName: こうなったら腹をくくるしかねえか…… ああ、バイク乗りもいるから参加出来るぜ。
jpnSearchText:
こうなったら腹をくくるしかねえか……
ああ、バイク乗りもいるから参加出来るぜ。

engChrName: *sigh* Guess the cat's outta the bag. Yes. We've got motorcyclists racing, too.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Guess the cat's outta the bag. Yes. We've got
motorcyclists racing, too.
jpnChrName: とはいえ走り屋のガキどももいるんだ。 非常識な事はしないでくれよ？
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ走り屋のガキどももいるんだ。
非常識な事はしないでくれよ？

engChrName: Just don't go crazy here, all right? These guys are mostly amateurs.
engSearchText:
Just don't go crazy here, all right? These guys are
mostly amateurs.
jpnChrName: ハッ、んなダリイ事言ってちゃ 勝負にならねえだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、んなダリイ事言ってちゃ
勝負にならねえだろうが。

engChrName: Bull. The hell kinda race is it if you can't go balls out?
engSearchText: Bull. The hell kinda race is it if you can't go balls out?
jpnChrName: 後でそっちに顔を出すから、 覚悟しとくよう伝えておけ。
jpnSearchText:
後でそっちに顔を出すから、
覚悟しとくよう伝えておけ。

engChrName: Well, I'm racin', whether you like it or not. Tell 'em to get ready for an ass whoopin'.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm racin', whether you like it or not. Tell 'em
to get ready for an ass whoopin'.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……アイツだけは 呼びたくなかったんですがね。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……アイツだけは
呼びたくなかったんですがね。

engChrName: ...Damn it. This is exactly why I was tryna AVOID roping him in.
engSearchText:
...Damn it. This is exactly why I was tryna AVOID
roping him in.
jpnChrName: はは、これは波乱の対決になりそうだな。
jpnSearchText: はは、これは波乱の対決になりそうだな。

engChrName: It sounds like we have quite the climactic showdown at hand.
engSearchText:
It sounds like we have quite the climactic showdown
at hand.
jpnChrName: さてと、これで目ぼしい奴全員に 声をかけ終わったな。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、これで目ぼしい奴全員に
声をかけ終わったな。

engChrName: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
engSearchText: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
jpnChrName: 次は走り屋のあいつらに 報告をしに行くとするか。
jpnSearchText:
次は走り屋のあいつらに
報告をしに行くとするか。

engChrName: Guess all that's left is to loop back with the racers.
engSearchText: Guess all that's left is to loop back with the racers.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、こんな所に連れてくるとはな。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、こんな所に連れてくるとはな。

engChrName: *sigh* I can't believe I let you drag me here.
engSearchText: *sigh* I can't believe I let you drag me here.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ちょうど今は空いてるみてえだし おあつらえ向きってところだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ちょうど今は空いてるみてえだし
おあつらえ向きってところだな。

engChrName: Oh, quit your bellyaching, grandpa. I know you didn't have anything better to do with your time. Why not have a go, just the two of us?
engSearchText:
Oh, quit your bellyaching, grandpa. I know you didn't
have anything better to do with your time. Why not
have a go, just the two of us?
jpnChrName: 言っとくがケンカなら付き合う気はねえぞ？ 稽古にしても他の日にしてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
言っとくがケンカなら付き合う気はねえぞ？
稽古にしても他の日にしてくれ。

engChrName: Look, I'm not in the mood for a fight, got it? If you wanna train together, I'm game, but it'll have to wait till another day.
engSearchText:
Look, I'm not in the mood for a fight, got it? If you
wanna train together, I'm game, but it'll have to wait
till another day.
jpnChrName: そんなんじゃねぇよ。
jpnSearchText: そんなんじゃねぇよ。

engChrName: You don't get it, man.
engSearchText: You don't get it, man.
jpnChrName: マフィアどものことがようやく片付いたんだ、 アンタにとってもやっと肩の荷が下りたとこだろ。
jpnSearchText:
マフィアどものことがようやく片付いたんだ、
アンタにとってもやっと肩の荷が下りたとこだろ。

engChrName: Now that the mafia's taken care of, I bet you feel like you're finally done with everything.
engSearchText:
Now that the mafia's taken care of, I bet you feel like
you're finally done with everything.
jpnChrName: まあ、そうだな。
jpnSearchText: まあ、そうだな。

engChrName: ...I mean, sure.
engSearchText: ...I mean, sure.
jpnChrName: だがオレはそうはいかねえ。
jpnSearchText: だがオレはそうはいかねえ。

engChrName: Well, that's not how it feels for me.
engSearchText: Well, that's not how it feels for me.
jpnChrName: ……“やり残し”ってやつか？
jpnSearchText: ……“やり残し”ってやつか？

engChrName: 'Cause of your 'unfinished business' and all?
engSearchText: 'Cause of your 'unfinished business' and all?
jpnChrName: ああ──なんせオレは、 まだ一度もてめぇに勝ててねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──なんせオレは、
まだ一度もてめぇに勝ててねえからな。

engChrName: Damn straight. And you know what that business is? I haven't beaten you one single time in a fight.
engSearchText:
Damn straight. And you know what that business is?
I haven't beaten you one single time in a fight.
jpnChrName: ……そんなに重要なことか？
jpnSearchText: ……そんなに重要なことか？

engChrName: And that matters WHY?
engSearchText: And that matters WHY?
jpnChrName: 俺もお前も、別に武の道を極めるために 全てを捧げるってタイプじゃねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
俺もお前も、別に武の道を極めるために
全てを捧げるってタイプじゃねえだろ。

engChrName: You really care that much whether or not you can beat some random spriggan in a fight?
engSearchText:
You really care that much whether or not you can
beat some random spriggan in a fight?
jpnChrName: それでもだ。
jpnSearchText: それでもだ。

engChrName: Hell yeah, I still care.
engSearchText: Hell yeah, I still care.
jpnChrName: てめぇに勝たなきゃ、オレのこの２ヶ月余りを 終わったことにはできねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
てめぇに勝たなきゃ、オレのこの２ヶ月余りを
終わったことにはできねぇ。

engChrName: Been two months and I still don't have a point on the damn board!
engSearchText:
Been two months and I still don't have a point on the
damn board!
jpnChrName: だから付き合えよ、ヴァン・アークライド。 これは男のケジメってヤツだ。
jpnSearchText:
だから付き合えよ、ヴァン・アークライド。
これは男のケジメってヤツだ。

engChrName: We've got a score to settle as men, you and me—and I'm not taking no for an answer.
engSearchText:
We've got a score to settle as men, you and me—and
I'm not taking no for an answer.
jpnChrName: ………そうかよ。
jpnSearchText: ………そうかよ。

engChrName: ...Damn brat. All right, fine.
engSearchText: ...Damn brat. All right, fine.
jpnChrName: 分かった、心残りを残したままじゃ 気持ち悪いよな、お互い。
jpnSearchText:
分かった、心残りを残したままじゃ
気持ち悪いよな、お互い。

engChrName: You wanna fight? You got one. I know how it feels when you're left wantin' for closure.
engSearchText:
You wanna fight? You got one. I know how it feels
when you're left wantin' for closure.
jpnChrName: 一回だけ付き合ってやるから、 全てをぶつけて来い、アーロン・ウェイ！
jpnSearchText:
一回だけ付き合ってやるから、
全てをぶつけて来い、アーロン・ウェイ！

engChrName: Now, I'm only givin' you one chance. Put up or shut up, kid—gimme everything you got!
engSearchText:
Now, I'm only givin' you one chance. Put up or shut
up, kid—gimme everything you got!
jpnChrName: そう来なくっちゃなぁ！！
jpnSearchText: そう来なくっちゃなぁ！！

engChrName: Damn straight, I will! Let's do this!
engSearchText: Damn straight, I will! Let's do this!
jpnChrName: はぁ……はぁ……クソ………！
jpnSearchText: はぁ……はぁ……クソ………！

engChrName: *huff* *huff* Shit...!
engSearchText: *huff* *huff* Shit...!
jpnChrName: あとちょっとで…… ……届きそうだったのによ………
jpnSearchText:
あとちょっとで……
……届きそうだったのによ………

engChrName: I was so close... A little more and I...I would've had it!
engSearchText: I was so close... A little more and I...I would've had it!
jpnChrName: ハッ…… そのちょっとが、埋められねぇ差ってもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
そのちょっとが、埋められねぇ差ってもんだ。

engChrName: Technique always beats talent, kid. You can train as much as you want, but I'll still be top dog.
engSearchText:
Technique always beats talent, kid. You can train as
much as you want, but I'll still be top dog.
jpnChrName: ほざけ…… そっちも、ギリギリじゃねぇか……
jpnSearchText:
ほざけ……
そっちも、ギリギリじゃねぇか……

engChrName: You shut your hole. You barely won that and you know it.
engSearchText:
You shut your hole. You barely won that and you
know it.
jpnChrName: まあいい、ジジイなんざ…… あっという間に、超えて見せるぜ……
jpnSearchText:
まあいい、ジジイなんざ……
あっという間に、超えて見せるぜ……

engChrName: Take it in while you can, you antique. Soon enough, it'll be YOU on the floor.
engSearchText:
Take it in while you can, you antique. Soon enough,
it'll be YOU on the floor.
jpnChrName: だから俺はまだ２４だっての……
jpnSearchText: だから俺はまだ２４だっての……

engChrName: Bud, for the love of Aidios, four years really ain't that much. You just gonna harp on that forever?
engSearchText:
Bud, for the love of Aidios, four years really ain't
that much. You just gonna harp on that forever?
jpnChrName: クク…… こんな馬鹿らしい会話、何回目だっけか……？
jpnSearchText:
クク……
こんな馬鹿らしい会話、何回目だっけか……？

engChrName: Of course I am. How many times have I gone on about that already...?
engSearchText:
Of course I am. How many times have I gone on
about that already...?
jpnChrName: さあな、数えてねえよ……
jpnSearchText: さあな、数えてねえよ……

engChrName: Couldn't tell you. Stopped countin' a long time ago.
engSearchText: Couldn't tell you. Stopped countin' a long time ago.
jpnChrName: クク……
jpnSearchText: クク……

engChrName: Heh heh...
engSearchText: Heh heh...
jpnChrName: ハハハハハ……
jpnSearchText: ハハハハハ……

engChrName: Hah... Hahaha!
engSearchText: Hah... Hahaha!
jpnChrName: ははははは……！
jpnSearchText: <S5>               ははははは……！

engChrName: Ahahahaha!
engSearchText: Ahahahaha!
jpnChrName: カーッ、やっぱ 汗かいた後は格別だねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
カーッ、やっぱ
汗かいた後は格別だねぇ。

engChrName: Aaah! Nothing like a cold one after breaking a good sweat!
engSearchText:
Aaah! Nothing like a cold one after breaking a
good sweat!
jpnChrName: やれやれ、ついこの間まで未成年だったくせに いい飲みっぷりしてんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、ついこの間まで未成年だったくせに
いい飲みっぷりしてんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: For someone who just became legal not that long ago, you sure don't drink like it.
engSearchText:
For someone who just became legal not that long ago,
you sure don't drink like it.
jpnChrName: ま、気が済んだようで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText: ま、気が済んだようで何よりだ。

engChrName: But hey, if you're satisfied after that, I'm happy.
engSearchText: But hey, if you're satisfied after that, I'm happy.
jpnChrName: あー、済んじゃいねぇさ。 一応の納得はしたがな。
jpnSearchText:
あー、済んじゃいねぇさ。
一応の納得はしたがな。

engChrName: Oh, I never said I was satisfied—I've just made peace with it and moved on. For now.
engSearchText:
Oh, I never said I was satisfied—I've just made peace
with it and moved on. For now.
jpnChrName: てめぇをぶっ倒す日までは お預けってこった。
jpnSearchText:
てめぇをぶっ倒す日までは
お預けってこった。

engChrName: One of these days, I'm gonna beat your ass REAL good, you hear?
engSearchText:
One of these days, I'm gonna beat your ass REAL
good, you hear?
jpnChrName: めんどくせえ奴だな…… いつまで経っても終わんねえじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
めんどくせえ奴だな……
いつまで経っても終わんねえじゃねぇか。

engChrName: You never make things easy for me, do you, punk? Am I just gonna be fendin' you off for the rest of my days?
engSearchText:
You never make things easy for me, do you, punk?
Am I just gonna be fendin' you off for the rest of
my days?
jpnChrName: だからすぐにでも 超えてやるっつってんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
だからすぐにでも
超えてやるっつってんだろ？

engChrName: Nah, maybe a few months at most. All I gotta do is dethrone you—and it WILL happen, mark my words. Sooner than you think.
engSearchText:
Nah, maybe a few months at most. All I gotta do is
dethrone you—and it WILL happen, mark
my words. Sooner than you think.
jpnChrName: 超えさせるかっつうの、ったく……
jpnSearchText: 超えさせるかっつうの、ったく……

engChrName: Heh, good luck with that. As if I'm just gonna sit here and take it.
engSearchText:
Heh, good luck with that. As if I'm just gonna sit
here and take it.
jpnChrName: てめぇに勝つのは もう少し先の話にしておいてやる。
jpnSearchText:
てめぇに勝つのは
もう少し先の話にしておいてやる。

engChrName: Like I said, all things in good time. You savor the view from the top while you still can.
engSearchText:
Like I said, all things in good time. You savor the
view from the top while you still can.
jpnChrName: それも含めて──オレたちとの貸し借りを 楽に精算できると思わねぇこったな。
jpnSearchText:
それも含めて──オレたちとの貸し借りを
楽に精算できると思わねぇこったな。

engChrName: End of the day, I don't even know if there's a way for us to settle the score for good. We've done too much for each other.
engSearchText:
End of the day, I don't even know if there's a way for
us to settle the score for good. We've done too much
for each other.
jpnChrName: なにを生き急いでんのかは知らねえが、 ジジイらしくもう少しゆっくりしとけや。
jpnSearchText:
なにを生き急いでんのかは知らねえが、
ジジイらしくもう少しゆっくりしとけや。

engChrName: And you need to learn to slow down, too, chief. You're always living so hard and fast, right on the edge. Can't be good for your heart at your age.
engSearchText:
And you need to learn to slow down, too, chief.
You're always living so hard and fast, right on
the edge. Can't be good for your heart at your age.
jpnChrName: こうやって飲み程度なら 付き合ってやってもいいしな。
jpnSearchText:
こうやって飲み程度なら
付き合ってやってもいいしな。

engChrName: Take it easy once in a while. Go out for drinks, take a day off. Shit can wait sometimes, you know what I'm saying?
engSearchText:
Take it easy once in a while. Go out for drinks, take a
day off. Shit can wait sometimes, you know what
I'm saying?

jpnChrName: ……ったく。 珍しく殊勝なことを言いやがって。
jpnSearchText:
……ったく。
珍しく殊勝なことを言いやがって。

engChrName: Well, would you look at that? You're actually capable of saying something nice and helpful. Who'd've thought?
engSearchText:
Well, would you look at that? You're actually capable
of saying something nice and helpful.
Who'd've thought?
jpnChrName: 俺の事はともかく── お前も、たまには素直に周りに頼れよ？
jpnSearchText:
俺の事はともかく──
お前も、たまには素直に周りに頼れよ？

engChrName: But enough about me. If anybody's in need of advice, it's you, punk. You should learn to ask others for help more often.
engSearchText:
But enough about me. If anybody's in need of advice,
it's you, punk. You should learn to ask others for help
more often.
jpnChrName: 小生意気なガキだろうが、 こっちも面倒を見る責任があるだろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
小生意気なガキだろうが、
こっちも面倒を見る責任があるだろうからな。

engChrName: You might be a real pain in the neck, but you're MY pain in the neck—I'm always lookin' after you and makin' sure you don't fly off the rails.
engSearchText:
You might be a real pain in the neck, but you're MY
pain in the neck—I'm always lookin' after you and
makin' sure you don't fly off the rails.
jpnChrName: ハン、抜かせっつうの。
jpnSearchText: ハン、抜かせっつうの。

engChrName: Heh. I'll listen to you when Gehenna freezes and poms fly, got it?
engSearchText:
Heh. I'll listen to you when Gehenna freezes and
poms fly, got it?
jpnChrName: その後、二人で珍しくゆっくりと ビールを楽しんだ後……
jpnSearchText:
その後、二人で珍しくゆっくりと
ビールを楽しんだ後……

engChrName: Van took Aaron's advice for once, and savored the moment with him over more than a couple cold ones.
engSearchText:
Van took Aaron's advice for once, and savored the
moment with him over more than a couple cold ones.
jpnChrName: 地上に戻って、 改めて行動を再開するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
地上に戻って、
改めて行動を再開するのだった。

engChrName: Once Van returned to the surface, of course, he resumed his normal business.
engSearchText:
Once Van returned to the surface, of course, he
resumed his normal business.
jpnChrName: ……これ、みたいね。
jpnSearchText: ……これ、みたいね。

engChrName: This must be what we're looking for.
engSearchText: This must be what we're looking for.
jpnChrName: なかなか苦労したっつーか…… 隠し方が本当に巧妙だったな。
jpnSearchText:
なかなか苦労したっつーか……
隠し方が本当に巧妙だったな。

engChrName: That was some tricky shit to figure out. They definitely didn't cut us any slack.
engSearchText:
That was some tricky shit to figure out.
They definitely didn't cut us any slack.
jpnChrName: ええ、ギリギリ見える線を繋いで なんとかここまで辿り着いた感じね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ギリギリ見える線を繋いで
なんとかここまで辿り着いた感じね。

engChrName: I'll say. We had to follow the thinnest threads we could find just to get here.
engSearchText:
I'll say. We had to follow the thinnest threads we
could find just to get here.
jpnChrName: 私と裏解決屋さんじゃなかったら 多分、途中で線が切れていたでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
私と裏解決屋さんじゃなかったら
多分、途中で線が切れていたでしょう。

engChrName: Had we not teamed up, this whole search would probably be dead in the water.
engSearchText:
Had we not teamed up, this whole search would
probably be dead in the water.
jpnChrName: おそらくはそれすらも見越して……か。
jpnSearchText: おそらくはそれすらも見越して……か。

engChrName: They must've trusted us to find it in the end, though, if it was here after all.
engSearchText:
They must've trusted us to find it in the end, though,
if it was here after all.
jpnChrName: とにかく開けてみるか。
jpnSearchText: とにかく開けてみるか。

engChrName: Well, let's crack it open and see what's inside.
engSearchText: Well, let's crack it open and see what's inside.
jpnChrName: アタッシュケースを開けて、 中身を取り出した。
jpnSearchText:
アタッシュケースを開けて、
中身を取り出した。

engChrName: Van unlocked the attaché case and threw it open to reveal...
engSearchText:
Van unlocked the attaché case and threw it open
to reveal...
jpnChrName: ……なんだこりゃ？
jpnSearchText: ……なんだこりゃ？

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnChrName: ちょっとした日用品に筆記用具…… 絵画に使う画材なんかも入ってやがる。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとした日用品に筆記用具……
絵画に使う画材なんかも入ってやがる。

engChrName: Writing utensils and...painting supplies? The hell's this stuff for?
engSearchText:
Writing utensils and...painting supplies? The hell's
this stuff for?
jpnChrName: どれもおかしなところはない、普通の品…… ある意味意外っちゃ意外だが。
jpnSearchText:
どれもおかしなところはない、普通の品……
ある意味意外っちゃ意外だが。

engChrName: There's nothin' weird about any of 'em, just normal-ass pencils. I don't get it.
engSearchText:
There's nothin' weird about any of 'em, just
normal-ass pencils. I don't get it.
jpnChrName: それと──
jpnSearchText: それと──

engChrName: Oh, it looks like we've also got these, uh...these letters here.
engSearchText:
Oh, it looks like we've also got these, uh...these
letters here.
jpnChrName: 俺とお前さん宛の手紙、か。
jpnSearchText: 俺とお前さん宛の手紙、か。

engChrName: They're addressed to the both of us.
engSearchText: They're addressed to the both of us.
jpnChrName: ……差出人の名前はねえが……
jpnSearchText: ……差出人の名前はねえが……

engChrName: No sender listed, but I can only think of one.
engSearchText: No sender listed, but I can only think of one.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、間違いないわ…… ──やっぱり、おじいさんからみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、間違いないわ……
──やっぱり、おじいさんからみたいね。

engChrName: Right. Grandpa Joerg, beyond a doubt.
engSearchText: Right. Grandpa Joerg, beyond a doubt.
jpnChrName: レンへ──
jpnSearchText: <C1>レンへ──

engChrName: Dear Renne,
engSearchText: Dear Renne,
jpnChrName: 半年以上も遅れてしまってすまないが、 まずはアラミスへの入学を祝わせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
半年以上も遅れてしまってすまないが、
まずはアラミスへの入学を祝わせてもらおう。

engChrName: I realize I'm more than six months late. Before I say anything else, I want to congratulate you on your acceptance into Aramis.
engSearchText:
I realize I'm more than six months late. Before I say
anything else, I want to congratulate you on your
acceptance into Aramis.
jpnChrName: リベールの王立学園に入ったのを聞いたのが ついこの間のことのようだ──早いものだな。
jpnSearchText:
リベールの王立学園に入ったのを聞いたのが
ついこの間のことのようだ──早いものだな。

engChrName: Time really does fly fast, doesn't it? It feels like it was only yesterday that you enrolled at Jenis.
engSearchText:
Time really does fly fast, doesn't it? It feels like it was
only yesterday that you enrolled at Jenis.
jpnChrName: 幼少から数々の論文を書いてきたほどのおぬしが、 改めて普通の教育機関で学校生活を過ごすこと。
jpnSearchText:
幼少から数々の論文を書いてきたほどのおぬしが、
改めて普通の教育機関で学校生活を過ごすこと。

engChrName: You've always had that impeccable talent and appetite for learning—from your studies to your papers and everywhere between.
engSearchText:
You've always had that impeccable talent and appetite
for learning—from your studies to your papers and
everywhere between.
jpnChrName: 最初は無意味と考えたこともあったかもしれぬ。 だがおぬしならすぐ気づいたはずだ──
jpnSearchText:
最初は無意味と考えたこともあったかもしれぬ。
だがおぬしならすぐ気づいたはずだ──

engChrName: You may have felt at first that there was no point returning to ordinary schooling—that it was a waste of time for a mind of your caliber.
engSearchText:
You may have felt at first that there was no point
returning to ordinary schooling—that it was a waste
of time for a mind of your caliber.
jpnChrName: 今、そこでしか得られないものが確かにあることを。
jpnSearchText: <C1>今、そこでしか得られないものが確かにあることを。

engChrName: But there are some things you can only learn and experience in those common places. I suspect you've come to realize that yourself.
engSearchText:
But there are some things you can only learn and
experience in those common places. I suspect you've
come to realize that yourself.
jpnChrName: ようやく見つけた居場所、家族や友人たちと 離れて過ごすのもおぬしにとってはいい経験だろう。
jpnSearchText:
ようやく見つけた居場所、家族や友人たちと
離れて過ごすのもおぬしにとってはいい経験だろう。

engChrName: Now that you have a place in this world to call your own, it's good to spread your wings and spend time away from your friends and family.
engSearchText:
Now that you have a place in this world to call your
own, it's good to spread your wings and spend time
away from your friends and family.
jpnChrName: 短い間ながらおぬしを預かっていた者として、 今後の健闘を祈っているとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
短い間ながらおぬしを預かっていた者として、
今後の健闘を祈っているとしよう。

engChrName: Although I only looked after you for a short period, I pray that you find happiness wherever your travels take you.  Sincerely, Grandpa Joerg
engSearchText:
Although I only looked after you for a short period, I pray
that you find happiness wherever your travels take you.

Sincerely, Grandpa Joerg
jpnChrName: 追伸──１年半前の“あの子たち”への手助け、 および工房の掃除についても感謝する。
jpnSearchText:
追伸──１年半前の“あの子たち”への手助け、
および工房の掃除についても感謝する。

engChrName: PS: Thank you for taking care of those kids and 'tidying up' the workshop during your visit a year and a half ago. I greatly appreciate it.
engSearchText:
PS: Thank you for taking care of those kids and
'tidying up' the workshop during your visit a year
and a half ago. I greatly appreciate it.
jpnChrName: 入学祝いはよく分からなかったので 無難なものを適当に選んでおいた。
jpnSearchText:
入学祝いはよく分からなかったので
無難なものを適当に選んでおいた。

engChrName: I didn't know what to get you to celebrate your admission, so I simply picked up some safe bets for a student your age.
engSearchText:
I didn't know what to get you to celebrate your
admission, so I simply picked up some safe bets for a
student your age.
jpnChrName: 不要ならば捨ててくれても構わぬ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>不要ならば捨ててくれても構わぬ。

engChrName: If you have no use for them, feel free to throw them out. I'll hardly be hurt.
engSearchText:
If you have no use for them, feel free to throw
them out. I'll hardly be hurt.
jpnChrName: 入学祝い、か。 まったく、捨てられるワケないじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
入学祝い、か。
まったく、捨てられるワケないじゃない。

engChrName: Oh, don't be like that, Grandpa... I could never throw these things away.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't be like that, Grandpa... I could never throw
these things away.
jpnChrName: “人形作り”以外は 相変わらず不器用なんだから……ふふ。
jpnSearchText:
“人形作り”以外は
相変わらず不器用なんだから……ふふ。

engChrName: Heehee... He's still as he ever was. Awkward and clumsy outside of his dollmaking...and I wouldn't have it any other way.
engSearchText:
Heehee... He's still as he ever was. Awkward and
clumsy outside of his dollmaking...and I wouldn't
have it any other way.
jpnChrName: ……そんでこっちは、俺宛てか。
jpnSearchText: ……そんでこっちは、俺宛てか。

engChrName: All right. Let's see what he's got to say to me next.
engSearchText: All right. Let's see what he's got to say to me next.
jpnChrName: ヴァン・アークライドへ──
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァン・アークライドへ──

engChrName: To Mr. Van Arkride,
engSearchText: To Mr. Van Arkride,
jpnChrName: おぬしとは何度か“貸し借り”を繰り返したが、 それについては今更話すこともあるまい。
jpnSearchText:
おぬしとは何度か“貸し借り”を繰り返したが、
それについては今更話すこともあるまい。

engChrName: It goes without saying that you and I have done much for each other over the years. I won't dwell on that ancient history.
engSearchText:
It goes without saying that you and I have done much
for each other over the years. I won't dwell on that
ancient history.
jpnChrName: あえてわしから言えることがあるとすれば ──己の“魂”からは目を背けぬことだ。
jpnSearchText:
あえてわしから言えることがあるとすれば
──己の“魂”からは目を背けぬことだ。

engChrName: But if I can offer one piece of advice to you, do not avert your eyes from the spirit you have within.
engSearchText:
But if I can offer one piece of advice to you, do not
avert your eyes from the spirit you have within.
jpnChrName: おぬしの事だ、レンの事も 気にかけてやっているのだろう。
jpnSearchText:
おぬしの事だ、レンの事も
気にかけてやっているのだろう。

engChrName: Beyond that, please continue to guide and protect my granddaughter.
engSearchText:
Beyond that, please continue to guide and protect
my granddaughter.
jpnChrName: そちらにいる間はよろしく頼む──
jpnSearchText: <C1>そちらにいる間はよろしく頼む──

engChrName: I trust that you're looking out for her while she's in your periphery.
engSearchText:
I trust that you're looking out for her while she's in
your periphery.
jpnChrName: ……もう、おじいさんは。 あれで案外過保護っていうか。
jpnSearchText:
……もう、おじいさんは。
あれで案外過保護っていうか。

engChrName: Did he really have to write that last part? I'm not used to seeing him be so protective.
engSearchText:
Did he really have to write that last part? I'm not used
to seeing him be so protective.
jpnChrName: ハハ……成長してからは 会ってないんだろうし仕方ねえんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……成長してからは
会ってないんだろうし仕方ねえんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Hard to blame the guy, he ain't seen you in years. Cut him a little slack, heh.
engSearchText:
Hard to blame the guy, he ain't seen you in years.
Cut him a little slack, heh.
jpnChrName: 己の“魂”からは目を背けるな、か……
jpnSearchText: 己の“魂”からは目を背けるな、か……

engChrName: Least it's not just you he's bein' nosey with, anyway.
engSearchText: Least it's not just you he's bein' nosey with, anyway.
jpnChrName: どういう意味なの？
jpnSearchText: どういう意味なの？

engChrName: What did he mean by your 'spirit within', though? That's an intriguing line...
engSearchText:
What did he mean by your 'spirit within', though?
That's an intriguing line...
jpnChrName: ………さあな。 俺に聞かれてもさっぱりだ。
jpnSearchText:
………さあな。
俺に聞かれてもさっぱりだ。

engChrName: ...Beats me. No idea what he was talkin' about, but that's par for the course with him.
engSearchText:
...Beats me. No idea what he was talkin' about, but
that's par for the course with him.
jpnChrName: 俺たちとは見えてるモンが違ってそうだが。
jpnSearchText: 俺たちとは見えてるモンが違ってそうだが。

engChrName: I mean, you know how he is—guy just sees everything differently.
engSearchText:
I mean, you know how he is—guy just sees
everything differently.
jpnChrName: マイスター、ヨルグ・ローゼンベルクか。 ……まったく大した爺さんだ。
jpnSearchText:
マイスター、ヨルグ・ローゼンベルクか。
……まったく大した爺さんだ。

engChrName: One hell of a grandpa you've got there, you know that?
engSearchText:
One hell of a grandpa you've got there, you
know that?
jpnChrName: ……おじいさんの人形には 魂が宿るなんて言われているけど。
jpnSearchText:
……おじいさんの人形には
魂が宿るなんて言われているけど。

engChrName: People say his dolls are beyond lifelike—they even have their own hearts and souls.
engSearchText:
People say his dolls are beyond lifelike—they even
have their own hearts and souls.
jpnChrName: それはもしかしたら魂を見抜く 才能があるということなのかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
それはもしかしたら魂を見抜く
才能があるということなのかもしれない。

engChrName: Maybe that power lets him take a look inside other people's hearts all the same.
engSearchText:
Maybe that power lets him take a look inside other
people's hearts all the same.
jpnChrName: その意味で心に留めておいて 損はないんじゃないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
その意味で心に留めておいて
損はないんじゃないかしら？

engChrName: He could be on to something. It wouldn't hurt to keep what he wrote to you in mind, whatever it turns out to mean.
engSearchText:
He could be on to something. It wouldn't hurt to
keep what he wrote to you in mind, whatever it turns
out to mean.
jpnChrName: ……だな。
jpnSearchText: ……だな。

engChrName: ...Maybe, yeah.
engSearchText: ...Maybe, yeah.
jpnChrName: しかしあの爺さん、 今はどこでなにをやってるやら。
jpnSearchText:
しかしあの爺さん、
今はどこでなにをやってるやら。

engChrName: So where is that old fart, anyway? Any idea where he is or what he's up to these days?
engSearchText:
So where is that old fart, anyway? Any idea where he
is or what he's up to these days?
jpnChrName: それは私にも分からないわね。
jpnSearchText: それは私にも分からないわね。

engChrName: I have no idea. Your guess is as good as mine.
engSearchText: I have no idea. Your guess is as good as mine.
jpnChrName: こっそりクロスベルの工房に 戻っているのかもしれないし──
jpnSearchText:
こっそりクロスベルの工房に
戻っているのかもしれないし──

engChrName: He may very well have slipped back to his workshop in Crossbell by now.
engSearchText:
He may very well have slipped back to his workshop
in Crossbell by now.
jpnChrName: 他のどこかでまた秘密の工房を 造っているかもしれないわ。
jpnSearchText:
他のどこかでまた秘密の工房を
造っているかもしれないわ。

engChrName: Or perhaps he's abandoned it and set up shop somewhere else entirely. It's so hard to tell with him.
engSearchText:
Or perhaps he's abandoned it and set up shop
somewhere else entirely. It's so hard to tell with him.
jpnChrName: うちの師父もそうだったが、年寄りは皆 秘密主義で放浪癖があるのかねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
うちの師父もそうだったが、年寄りは皆
秘密主義で放浪癖があるのかねぇ……

engChrName: My master was like that, too. Maybe bein' all cryptic and shit's just part of gettin' old.
engSearchText:
My master was like that, too. Maybe bein' all cryptic
and shit's just part of gettin' old.
jpnChrName: ふふ、まあ連絡が来ただけで 今は良しとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、まあ連絡が来ただけで
今は良しとしましょう。

engChrName: Heehee. Maybe so. I'm happy to have heard from him, at least.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Maybe so. I'm happy to have heard from
him, at least.
jpnChrName: ありがとう、裏解決屋さん。 この借りはいずれ返すわね。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう、裏解決屋さん。
この借りはいずれ返すわね。

engChrName: Thanks for bringing me along, Van. I'll have to return the favor one of these days.
engSearchText:
Thanks for bringing me along, Van. I'll have to return
the favor one of these days.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ガキがナマ言ってるんじゃ ねえっつうの。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ガキがナマ言ってるんじゃ
ねえっつうの。

engChrName: Hey, take it down a notch. You play with fire, you might get burned.
engSearchText:
Hey, take it down a notch. You play with fire, you
might get burned.
jpnChrName: あら、貴方もまだ子供扱いするつもり？
jpnSearchText: あら、貴方もまだ子供扱いするつもり？

engChrName: Oh, you think I'm still just some little girl, do you?
engSearchText: Oh, you think I'm still just some little girl, do you?
jpnChrName: ここ数ヶ月で少しはレディとして 成長できたつもりなんだけれど。
jpnSearchText:
ここ数ヶ月で少しはレディとして
成長できたつもりなんだけれど。

engChrName: I'll be all grown up before you know it—in many ways, I already am.
engSearchText:
I'll be all grown up before you know it—in many
ways, I already am.
jpnChrName: あの時、貴方がしてくれたみたいに──
jpnSearchText: あの時、貴方がしてくれたみたいに──

engChrName: At least, enough for me to reach out and lend you a hand when you need it most...
engSearchText:
At least, enough for me to reach out and lend you a
hand when you need it most...
jpnChrName: 今度は私の方から 手を差し伸べられるくらいにはね。
jpnSearchText:
今度は私の方から
手を差し伸べられるくらいにはね。

engChrName: ...just like you did for me all those years ago.
engSearchText: ...just like you did for me all those years ago.
jpnChrName: （ったく、どいつもこいつも   あっという間に成長するっつうか……）
jpnSearchText:
（ったく、どいつもこいつも
あっという間に成長するっつうか……）

engChrName: (Sheesh, the old man's right. This girl is growing up fast—TOO fast, if you ask me.)
engSearchText:
(Sheesh, the old man's right. This girl is growing up
fast—TOO fast, if you ask me.)
jpnChrName: ──ああ、いざって時は頼りにしてるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ──ああ、いざって時は頼りにしてるぜ。

engChrName: Sure. I'll ring you up if I really need a hand.
engSearchText: Sure. I'll ring you up if I really need a hand.
jpnChrName: その後、回収したアタッシュケースを 寮まで運んでからレンと別れ……
jpnSearchText:
その後、回収したアタッシュケースを
寮まで運んでからレンと別れ……

engChrName: Van saw Renne back to her dormitory and left the attaché case in her care. With that, the two went their separate ways.
engSearchText:
Van saw Renne back to her dormitory and left the
attaché case in her care. With that, the two went their
separate ways.
jpnChrName: 改めて仲間と合流して活動を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>改めて仲間と合流して活動を再開したのだった。

engChrName: And just like that, it was back to the usual business.
engSearchText: And just like that, it was back to the usual business.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァンとフィーは黒芒街に到着し……
jpnSearchText: <C1>こうしてヴァンとフィーは黒芒街に到着し……

engChrName: Van and Fie made haste to the Blacklight District.
engSearchText: Van and Fie made haste to the Blacklight District.
jpnChrName: ライフルの修理に必要な さまざまな部品を探して回る事になった。
jpnSearchText:
ライフルの修理に必要な
さまざまな部品を探して回る事になった。

engChrName: Upon arrival, they scoured the area in search of replacement parts for Aida's rifle.
engSearchText:
Upon arrival, they scoured the area in search of
replacement parts for Aida's rifle.
jpnChrName: ほほう、カスタムライフルの修理を。 それはまた骨が折れそうですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ほほう、カスタムライフルの修理を。
それはまた骨が折れそうですねぇ。

engChrName: You're looking to fix up a custom rifle, eh? Not to discourage you fine folks, but that sounds like quite the pain in the behind.
engSearchText:
You're looking to fix up a custom rifle, eh? Not to
discourage you fine folks, but that sounds like quite
the pain in the behind.
jpnChrName: ん、それでいくつか特殊な部品を 揃える必要があるんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ん、それでいくつか特殊な部品を
揃える必要があるんだけど……

engChrName: We know—and we're prepared to deal with it. As you can probably guess, we need some specialized parts to get it back in working condition.
engSearchText:
We know—and we're prepared to deal with it. As you
can probably guess, we need some specialized parts to
get it back in working condition.
jpnChrName: ライフル用サプレッサーとフォアグリップで、 店にある物を見せてもらえないかな？
jpnSearchText:
ライフル用サプレッサーとフォアグリップで、
店にある物を見せてもらえないかな？

engChrName: Mind showing us the rifle suppressors and foregrips you've got in stock at the moment?
engSearchText:
Mind showing us the rifle suppressors and foregrips
you've got in stock at the moment?
jpnChrName: ええ、かしこまりました。 探し物が見つかると良いのですが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、かしこまりました。
探し物が見つかると良いのですが……

engChrName: Not at all! Right this way, young lady—hopefully I've got what you're looking for.
engSearchText:
Not at all! Right this way, young lady—hopefully I've
got what you're looking for.
jpnChrName: 商品は色々あるみたいだけど…… 見つからないもんだね。
jpnSearchText:
商品は色々あるみたいだけど……
見つからないもんだね。

engChrName: He's definitely got a wide selection, but...hrm. None of it looks quite right.
engSearchText:
He's definitely got a wide selection, but...hrm.
None of it looks quite right.
jpnChrName: お、ここら辺のはどうだ？
jpnSearchText: お、ここら辺のはどうだ？

engChrName: What about this part over here?
engSearchText: What about this part over here?
jpnChrName: 扱いにくそうだが、 猟兵だったら使いこなせちまうのかね。
jpnSearchText:
扱いにくそうだが、
猟兵だったら使いこなせちまうのかね。

engChrName: Looks pretty unwieldy, but nothin' any decent jaeger couldn't handle.
engSearchText:
Looks pretty unwieldy, but nothin' any decent jaeger
couldn't handle.
jpnChrName: ん……それってもしかして アイーダが使ってた部品の最新型かも。
jpnSearchText:
ん……それってもしかして
アイーダが使ってた部品の最新型かも。

engChrName: Hmm... Yeah, maybe. That might actually be the same model Aida used—or the same make, at least.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Yeah, maybe. That might actually be the
same model Aida used—or the same make, at least.
jpnChrName: 元の部品の代替品としては十分かもね。
jpnSearchText: 元の部品の代替品としては十分かもね。

engChrName: This might work in a pinch. Might as well give it a shot.
engSearchText:
This might work in a pinch. Might as well give it
a shot.
jpnChrName: あの《火喰鳥》が使っていたライフルか…… 噂くらいは聞いていた。
jpnSearchText:
あの《火喰鳥》が使っていたライフルか……
噂くらいは聞いていた。

engChrName: Working on Flameeater's rifle, huh? I've heard stories about that bad boy.
engSearchText:
Working on Flameeater's rifle, huh? I've heard stories
about that bad boy.
jpnChrName: アタシが現役時代に使っていたライフルが、 たしか彼女のと同世代のモデルだったね。
jpnSearchText:
アタシが現役時代に使っていたライフルが、
たしか彼女のと同世代のモデルだったね。

engChrName: You're in luck. I know for a fact that the rifle I used back when I was on active duty is the same generation as her gun.
engSearchText:
You're in luck. I know for a fact that the rifle I used
back when I was on active duty is the same generation
as her gun.
jpnChrName: 流用できるパーツもありそうだ。 良かったら持っていくといい。
jpnSearchText:
流用できるパーツもありそうだ。
良かったら持っていくといい。

engChrName: You can go ahead and take it, if you want. It should have a part or two you can use.
engSearchText:
You can go ahead and take it, if you want. It should
have a part or two you can use.
jpnChrName: おいおい、そりゃまた太っ腹だな。
jpnSearchText: おいおい、そりゃまた太っ腹だな。

engChrName: Damn, that's real generous of you.
engSearchText: Damn, that's real generous of you.
jpnChrName: いいの？ 大切なものなんじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
いいの？
大切なものなんじゃ……

engChrName: For real. Are you sure? I mean, that has to mean a lot to you.
engSearchText:
For real. Are you sure? I mean, that has to mean a lot
to you.
jpnChrName: アタシの古巣を率いた“大佐”の娘── サラお嬢さんが育てた子からの頼みとあっちゃね。
jpnSearchText:
アタシの古巣を率いた“大佐”の娘──
サラお嬢さんが育てた子からの頼みとあっちゃね。

engChrName: I'm no jaeger anymore, so I don't mind parting with it. Helping the colonel's daughter sounds better to me, anyway.
engSearchText:
I'm no jaeger anymore, so I don't mind parting
with it. Helping the colonel's daughter sounds better
to me, anyway.
jpnChrName: 代わりと言っちゃなんだが、 世間話程度に聞かせてもらえないかい？
jpnSearchText:
代わりと言っちゃなんだが、
世間話程度に聞かせてもらえないかい？

engChrName: In return, just promise you'll come back and tell me how the Purple Lightning's doing.
engSearchText:
In return, just promise you'll come back and tell me
how the Purple Lightning's doing.
jpnChrName: 北の猟兵を抜けて、ようやく見つけた 彼女の居場所での話をさ。
jpnSearchText:
北の猟兵を抜けて、ようやく見つけた
彼女の居場所での話をさ。

engChrName: I've been rooting for her ever since she hung it up to walk her own path. Lemme know how she's holding up, yeah?
engSearchText:
I've been rooting for her ever since she hung it up to
walk her own path. Lemme know how she's holding
up, yeah?
jpnChrName: ……ふふ、もちろん。 わたし程度の話でもいいのなら。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふ、もちろん。
わたし程度の話でもいいのなら。

engChrName: Deal. Can't say I know everything, but I'll be happy to share what I can.
engSearchText:
Deal. Can't say I know everything, but I'll be happy
to share what I can.
jpnChrName: こうしてその後も横流し品などから 修理用パーツを一通り手に入れることができ……
jpnSearchText:
こうしてその後も横流し品などから
修理用パーツを一通り手に入れることができ……

engChrName: Eventually, Fie and Van managed to scrape together the needed parts to repair the gun—albeit from a less-than-desirable mix of sources.
engSearchText:
Eventually, Fie and Van managed to scrape together
the needed parts to repair the gun—albeit from a
less-than-desirable mix of sources.
jpnChrName: ちょうど地上でのパーツ集めを終えたフェリと 百貨店のガンショップで落ち合う事になった。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど地上でのパーツ集めを終えたフェリと
百貨店のガンショップで落ち合う事になった。

engChrName: With Feri having acquired her allotted parts, the group reconvened at the arms dealer inside the department store.
engSearchText:
With Feri having acquired her allotted parts, the
group reconvened at the arms dealer inside the
department store.
jpnChrName: ……道中、薄々勘づいていたが。
jpnSearchText: ……道中、薄々勘づいていたが。

engChrName: ...I was starting to wonder on the way here if this was where you were taking me.
engSearchText:
...I was starting to wonder on the way here if this was
where you were taking me.
jpnChrName: ダスワニ警部を、 ディープな地下街へご案内～ってな。
jpnSearchText:
ダスワニ警部を、
ディープな地下街へご案内～ってな。

engChrName: Aww, don't be like that. I'm just takin' you through a nice, dingy underground shopping center, Inspector, just like any other in Edith!
engSearchText:
Aww, don't be like that. I'm just takin' you
through a nice, dingy underground shopping center,
Inspector, just like any other in Edith!

jpnChrName: あからさまに嫌な顔してるな。
jpnSearchText: あからさまに嫌な顔してるな。

engChrName: ...Look, you're not makin' this any better for either of us. Wipe that frown off your face already.
engSearchText:
...Look, you're not makin' this any better for either
of us. Wipe that frown off your face already.
jpnChrName: 実は来たことあったりすんのか？
jpnSearchText: 実は来たことあったりすんのか？

engChrName: All right, I'll stop yuckin' around. This your first rodeo, or you been down here before?
engSearchText:
All right, I'll stop yuckin' around. This your first
rodeo, or you been down here before?
jpnChrName: ……１０年以上前にな。 俺には相容れない場所だ。
jpnSearchText:
……１０年以上前にな。
俺には相容れない場所だ。

engChrName: It's been over a decade. This isn't exactly my kind of place, either professionally or personally.
engSearchText:
It's been over a decade. This isn't exactly my kind of
place, either professionally or personally.
jpnChrName: この地があえて残される意味も、 ここで生きることを選ぶ人間の思考も──
jpnSearchText:
この地があえて残される意味も、
ここで生きることを選ぶ人間の思考も──

engChrName: I swear. I just can't wrap my head around it...
engSearchText: I swear. I just can't wrap my head around it...
jpnChrName: 何もかもが理解に苦しむ。
jpnSearchText: 何もかもが理解に苦しむ。

engChrName: How anyone could just choose to live down here, and how the authorities could turn a blind eye to how obviously foul it is, is just beyond me.
engSearchText:
How anyone could just choose to live down here, and
how the authorities could turn a blind eye to how
obviously foul it is, is just beyond me.
jpnChrName: ま、そういう意味でも アンタ１人じゃ無理だろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そういう意味でも
アンタ１人じゃ無理だろうな。

engChrName: That's what I'm here for, pal. You wouldn't last a minute down here by yourself.
engSearchText:
That's what I'm here for, pal. You wouldn't last a
minute down here by yourself.
jpnChrName: 行こうぜ、まずは情報収集だ。
jpnSearchText: 行こうぜ、まずは情報収集だ。

engChrName: Anyway, time's a wastin'. Let's talk to the locals first and see what we can figure out.
engSearchText:
Anyway, time's a wastin'. Let's talk to the locals first
and see what we can figure out.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは、居酒屋を営む ガブリエラに事情を話し──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは、居酒屋を営む
ガブリエラに事情を話し──

engChrName: Van and Inspector Daswani first inquired with Gabriella, the proprietress of a local drinking hole.
engSearchText:
Van and Inspector Daswani first inquired with
Gabriella, the proprietress of a local drinking hole.
jpnChrName: 『見慣れない新参の転売屋がいる』との情報を得て、 試しにその人物を訪ねることにした。
jpnSearchText:
『見慣れない新参の転売屋がいる』との情報を得て、
試しにその人物を訪ねることにした。

engChrName: She informed them about a new scalper who had recently arrived. The two decided to try their luck by visiting him.
engSearchText:
She informed them about a new scalper who had
recently arrived. The two decided to try their luck by
visiting him.
jpnChrName: イヒヒ、お客さんは運が良い。
jpnSearchText: イヒヒ、お客さんは運が良い。

engChrName: Heh heh heh, you're in luck, my good man!
engSearchText: Heh heh heh, you're in luck, my good man!
jpnChrName: ありますよ、その人形。 ちょうど店頭に並べたばかりでしてね。
jpnSearchText:
ありますよ、その人形。
ちょうど店頭に並べたばかりでしてね。

engChrName: I've got exactly what you're looking for! I just put those dolls up on display!
engSearchText:
I've got exactly what you're looking for! I just put
those dolls up on display!
jpnChrName: 貴重な物なので、手に入れるのに苦労しました。
jpnSearchText: 貴重な物なので、手に入れるのに苦労しました。

engChrName: You don't know how hard I had to work to obtain them. Those things aren't easy to come by!
engSearchText:
You don't know how hard I had to work to
obtain them. Those things aren't easy to come by!

jpnChrName: 言わずもがな、この取引はグレーだ。
jpnSearchText: 言わずもがな、この取引はグレーだ。

engChrName: Probably goes without saying: if you move forward with it, this ain't gonna be the most legit sale you've ever done.
engSearchText:
Probably goes without saying: if you move forward
with it, this ain't gonna be the most legit sale you've
ever done.
jpnChrName: その上でアンタが、天秤にかけたどっちを取るか。 それだけだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
その上でアンタが、天秤にかけたどっちを取るか。
それだけだぜ。

engChrName: Just puttin' that out there. What you decide to do with that information's up to you.
engSearchText:
Just puttin' that out there. What you decide to do
with that information's up to you.
jpnChrName: ……若造が知ったような口を。
jpnSearchText: ……若造が知ったような口を。

engChrName: ...I don't need some street rat like you lecturing me about morals.
engSearchText:
...I don't need some street rat like you lecturing me
about morals.
jpnChrName: ……買わせてもらおう、いくらだ。
jpnSearchText: ……買わせてもらおう、いくらだ。

engChrName: *sigh* Hell, sure, I'll take one. How much do you want?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Hell, sure, I'll take one. How much do
you want?
jpnChrName: イヒヒ、毎度あり。
jpnSearchText: イヒヒ、毎度あり。

engChrName: Heh heh. Pleasure doing business with you, sir.
engSearchText: Heh heh. Pleasure doing business with you, sir.
jpnChrName: それじゃ、１万ミラになります。
jpnSearchText: それじゃ、１万ミラになります。

engChrName: That'll be 10,000 mira, thank you very much.
engSearchText: That'll be 10,000 mira, thank you very much.
jpnChrName: １万……！？ 元値はその１０分の１以下だぞ！
jpnSearchText:
１万……！？
元値はその１０分の１以下だぞ！

engChrName: You serious?! That's ten times the MSRP! You'd better give me a damn good reason why!
engSearchText:
You serious?! That's ten times the MSRP!
You'd better give me a damn good reason why!
jpnChrName: さっきもお話ししたように 貴重な物ですのでねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
さっきもお話ししたように
貴重な物ですのでねぇ。

engChrName: As I just explained to you, sir, these dolls are quite the hot commodity right now. I'm simply charging what the market is willing to pay.
engSearchText:
As I just explained to you, sir, these dolls are quite the
hot commodity right now. I'm simply charging what
the market is willing to pay.
jpnChrName: 貴様、足元見やがって……！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>貴様、足元見やがって……！！

engChrName: Like hell! You think you can get away with fleecing me? Huh?!
engSearchText:
Like hell! You think you can get away with
fleecing me? Huh?!
jpnChrName: ひいっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ひいっ……！？

engChrName: Aaah! D-Don't hurt me!
engSearchText: Aaah! D-Don't hurt me!
jpnChrName: あー、黙ってて悪かったんだが。
jpnSearchText: あー、黙ってて悪かったんだが。

engChrName: Sorry, pal. Doesn't look like you know who this guy is, so lemme fill you in.
engSearchText:
Sorry, pal. Doesn't look like you know who this guy
is, so lemme fill you in.
jpnChrName: 超強面のこちらの方は、 黒芒街の元締めの用心棒を務める男でな。
jpnSearchText:
超強面のこちらの方は、
黒芒街の元締めの用心棒を務める男でな。

engChrName: You're lookin' at the personal bodyguard for this district's head honcho.
engSearchText:
You're lookin' at the personal bodyguard for this
district's head honcho.
jpnChrName: 度を越した商売を見つけては、 その腕っぷしの強さで締め上げてきたわけよ。
jpnSearchText:
度を越した商売を見つけては、
その腕っぷしの強さで締め上げてきたわけよ。

engChrName: Wanna guess how he got so strong? By settin' crooks straight by force when they step outta line.
engSearchText:
Wanna guess how he got so strong? By settin' crooks
straight by force when they step outta line.
jpnChrName: ま、新参のアンタが知らないのも無理は無い。
jpnSearchText: ま、新参のアンタが知らないのも無理は無い。

engChrName: I hear you're new here, so I guess nobody took the time to fill you in yet. Can't fault you for that.
engSearchText:
I hear you're new here, so I guess nobody took the
time to fill you in yet. Can't fault you for that.

jpnChrName: っつうわけで、 ちょいと勉強してもらえないかい？
jpnSearchText:
っつうわけで、
ちょいと勉強してもらえないかい？

engChrName: But now that you know who you're dealin' with, you MIGHT wanna consider cuttin' the man a discount.
engSearchText:
But now that you know who you're dealin' with, you
MIGHT wanna consider cuttin' the man a discount.
jpnChrName: じゃないとアンタの身が心配なんだよなぁ。
jpnSearchText: じゃないとアンタの身が心配なんだよなぁ。

engChrName: Otherwise, life's gonna come at'cha real fast in just a couple of seconds.
engSearchText:
Otherwise, life's gonna come at'cha real fast in just a
couple of seconds.
jpnChrName: わわわ、分かりやした！
jpnSearchText: わわわ、分かりやした！

engChrName: Okay, okay, I give! You win!
engSearchText: Okay, okay, I give! You win!
jpnChrName: 定価に＋手間賃ほどの値段でどうでしょう……？
jpnSearchText: 定価に＋手間賃ほどの値段でどうでしょう……？
