engChrName: So, normal retail price plus a finder's fee to compensate me for my labor. Does that sound fair?
engSearchText:
So, normal retail price plus a finder's fee to
compensate me for my labor. Does that sound fair?
jpnChrName: （セコいが、まぁ妥当なとこか。）
jpnSearchText: （セコいが、まぁ妥当なとこか。）

engChrName: (Heh, still a snake to the bitter end—but he knows what's up now, at least.)
engSearchText:
(Heh, still a snake to the bitter end—but he knows
what's up now, at least.)
jpnChrName: どうだい？
jpnSearchText: どうだい？

engChrName: What's your call, boss? Deal?
engSearchText: What's your call, boss? Deal?
jpnChrName: ……分かった、良いだろう。
jpnSearchText: ……分かった、良いだろう。

engChrName: Hmph. Yeah, I'll take it.
engSearchText: Hmph. Yeah, I'll take it.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ交渉成立だ。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ交渉成立だ。

engChrName: Fantastic. Another satisfied customer you've made.
engSearchText: Fantastic. Another satisfied customer you've made.
jpnChrName: 今後も商売するなら 扱うブツと売り値には気をつけるこった。
jpnSearchText:
今後も商売するなら
扱うブツと売り値には気をつけるこった。

engChrName: So I hope this taught you a valuable lesson: be careful how you do business down here, got it?
engSearchText:
So I hope this taught you a valuable lesson: be careful
how you do business down here, got it?
jpnChrName: ……商品を受け取るついでに、 １つ聞かせてもらいたい。
jpnSearchText:
……商品を受け取るついでに、
１つ聞かせてもらいたい。

engChrName: Let me ask you one more question before I leave.
engSearchText: Let me ask you one more question before I leave.
jpnChrName: アンタはなぜ、 この黒芒街で生きることを選んだ？
jpnSearchText:
アンタはなぜ、
この黒芒街で生きることを選んだ？

engChrName: What on Zemuria made you decide to come live in a place like this?
engSearchText:
What on Zemuria made you decide to come live in a
place like this?
jpnChrName: な、なぜって、妙なことを聞きますね。 そりゃあ──
jpnSearchText:
な、なぜって、妙なことを聞きますね。
そりゃあ──

engChrName: Wh-Wha...? That's a weird question to ask. But if I had to say...
engSearchText:
Wh-Wha...? That's a weird question to ask. But if I
had to say...
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: お、いたいた。
jpnSearchText: お、いたいた。

engChrName: There he is.
engSearchText: There he is.
jpnChrName: ジャックの奴、 イーマイの爺さんに用があったのか。
jpnSearchText:
ジャックの奴、
イーマイの爺さんに用があったのか。

engChrName: Looks like Jack's got business with Yimai.
engSearchText: Looks like Jack's got business with Yimai.
jpnChrName: おい、爺さん──約束が違うじゃねえか！
jpnSearchText: おい、爺さん──約束が違うじゃねえか！

engChrName: Hey! This isn't what you promised, old man!
engSearchText: Hey! This isn't what you promised, old man!
jpnChrName: ほほ、別に約束などした覚えはないがのう。
jpnSearchText: ほほ、別に約束などした覚えはないがのう。

engChrName: Promised? Now, I'm sorry, but I haven't the foggiest idea what you're talking about. I never promised you anything, you see.
engSearchText:
Promised? Now, I'm sorry, but I haven't the foggiest
idea what you're talking about. I never promised you
anything, you see.
jpnChrName: どうした、トラブルか？
jpnSearchText: どうした、トラブルか？

engChrName: 'Sup? Got a problem?
engSearchText: 'Sup? Got a problem?
jpnChrName: ヴァン……来たのか。
jpnSearchText: ヴァン……来たのか。

engChrName: Oh, hey, Van. You actually came, huh?
engSearchText: Oh, hey, Van. You actually came, huh?
jpnChrName: ああ、少し気になってな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、少し気になってな。

engChrName: Yeah. Was just a little concerned about you, is all.
engSearchText: Yeah. Was just a little concerned about you, is all.
jpnChrName: いったい何があったんだ。
jpnSearchText: いったい何があったんだ。

engChrName: So what happened?
engSearchText: So what happened?
jpnChrName: 万が一手に入ったら取り置きするよう 爺さんに頼んであった１０ミラコイン……
jpnSearchText:
万が一手に入ったら取り置きするよう
爺さんに頼んであった１０ミラコイン……

engChrName: I asked this guy to reserve a certain ten mira coin for me on the off chance he came across it so I could buy it off him.
engSearchText:
I asked this guy to reserve a certain ten
mira coin for me on the off chance he came across
it so I could buy it off him.
jpnChrName: そいつを別の奴に売りやがったんだ。
jpnSearchText: そいつを別の奴に売りやがったんだ。

engChrName: But instead, he went behind my back and pawned it off to somebody else.
engSearchText:
But instead, he went behind my back and pawned it
off to somebody else.
jpnChrName: １０ミラコイン？
jpnSearchText: １０ミラコイン？

engChrName: A...ten mira coin? What's got you worked up over it?
engSearchText: A...ten mira coin? What's got you worked up over it?
jpnChrName: いわゆるエラーコインというヤツでな。
jpnSearchText: いわゆるエラーコインというヤツでな。

engChrName: It's what we in the business call an 'error coin'. A misprint, if you will.
engSearchText:
It's what we in the business call an 'error coin'.
A misprint, if you will.
jpnChrName: 肖像と文字が反転している上に、 銅の色味が限りなく薄い白銀の１０ミラコイン。
jpnSearchText:
肖像と文字が反転している上に、
銅の色味が限りなく薄い白銀の１０ミラコイン。

engChrName: Not only are the portrait and text flipped, but the copper is the wrong color, too. It has this slight silver hue to it.
engSearchText:
Not only are the portrait and text flipped, but the
copper is the wrong color, too. It has this slight silver
hue to it.
jpnChrName: 数千万分の一の確率でできる超レアモノで ３万ミラはくだらん品なんじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
数千万分の一の確率でできる超レアモノで
３万ミラはくだらん品なんじゃが……

engChrName: These little mistakes are one in ten thousand, if not rarer—30,000 mira per coin is quite common.
engSearchText:
These little mistakes are one in ten thousand, if not
rarer—30,000 mira per coin is quite common.
jpnChrName: 元の持ち主がまた曰く付きでの。
jpnSearchText: 元の持ち主がまた曰く付きでの。

engChrName: But that's not all that can inflate the value of these, no, sir.
engSearchText:
But that's not all that can inflate the value of these,
no, sir.
jpnChrName: それを踏まえると、 ５万ミラほどの価値があるじゃろうな。
jpnSearchText:
それを踏まえると、
５万ミラほどの価値があるじゃろうな。

engChrName: Owner history plays a part, too—and a previous owner as infamous as this coin's can bump the value up even higher. 50,000, by my estimate.
engSearchText:
Owner history plays a part, too—and a previous
owner as infamous as this coin's can bump the value
up even higher. 50,000, by my estimate.
jpnChrName: ５万……なかなかの額だな。
jpnSearchText: ５万……なかなかの額だな。

engChrName: Damn, 50,000 mira for a little coin? Must've had one hell of a past life to command that kinda money.
engSearchText:
Damn, 50,000 mira for a little coin? Must've had one
hell of a past life to command that kinda money.
jpnChrName: ……俺の師であり、 最大のライバルだった男の話は知ってるな？
jpnSearchText:
……俺の師であり、
最大のライバルだった男の話は知ってるな？

engChrName: You're damn right it did. I take it you know about my mentor—and my greatest rival?
engSearchText:
You're damn right it did. I take it you know about my
mentor—and my greatest rival?
jpnChrName: もちろんだ。
jpnSearchText: もちろんだ。

engChrName: Course I do.
engSearchText: Course I do.
jpnChrName: 伝説のギャンブラーにして ハルの父親でもある──キングだろ？
jpnSearchText:
伝説のギャンブラーにして
ハルの父親でもある──キングだろ？

engChrName: The King himself, ain't it? Halle's own old man.
engSearchText: The King himself, ain't it? Halle's own old man.
jpnChrName: ああ……まだまだケツの青かった俺が いきがって突っ走っちまったせいで……
jpnSearchText:
ああ……まだまだケツの青かった俺が
いきがって突っ走っちまったせいで……

engChrName: Right... Then you probably know that he's not around anymore. There's a reason for that...
engSearchText:
Right... Then you probably know that he's not
around anymore. There's a reason for that...
jpnChrName: 結果的に命を落とすことになってしまった男だ。
jpnSearchText: 結果的に命を落とすことになってしまった男だ。

engChrName: I was a dumb little shit when I was younger. My cocky ass got him killed.
engSearchText:
I was a dumb little shit when I was younger. My cocky
ass got him killed.
jpnChrName: ジャック……
jpnSearchText: ジャック……

engChrName: Damn, dude. I'm sorry. Didn't mean to dig up all that baggage.
engSearchText:
Damn, dude. I'm sorry. Didn't mean to dig up all
that baggage.
jpnChrName: ──とにかく、そのエラーコインは かつてキングが持っていたモンでな。
jpnSearchText:
──とにかく、そのエラーコインは
かつてキングが持っていたモンでな。

engChrName: Well, now you know. Anyway, I'm sure you've put two and two together. That coin we're arguing over used to belong to him.
engSearchText:
Well, now you know. Anyway, I'm sure you've put
two and two together. That coin we're arguing over
used to belong to him.
jpnChrName: キング亡き後、 ずっと行方知れずだったんだが……
jpnSearchText:
キング亡き後、
ずっと行方知れずだったんだが……

engChrName: After he died, that coin disappeared. I had no idea where it went—at least, until...
engSearchText:
After he died, that coin disappeared. I had no idea
where it went—at least, until...
jpnChrName: ほほ、それがこのたび運よく手に入っての。
jpnSearchText: ほほ、それがこのたび運よく手に入っての。

engChrName: ...until yours truly happened upon it.
engSearchText: ...until yours truly happened upon it.
jpnChrName: ジャックが１０万ミラで買うと言うから ワシも前向きに検討しておったんじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
ジャックが１０万ミラで買うと言うから
ワシも前向きに検討しておったんじゃ。

engChrName: Jack offered 100,000 mira for that little coin—and at the time, I was more than happy to give it to him.
engSearchText:
Jack offered 100,000 mira for that little coin—and at
the time, I was more than happy to give it to him.
jpnChrName: じゃが、ほんの数十分前に先客が現れてな。 そやつは１０万５千ミラ出すと言うではないか。
jpnSearchText:
じゃが、ほんの数十分前に先客が現れてな。
そやつは１０万５千ミラ出すと言うではないか。

engChrName: Unfortunately, another customer beat him to the punch with a 105,000 mira offer. Poor Jack was just minutes too late.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, another customer beat him to the
punch with a 105,000 mira offer. Poor Jack was just
minutes too late.
jpnChrName: となれば結論は決まっておるじゃろう。
jpnSearchText: となれば結論は決まっておるじゃろう。

engChrName: It really was nothing personal—I was just doing as a businessman does and taking the better offer.
engSearchText:
It really was nothing personal—I was just doing as a
businessman does and taking the better offer.
jpnChrName: いやいや爺さん……そんなのは 言ってくれたら俺も上乗せしたって話だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
いやいや爺さん……そんなのは
言ってくれたら俺も上乗せしたって話だぜ。

engChrName: Oh, give me a break. If you'd just TOLD me somebody had put in a counteroffer, I would've put up more money, too!
engSearchText:
Oh, give me a break. If you'd just TOLD me
somebody had put in a counteroffer, I would've put
up more money, too!
jpnChrName: 確かに、いつもの爺さんなら 限界まで釣り上げそうなモンだが……
jpnSearchText:
確かに、いつもの爺さんなら
限界まで釣り上げそうなモンだが……

engChrName: That IS a little odd that you didn't do that this time. I know just how much you like to wring people for every mira they're worth.
engSearchText:
That IS a little odd that you didn't do that this time.
I know just how much you like to wring people for
every mira they're worth.
jpnChrName: その先客とやらは誰なんだ？
jpnSearchText: その先客とやらは誰なんだ？

engChrName: So who's the moneybags who ran off with the coin?
engSearchText: So who's the moneybags who ran off with the coin?
jpnChrName: ほっほっ、それなら自分で確かめるといい。
jpnSearchText: ほっほっ、それなら自分で確かめるといい。

engChrName: Haha. Well, if you want to know, you'll have to go straight to the source.
engSearchText:
Haha. Well, if you want to know, you'll have to go
straight to the source.
jpnChrName: 実はそやつから伝言を受け取っていてのう。
jpnSearchText: 実はそやつから伝言を受け取っていてのう。

engChrName: As it so happens, the buyer left a note to pass on to Jack.
engSearchText:
As it so happens, the buyer left a note to pass on
to Jack.
jpnChrName: 『コインを取り返したくば《彩雲閣》へ来い』 だそうじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
『コインを取り返したくば《彩雲閣》へ来い』
だそうじゃ。

engChrName: It says quite plainly, 'If you'd like the coin back, come to Caiyunge.'
engSearchText:
It says quite plainly, 'If you'd like the coin back, come
to Caiyunge.'
jpnChrName: って、爺さんもグルなんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: って、爺さんもグルなんじゃねえか。

engChrName: Great. You couldn't just sell the damn coin to them— you had to help them antagonize me, too. Thanks, Yimai.
engSearchText:
Great. You couldn't just sell the damn coin to them—
you had to help them antagonize me, too.
Thanks, Yimai.
jpnChrName: ったく、にしても どこのどいつかは知らねえが。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、にしても
どこのどいつかは知らねえが。

engChrName: Every now and again, someone comes out of the woodwork, trying to pick a fight with me.
engSearchText:
Every now and again, someone comes out of the
woodwork, trying to pick a fight with me.
jpnChrName: たまに現れやがるんだよな。 どうしても俺と本気で勝負したいって輩がよ。
jpnSearchText:
たまに現れやがるんだよな。
どうしても俺と本気で勝負したいって輩がよ。

engChrName: Who's got it out for me this time, though, I haven't a clue.
engSearchText:
Who's got it out for me this time, though, I haven't
a clue.
jpnChrName: 煌都に現れたイカサマ師コンビの時といい、 ジャックも大変だな。
jpnSearchText:
煌都に現れたイカサマ師コンビの時といい、
ジャックも大変だな。

engChrName: Yeah, I remember that pair of cheaters you had to deal with in Langport when we were in town. Sure ain't easy bein' famous, huh?
engSearchText:
Yeah, I remember that pair of cheaters you had to
deal with in Langport when we were in town.
Sure ain't easy bein' famous, huh?
jpnChrName: 早速向かうのか？ せっかくだし俺も立ち会わせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
早速向かうのか？
せっかくだし俺も立ち会わせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: You headin' over right now, then? I think I'll tag along to see how it goes down.
engSearchText:
You headin' over right now, then? I think I'll tag
along to see how it goes down.
jpnChrName: ああ──よろしく頼む。
jpnSearchText: ああ──よろしく頼む。

engChrName: Sure, go ahead. I don't mind the company.
engSearchText: Sure, go ahead. I don't mind the company.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはそのまま、シズナを とある心当たりの場所へと案内した。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはそのまま、シズナを
とある心当たりの場所へと案内した。

engChrName: Van led Shizuna to a merchant he felt might be able to assist her.
engSearchText:
Van led Shizuna to a merchant he felt might be able
to assist her.
jpnChrName: よぉ、ちょっといいか？
jpnSearchText: よぉ、ちょっといいか？

engChrName: Hey, buddy. Got a minute to talk?
engSearchText: Hey, buddy. Got a minute to talk?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんじゃないですか、 おや、そちらの方は……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんじゃないですか、
おや、そちらの方は……

engChrName: Well, hello there, Van! It's so wonderful to see you! And who else do you have with you today...?
engSearchText:
Well, hello there, Van! It's so wonderful to see you!
And who else do you have with you today...?
jpnChrName: まさか、かの名高き《斑鳩》の──！
jpnSearchText: まさか、かの名高き《斑鳩》の──！

engChrName: Oh, my gracious! Am I seeing things? Or is that the Ikaruga's right hand woman herself?!
engSearchText:
Oh, my gracious! Am I seeing things? Or is that the
Ikaruga's right hand woman herself?!
jpnChrName: 私のことを知ってるみたいだね？
jpnSearchText: 私のことを知ってるみたいだね？

engChrName: Oh, you know who I am? I'm flattered! Nice to meet you.
engSearchText:
Oh, you know who I am? I'm flattered! Nice to
meet you.
jpnChrName: 《白銀の剣聖》にお越しいただけるなんて、 恐縮、感激ですねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
《白銀の剣聖》にお越しいただけるなんて、
恐縮、感激ですねぇ！

engChrName: Oh, no, the pleasure is all mine, truly!
engSearchText: Oh, no, the pleasure is all mine, truly!
jpnChrName: 今日はどんなご入用で？
jpnSearchText: 今日はどんなご入用で？

engChrName: What brings you, of all people, to my humble little armory?
engSearchText:
What brings you, of all people, to my humble
little armory?
jpnChrName: ここは武器商店みたいだけど、 武具の修繕もできるかな？
jpnSearchText:
ここは武器商店みたいだけど、
武具の修繕もできるかな？

engChrName: It looks like you mostly sell weapons here, but you wouldn't happen to offer repair services, too, would you?
engSearchText:
It looks like you mostly sell weapons here, but you
wouldn't happen to offer repair services, too,
would you?
jpnChrName: ええ、承っておりますとも！
jpnSearchText: ええ、承っておりますとも！

engChrName: Why, yes, I do!
engSearchText: Why, yes, I do!
jpnChrName: じゃあちょっと 仕事を頼みたいんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
じゃあちょっと
仕事を頼みたいんだけど……

engChrName: Perfect. Then I've got a little favor to ask you...
engSearchText: Perfect. Then I've got a little favor to ask you...
jpnChrName: ああ、このことは他言無用で、いいかな？
jpnSearchText: ああ、このことは他言無用で、いいかな？

engChrName: ...but only if you keep my visit here a secret. I trust that won't be a problem?
engSearchText:
...but only if you keep my visit here a secret. I trust
that won't be a problem?
jpnChrName: も、もちろんですとも！ お客様のプライバシーはきちんと守ります！
jpnSearchText:
も、もちろんですとも！
お客様のプライバシーはきちんと守ります！

engChrName: Your secret's safe with me, ma'am! Confidentiality is my prime directive here at the shop.
engSearchText:
Your secret's safe with me, ma'am! Confidentiality is
my prime directive here at the shop.
jpnChrName: いやぁ、かの剣聖からの依頼ですか、 腕が鳴りますねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、かの剣聖からの依頼ですか、
腕が鳴りますねぇ！

engChrName: Oh, I'm just shaking! A real Divine Blade right here in my store! It's like Aidios herself descended right before my eyes!
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm just shaking! A real Divine Blade right here
in my store! It's like Aidios herself descended right
before my eyes!
jpnChrName: こ、これは……！
jpnSearchText: こ、これは……！

engChrName: My word...
engSearchText: My word...
jpnChrName: なんという刀身──ま、まるで この世のものではないような……！
jpnSearchText:
なんという刀身──ま、まるで
この世のものではないような……！

engChrName: Such splendid craftsmanship! It's so...so beautiful! Too beautiful for this world!
engSearchText:
Such splendid craftsmanship! It's so...so beautiful!
Too beautiful for this world!
jpnChrName: スミマセン、こんな代物をうちの店で 修理なんてできませんよぉ！
jpnSearchText:
スミマセン、こんな代物をうちの店で
修理なんてできませんよぉ！

engChrName: I'm really sorry, ma'am, but I don't think I have what it takes to handle a blade of such splendor!
engSearchText:
I'm really sorry, ma'am, but I don't think I have what
it takes to handle a blade of such splendor!
jpnChrName: ああこっちこっち、鞘の方さ。
jpnSearchText: ああこっちこっち、鞘の方さ。

engChrName: Oh, it's not the blade I need help with. It's the scabbard that needs attention.
engSearchText:
Oh, it's not the blade I need help with. It's the
scabbard that needs attention.
jpnChrName: はっ……し、失礼しました！
jpnSearchText: はっ……し、失礼しました！

engChrName: A-Ah, so it is! Forgive my presumption!
engSearchText: A-Ah, so it is! Forgive my presumption!
jpnChrName: なるほど、ここに僅かに 亀裂が入っていますねえ……
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、ここに僅かに
亀裂が入っていますねえ……

engChrName: Yes, it does seem to have developed a minor crack.
engSearchText: Yes, it does seem to have developed a minor crack.
jpnChrName: 少々特殊な作りのようですが、 問題なく修復はできるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
少々特殊な作りのようですが、
問題なく修復はできるでしょう。

engChrName: This seems to be made differently from your typical scabbard, but I should be able to restore it all the same.
engSearchText:
This seems to be made differently from your typical
scabbard, but I should be able to restore it all
the same.
jpnChrName: そう時間も掛かりません。
jpnSearchText: そう時間も掛かりません。

engChrName: In fact, it shouldn't take me all that long. Just give me a little time and I'll have it as good as new!
engSearchText:
In fact, it shouldn't take me all that long. Just give me
a little time and I'll have it as good as new!
jpnChrName: それなら良かった。
jpnSearchText: それなら良かった。

engChrName: Great! Glad to hear it!
engSearchText: Great! Glad to hear it!
jpnChrName: そうそう、欠けている部分の素材は これを使うといい。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、欠けている部分の素材は
これを使うといい。

engChrName: If you could just fill in the missing portion with this, that would be perfect.
engSearchText:
If you could just fill in the missing portion with this,
that would be perfect.
jpnChrName: これは……刀の切っ先か？
jpnSearchText: これは……刀の切っ先か？

engChrName: A blade tip? Where'd that come from?
engSearchText: A blade tip? Where'd that come from?
jpnChrName: うん、少し前に“弟弟子”から頂いた 戦利品みたいなものかな。
jpnSearchText:
うん、少し前に“弟弟子”から頂いた
戦利品みたいなものかな。

engChrName: From a younger disciple in my school. I like to think of it as a memento of the short time I shared with him.
engSearchText:
From a younger disciple in my school. I like to think
of it as a memento of the short time I shared
with him.
jpnChrName: よろしいのですか？　もっと鞘の修復に 適した素材も用意しておりますが。
jpnSearchText:
よろしいのですか？　もっと鞘の修復に
適した素材も用意しておりますが。

engChrName: Are you sure you want to do that? If I'm being honest, I have materials on hand that would be better suited for this sort of restoration.
engSearchText:
Are you sure you want to do that? If I'm being
honest, I have materials on hand that would be better
suited for this sort of restoration.
jpnChrName: 構わないさ。 むしろこの鞘には相応しいかな。
jpnSearchText:
構わないさ。
むしろこの鞘には相応しいかな。

engChrName: That's okay. I know what I'm asking for. I think this fits it better, personally.
engSearchText:
That's okay. I know what I'm asking for. I think this
fits it better, personally.
jpnChrName: それではお預かりします。 少々お時間をいただきますが。
jpnSearchText:
それではお預かりします。
少々お時間をいただきますが。

engChrName: As you wish! I'll have it patched up in just a few moments.
engSearchText:
As you wish! I'll have it patched up in just a
few moments.
jpnChrName: （ハン、《黒神一刀流》ってのが   どんな流派までかは知らんが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ハン、《黒神一刀流》ってのが
どんな流派までかは知らんが……）

engChrName: (Hmm... Can't say I really know what kind of style that Black God One Blade of hers is like.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... Can't say I really know what kind of style
that Black God One Blade of hers is like.)
jpnChrName: （弟弟子、か。）
jpnSearchText: （弟弟子、か。）

engChrName: (Got me curious about this 'younger disciple' of hers, though.)
engSearchText:
(Got me curious about this 'younger disciple' of
hers, though.)
jpnChrName: （龍來では噂の“新米剣聖”の   技を使ってやがったが……）
jpnSearchText:
（龍來では噂の“新米剣聖”の
技を使ってやがったが……）

engChrName: (I remember her using a fancy technique in Longlai that came from a new Divine Blade... Maybe the two are related.)
engSearchText:
(I remember her using a fancy technique in Longlai
that came from a new Divine Blade... Maybe the two
are related.)
jpnChrName: フフ、気になるかい？ 詳しく聞かせてあげようか。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、気になるかい？
詳しく聞かせてあげようか。

engChrName: Curious to learn more, huh? I'd be happy to fill you in.
engSearchText:
Curious to learn more, huh? I'd be happy to fill
you in.
jpnChrName: ……結構だ。 別に知りたくもねえしな。
jpnSearchText:
……結構だ。
別に知りたくもねえしな。

engChrName: ...I'll pass. Not really my business.
engSearchText: ...I'll pass. Not really my business.
jpnChrName: ふぅん。
jpnSearchText: ふぅん。

engChrName: Uh-huh. If you say so.
engSearchText: Uh-huh. If you say so.
jpnChrName: 終わりました、お受け取り下さい。
jpnSearchText: 終わりました、お受け取り下さい。

engChrName: All finished! Here you go, ma'am.
engSearchText: All finished! Here you go, ma'am.
jpnChrName: ふむ、なかなか良い仕事だね。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、なかなか良い仕事だね。

engChrName: Wonderful! I gotta say, I'm impressed—this looks pretty good. Thanks!
engSearchText:
Wonderful! I gotta say, I'm impressed—this looks
pretty good. Thanks!
jpnChrName: そんなそんな、恐縮です！
jpnSearchText: そんなそんな、恐縮です！

engChrName: Oh, gee, you're just too kind, Silverblade! It was my honor to have your business.
engSearchText:
Oh, gee, you're just too kind, Silverblade! It was my
honor to have your business.
jpnChrName: これで一安心かな。
jpnSearchText: これで一安心かな。

engChrName: All righty. Now that's one less thing to worry about.
engSearchText: All righty. Now that's one less thing to worry about.
jpnChrName: まあ鞘がないと不便だしな。
jpnSearchText: まあ鞘がないと不便だしな。

engChrName: I bet. Be a pain in the ass to lug that thing around if the scabbard went kaput.
engSearchText:
I bet. Be a pain in the ass to lug that thing around if
the scabbard went kaput.
jpnChrName: この子の場合はもうちょっと厄介なんだ。
jpnSearchText: この子の場合はもうちょっと厄介なんだ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. And the problems don't stop there with this sword.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. And the problems don't stop there with
this sword.
jpnChrName: 見る人が見れば“妖刀”とも 呼ばれかねない代物だからね。
jpnSearchText:
見る人が見れば“妖刀”とも
呼ばれかねない代物だからね。

engChrName: This isn't your average blade. It's always emanating a certain...energy. It's hard to describe.
engSearchText:
This isn't your average blade. It's always emanating a
certain...energy. It's hard to describe.
jpnChrName: なにせ常時刀身から 妖の気を放ち続けている。
jpnSearchText:
なにせ常時刀身から
妖の気を放ち続けている。

engChrName: Not exactly 'cursed', but more like 'imbued'. 'Bewitched', even, some trained eyes have called it.
engSearchText:
Not exactly 'cursed', but more like 'imbued'.
'Bewitched', even, some trained eyes have called it.
jpnChrName: 普段はこの鞘で抑え込んでいないと 大変なことになってしまうだろう。
jpnSearchText:
普段はこの鞘で抑え込んでいないと
大変なことになってしまうだろう。

engChrName: I have to keep that energy in check with the scabbard or it might...spill out. And that'd get real ugly, real fast.
engSearchText:
I have to keep that energy in check with the scabbard
or it might...spill out. And that'd get real ugly,
real fast.
jpnChrName: 大変なこと、ねぇ……
jpnSearchText: 大変なこと、ねぇ……

engChrName: ...Well, that ain't ominous at all.
engSearchText: ...Well, that ain't ominous at all.
jpnChrName: だからこの鞘も特別製でね……
jpnSearchText: だからこの鞘も特別製でね……

engChrName: Anyway, that's why the scabbard's made so differently.
engSearchText:
Anyway, that's why the scabbard's made
so differently.
jpnChrName: 使われている素材は全部強者（つわもの）の 武器や鎧からとった破片なのさ。
jpnSearchText:
使われている素材は全部強者（つわもの）の
武器や鎧からとった破片なのさ。

engChrName: The entire thing's built from weapons and armor that I took from formidable fighters I've encountered on my travels.
engSearchText:
The entire thing's built from weapons and armor that
I took from formidable fighters I've encountered on
my travels.
jpnChrName: 強者の闘気が込められた素材でないと この妖気を抑え込めないからね。
jpnSearchText:
強者の闘気が込められた素材でないと
この妖気を抑え込めないからね。

engChrName: Those weapons—and their wielders' fighting spirits— are the only materials capable of holding back the blade's power.
engSearchText:
Those weapons—and their wielders' fighting spirits—
are the only materials capable of holding back the
blade's power.

engChrName: ...Huh.
engSearchText: ...Huh.

engChrName: I...see.
engSearchText: I...see.
jpnChrName: ああ、これも他言無用でお願いするよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、これも他言無用でお願いするよ。

engChrName: If you could keep all that to yourself, too, shopkeep, I'd really appreciate it.
engSearchText:
If you could keep all that to yourself, too, shopkeep,
I'd really appreciate it.
jpnChrName: もも、もちろんですともぉッ！
jpnSearchText: もも、もちろんですともぉッ！

engChrName: Y-Yes, of course! My lips are sealed so tight, not even Aidios herself could pry them open!
engSearchText:
Y-Yes, of course! My lips are sealed so tight, not even
Aidios herself could pry them open!
jpnChrName: （そんな物騒極まりねえもんをしれっと   使ってるこいつは、一体何者なんだ？）
jpnSearchText:
（そんな物騒極まりねえもんをしれっと
使ってるこいつは、一体何者なんだ？）

engChrName: (Just who the hell is this chick, carryin' that dicey-ass blade on her like it's a walk in the park?)
engSearchText:
(Just who the hell is this chick, carryin' that dicey-ass
blade on her like it's a walk in the park?)
jpnChrName: （いや聞かない方がいいだろう……   そもそもさっきの言葉も本当とは限らねぇし。）
jpnSearchText:
（いや聞かない方がいいだろう……
そもそもさっきの言葉も本当とは限らねぇし。）

engChrName: (...Meh, probably shouldn't think on it too hard. It all sounded kinda bullshit, so maybe it WAS bullshit.)
engSearchText:
(...Meh, probably shouldn't think on it too hard. It all
sounded kinda bullshit, so maybe it WAS bullshit.)
jpnChrName: そうだね、もしかしたら全部 私が適当に言ったデタラメかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
そうだね、もしかしたら全部
私が適当に言ったデタラメかもしれない。

engChrName: Fair point—who's to say I DIDN'T just make it all up? It still got the point across, though, didn't it? Every sword needs a story.
engSearchText:
Fair point—who's to say I DIDN'T just make it
all up? It still got the point across, though, didn't it?
Every sword needs a story.
jpnChrName: 自分で言うのかよ……
jpnSearchText: 自分で言うのかよ……

engChrName: You really wanna cast that kinda doubt on your public image, though? Might not be a good look.
engSearchText:
You really wanna cast that kinda doubt on your public
image, though? Might not be a good look.
jpnChrName: ってだから勝手に人の心を読むんじゃねえ！
jpnSearchText: ってだから勝手に人の心を読むんじゃねえ！

engChrName: ...Wait, what the— Did you just read my mind?! I— Cut that shit out!
engSearchText:
...Wait, what the— Did you just read my mind?!
I— Cut that shit out!
jpnChrName: さて、おかげで鞘のことも解決したし そろそろ街に戻ろうかな。
jpnSearchText:
さて、おかげで鞘のことも解決したし
そろそろ街に戻ろうかな。

engChrName: Well, now that we've got all that out of the way, I think I'll be heading back up.
engSearchText:
Well, now that we've got all that out of the way, I
think I'll be heading back up.
jpnChrName: ヴァン、今日はありがとう。 近い内に、また。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、今日はありがとう。
近い内に、また。

engChrName: Thanks for showing me around, Van! Let's do this again some time soon, all right?
engSearchText:
Thanks for showing me around, Van! Let's do this
again some time soon, all right?
jpnChrName: ……？ あー、できれば遠慮したいがな。
jpnSearchText:
……？
あー、できれば遠慮したいがな。

engChrName: I'd, uh...really rather not make a habit of this if I can help it.
engSearchText:
I'd, uh...really rather not make a habit of this if I can
help it.
jpnChrName: フフ、ホントつれないなぁ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、ホントつれないなぁ。

engChrName: Aww, don't be such a spoilsport.
engSearchText: Aww, don't be such a spoilsport.
jpnChrName: 親交を深めるためにも、やっぱり ヴァンが提案した通り立ち会おうか？
jpnSearchText:
親交を深めるためにも、やっぱり
ヴァンが提案した通り立ち会おうか？

engChrName: Maybe you and I should square off after all like you suggested. Whatever it takes to build a better relationship with you! ㈱
engSearchText:
Maybe you and I should square off after all like
you suggested. Whatever it takes to build a better
relationship with you! ㈱
jpnChrName: だからそんな提案はしてねえよ！
jpnSearchText: だからそんな提案はしてねえよ！

engChrName: To hell with that! How many times do I have to tell you?!
engSearchText:
To hell with that! How many times do I have to
tell you?!
jpnChrName: その後、シズナと別れてどっと疲れながらも、 仲間と合流して活動を再開するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、シズナと別れてどっと疲れながらも、
仲間と合流して活動を再開するのだった。

engChrName: After bidding Shizuna an exhausted farewell, Van reunited with the rest of the gang and got back to work.
engSearchText:
After bidding Shizuna an exhausted farewell, Van
reunited with the rest of the gang and got back
to work.
jpnChrName: まぁ待て、アークライド。 用があるのはこの街の中だ。
jpnSearchText:
まぁ待て、アークライド。
用があるのはこの街の中だ。

engChrName: Hold it, Arkride. We've still got business in this part of town.
engSearchText:
Hold it, Arkride. We've still got business in this part
of town.
jpnChrName: ちっ……
jpnSearchText: ちっ……

engChrName: Gah! All right, all right.
engSearchText: Gah! All right, all right.
jpnChrName: おいおい、もう終わりとは言わねえよな？
jpnSearchText: おいおい、もう終わりとは言わねえよな？

engChrName: Hey, chief. You don't think you're done already, do you?
engSearchText:
Hey, chief. You don't think you're done already,
do you?
jpnChrName: はい、“作法”はまだ 十分に教わっていないかと。
jpnSearchText:
はい、“作法”はまだ
十分に教わっていないかと。

engChrName: Indeed. I believe you still have some things left to teach about navigating this district.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I believe you still have some things left to
teach about navigating this district.
jpnChrName: 仕方がねえ……ついてこい。
jpnSearchText: 仕方がねえ……ついてこい。

engChrName: Yeah, I guess you're right. Follow me. We'll keep going.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I guess you're right. Follow me. We'll
keep going.
jpnChrName: あの、もう少しここで マリエルさんを探してみませんか？
jpnSearchText:
あの、もう少しここで
マリエルさんを探してみませんか？

engChrName: Don't you think we should look around for Marielle a little more?
engSearchText:
Don't you think we should look around for Marielle a
little more?
jpnChrName: ったく、手のかかる女だぜ。
jpnSearchText: ったく、手のかかる女だぜ。

engChrName: Ugh, just what we needed. That chick's always causing trouble for us.
engSearchText:
Ugh, just what we needed. That chick's always
causing trouble for us.
jpnChrName: 巨大な隔壁で封鎖されている。
jpnSearchText: 巨大な隔壁で封鎖されている。

engChrName: The area is sealed off by an enormous barrier.
engSearchText: The area is sealed off by an enormous barrier.
jpnChrName: 外への通路に繋がっているようだが 扉はロックされている。
jpnSearchText:
外への通路に繋がっているようだが
扉はロックされている。
